40001001	To in Kiristo Hisos manga hasokfonan gis hagorangan, gin Dabid fag Gorangon hasokfonan, ka yadi gin Abraham fag hasokfonan.
40001002	In Abraham anak is Isaak, in Isaak anak is Hakob. In Hakob manga anak is Hoda, hanggan it manga fadwasay.
40001003	Da Faris da Sara in Hoda manga anak san Tamar. In Faris anak is Isrom hanggan in Isrom anak is Aram.
40001004	In Aram anak is Aminadab, in Aminadab anak is Naason. In Naason anak is Salmon.
40001005	Is Boos in Salmon anak san Rahab, ginya madi is Obid in Boos anak san Rot. In Obid anak is Hisi.
40001006	In Hisi anak is Dabid kawan bali gorangon fag Dabid. Ginya madi is Salomon in Dabid anak san Oriyas babay hyabi.
40001007	Ginyan Salomon anak is Roboam. In Roboam anak is Abiyas. In Abiyas anak is Asa.
40001008	In Asa anak is Hosafat hanggan in Hosafat anak is Horan. In Horan anak is Osiyas.
40001009	In Osiyas anak is Hotan. In Hotan anak is Akas. In Akas anak is Isikyas.
40001010	In Isikyas anak is Manasis. In Manasis anak is Amos. In Amos anak is Hosiyas.
40001011	In Hosiyas manga anak is Hikoniyas hanggan it manga fadwasay. Gis nanya fag masohod ka manga taga Babilonya igpilit wagtaban in Israil manga ha sokfonan has Babilonya.
40001012	Nondiya has Babilonya, in Hikoniyas anak is Salatiyal. In Salatiyal anak is Sorobabil.
40001013	In Sorobabil anak is Abiyod. In Abiyod anak is Iliyakim. Ginyan Iliyakim anak is Asor.
40001014	In Asor anak is Sadok. In Sadok anak is Akim. Ginyan Akim anak is Iliyod.
40001015	In Iliyod anak is Iliyasir. In Iliyasir anak is Matan. In Matan anak is Hakob.
40001016	Ginya madin Hakob anak is Hosi, kawa ka nababay in Mariya fag Hosi. To fag is Mariya kan Hisos ina. To fag is Hisos kawasta faglwangon, in Diyos-natogon-Famawi.
40001017	It kahologan, gin Abraham balin Dabid, safolo ha ofat ik hasokfonan taw, ginya madi, gin Dabid balis tagpilit wagtaban in Israil manga hasokfonan taw has Babilonya, safolo ha ofat, ginya safolo yadi ha ofat ik hasokfonan taw gistag pilit wagtaban has Babilonya balin Diyos-natogon-Famawi.
40001018	Kito is Kiristo Hisos nonsagaya. Is Mariya, kambali aba in Hisos ina, hanggan is Hosi, intohoyan talsawa aban. Dapat is Mariya danwa gabosog nyawa idyan saya in Hosi. To fag madolaw ka Maliyaw fag Falad nafatimawa.
40001019	Is Hosi, kan Mariya bato indoganon, mahoway, idwa kasayag fahaya in Mariya, yakanga hanya gayfan domayo lamang in Mariya, nyawadwa ha toltolan.
40001020	Is Hosi gisip wa gisip wa hanya baliwa. Ginya madi, sadi ginan, hanya no matoyogan, nalag kagfon intam it anghil sadi. Ka anghil nalwang han Hosi kiti, Hosi, in Dabid hasokfonan, haw fag idwa kadalag dagos han Mariya, kawa hanya gabosog maskin ka Maliyaw fag Falad nafatimawa.
40001021	Ka anak nomsagaya aban, ama wan. Haw fangayanan hanya is Hisos, maskin hanya ka bomawi it sakop fag manga taw git manga ogali dwat.
40001022	To fagayo inlag kitonya kaarakitay im-anod in Diyos fwayong git fangampang kitay,
40001023	Fandog ngay, sadik dayaga kadya hansaya ama, imbali gabosog, ginyat anak nomsagaya ama wan. Ta lomwang, Tos Imanyowil, it kahologan, Is Diyos sawantam.
40001024	Ginyas Hosi nonfolaw, intanog kagfon intam it anghil fwayong, nataban wan Mariya, naano hanya.
40001025	Dapat is Hosi idyan saya in Mariya hanggan wansagaya ka anak dararag ama, kat nafangayan is Hisos.
40002001	Sawas banwa Bitlihim, sakop Hodiya, is Hisos nonsagaya. Gis nanya fag masohod, is Hirodis ka gorangon sas Hodiya. Ya mangharaw, ha akwa yadin bangkad manga fiyahin ik famaklay madonong, kawa ha nagadalan has fanggasan baliwa. Tanbangkad has banwa Hirosalim git banwanan sas salogan myanit baliwa.
40002002	Ta nondasog, ta gintaw wa gintaw wa kitay, Siday ka gorangon manga Hodyo ka bagon sagaya hyabi ogbot? Mi no sa hyami banwanan yapdi, sas salogan myanit baliwa, mi nalag it fanggasan. Yakanga hamin bangkad kaarakitay manlibabaan hanya.
40002003	Is Hirodis, ka gorangon, no nadog kitonya, nangalibitan it fangayofan, hanggan sadi wak dahonya Hirosalim kitonya yadi.
40002004	Is Hirodis nafatifon fagayo fagayo fag manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, hanggan ka mangag faadal ka Batasan Hodyo, ginya naintaw has taw no siday mayon kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi, intam Gorangon, nomsagaya.
40002005	Ta nasagot kiti, Sas banwa Bitlihim, sakop Hodiya, hanya nomsagaya, maskin kiti in Diyos fangampang nasorat hyabi kitay,
40002006	Hanggan haw, banwa Bitlihim, san Hoda banwanan, Yatokitay im kangayanan ogbot man has manga banwa kanbantog sas sakop Hoda, Maskin giwa hyamo sadik Gorangon imbangkad Ka bomahala sangko sakop, in Israil manga hasokfonan.
40002007	Ginya madis Hirodis nafatawag ka manga famaklay madonong, kaarakitay tomwa no ginahin ka fanggasan nonlag, dapat idwag fadogon has iba taw.
40002008	Ginyas Hirodis nafalahaw has Bitlihim baliwa ka manga famaklay, dapat natogon yap kitay, Ham fag hanya wan, sayakan fiya fiya ka anak. Ginya ham no nalag, fwayongan ya angko no siday tonya kaarakitay hanggan aho hanya wan, lomibabaan yadi hanya.
40002009	Ka manga famaklay madonong, no nadog ka gorangon togon, inlahaw ya ngawan. Sadi ya ginan ta nalag ka fanggasan kasta lagan sas salogan myanit baliwa itfagonan, yakanga tagbaya wa dahol dahol. Ginya ka fanggasan nagona ya ngay has taw hanggan wa tandasog. Ka fanggasan natorosan sas tongod oliyanan anak.
40002011	Ginya ta nonsakbaw has basad balay, ka manga famaklay nalag ka anak san Mariya it ina akbang. Ta nanlibabaan hanggan nafasayagdog has anak. Ta nabongkat manga sohadan, ginya nadisag has anak, manga ginto, manga salong banglo kamangyan, hanggan tagok hayo mahalga, kawa mira.
40002012	Ginya madi ka manga famaklay madonong natagimfan kitay, ha nafwayong, Ham hawag dalan han Hirodis no goli. Yakanga ta hawas iba dalan no nwali hat banwanan.
40002013	Ka manga famaklay madonong nonlahaw wan, is Hosi natagimfan ya ngay, nalag sadik anghil gintam Fon. Ka anghil iglwang, Kalibang, fakabangon wan, tabanan wa ka talanak has Ihipto. No baliday hodyag fwayong hyamo, ham hayap galin ginya, maskin is Hirodis igsayak ka anak kaarakitay fahatay hanya.
40002014	Yakangas Hosi dagos inbangon gis nanya, inlahaw wan, yabi yapdi, nataban ka talanak has Ihipto.
40002015	Ta sinya wak nadogayan hanggan is Hirodis nodya natay. In-anod kito kaarakitay fatonglos kagfon intam it fwayong git fangampang kitay, Ho nafatawag angko anak gis sakop Ihipto.
40002016	Is Hirodis no natwa kitay ka manga famaklay madonong nabohag odi, nabaybay wa hanya no goli, hanya kaisog wa dahol dahol. Yakanga nasogot manga sakop, natogon kitay, Fahatayan fagayo fag manga anak ama balis dowak fangaraw it kadogayan, hanggan wa ka bago sagaya sas banwa Bitlihim hanggan wa ka sas manga ligongan. Is Hirodis nafwayong kitonya maskin no naintaw gis manga famaklay madonong, taglwang kitay dowak fangaraw kantolas giwasta nalag ka fanggasan bago bago.
40002017	Yakanga in Hirimiyas, in Diyos fangampang nafwayong in-anod wan, noglwang kiti,
40002018	Sadik hasnog indog sas banwa Rama, igngongoy hanggan igrokyaw marigon. Is Rakil ka naoraw it manga anak, Fawa kalibang it fangayofan, Maskin it manga anak natay wan.
40002019	Ginya madis Gorangon Hirodis no natay wan, is Hosi natagimfan ya ngay sas Ihipto, nalag in Diyos anghil. Ka anghil nafwayong han Hosi,
40002020	Haw fakabangon, tabanan ya ngay ka talanak has banwanan Israil, maskin ka manga kasayag fahatay ka anak hyabi natay wan.
40002021	Yakangas Hosi inbangon, ginya nafaoli ka talanak has banwanan Israil.
40002022	Dapat is Hosi no nadog kitay is Arkilao man ka natobos it ama is Hirodis, kanbali gorangon sas Hodiya, is Hosi kadala goli has banwa Bitlihim. Sadi ya ginan ha nafatagak in Hosi basad tagimfan, yakanga hawas sakop Galiliya.
40002023	Ginya da Hosi nabanwanan sas banwa Nasarit, kaarakitay faanod in Diyos fangampang fwayong kitay, Ta ngomayan hanya sadik taga Nasarit.
40003001	Gis nanya fag masohod, is Hwan, kagfatogna manga taw, indasog sas sakop Hodiya, sas basad fakahyabogan. Sinya no nafaadal bago bago.
40003002	Hanyag lwang, Ham fag soyo, obonan yadi ka hayo manga ogali dwat, maskin ka gim tongod kaakbang wa kabali Gorangon.
40003003	Kawas Hwan iglwang kitonya, hanya kan Isayas, in Diyos fangampang, faglwangon no danwa ngap nafwayong kitay, Kiti kat nafwayong kagtawag marigon marigon sas basad fakahyabogan kitay, Fatalagaan in Diyos bato lahawan, Fahaslongan it manga dalan.
40003004	Gis nanya in Hwan rotay olad kamilyo mahaligan, anit yadit fagyahos, manga fan hanggan dyahot it fanganon.
40003005	Ka manga taga Hirosalim fagayo, hanggan fagayo gis sakop Hodiya, hanggan ka gis bali bali difay safa Hordan, nagobok in Hwan sinya.
40003006	Is Hwan nafatogna manga taw sas safa Hordan, hanggan ta nabayat sadili manga naogali dwat.
40003007	Dapat is Hwan noglag kaaywanon fag manga Farisiyo hanggan Sadosiyo gakbang ha hanya kaarakitay fatogna wan, is Hwan nalwang has taw, Ham bilang odi manga abyanon no madaya. Fakta kagfatagak hayo kitay ham fag lagyo wan gin Diyos fadosaan ka kadasog aban?
40003008	Fag hanggan wa hayo manga bohad ogali kagfalag kitay ham igsoyo.
40003009	Ham fag idwa kasyag kitay maskin ham in Abraham manga hasokfonan, ya fiya wan. Gwadi hogfwayong ha hayo kitay, gistay fag manga bato is Diyos syagan kalig in Abraham manga hasokfonan orongan.
40003010	Gis kati ginan ka wasay danwam hatak sas dalid hayo, omobang fagayo fagayo fag manga fon hayo kadwa fiyat manga bohad, omokas wa has basad afoy.
40003011	Sas danom ho fatogna hayo, kawa tandaan kitay ham igsoyo, hanggan ham gobon yadi hayo manga ogali dwat. Dapat ka goyan angko, gingko ginanan, madonong man angko, sas Maliyaw fag Falad hanya no fatogna hayo, hanggan sas afoy. Ho kaya mandiya ngadit lapak.
40003012	Hanya ha bitbit fanayang kaarakitay falayon fiya fiya it opa, manga ohot. Tomifon it tirigo sas basad dongdong, dapat ay, somonog wa ka manga ohot sas afoy kadwa kapsa.
40003013	Ginya madis Hisos indasog sas safa Hordan gis sakop Galiliya, naakbang han Hwan kaarakitay is Hwan fatogna nangos hanya.
40003014	Is Hwan nasanggala in Hisos, nalwang, Fag haw ngap nangos ka fatogna angko, dapat haw di ngap ka gakbang hangko.
40003015	Dapat is Hisos nasagot kiti, Kati fag masohod faangayan wangko, maskin to fag im-anod kaarakitay in Diyos kafangayofanan imtonglos wan. Yakangas Hwan nafaangay wan.
40003016	Is Hwan nontabo wa ngag fatogna in Hisos, is Hisos hawas dayo danom. Ka manghara banwa sam tongod inboklas wan, ginyas Hisos nalag in Diyos Falad kitos salompati kayokfo ha hanya gis tongod.
40003017	Ginya ha nahampang gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, nalwang, Tongko fagalwasiyon fag Anak, hogbaya wa dahol dahol hanya.
40004001	Ginya madi ka Maliyaw fag Falad nataban in Hisos has basad fakahyabogan, kaarakitay is Fandaya somolay faloksowan hanya.
40004002	Ofat ik safolok yabi hanggan ofat ik safolok sirang is Hisos idwa ha nahwan hanon, yakanga kalonos wa dahol.
40004003	Is Fandaya kagsolay hanya nondasog, nalwang han Hisos, Haw non Diyos wa nga Anak, haw fabaliyan nangos tinapay to fag manga bato.
40004004	Dapat is Hisos nasagot, Insorat kitay, Bohondi ka fanganon kagfaboyag manga taw, Dapat fagayo fag manga hampang gin Diyos bibig kagfaboyag manga taw.
40004005	Ginya madis Fandaya nataban in Hisos has baba atop Fanimbaan-Dahol, abwat abwat sas Hirosalim, ka banwa kantohoyan han Diyos.
40004006	Hanyag lwang han Hisos, Haw non Diyos wa nga Anak, fadagdagan nangos hyamo ham daga, is baba daga, maskin insorat kitay, Hanya tomogon it manga anghil kitay, ta fag omano hyamo, insorat yadi kitay Ta somambot di hyamo kaarakitay im bitis idwam iktan has bato.
40004007	Is Hisos iglwang hanya, Insorat yadi kitay, Haw fag idwag tikis igsolay kagfon hyamo, hyamo Diyos.
40004008	Ginya madi, sadi ya ginan is Fandaya nataban in Hisos ha baba fongso abwat abwat, sas fakabantayan, nafalag hanya ka manga gorangon sakop fagayo fagayo sadik dahonya baba daga, hanggan ista manga kaakwaan sinya.
40004009	Is Fandayag lwang han Hisos, Haw no ha ngangkok manlibabaan hanggan somimba, ho domisag wa hyamo to fagayo fagayo hyamo lagan.
40004010	Is Hisos nasogo in Fandaya, nalwang, Satanas, haw fag idwastay, haw fag lahaw wan, maskin insorat kitay, Fag is Diyos kagfon hyamo kam fagfasayaon igdog, Fag in Diyos lamang sogo kam fakatanogon.
40004011	Ginyas Fandaya naobon in Hisos. Manga anghil inbangkad, natogbong hanya.
40004012	Ginya madis Hisos nadog kitay ta nafaporiso in Hwan, yakanga nwali has sakop Galiliya,
40004013	dapat nabanwanan sas banwa Kapirnaom, idwa sas banwa Nasarit. Ka banwa Kapirnaom sas gobang linaw dahol, linaw Galiliya, sas bahalan manga banwanan Sabolon hanggan Niptali.
40004014	Yakangan Isayas, in Diyos fangampang fwayong in-anod wan, kitay,
40004015	Ka banwanan Sabolon hanggan ka banwanan Niptali Has dagat baliwa sas difay Hordan, Ka bali Galiliya ka banwanan manga Hintil,
40004016	Ka manga taw sinya fag manga banwanan Sawas basad fakaharoman hyabi, Dapat, no dogay wan, taglag yawa masilaw. Kati to fag yawa yomawa Has fagayo ka hyabi maayfanan odi daga gohom kahatayan.
40004017	Ginya ginan is Hisos nafaadal has taw, iglwang kiti, Ham fag soyo wan hanggan obonan hayo manga ogali dwat, maskin ka gim tongod kaakbang wa kabali Gorangon.
40004018	Ginya madi, aban ogbot, is Hisos nogdalan sas bahalan linaw dahol, tagngayan tonya fag linaw Dagat Galiliya, is Hisos nalag dowak ama, is Simon, kawasta faglwangon is Pidro, hanggan it fadwasay is Andris. Gis nanya ta gokas it manga sarap ha basad linaw, maskin pariho fangoyang fag manga taw.
40004019	Is Hisos nalwang has taw, Ham tahinan wangko, ho fabali hayo manga fangiktan manga taw.
40004020	Ginya ginan ta nadagos wa naobon it manga sarap, natahin wan Hisos.
40004021	Ta noglahaw wan, is Hisos nalag yadi inda Santyago da Hwan, dowasay, in Sibidiyo manga anak, sas basad baloto, gofodan hat ama. Tagsip it manga sarap. Is Hisos natawag wa ka dowasay.
40004022	Ta dagos wa naobon it baloto hanggan it ama, ginya natahin wan Hisos.
40004023	Is Hisos nafahaskat sadik dahonya sakop Galiliya, igfaadal sas basad manga fanimbaan Hodyo, natoltol yadi ka Fiya fag Barita kawa han Diyos sakop baliwa. Igfafiya yadi ista manga sagit fagayo, hanggan ista manga fagdogon mahori.
40004024	In Hisos ibolon kabantog wan sa sadik dahonya sakop Siriya. Yakanga ta nadiya han Hisos fagayo ka manga ha sagit, hanggan kasta manga fagdogon mahori bokod bokod, ka manga ha labang kagfapaong hasta sadili, ka manga kalobay, hanggan ka mangadwa syagan kimot no kasagit. Is Hisos nafafiya lamang fagayo.
40004025	Yakanga kaaywanan wa fag manga taw gis sakop Galiliya, gi yadi sadik layonan ka ha safolok banwa, gis banwa Hirosalim, gis sakop Hodiya, hanggan kawa gis difay Hordan naoyan wan Hisos.
40005001	Is Hisos noglag manga taw bilang wa tigasaw it kaaywanan, is Hisos hawas baba moyod. Is Hisos no natokaw sinya, it manga katogbong naakbang yadi hanya,
40005002	ginyas Hisos nafaadal has taw kiti,
40005003	Ka mangadwa ha takan bomaya wan, maskin in Diyos sakop is taw wan.
40005004	Ka ha karongkotan bomaya wan, kawas Diyos igfalibang ista fangayofan.
40005005	Ka manga mahoway bomaya wan, maskin ta omafo in Diyos natogon fagayo.
40005006	Ka manga gwayan wa kasaya katanog in Diyos fakasayaon, bomaya yadi wan, maskin im-anod wa kasta fakasayaon.
40005007	Ka manga maawaon bomaya wan, maskin is Diyos im-awa yadis taw.
40005008	Ka manga maliyaw it fangayofan bomaya yadi wan, maskin ta lomag in Diyos.
40005009	Ka mangag faamigosan ya has manga gawayan bomaya wan, maskin is Diyos lomwang kitay tonya fag manga taw it manga wa anak.
40005010	Kasta manga fagfahoriyon kawa ta no katanog in Diyos kafangayofanan bomaya wan, maskin ta omofod in Diyos san Diyos sakop aban.
40005011	Manga taw nogyod hayo, mangag fahoriyan hanggan igfadwat odig dog hayo, maskin aho ka hayo fagalwasiyon, ista manga hampang dwat sonson wa bohag, idwa ha fakaanodan, ham bomaya wan.
40005012	Fag masolong di hayo fangayofan, fag idwa kabalaw, kawa dahol hayo tanggapon fasalamat aban san Diyos banwanan sam tongod. Kitonya yadi kasta naibolon hyabi ta nogfahoriyan in Diyos manga fangampang ka nagona hayo.
40005013	Ham bilang wa asin istay is baba daga. Dapat ka tamis nonbol wan gis asin, kinda odi nogfatamis ya ka asin, ham gayfan? Fawa ha fakinabang tonya fag asin, ta omokas odi, manga taw lomid lamang.
40005014	Ham bilang yadi wa salong istay is baba daga. Idwa ha syagan tomago sadik banwa, ka banwa no sas baba moyod.
40005015	Idwa ha taw igsonog salong ginyag fwalid sas daga gantangan. Yatokitay, fag sawa ngap is salangan fiya fiya nogsalifit ka salong, kaarakitay yomawa has fagayo sadi wak dahonya basad balay.
40005016	Ham fag kitonya yadi, ham fag fayawa yadi hayo salong sas faglagan manga taw, kaarakitay ta lomag hayo fiya fag ogali, ginya ta mamasayag dog yadi hayo Ama sat banwanan sam tongod kitay, hanya kafiyaon.
40005017	Ham fag idwa gisip kitay honbangkad hastay kaarakitay iglaban ka manga Batasan Hodyo, hanggan in Diyos manga fangampang adal hyabi. Yatokitay, maskin honbangkad hastay kaarakitay ho fatonglos tonya fagayo.
40005018	Ham fag matohodan kitay ka banwa sam tongod hanggan ka daga imliyam di aban, dapat ngadi ogbot ogbot fag bagay sas Batasan Hodyo idwam liyam it karigonan, tonya nodyan anod fagayo.
40005019	Yakanga nyawa faktaw kagfabali idwa ha kahologan ngadi sadik ogbot fag bagay gis Batasan Hodyo, hanggan igfaadal has taw kitonya, is Diyos igfatimbang hanya libaba man has fagayo it kangayanan sat sakop sam tongod. Dapat ay, ka katanog ka manga Batasan Hodyo fagayo, hanggan igfaadal kitonya has taw, is Diyos iglwang kitay, abwat it kangayanan sat sakop sam tongod.
40005020	Maskin hogfwayong hayo, no kito odi ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan manga Farisiyo ham no katanog in Diyos kafangayofanan, ham idwam aktom hat sakop sam tongod.
40005021	Ham nadog kitay hyabi ta natogon has taw, Haw fag idwag fahatay taw. Nyawa faktaw nogfahatay taw, ka fangabaya mamatohoyan hanya has fadosaan.
40005022	Dapat kati kangko fagfwayongon ha hayo, ngadi ka gisog it fadwasay, ka fangabaya fatohoyan hanya hat fadosa. Kagyod dit fadwasay, ka manga ha kangayanan Hodyo sasta Fanoltolan fatohoyan hanyat fadosa. Hanggan nyawa faktaw noglwang hat fadwasay, Paong paong haw, ngandayo imtohoyan has fadosaan manga taw sas afoy.
40005023	Yakanga haw no ha diya fagdisagon fangafiyan han Diyos, dapat igtohod kitay im fadwasay ha fakahoriyon ha hyamo,
40005024	obonan yap im disagon sas dayo fanogban. Ha fag hayap im fadwasay, haw famatohoyan yap hanya fiya fiya. Ginya ara ha fakafwali ya, fag bago domisag im disagon han Diyos.
40005025	No hagsombong ha hyamo has fangabaya, famatohoyan yap hasagsombong, ha no somyagan di, haw nodya sas fagdogan fangabaya. Maskin haw nodwa syagan igfatohoyan, ta domiya wa ara hyamo has fangabaya. Ginya ka fangabaya ka domisag hyamo hasag bantay porisowan, ginya madi hamporiso wan.
40005026	Hogfwayong hyamo hadwa malfas ginya aban, haw nodya nabayad hanggan wa kat kahaminan fag saga.
40005027	Ham nadog kitay ta natogon has taw hyabi, Haw fag idwag fabayowan.
40005028	Dapat kati hogfwayong ha hayo kitay, nyawa fakta fag ama kagbantay has ina, ha fangayofan wa kasaya hanya, sat fangayofan nafabayowan wa hanya fag ina.
40005029	Nom mata kagtaban hyamo has ogali dwat, sowatan lamang im mata ginya okasan wan. Maskin im habilogan it baliw nomliyam, tonya fiya man has habilogan sadi wak dahonya nom hadasogan has fadosaan manga taw sas afoy.
40005030	Nom gamat man kagtaban hyamo has ogali dwat, lifongan wam gamat, ginya okasan wan. Maskin im habilogan it baliw nomliyam, tonya fiya man has habilogan sadi wak dahonya, not hadasogan has fadosaan manga taw sas afoy.
40005031	Ka Batasan Hodyo gin Mwisis nalwang yadi kitay, sadik ama no gobon it babay fag ha kasoratan kitay hanya nadayo wan.
40005032	Dapat kati hogfwayong ha hayo, ka ama no gobon it babay, nyawat babay idwa ha nafabayowan, ginya kat babay omindogan iba ama, kawat indogan gona ka ha dwat, maskin igfangolo it babay hasagfabayowan baliwa. Hanggan nyawa fakta fag ama ka bomabay ista nagobonan fag ina, tonya fag ama igfabayowan yadi wan.
40005033	Ham nadog yadi kitay ta natogon has manga taw hyabi hyabi, haw nogtangkod marigon kitay haw ha togon bato ibolonon, haw fag fatonglos kam natangkod san Diyos fagdogan.
40005034	Dapat kati hogfwayong ha hayo, ham fag idwag faaywanon hampang ha no ha tangkod. Ham fag idwag lwang, In Diyos banwanan sam tongod fadi wadagdog angko hampang, maskin kat banwanan sam tongod in Diyos wa fanokawan gorangon.
40005035	Fag idwa yadig tangkod wa kitay, Ka daga fadi wadagdog angko hampang, maskin ka daga in Diyos wa lidan bitis. Fag idwa yadig lwang kitay, Ka banwa Hirosalim fadi wadagdog angko hampang, maskin ka Hirosalim ka Dahol fag Gorangon it sadili banwa.
40005036	Haw fag idwa yadig lwang Nyawa aho matay wan, maskin no kadi haw, hadwa syagan igfabanonan, mangag fahasding im bok alfoyo ngadi sadik ogat.
40005037	Fiya wam fwayong, hawag dogang ya domwag, no ala, fag lwang ala wan, nodwan, fag lwang idwan. Maskin no ha dogang yat tangkod giwas kadwatan tonyat fagfonan.
40005038	Ham nadog kasta fwayong kitay, No mata man di kasta nafadwat, ta fag gomanti, domwat mandi ista mata. No ngifon, ngifon mandi kasta fagfadwaton.
40005039	Dapat kati hogfwayong ha hayo, ham fag idwag laban ka dwat fag taw. No hagtofa hyamo marigon balis sihon fag faringfing, fag hanggan wa ka balis wala.
40005040	No hagsombong hyamo hasagtalinga hampangan kaarakitay igbolay im balokas, disagan yadi wa hanggan kam rotay ka aba aba.
40005041	No hagfafasan hyamo it diya sadik liho, fasanan dowa man ik liho.
40005042	Disagan hasagsagad gi hyamo, fag idwa kwangit ka manga goyam hyamo.
40005043	Ham nadog kasta manga fwayong hyabi, Haw fag kaawa im manga fakilalaon dapat fag kaisog im manga kaaway.
40005044	Dapat to yadi kangko fwayong, Ham fag kaawa hayo manga kaaway, ham fag darangin yadi kawa has mangag fahoriyan hayo,
40005045	kaarakitay ham imbali hayo Ama manga anak orongan, hayo Ama ka sat banwanan sam tongod. Maskin hayo wa Ama ka sat banwanan sam tongod kagfasalog ka myanit has manga dwat fag manga taw hanggan has fiya. Hayo yadi wa Ama kagfahwayan has manga taw kantohoyan hanya, hanggan has manga taw ka kafang hanya.
40005046	No ka lamang manga kaawa hayo, ka hayo fakaawaon, kana ka hayo fagfanayaon fasalamat aban, ham gayfan? Idwa awkin kitonya yadi kat ogali ka manga fanohot bohis?
40005047	No ka odi hayo manga fadwasay ka hayo fakampangon mahoway, kana ka hayo ogali ka fiya man has taw? Ka manga Hintil, kadya kilala in Diyos, kampang mahoway no hadit manga fadwasay.
40005048	Yakanga hayo manga ogali fag kabali fiya wa malayon, kito yadi ka hayo Ama sat banwanan sam tongod no fiya wa malayon.
40006001	Ham fag matohodan kitay ham no gogali fiya, fag bohonwa kitay famalagon odis taw. No famalagon odis taw, ham idwa ha tanggapon fasalamat gi hayo Ama ka sat banwanan sam tongod.
40006002	Yakanga, haw no kasayag disag has myabog, haw fag idwa gawang has fakaaywanan, kito kasta ogali ka manga ha takan nogfadog sas fanimbaan, hanggan sayo basad karsada. Kitonya ista ogali kaarakitay manga taw mamasayag dog ha hanya. Hogfwayong hayo ta natanggap wat fasalamat.
40006003	Dapat haw nogdisag has myabog, sakwag fadog nyawa kawa kam fakilalaon fiya fiya,
40006004	kaarakitay bohonwa famalagon odis taw haw nogdisag has myabog. Ginya madi hyamo Ama kaglag hyamo ogali fiya, haw no nadisag kitonya, domisag fasalamat ha hyamo.
40006005	Ham nogdarangin, ham fag idwag sokfon ka ogali manga ha takan. Ta nogdarangin, ista fakasayaon, ta fag malindogan sas fanimbaan, ngatay sas basad fagsalahan karsada, maskin famalagon odis taw. Hogfwayong hayo ta natanggap it fasalamat.
40006006	Dapat haw nogdarangin, haw fag sakbaw ham basad balay, fag tahop wan. Ginya madi haw fag darangin ha hyamo Ama kaglag hyamo, nyawa hadyapdi nalag hanya, ginya hyamo Ama domisag yadi ha hyamo fasalamat, kawa fiya kam naogali nogdarangin, bohonwa famalagon odis taw.
40006007	Ham nogdarangin ham fag idwag faaywanon hampang kito kasta ogali manga Hintil. Ta gayfan kitay ista fagsyagon domog wan kawasta hampang kaaywanon.
40006008	Ham fag idwag sokfon is taw kitonya. Maskin ham nodyag sagad gi hayo Ama, hanya danwa twa no kana ka hayo kakorangan.
40006009	Yakanga fag kiti ham nogdarangin, Hyami Ama ka sawam banwanan sas tongod, Hyamo ngayan bohonwa fagswayon.
40006010	Haw fag kabali hari, kagsakop has fagayo. Im kafangayofanan fag kaanod fagaba istay is baba daga, no kinday no fagaba kaanod sam banwanan sam tongod.
40006011	Disagan nangos ha hyami hyami fanganon ka homosto tangona fag sirang.
40006012	Haw fag faliyam hyami manga naogali dwat, no kinday hami nogfaliyam ista naogali dwat ha hyami.
40006013	Fag idwag faakbang hyami has manga dwat kaarakitay igsolay hyami, Dapat bawiyan hyami gin Satanas. (Maskin haw wa ka Hari kagsakop fagayo, haw kadwa ha bosal, sawa hyamo yadi ka kafiyan, nyawa ginahin. Fag kitonya wa ngay.)
40006014	Maskin ham nogfaliyam ista manga naogali dwat ha hayo, hayo Ama sat banwanan sam tongod, mamaliyam yadi hayo manga ogali dwat.
40006015	Dapat ham nogbotang yapdi ista manga naogali dwat ha hayo, hayo Ama idwa yadi faliyam hayo manga naogali dwat.
40006016	Ham nodwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin, ham fag idwag falagon kitay ham roko-roko kito ka manga taw kagfalagon odis taw. Tadwag fafiyanon it habilogan kaarakitay manga taw tomwa kitay tadwa kwan hanon gis nanya fag masohod. Hogfwayong ha hayo ta natanggap it fasalamat.
40006017	Nyawa haw idwag yafon, idwag yabas kaarakitay mandarangin, haw fag fafiyanon im habilogan, im bok fag masorodan di, fag yamos yap im mata,
40006018	kaarakitay manga taw idwa kadolaw kitay hadwa kwan hanon. Im Ama kaglag hyamo, nyawa hadyapdi nalag hanya, hanya lamang ka nalag kitay haw gibolon kitonya, gogali fiya, bohonwa famalagon odis taw, hanya ka domisag fasalamat ha hyamo.
40006019	Ham fag idwag tifon kaakwaan istay sas baba daga, maskin ha manga tipakong kagat, ha manga aningga kwan yadi, ha akwa yadi manga fangnahaw igsakbaw.
40006020	Ka fiya, ham nogtifon hayo kaakwaan, fag san Diyos banwanan sam tongod, maskin sinya idwa ha tipakong homagat, idwa yadi ha aningga, idwa yadi ha fangnahaw igsakbaw.
40006021	Maskin no sidak mabotangan hayo kaakwaan, hayo fangayofan sinya yadi wak maisipan fagaba.
40006022	Ka mata ka bilang wa salong sas haboyagan. Yakanga im mata no fiya, igfayawam haboyagan sadi wak dahonya.
40006023	Dapat im mata no dwat, im haboyagan sadik dahonya inbali yadi wa marom. Yakanga ka yawa sa hyamo no marom mangharaw, marom wa dahol dahol tonya.
40006024	Idwa ha taw syagan igfasohodan katanog has dowa kagsogo hanya. Matohoyanan ha fagfiliyon, ngatay kawilit fon sadi, ngatay kadwat iglag kat fadowa, ngatay katanog fiya fiya ka sadi, dapat igfasigpala wa kat fadowa. Ham idwa syagan katanog in Diyos hanggan has kaakwaan igsohodan.
40006025	Yakanga hogfwayong ha hayo, ham fag idwa galibitan hayo fanganon hanggan inomon kaarakitay ham imboyag, ngatay hayo rotay bato solongon. Idwa awkin ka haboyagan bohondi kitos fanganon no mahalga, ham gayfan, hanggan ka habilogan bohondi kitos rotay?
40006026	Fanlag ngay, ham bantayan ka manga manok, idwag famgas, idwa yadi gani, idwa yadi ha tifon basad dongdong, dapat ay nyawa kitonya, hayo Ama sat banwanan sam tongod kagfahwan di ka manga manok. Gwadi ham bohondi kitos manga manok ik mahalga.
40006027	Fakta fag taw sa hayo syagan igfadogay it haboyagan sas baba daga, ngadi sadik tama sinyahod kawa no galibitan, ham gayfan?
40006028	Kana ham no galibitan hayo solong rotay? Yabay ka manga borahan igborak basad talon, gwadi tonya idwag bonang, idwa yadi kalig rotay.
40006029	Dapat hogfwayong hayo, nyawas Salomon igsolong it rotay fiya man has fagayo, ka sadik borahan fiya man inyak kabantay, idwa ha matoga.
40006030	Is Diyos no bilang wagfasolong rotay kafiyaon kabantay has manga lamnon, ka kati malangba basad talon, dapat ay, no marom ngandayo imsonog lamang, idwa awkin labi man is Diyos wa ka farotay hayo? Laya ogbot yapdi ham nogsyag hanya.
40006031	Yakanga ham fag idwa galibitan hayo fanganon, hayo inomon, hayo manga solongon rotay.
40006032	Maskin tonya fag manga bagay ka manga Hintil fagalibiton. Hayo Ama sat banwanan sam tongod fadi wadtwa kitay korang yadi sa hayo ham nodwa ha akwa tonya fag manga bagay.
40006033	Bago bago ham fag fasakop fiya fiya han Diyos hanggan fag katanog it manga fwayong, ginya madi ham tomanggap yadi tonya fag manga bagay fagayo.
40006034	Yakanga ham fag idwa galibitan ka manga bagay ka bago marom. Nomdasog sa sadik bago marom, gis nanya yabay, bago mangisip kitay kinda odi kati. Sa sadik sirang it fagisipon hosto wan.
40007001	Ham fag idwa gato fagaba hayo kapariho kaarakitay is Diyos idwa yadi gato hayo.
40007002	Maskin no kinday ham no gato is taw, kitonya yadi is Diyos no gato hayo. No kinday hayo gantangan has taw, kitonya yadi is Diyos no gomantang ha hayo.
40007003	Kana mayon haw nogbantay ka rokrok sam fadwasay basad mata, dapat hagfabayaan ka sa hyamo sadili mata bilang wa dahos batang?
40007004	Kinda araw haw no lomwang ha hyamo fadwasay, ho nangos bomol ka rokrok gi hyamo mata, dapat sa hyamo, ya manghara, ha akwa yadi daho was batang?
40007005	Hagfataka odi, gwadi bol yap ka daho was batang ka sa hyamo sadili mata, ha bago di lomag fiya fiya, ginya madi ha tomwa bomol ka rokrok gim fadwasay mata.
40007006	Ham fag idwag disag has ido ka manga bagay kantohoyan han Diyos, ngandayo ka ido bomantay araw, ngomarngar ha hyamo. Ham fag idwa gokas has baboy hayo ono bolawan, ngandayo lomid odi tonya.
40007007	Ham fag sagad, ginya ham tomanggap hayo fagsagadon. Ham fag sayak a, ham lomag wa ka hayo fagsayahon. Ham fag sagam gi dayo balay, ginya ta fasakbaw hayo.
40007008	Maskin fagayo kagsagad tomanggap wa kat fagsagadon, fagayo kagsayak lomag wa kat fagsayahon, hanggan fagayo kagsagam gi dayo balay, ta fasakbaw wan.
40007009	No tinapay ka hayo anak fagsagadon, ham awkin domisag bato?
40007010	No oyang man kat fagsagadon, ham awkin domisag abyanon?
40007011	Gwadi no ham, nyawa kitay hayo manga ogali idwa fiya, ham idwag disag ha hayo manga anak kadwa fiya hanon, idwa awkin bohondi kitonyak mahoway hayo Ama ka sat banwanan sam tongod? Fiya fag manga bagay kat fagdisagon has mangag sagad gi hanya.
40007012	No kinday hayo fakasayaon ista ogaliyon ha hayo, ham fag gogali yadi kitonya ha hayo manga kapariho. Kitonya yadi ka Batasan Hodyo it manga kahologan hanggan in Diyos manga fangampang adal hantam.
40007013	Ham fag danwag sakbaw has ogbot fag sakbawan alad, maskin dahol ka sakbawan hanggan gorangon ka dalan ka hawas kadwatan, aywan kaglahaw hanya.
40007014	Dapat ay, ogbot ka sakbawan, mahori yadi ka dalan ka hadasogan has haboyagan, hanggan sayok di kaglag ka ogbot fag dalan.
40007015	Ham fag matagahan ka manga bohagon fag manga fangampang. Magop wan no kalag di, ta nombangkad ha hayo, bilang manga topa, dapat ka orongan sasta basad fangayofan kitos ido maisog gi basad talon.
40007016	Ham lomag wat manga ogali no kinday. Tam awkin igfangta bohad obas gis lamnon madogi, ngatay bohad igos gis fon haya-haya, ham gayfan?
40007017	Ka fon hayo no fiya, igbohad yadi fiya, dapat ka fon hayo no dwat mandi, igbohad mandi dwat.
40007018	Maskin ka fiya fag fon hayo idwa somyagan bomohad dwat, kitonya yadi ka dwat fag fon hayo idwa somyagan bomohad fiya.
40007019	Fagayo fag fon hayo kadwag bohad fiya, ta omobang lamang a, somonog wan.
40007020	Yakanga ham homilala ka manga bohagon fag manga fangampang git manga bohad ogali.
40007021	Idwa fagayo kagngayan angko, Angko Fon, ka somakbaw han Diyos banwanan fag sakop sam tongod aban, dapat ka katanog lamang angko Ama sas tongod it kafangayofanan ka somakbaw sinya.
40007022	Ka mahalga fag Sirang nomdasog aban, aywan ka lomwang hangko, Hyami Fon, gwadi mi namaadal yadi has taw im hampang, mi nafalagyo yadi ka manga labang, mi naibolon yadi manga madolaw sa hyamo ngayan karigonan.
40007023	Dapat ho lomwang has taw, Nyawa ginahin hodwa nahilala hayo. Ham fag ayayo gingko, ham ka manga gogali dwat fagaba.
40007024	Yakanga fagayo kagtalinga angko manga hampang to, hanggan katanog, kito yadi ka sadik taw madonong, ka nahalig it balay sas baba bato.
40007025	Nahwayan dahol, nabaha ya ngadi, nabagyo yadi marigon, nabakbak ka balay, dapat ay, ka balay idwa nakfo maskin in-ganit sas baba bato.
40007026	Dapat ay, fagayo fag manga taw kagtalinga angko manga hampang dapat idwa katanog, kito sadik taw, bilang odig bongol, kalig it balay basad odi onay.
40007027	Nahwayan dahol, nabaha ya ngadi, nabagyo yadi marigon, nabakbak ka balay. Ka balay nakfo lamang, insarowayan wan.
40007028	Is Hisos nontabo wagtoltol kitonya, ka manga taw indolaw it manga fwayong,
40007029	maskin is Hisos nogfaadal matohoyanan wan, kitos sadik taw ha kangayanan, idwa kito ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo.
40008001	Is Hisos nondasog has lwad gis baba moyod, aywan fag manga taw naoyan hanya.
40008002	Yakanga sadik taw ha sagit kitong naakbang hanya, nanlingkohodan sat atobangan, iglwang, Ama, haw no kasaya di, haw fadi wad somyagan igfafiya angko sagit.
40008003	Is Hisos natawid hanya, ginyag lwang, Ho kasaya ngay, haw fag imfiya wan. Ginya madit kitong dagos wanfiya.
40008004	Is Hisos natogon ha hanya kitay, Hawag fwayong nyawa haday fag manga taw, dapat fag hayap has fagalan-han-Diyos, fabantayan hanya im habilogan. Ginya madi ha disagan kan Mwisis natogon bato disagon bilang faorongan has taw kitay haw infiya wan.
40008005	Is Hisos no hawas basad banwa Kapirnaom, sadik fagtahinan sondalo taga Roma naakbang hanya, nalwang,
40008006	Ama, angko sogowan idwa syagan kimot. Hanya sinya dik maigyanan sa hyami balay, kahori wa dahol dahol it sagit.
40008007	Is Hisos iglwang, Tam hanya wan, ho fafiya hanya.
40008008	Dapat ka fagtahinan sondalo nasagot, Ama, ho kaya wa hyamo, nyawa hadwam dasog hangko balay. Haw fag lomwang lamang kitay, angko sogowan fag imfiya, ginya madi im-anod wan.
40008009	Kawa aho sadi yadik taw kagfasakop has manga abwat fag kangayanan, dapat ay, aho ha fagsogoon yadi manga sondalo. Aho noglwang ha sadi, Ha fag hanya wan, yakanga hanyan tanog wan. Aho noglwang ha sadi ya, Haw fag hastay, hanyam bangkad wan. Aho noglwang hangko nasali sogowan, Haw fag gibolon to, hanya omibolon wa tonya.
40008010	Is Hisos no nadog it hampang, indolaw wan, nafwayong has manga taw ka goyan hanya kitay, Hogfadog ha hayo, hodya ha donggon no kitay iba taw kitonya wa kagsyag angko marigon, nyawa sawan Israil manga hasokfonan.
40008011	Ho danwag fatagak hayo kitay, aywan kambangkad aban gis salogan myanit hanggan sangdayan myanit baliwa, manayowan san da Abraham da Isaak da Hakob, san Diyos sakop fanganan sat banwanan sam tongod.
40008012	Dapat aywan in Israil sakop fag manga hasokfonan im-okas lamang has basad marom sas sokayan, sinya ta mangodgorawan wan hanggan wasta ngifon di mangarigitan wan.
40008013	Ginyas Hisos nalwang has fagtahinan sondalo, Nyawa ha goli wa kati, maskin hagsyag wa fiya fiya angko, im-anod wan kam fagsagadon gingko. Gis nanya yadi fag masohod ka fagtahinan sondalo sogowan nonfiyat sagit.
40008014	Is Hisos nonsakbaw san Pidro basad balay, nalag in Pidro nogang ina sinya, maigyanan kagnaw.
40008015	Is Hisos natawid ka ina it gamat. It hagnaw dagos wanfiya, ginya ka ina inbangon, ogali man di, igtogbong in Hisos.
40008016	Ginya madi araw no kayabi wan, ka manga taw nataban han Hisos aywan ka ha manga labang igfahoriyan is taw. Sadi lamang ik hampang is Hisos nafaalin ka manga labang, nafafiya yadi fagayo ka ha manga fagdogon.
40008017	Is Hisos naibolon kitonya kaarakitay in Isayas, in Diyos fangampang fwayong im-anod wan, noglwang kiti, Hanya nabol intam manga kagomowan, Nadiya yadintam manga fagdogon.
40008018	Is Hisos noglag kaaywanon ka manga taw sat ligongan, hanya nasogo hat manga ofod kitay, tam ara domifay wa has difay linaw.
40008019	Araw araw ogbot, sadi kagfaadal ka Batasan Hodyo naakbang han Hisos nalwang, Haw kagfaadal, ho tomahin yadi wa hyamo, nyawa ha hadawan.
40008020	Is Hisos nasagot hanya, Ka manga ido maisog ha oliyanan basad lohib, ka manga manok ha fogad yap man, dapat ay, aho, Kanbali Taw, idwa ha toyogan, idwa ha fahowayan.
40008021	In Hisos katogbong sadi iglwang, Angko Fon, ha faoliyan yap dingko, ho manlobgob yap angko ama.
40008022	Dapat is Hisos nafwayong hanya, Ha tahinan wangko, fabayaanan yapdi ka manga mahatayan, ta bahala waglobgob it sadili kapariho ka natay.
40008023	Araw is Hisos no nasahay was baloto, it manga katogbong natahin yadi wan.
40008024	Yabay araw nabagyo dahol dahol baba danom, taob di godgoyanan wan myasa wa dahol sas baba linaw, ka odi kitay idyag tabon ka baloto. Dapat gis nanya is Hisos matoyogan di.
40008025	Yakangat manga katogbong hawan Hisos, nafolaw hanya. Taglwang, Hyami Fon, hyami Fon, kalibang kalibang, togbongan hyami, tam kalogom wan ha daga danom.
40008026	Ginyas Hisos iglwang, Kana mayon ham no kadala? Yabay ham idwa bangan igsyag angko. Ginyas Hisos inbangon wan, nangabaya ka bagyo hanggan taob. Yakangan tohas ya ngawan ka danom, inhalyaw ya fiya fiya.
40008027	Yakanga ta fagayo indolaw waglag, taglwang, Kana wa to fag taw? Nyawa bagyo, manga dagat, katanog it fwayong.
40008028	Da Hisos nondasog sas difay sas banwanan manga taga Gadara, ha dowak ama gis manga lohib fanlobgobanan taw natagbo in Hisos. Ka dowak ama ha manga labang kagfahoriyan hanya, maisog ya ngadi, yakanga ka manga taw kadala wagdalan sinya.
40008029	Ginya madi ka dowak ama ha labang, dagos wa narokyaw, iglwang han Hisos, Haw in Diyos wa Anak, haw fag idwag mawat hyami. Haw awkin inbangkad hastay kaarakitay igfahoriyan hyami nyawa idyapdin dasog gis nanya hyami fadosaan?
40008030	Idwa ayayo bangan ginya ha sadik tifonan baboy ayo ayo, kwan manga lamnon.
40008031	Ka manga labang igsagad in Hisos kiti, Haw nogfaalin hyami gis taw, faangayan nangos hyami, sogowan wa hyami has nwa fag manga baboy ayo ayo.
40008032	Is Hisos iglwang, Sogi, ham fag hanya wan. Yakanga ka manga labang nalin wa gis taw, hawas basad manga baboy. Ginya ka manga baboy dagos wa nandalandanan madali has lwad indahodan has basad linaw dahol, fagayo inlimos wan.
40008033	Ka manga gano tifonan baboy nalagyo wan hawas banwa, nafadog has taw fagayo kat lagan hanggan no kinday ka manga ama ka ha labang haraw.
40008034	Yakanga ka manga taga banwa, sadi wak kayonya manga taw, nagobok in Hisos. Ta no nalag hanya, ta garonganon igsogo hanya gista banwanan.
40009001	Yakanga da Hisos nasahay wa baloto, nwali ya has bali difay linaw dahol, nadagos wa hat sadili banwanan.
40009002	Yabay tiba taw nadiya han Hisos sadik taw kadwa syagan kimot, maigyanan sat baba sagmak. Is Hisos no nalag kitay tagsyag marigon ha hanya, is Hisos nafwayong has taw kadwa syagan kimot, Ama, ha fag marigon im fangayofan. Hogfaliyam im manga naogali dwat.
40009003	Tiba kagfaadal ka Batasan Hodyo naayfan sat basad fangayofan, To fag taw igsway in Diyos.
40009004	Dapat is Hisos nasalom ista fagisipon, yakanga nalwang has taw, Kana mayon ham no gisip kitonyak dwat?
40009005	Sida ka malpos fwayongon, ngatay Hogfaliyam im manga naogali dwat, ngatay Ha fag kabangon, anggongan wam sagmak, fag lomahaw wan.
40009006	Dapat ho falag ha hayo kitay aho, Kanbali Taw, ha kangayanan igfaliyam ista manga ogali dwat istay sas baba daga. Ginyas Hisos nafwayong has idwa syagan kimot, Haw fag kabangon wan, dyan wam sagmak, nyawa ha mwali wa kati.
40009007	Ka ama nalindog wa ngay, nwali wan.
40009008	Ka manga taw no nalag kitonya, indala wan, hanggan tagbaya yadi han Diyos ka nadisag kitonya fag kangayanan has taw.
40009009	Da Hisos nalahaw wa ginya fag banwanan. Ta noglahaw yapdi, is Hisos nalag sadik ama, it ngayan is Matiyo, matokawan sas fanohotan bohis Roma. Is Hisos nafwayong hanya, Ha tahinan wangko. Is Matiyo dagos wanlindog, natahin wa hanya.
40009010	Araw da Hisos no matokawan san Matiyo balay sas bilog fanganan, yabay aywan fag manga fanohot bohis hanggan tiba taw kadwa fiya it ogali, nagobok in Hisos. Ta fagayo nanayowan kwan sinya, hanggan in Hisos manga katogbong.
40009011	Ka manga Farisiyo no nalag kitay tagsayowan kwan hanon sinya, ta naintaw in Hisos manga katogbong, Kana mayon kagfaadal ha hayo nogsayo has manga fanohot bohis hanggan has manga taw ka ha ogali dwat?
40009012	Is Hisos nadog ista manga hampang, yakanga nasagot kiti, Ka manga ha sagit ka kasaya has famolongan, no kadi idwa ha manga sagit idwa kasaya hanya.
40009013	Gwadi ham fag twagdog it kahologan noglwang, Ka kaawaan kangko fakasayaon, fiya man ka fangafiyan fag sinogba. Maskin ngay honbangkad hastay, angko fagsayahon ka manga ha ogali dwat, bohonwa ka gayfan kitay it manga ogali fiya.
40009014	Ginya madi in Hwan manga katogbong hawan Hisos, naintaw hanya kitay, Gwadi hami fagabadwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin, hanggan ka manga Farisiyo kitonya yadi. Kana mayon im manga katogbong nodwa gogali kitonya?
40009015	Is Hisos nasagot has taw, Ka mangag fasakop has famabayan marongkot awkin kagbabay no gofod yapdis taw, ham gayfan? Dapat ay, aban, ha pomilit tomaban kagbabay, gis nanya ta bago didwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin mahogod.
40009016	Idwa haglonob rotay kadyan yamos has daanon fag rotay, maskin ka bago maganit man ka daanon, yakanga labi man imdahol ka losbong sas daanon.
40009017	Idwa yadi ha taw somiblag alak bago has basad sohadan anit daanon. No omibolon kitonya ka anit imbosni, ka alak im-od-olanan lamang, ka sohadan anit imdwat yadi wan. Yatokitay, tagsiblag bago fag alak has bago fag sohadan anit, ginya fagayo dowa dogay imdwat.
40009018	Is Hisos nogtoltol yapdi has taw, sadik fag tahinan Hodyo insakbaw wan, nanlingkohodan san Hisos atobangan, iglwang, Angko anak ina bago di nafos it ipsaw. Haw nangos tahinan angko, fwalidan yap im gamat ha hanya kaarakitay hanyam boyag ya.
40009019	Is Hisos nalindog wan naofod hanya, hanggan it manga katogbong hanya yadi wan.
40009020	Ya mangharaw, sadik ina ka ha sagit ina, safolo ha dowak fangaraw, naoyan inda Hisos. To fag ina naakbang han Hisos gis ginanan, dayo goyoy, nasapkid it tobwan tobwan rotay,
40009021	maskin it fangayofan iglwang, Ngadi ho somapkid it tobwan rotay homfiya wan.
40009022	Is Hisos inbalihid, ginya no nalag ka ina, nalwang, Anak ina, fag marigon im fangayofan, maskin hagsyag angko, haw infiya wan. Gis nanya yadi ka ina infiya wa dagos it fagdogon.
40009023	Da Hisos nondasog sas balay fag tahinan, nalag tagfaoni manga palawta, hanggan aywan fag manga taw, mawang wan.
40009024	Is Hisos nalwang, Ham fag dokson wa has sokayan. Ka anak ina idwa natay, matoyogan di. Ka manga taw kasay odi in Hisos.
40009025	Dapat ka manga taw nondokson wan, is Hisos nasakbaw wan, natawid ka anak gamat, yakanga ka anak inbangon ya.
40009026	Ginya madi in Hisos naibolon inbarita wa sadik dahonya sinya fag banwanan.
40009027	Da Hisos no nalahaw ginya fag banwanan, dowak ama bota goyan wa goyan wan Hisos. Tagtawag marigon, iglwang, Haw in Dabid hasokfonan anak, haw fakaawa hyami.
40009028	Is Hisos no nasakbaw hasta basad balay, ka manga bota naakbang hanya. Is Hisos naintaw is taw, Ham awkin katiwala kitay ho somyagan omibolon to? Taglwang, Ala, hyami Fon mi katiwala ngay.
40009029	Ginyas Hisos nasapkid ista manga mata, nalwang yadi kitay, Maskin ham igsyag wangko, im-anod wa kitonya.
40009030	Ginya madi dagos wanfoga ista mata. Is Hisos igbando mahogod kitay, Ham fag idyag fwayong nyawa haday.
40009031	Dapat ta nondokson di ngay, ta dagos wa nafwayong sadik dahonya banwanan sinya in Hisos naibolon.
40009032	Ka manga bota kanfiya nonlahaw di ngay, ta ha nataban ya han Hisos sadik taw boyon, labang kagfahoriyan.
40009033	Ka labang no nalin wan, ka boyon kampang ya. Ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw indolaw wan, taglwang, Nyawa ginahin tam idwa ha lagan kadonongan kitonya sas Israil.
40009034	Dapat ka manga Farisiyo iglwang, Ka manga labang fagtahinan kagtogbong in Hisos, yakanga syagan digfalagyo ka manga labang.
40009035	Is Hisos naskatan ya ngawan ka manga banwa hanggan sas manga ligongan manga banwa, igfaadal sas manga fanimbaan Hodyo ka Fiya fag Barita kawa han Diyos sakop baliwa. Is Hisos nafafiya yadi ka manga taw ka ha sagit, nyawa kanat manga sagit, manga fagdogon.
40009036	Is Hisos in-awa ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw, maskin ista fangayofan balaw balaw odi, bilang wadwa ha kaawa has taw, kitos topa kadwa ha gano.
40009037	Yakangas Hisos igfwayong hat manga katogbong. Kaaywanon ka aniyon, dapat sayok ka fangani.
40009038	Ham daranginan hasag fon namay, hanya nangos fag somogo, fag ha omani wa kat aniyon.
40010001	Is Hisos nafatifon ka safolo ha dowak katogbong, ginya nafalobos has taw it kangayanan has mangag faalin manga labang hanggan igfafiya manga sagit.
40010002	To kasta manga ngayan ka safolo ha dowak Fandiya Barita. Bago bago is Simon kasta faglwangon is Pidro, hanggan is Andris it fadwasay. Da Santyago da Hwan in Sibidiyo manga anak,
40010003	da Filipi da Bartolomi, da Tomas da Matiyo, ka fanohot bohis, in Santyago sangay kan Alfiyo anak, hanggan is Tadiyo.
40010004	In Simon yadi sangay kagbaliwa it manga kapariho Hodyo, hanggan is Hodas Iskariyoti ka naoyon in Hisos kalaban.
40010005	Is Hisos nasogo tonya fag safolo ha dowak Fandiya Barita, natogon kiti, Ham fag idwa has manga banwanan Hintil, fag idwa yadi has manga banwa manga taga Samariya.
40010006	Ham fag sayak yapdi ka manga topa kanliyam san Israil sakop fag manga banwanan.
40010007	Ham noglahaw wan, fag faadal has taw kitay ka gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod kaakbang wa aba kabali hari.
40010008	Ham fag fafiya ka manga ha sagit, faboyagan yadi ka manga natay. Fafiyaan ya ka manga ha sagit kitong, faalinan yadi gistaw ka manga labang. Ka hayo natanggap idwa ha bayad, yakanga ham nogdisag has taw fag idwa yadi ha bayad.
40010009	Ham fag idwag diya kwarta, nyawa ginto, nyawa pilak, nyawa tanso sa hayo hagkos.
40010010	Ham fag idwa yadi ha diya boyog, ham noglahaw, nyawa hayo falhosan rotay, nyawa fanobos lapak, nyawa sokod, fag idwa ha diya, maskin ka fangibolon fiya di tomanggap it fangaboyagon.
40010011	Nyawa siday fag banwa, ngatay tifonan balay, ham nomdasog sinya, ham sayahan ka taw danwasta fakilalaon fiya fiya sinya. Ham fag sinya wak domogayan no baliday ham sinya yapdi.
40010012	Ham nogsakbaw sasta balay ham fag lwang, Fag ka kahowayan kagbahala istay sa hayo balay.
40010013	Ka manga taw sinya fag balay no fiya it manga ogali, ham fag mahoway odi has manga taw sinya kito hayo nafwayong. Dapat nodwa fiya, bawiyan hayo fwayong.
40010014	Sa sadik balay, ngatay banwa, ta no kafang igfasakbaw hayo, kafang yadi igtalinga, ham noglahaw wa ginya, fadagdagan yadi ka manga fogis daga gi hayo manga bitis.
40010015	Hogfwayong ha hayo, bonwa bohag, ista fadosaan aban, sas Sirang Fangabaya bohondi kito ka fadosaan sas manga banwa Sodoma hanggan Gomora.
40010016	Kati yabay, hogsogo hayo bomarita, bilang manga topa magop magop sas fagbokngan manga ido maisog. Yakanga ham fag bilang wa abyanon no maaman, dapat ham fag kito was limohon ik mahoway.
40010017	Ham fag matagahan maskin ha manga taw aban fagamat hayo hasag talinga hampangan. Ta fabakbak yadi hayo sas manga fanimbaan Hodyo.
40010018	Maskin aho hayo fagalwasiyon, ta gomoyod hayo has atobangan manga gobirnador hanggan manga gorangon. Ham mamaorongan sasta fagdogan, hanggan sas fagdogan manga Hintil.
40010019	Ta nogfagamat hayo has taw, ham fag idwa galibitan hayo bato fwayongon ngatay no kinday ham no somagot. Nomdasog gis nanya fag masohod aban, is Diyos fatohod hayo hampang bato sagoton has taw.
40010020	Maskin hayo hampang aban idwa gi hayo sadili fangayofan, ka hayo hampang gi wa hayo Ama it Falad ka faisip hayo.
40010021	Aban kayadit fadwasay kagfagamat it fadwasay has iba taw kaarakitay ta fahatay hanya, kitonya yadi kat ama hat sadili yadi anak. Manga anak lomaban it magorang, fasognod has iba taw kitay fahatayan wan.
40010022	Maskin aho hayo fagalwasiyon, fagayo fag manga taw kadwat iglag hayo aban, dapat kadwag fagomon hanggan wa has katabowanan, hanya wa kambawi.
40010023	Ta nogfahoriyan hayo sa sadik banwa, ham fag lagyo ha sadi yak banwa. Hogfwayong ha hayo, ham idya domasog has fagayo fag manga banwa sas Israil, aho Kanbali Taw, nombangkad ya.
40010024	Idwa ha katogbong ha kangayanan abwat man hasag faadal hanya. Kitonya yadi idwa ha sogowan ha kangayanan abwat man hat fon kangayanan.
40010025	Ka katogbong nogtolad kagfaadal hanya, fiya wan, hanggan ka sogowan nogtolad yadi kagfon hanya. Ta nogngayan kagfon balay is Biilsibol, labi man inyak dwat ta no ngomayan it manga ofod.
40010026	Yakanga ham fag idwa kadalas taw. Ka manga matagowan kati fadi wadamlag aban. Fadi wamfyalom aban, imdog di has fagayo.
40010027	Kangko fwayong ha hayo basad marom, olitan ya sas basad mayawa, kasta nainas ha hayo, ham fag golit igtawag fiya fiya sas sokayan sasta fanifonan.
40010028	Ham fag idwa kadala kagfahatay habilogan taw, dapat idwa syagan igfahatay hayo falad. Yatokitay, ka syagan igfadwat habilogan hanggan falad sas basad fadosaan afoy, fag tonya wa ka hayo fakadalaon.
40010029	Idwa awkin tam nogfasali dowak maya sadi dik saga it halga? Nyawa kitonya, no bohonwa hayo Ama kafangayofanan, nyawa sadik maya idwam dagdag has baba daga.
40010030	Gwadi nyawa hayo bok sas alfoyo, hayo Ama twa wa no kayoday it manga ogat.
40010031	Yakanga ham fag idwa kadala, ham mahalga man has kaaywanon fag manga maya.
40010032	Nyawa faktaw kagbaya sas manga taw fagdogan kitay hanya angko wa sakop, ho bomaya yadi aban, sangko Ama atobangan sam tongod, kitay tonya fag taw angko wa sakop ngay.
40010033	Dapat ay, nyawa faktaw kagtangkod angko sas fagdogan manga taw, ho tomangkod yadi hanya sangko Ama fagdogan, ka sawat banwanan sam tongod.
40010034	Ham fag idwa gayfan kitay honbangkad hastay kaarakitay igdiya kahowayan hastay is baba daga. Honbangkad hastay ha diya yadi talibong, bohonwa kahowayan.
40010035	Maskin honbangkad hastay kaarakitay ho falaban kasta anak ama hat ama, kasta anak ina hat ina, kasta nogang ina hat nogang ina magorang.
40010036	Hanggan ista kalaban ka yadi talanahan.
40010037	Ka galwasit ama ngatay it ina bohondi kito hangko no galwasi, idwa maangay sangko. Ka galwasit anak ama ngatay ina bohondi kito hangko no galwasi, idwa yadi maangay sangko.
40010038	Kadwa gagwanta mahori, bilang kafang igfasan it sadili fatimbangan hayo, ginyadwag tahin angko, idwa yadi maangay sangko.
40010039	Ka kwangit it sadili haboyagan hangko, hanya abadwa ha akwa haboyagan, dapat kadwa kwangit it sadili haboyagan kawa hangko, hanya ha tanggapon haboyagan.
40010040	Kagtanggap hayo, aho yadi it fagtanggapon, hanggan kagtanggap angko igtanggap yadi kagsogo angko.
40010041	Kagtanggap sadik fangampang maskin tonya in Diyos fangampang, tomanggap ka fasalamat ka maangay han Diyos fangampang. Kagtanggap sadik taw fiyat ogali, maskin ka taw fiya, tomanggap ka fasalamat ka maangay has fiya fag taw.
40010042	Nyawa faktaw kagfainom, nyawa di sadik ongot danom magnaw, hangko sakop fag taw ka ogbot it kangayanan, maskin tonya angko wa katogbong, hogfwayong ha hayo kitay, matohoyanan hanya tomanggap it fasalamat aban.
40011001	Is Hisos natogon di ngay hat manga katogbong Safolo ha Dowa, ginyan lahaw ya ngawan kaarakitay mamwayong, mamaadal ya has manga banwa sinyat akbang.
40011002	Is Hwan kagfatogna manga taw hyabi sayapdis basad porisowan gis nanya. It manga katogbong nafadahit han Hwan in Kiristo manga naibolon, yakangas Hwan nasogo yadit manga sogowan hanya.
40011003	Ta nangos intawan han Hisos kitay, Haw awkin kawan Diyos natogon kitay imbangkad hastay, ngatay mi ha fagfanayaon yapdi sadi ya?
40011004	Is Hisos nasagot kiti, Ham fag goli ya ngawan han Hwan, ham fwayongan ka hayo donggon hanggan lagan.
40011005	Fag fwayong kitay, ka manga bota infoga ya ngat mata, ka mangan fihong it bitis iglahaw ya, ka manga ha kitong infiya yadi wan hanggan ka manga bongkok igdog ya, ka manga natay inboyag ya yadi, hanggan ka Fiya fag Barita nafaadal has manga myabog.
40011006	Ka taw kadwa gadowan igsyag angko bomaya wan.
40011007	In Hwan manga katogbong nonlahaw, Is Hisos nafwayong has manga taw kawa han Hwan, iglwang, Kana mayon hyabi ham no hawas basad fakahyabogan? Kana ka hayo fagasolopon sinya? Ham awkin kasayaglag ka bagyo nogfafarayfayan igfafarayfayan ka iyano?
40011008	Kana ham no hanya? Ngatay hayo fagasolopon sinya sadik taw myasa wa fiya it manga solong rotay? Gwadi sawasta gorangon balay ka myasa wa fiya it manga solong rotay.
40011009	Kana ka orongan hayo fagasolopon sinya? Ngatay in Diyos fangampang sadi? Ala ngay, tonya wan, hanggan hogfwayong ha hayo ka hayo lagan sinya it kangayanan bohondi kito kan Diyos manga fangampang.
40011010	Maskin is Hwan kat faglwangon sas Kasoratan, noglwang kiti, Fanlag ngay, hogsogo angko sogowan ka gomona hyamo. Hanya mamatalaga hyamo bato lahawan.
40011011	Hogfwayong ha hayo idya ha anak kansagaya git ina ka abwat man in Hwan kangayanan, ka Hwan kagfatogna manga taw, dapat ka ogbot man has fagayo san Diyos sakop, it kangayanan abwat man in Hwan.
40011012	Giwan Hwan igfaadal ka barita, hanggan balis kati, kan Diyos banwanan fag sakop igdog mahori hanggan ka maisog fag manga taw igpilit wa omaktom sinya fag sakop fag manga taw.
40011013	Maskin hyabi hyabi in Diyos manga fangampang hanggan ka Batasan Hodyo nagona wa nafwayong kawa han Diyos banwanan fag sakop, hanggan was Hwan nafwayong yadi hanya baliwa.
40011014	Ham no kasaya yadim tiwala, hanya is Iliyas ka hastay.
40011015	Ham no ha manga talinga ya ngadi, fag talinga wan.
40011016	Kinda odi kin angko fatoladan ka kati fag manga masohod fag manga taw, ham gayfan? Kito odis manga anak matokawan sas famahowayan, igtawag hat manga ofod anak, iglwang,
40011017	Mi fadi wad nafaoni palawta, dapat ham kafang digtayok, Nyawa hami nangodgorawan, ham kafang yadi goraw.
40011018	Kawas Hwan nonbangkad hastay, nomtoon idwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin, idwa yadi ginom alak, ginya taglwang, hono, Labang wa kagfon in Hwan.
40011019	Ginya madi, aho man, Kanbali Taw, inbangkad hastay, kwan yadi hanon hanggan ginom kitos iba taw, ginya taglwang, Yabay, to fag taw, mahogod wa kwan a, iglango ya ngadi, koyog yadi has mangag falo igsohot bohis Roma hanggan has tiba taw ka ha dwat fag manga ogali. Nyawa taglwang kitonya, in Diyos manga ibolon kagfatohoyan kitay in Diyos kadonongan myasa wa fiya.
40011020	Ginya madis Hisos nangabaya ka manga banwa kat nafalag ka fakaaywanan fag manga ibolon madolaw sinya, maskin tadwa nasoyo, idwa yadi nadayo it manga ogali dwat.
40011021	Isyay wa, isyay wan, haw, banwa Korasin. Isyay wa, isyay wan haw, banwa Bitsayda, maskin ka manga taga Tiro hanggan taga Sidon no nalag di ka hayo manga lagan madolaw, ta dan wa nasolong manga sako hyabi yapdi, hanggan natokaw sas fogis dafog kaarakitay igfalag kitay tagsoyo wan.
40011022	Dapat hogfwayong ha hayo, gis nanya aban, sas Sirang Fangabayan, ka fadosaan kamtohoyan ha hayo bohondi kito kamtohoyan has manga taga Tiro hanggan manga taga Sidon.
40011023	Haw yadi, banwa Kapirnaom, Haw aw kasayag faabwaton hyamo han Diyos banwanan sam tongod? Dapat ho fadagdag lamang hyamo hawas Daga Salad. Maskin no nangos sadis Sodoma no nalag ka hyamo lagan madolaw kati, ka banwa Sodoma idwa ara indwat, hanggan kati sinya yapdi.
40011024	Dapat hogfwayong ha hayo, sas Sirang Fangabayan aban, im fadosaan bohondi kito ka fadosaan kandalan hyabi sas banwa Sodoma.
40011025	Gis nanya fag masohod is Hisos nalwang, Mama, haw kagfon im banwanan sam tongod hanggan ka daga, hogbaya hyamo, maskin no hadis manga madonong, manga ha nagadalan, hadyag fatwagdog to fag manga bagay, dapat hagfatwagdog fiya fiya has manga taw kat fangayofan kito yapdis manga anak it fakatwawon.
40011026	Anod mama, maskin kitonya ngay kam fakasayaon.
40011027	Ginyas Hisos nalwang has taw, Angko Ama ka nafaano hangko fagayo fag manga bagay. Idwa ha kilala angko, in Diyos Anak no bohonwa angko Ama. Idwa yadi ha kilala in Diyos angko Ama, no bohonwa aho, kat Anak, hanggan nyawa kayoday angko fagfaangayon mamahilala has taw angko Ama.
40011028	Ham fagayo ka kayaya basad fangayofan, fag gakbang wangko, kawa ham kabyat hayo manga fasan, ho fahoway hayo.
40011029	Fasablayan angko singkaw ha hayo, ham fag gadal gingko. Kawa aho mahoway, idwa yadi ha takan, yakanga hayo fangayofan lomag yadi wa kahowayan.
40011030	Maskin angko singkaw fiya wa donggon, malokmay a, angko fafasanon ha hayo magan wa dahol.
40012001	Gis nanya fag masohod, sas Sirang Kafahowayan, da Hisos igdalan sasta namay ha tirigo. Gis nanyat manga katogbong kalonos wan, yakanga ta nabol manga haway tirigo sayok, ginya kwan wan.
40012002	Ka manga Farisiyo no nalag ista naibolon, taglwang han Hisos, Lag ngay im manga katogbong gibolon kadwa maangay sas Batasan Hodyo, maskin sawas Sirang Kafahowayan.
40012003	Is Hisos nasagot, Ham awkin idwa nabasa in Dabid naibolon hyabi no kalonos hanggan wat manga ofod kalonos yadi?
40012004	Is Dabid nasakbaw han Diyos basad balay a, hanya hanggan wat manga ofod nahwan ka tinapay kandisag han Diyos. Ka Batasan Hodyo iglwang ka manga fagalan-han-Diyos lamang ka fiya homwan tonya fag tinapay.
40012005	Ngatay ham idwag basa sas Batasan Hodyo kitay, fagayo fag Sirang Kafahowayan ka manga fagalan sas Fanimbaan-Dahol igfalamang di ka Togon kawa hastay fag sirang. Nyawa kitonya bohonwa dwat ista naogali.
40012006	Hogfwayong ha hayo, aho Kanbangkad kati hastay bohondi kitos Fanimbaan-Dahol angko kangayanan.
40012007	Ham nangos no natwa wagdog to fag manga hampang kaglwang, No sa dingko, fiya man no kaawa manga taw hasag sogba fangafiyan, ham nangos haraw idwa naato kadwa ha naibolon dwat.
40012008	Maskin aho, Kanbali Taw, kagbahala has Sirang Kafahowayan.
40012009	Is Hisos inlahaw wan hawas basad fanimbaan Hodyo.
40012010	Sinyas basad fanimbaan ha sadik ama it gamat sadi inrifis wan. Ha akwa yadi manga taw sinya kagsayak it fabangdanan gin Hisos manga ibolon. Yakanga ta gintaw in Hisos, Ka Batasan Hodyo awkin igfaangay di kitay, nyawag fafiya sagit sas Sirang Kafahowayan, fiya di?
40012011	Is Hisos nasagot, Nyawa faktaw sa hayo, no ha topa indagdag has basad tabyo sas Sirang Kafahowayan, ham awkin idwa bomol ginyas basad tabyo?
40012012	Idwa aw ka sadik taw labi man ik mahalga ha sadik topa, ham gayfan? Yakanga ka Batasan Hodyo igfaangay di no gibolon fiya nyawa sawas Sirang Kafahowayan.
40012013	Ginya madis Hisos nafwayong has ama kanrifis it gamat, Haw fag falogday im gamat. Yakanga nafalogday ngat gamat a, infiya wa dagos, ogali wan, kito mandi kat gamat balis baliw yabay.
40012014	Dapat ay, ka manga Farisiyo nadokson wan, goyonan igtoltolan no kindasta halimbawan kaarakitay domaog in Hisos.
40012015	Is Hisos natwa di kitay ta kahori hanya, yakanga inlahaw yadi wa ginya. Aywan ka goyan hanya a, is Hisos nafafiya yadi ista manga sagit fagayo.
40012016	Dapat is Hisos nabando marigon kitay ta fag idwag fadog has taw kawa ha hanya.
40012017	To in-anod wan kaarakitay igfatonglos in Isayas, ka fangampang fwayong kiti,
40012018	Lag ngay, to kangko sogowan kangko yadi nafili, Ho gwayan wa galwasi hanya, hanya angko yadi fagbayaon. Ho domisag hanya angko Falad. Hanya fadog has fagayo fag manga layonan taw kitay, hodwa ha fagapinon taw nogfadosa.
40012019	Hanyadwag daraogan, mahoway di no kampang has taw, nyawa basad wa karsada idwag ringgit, ogali wa no kampang.
40012020	Hanyadwa lomifong ka iyano kanbokong, Idwa yadig fahapsa ka salong ka ganos ganos odi, No kandogay day hanya, kadwa ha fagapinon taw nogfadosa, nodyag daog has fagayo
40012021	Hanggan fagayo fagayo fag manga layonan taw hawa hanya no somyag aban.
40012022	Ginya ta nataban han Hisos sadik ama bota, boyon ya ngadi, kawa labang kagfahoriyan hanya. Is Hisos nafafiya ka ama, yakanga ka ama nahampang ya, infoga yat mata.
40012023	Fagayo intaka waglag, taglwang, To aw mayon kan Dabid hasokfonan anak?
40012024	Dapat ka manga Farisiyo no nadog ista hampang kitonya, iglwang, Tyamo fag ama it kadonongan igfaalin manga labang, gi odin Biilsibol ka fagtahinan manga labang.
40012025	Is Hisos nasarom di ista fagisipon, yakanga nafwayong has taw, Fagayo fag gorangon sakop imdaog di nombali dowak layonan, yakanga idwa domogay. Nyawa sida fag banwa, ngatay talanahan, nombali dowak layonan ginyag labanan wan, idwa domogay.
40012026	Nos Satanas kagfalagyo in Satanas sakop, hanyag laban yadit sadili. No kitonya, kinday it sakop no domogay, ham gayfan?
40012027	Nos Biilsibol kagfasyagan angko igfaalin labang, fakta, ham gayfan, kagfasyagan hayo manga anak igfaalin labang? Yakanga hayo manga anak mandi kagfatohoyan kitay ham gwayan wagfalamang.
40012028	Dapat non Diyos Falad kagfasyagan angko igfaalin labang, it kahologan in Diyos sakop indasog wa sa hayo.
40012029	Fakta ka somyagan somakbaw hasta basad balay kaarakitay ignahaw ista botang, kagfon balay no marigon, nodwa gomafos yap hanya bago bago? Kagfon balay no magafosan wa bay, ginya madi idwa somawad it manga botang.
40012030	Kadwa kaoyon angko iglaban angko. Kadwag togbong angko igfatifon manga taw, yagfasarowayan di ngap.
40012031	Yakanga hogfwayong ha hayo, nyawa kana kasta ogali dwat, nyawa hanggan igfadwat igdog in Diyos, twam liyam, dapat ay, ista hampang nogfadwat igdog ka Maliyaw fag Falad, idwam liyam nyawa ginahin.
40012032	Nyawa faktaw no kampang dwat donggon kawa hangko, Kanbali Taw, fiya digfaliyam ista nahampang dwat, dapat ay, ka kampang dwat donggon kawa has Maliyaw fag Falad, ista naogali kitonya idwam liyam nyawa kati, nyawa hanggan aban.
40012033	Ka fon hayo no fiya, it bohad fiya yadi. Ka fon hayo no dwat, it bohad dwat yadi. Kat bohad kagfalag no kinday fag hayo it fon.
40012034	Ham bilang odi manga hasokfonan abyanon no madaya. Hayo fangayofan no dwat, kinday ham no twa kampang fiya, ham gayfan? No kindawasta fangayofan, kitonya yadi ka kadog.
40012035	Ka taw no fiya, it fwayong fagaba yadi wa fiya, maskin it fagayfanon fagaba wa fiya. Dapat ka taw no dwat it fangayofan, it fwayong fagaba yadi wa dwat, maskin it fagayfanon fagaba wa dwat.
40012036	Hogfwayong ha hayo kitay aban sas Sirang Fangabayan, ta ha sagoton wa fagayo fag manga hampang kat nafwayong kadwa ha kahologan.
40012037	Maskin gi wa hayo sadili manga nahampang imtohoyan kitay, ngatay ham fiya san Diyos faglagan, ngatay ham fag has fadosaan.
40012038	Ginya ha mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan tibak Farisiyo nafwayong han Hisos kiti, Haw kagfaadal, falagan nangos hyami sadik falagon madolaw kagfatohoyan ha hyami haw no faktaw.
40012039	Is Hisos nasagot, Ka kati fag masohod fag manga taw dwat wa dahol, kawa has iba fagsyagon ham nogfasakop. Ham igsayak falagon madolaw, dapat hodwa ha falagon ha hayo, no bohonwa kanlag san Honas, in Diyos fangampang nadalanan.
40012040	No kinday is Honas hyabi tolok sirang hanggan tolok yabi sas basad tiyan oyang dahol dahol, kitonya yadi aho, Kanbali Taw, tolok sirang hanggan tolok yabi sas basad basad daga aban.
40012041	Aban, sas Sirang Fangabayan, ka manga taga Ninibi fatohoyan has fadosaan ka kati fag masohod fag manga taw, maskin ka taga Ninibi nasoyo hyabi, kawas Honas nafaadal has taw, dapat ay, kati yabay, kastay bohondi kiton Honas it kangayanan.
40012042	Gis nanya yadi fag Sirang Fangabayan, ka ina gis Ihipto baliwa, kanbali gorangon hyabi, fatohoyan yadi has fadosaan ka kati fag masohod fag manga taw, maskin tonya fag ina hyabi inbangkad gis bali fongfongan daga kaarakitay domog in Gorangon Salomon kadonongan, dapat yabay, kastay kati bohondi kiton Salomon it kadonongan.
40012043	Ka labang no nalin gis sadik taw, igswaliyan igswaliyan has daga magwang magwang, igligaw it famahowayan, dapat idwa ha lagan it oliyanan.
40012044	Yakangat fangayofan iglwang, Ho kafwali ya ngawan hangko nagalinan. Nonfwali ya, iglag it nagalinan idwa ha goli sinya, malinay di, maangay wan.
40012045	Yakanga ka labang hanya ya ngay, igtaban fito yak labang ka dwat man hanya a, hawa basad taw, sinya wak rnaoliyanan. Yakanga sas katabowanan ka taw mahori man ka gona it fangayofan. Ka kati fag masohod fag manga taw dwat lomag yadi wa kitonya.
40012046	Is Hisos nogtoltol yapdi has taw, yabay it ina hanggan it manga fadwasay indasog wan, mafanayan sas sokayan, ta kasaya mangampang in Hisos.
40012047	Ha nafwayong han Hisos, Im ina hanggan im manga fadwasay sas sokayan, ta kasaya mangampang nangos ha hyamo.
40012048	Dapat is Hisos nasagot, Fakta kangko ina, fakta kangko manga fadwasay, ham gayfan?
40012049	Ginyas Hisos igsiyo hat manga katogbong, iglwang, To kangko ina hanggan angko manga fadwasay.
40012050	Kawa nyawa faktaw no katanog angko Ama kafangayofanan, ka sat banwanan sam tongod, tonya wa kangko manga fadwasay, kangko ina.
40013001	Gis nanya yadi fag sirang is Hisos nalahaw wa gis balay, natokaw sas bahalan linaw dahol.
40013002	Manga taw kaaywanon nagobok in Hisos, yakangas Hisos nasakbaw has basad baloto baba danom, akbang has bahalan linaw, sinyak matokawan. Ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw sinya dik malindogan sas baba daga sas bahalan linaw.
40013003	Yabay is Hisos igfaadal has taw sinya, sayapdis manga halimbawa dapat. Hanyag lwang kiti, Sadik ama fangiyab hawat namay kaarakitay mamamgas.
40013004	Hanya nogfamgas, igsabod odit binhi, yakanga tibak botol indagdag has boknga dalan. Ka manga manok indasog a, nahwan wa tonya.
40013005	Ha akwa yadi manga botol indagdag has daga libabaw, baba odi dalifi. No kitay di dagos wa natobo kawa libabaw maskin ka daga sinya.
40013006	Ka myanit no nasalog sinya, myanit wa dahol dahol. Kat manga tobo inlayong di, maskin idwa ha dalid abasad.
40013007	Ha manga bolhog yadin dagdag ha sayo manga lamnon madogi. Ka manga lamnon inlangba, nasakfaw di ka manga tanom, ka manga tanom nadaogan di lamnon.
40013008	Dapat ay, ha akwa yadi manga botol kandagdag has fiya fag daga, yabay nabohad wan. Ha akwa nabohad sadik daan bolhog, tiba onom ik safolok bolhog, tiba tolok safolo.
40013009	Ham no ha manga talinga ya ngadi, fag talinga wan.
40013010	Araw in Hisos manga katogbong naakbang hanya, naintaw kitay, Kana mayon haw nogfadalan yapdi las manga halimbawa hyamo bato toltolon has taw?
40013011	Is Hisos nasagot, Indisag wa ha hayo kitay, ham fag tomwa ka mangadwag fadogon kawa han Diyos banwanan fag sakop baliwa, dapat idyapdin disag has taw.
40013012	Maskin ka danwa ha akwa ho domogang ya hanya, im-aywan, dapat kadwa ha akwa bangan, nyawa hara ha akwa ogbot ogbot sa hanya, tonya abam bol di.
40013013	Maskin kitonya, sa yapdis manga halimbawa aho nogtoltol has taw, maskin nyawa tagbantay, tadwaglag, nyawa tagtalinga, tadwagdog, yakanga idwa yadi twagdog.
40013014	In Isayas faglwangon kawa hanya fag manga taw in-anod wan, hanya noglwang, Nyawa ham igdog fagaba, ham idwa yadi tomwa wagdog. Nyawa ham iglag fagaba, ham idwa yadi tomwa waglag no kana tonya
40013015	Maskin to fag manga taw in-ganit ista manga fangayofan Ngadit manga talinga dayo wagdog, Tagfotikan wan it manga mata, Maskin ta dayo waglag, Ta dayo yadi wagdog. Ista fangayofan ta fag idwa yadi tomwagdog. Ta kafang kafwali hangko, Dayo yadig soyo, Tadwa kasaya kitay aho fag fafiya is taw.
40013016	Dapat ham igbaya wan ka hayo mata lagan madolaw fagaba, hanggan ka hayo manga talinga donggon madolaw.
40013017	Hogfwayong ha hayo, no kitay di, aywan in Diyos manga fangampang, hanggan fiya fag manga taw hyabi hyabi, kasaya wa dahol lomag ka hayo lagan kati, ka tadyapdi nalag hyabi. Ta gwayan wa kasaya nangos fag domog wa haraw ka hayo donggon kati, ka tadyapdi nadog hyabi.
40013018	Kati dog ngay it kahologan ka halimbawa kawa hasagfamgas baliwa.
40013019	Ka mangagdog ka toltol kawa han Diyos sakop baliwa, dapat idwa twagdog tonya, ka kitos manga botol kandagdag boknga dalan. Is Satanas indasog di ngay, igbol lamang kansabod sasta basad fangayofan.
40013020	Ka botol kansabod has sayo baba dalifi igfahalimbawa ka manga taw kagtalinga ka toltol, igtanggap wa dagos, masolong wan no kitay di.
40013021	Dapat idwag dalid abasad sasta basad fangayofan. Ngalay di gagwanta, maskin no ha donggon ya nga manga mahori, ngatay tagfahoriyan hanya maskin katiwala ka toltol, dagos wagdayo.
40013022	Kandagdag ha sayo manga lamnon madogi igfahalimbawa ka mangag talinga has toltol, dapat it manga kakorangan istay is baba daga kat fagisipon fagaba, ngatay kawili wa dahol ka kaakwaan, yakanga nasakfaw ka Toltol sat basad fangayofan, yakanga tonya idwa nabohad.
40013023	Dapat ay, ka botol kansabod sas fiya fag daga igfahalimbawa ka mangag talinga ka Toltol hanggan natwa wagdog tonya. Ginya yabay nabohad sinya, tiba sadik daan, tiba onom ik safolo, tiba tolok safolo.
40013024	Is Hisos natoltol sadi yak halimbawa has taw, nalwang kitay, Kiti kan Diyos banwanan fag sakop, nogfahalimbawa, kitos sadik taw nafamgas fiya fag botol sat baba namay.
40013025	Ta no matoyogan araw, basad yabi, it kalaban nasabod kadwa fiya fag bolhog lamnon hasta basad namay tirigo, ginya nwali wan.
40013026	Ka tirigo no natobo hanggan kaboskad wat borak, inlag yadi wa ka manga dwat fag lamnon sinya maaktoman sayo tirigo.
40013027	Yakanga ka manga sogowan hawasagfon namay, iglwang kitay, Bohonwa awkin fiya fag manga botol ka hayo tanom? Kana mayon no ha manga lamnon kati?
40013028	Kagfon namay nasagot, Angko kalaban sadi ka nasabod tonya. It manga sogowan naintaw hanya, Ha awkin kasaya mi nangos fag gomoyod tonya?
40013029	Kagfon istaw nasagot, Ham fag idwa goyod, ngandayo hanggan wa ka tirigo imtahin.
40013030	Ham fabayaanan wan hanggan fanganiyon. Tam aba no gani wan ho fomwayong has manga fangani, Tifonan yap ka manga lamnon, ham fogongan wa fogongan wan kaarakitay somonog, ginya madi ka tirigo ham tifonan wan hangko basad dongdong.
40013031	Is Hisos natoltol sadi yak halimbawa has taw, iglwang, Nogfahalimbawa in Diyos banwanan fag sakop kiti wan. Ha sadik taw igtanom sadik botol mostasa sat baba iyab.
40013032	Kat natanom hat basad iyab ka ogbot man has fagayo fag botol, dapat no natobo wan, kabali dahol man has fagayo fag fangofiyon. Kabali wa fon hayo it kadaholan, manok digfogad wan sat baba sanga.
40013033	Is Hisos natoltol ya ngay sadi yak halimbawa, In Diyos banwanan fag sakop kitos famadahol tinapay ka sadik ina nafaaktom sas tolok sarok harina, hanggan wandahol sadi wak dahonya.
40013034	To fagayo is Hisos natoltol has fakaaywanan fag manga taw sas manga halimbawa, idwa yadig toltol has fakaaywanan no bohonwa las halimbawa.
40013035	Is Hisos natoltol kitonya kaarakitay ka fangampang fwayong hyabi im-anod kitay, Las manga halimbawa lamang ho no homampang has taw, Ho fadog has taw ka manga idyapdin dog gi yapdis kalig daga.
40013036	Ginya madis Hisos naobon wa ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw, nasakbaw wa has basad balay. It manga katogbong naakbang ha hanya, iglwang, Ha fatwaan igdog hyami ka toltolan ka dwat fag lamnon sas basad namay.
40013037	Is Hisos nasagot has taw, Kagtanom fiya fag botol kawa aho, Kanbali Taw.
40013038	Ka namay kawastay sas baba daga. Ka fiya fag botol kawan Diyos sakop fag manga taw, hanggan ka dwat fag lamnon in Fandaya sakop fag manga taw.
40013039	Ka kalaban kagtanom tonya idwa ha iba, kawas Fandaya. Ka fanganiyon sawas katabowanan fag sirang hanggan ka manga gani kawa manga anghil.
40013040	No kinday nontifon ka manga lamnon hanggan insonog, kitonya yadi aba kamlag sas katabowanan fag sirang.
40013041	Aho, Kanbali Taw, somogo angko manga anghil aban, ta domayo a, tomifon fagayo kagfasayag dog has dwat iba taw, hanggan ka gogali yadi dwat, ka maaktoman sangko sakop,
40013042	omokas yadi tonya ha basad fadosaan afoy. Sinya ta mangodgorawan, hanggan wasta ngifon di mangarigitan wan.
40013043	Dapat ay, ka mangan tohoyan han Diyos bilang wagyawa kitos myanit sat Ama sakop aban. Ham no ha manga talinga ya ngadi, fag talinga wan.
40013044	In Diyos banwanan fag sakop kitos kaakwaan malobgoban basad iyab. Sadik taw no nangodkod sinya nalag wan, ginya madi natabon ya. Nabaya wa dahol dahol kat lagan matagowan basad daga. Yakanga nafasali it manga botang fagayo, ginya nasali tonya fag iyab.
40013045	Kitonya yadi in Diyos banwanan fag sakop, kitos sadik fanlako kagsayak manga mahalga fag ono.
40013046	No nalag nga sadik ono kafiyaon, hanya nafasali it manga botang fagayo fagayo, ginya nasali ka ono mahalga.
40013047	In Diyos banwanan fag sakop kito yadis sadik sarap dahol kasta fagokason ha basad dagat, giktan yadi bokod bokod fag manga oyang.
40013048	Ka sarap no napno ta nagoyod has bahalan bintalan. Ginya ka manga taw intokaw wan, igfalayon ka manga oyang bokod bokod. Ka fiya fag oyang ta natifon sasta basad sohadan, dapat naokas lamang kadwa fiya fag manga oyang.
40013049	Kitonya yadi kamlag aban sas katabowanan fag sirang. Ka manga anghil imbangkad falayon ka manga ha ogali dwat hanggan ka mangan bokod han Diyos,
40013050	omokas ha basad fadosaan afoy ka ha manga ogali dwat. Sinya ta mangodgorawan hanggan wasta ngifon di mangarigitan wan.
40013051	Is Hisos naintaw has taw, Ngatay ham natwa wagdog tonya fagayo? Taglwang, Ala.
40013052	Yakangas Hisos iglwang, Kawa kitonya fagayo kagfaadal Batasan Hodyo nombali yadi in Diyos banwanan fag sakop it katogbong, kitosagfon balay kagbangkad git fwalidan manga botang fiya fag bagay bago, hanggan ka gona.
40013053	Nontabo wagtoltol to fag manga halimbawa, is Hisos inlahaw wa ginya.
40013054	No nwali hat sadili banwanan, is Hisos igtoltol sasta basad fanimbaan. Ka manga matalingan kataka wagdog, taglwang, To fag taw gindak nabol it kadonongan? Twa oman gibolon kitonya fag manga madolaw?
40013055	Bohonwa awkin it ama ka famanday balay? Bohonwa awkin it ina is Mariya, hanggan da Santyago, da Hosi, da Simon, da Hodas, it manga fadwasay ama?
40013056	Idwa awkin istay yadik maoliyanan it manga fadwasay ina? Gindak nabol to fag kadonongan fagayo?
40013057	Yakanga tadwa katalinga in Hisos. Dapat is Hisos nafwayong has taw, Nyawa siday manga taw magalang has fangampang, nodwa sat sadili banwanan, ngatay sat sadili talanahan.
40013058	Yakangas Hisos idwa naibolon aywan fag manga madolaw sinya maskin tadwa katiwala hanya.
40014001	Gis nanya fag masohod in Hisos manga naibolon indahit han Hirodis ista gorangon sas sakop Galiliya.
40014002	Ginyas Hirodis nafwayong hat sadili manga sogowan, Tos Hwan kagfatogna manga taw hyabi. Hanyan boyag ya mangharaw, yakanga syagan gibolon manga madolaw fag manga bagay.
40014003	No kitay di, hyabi is Hirodis mandi ka nafagamat has manga taw in Hwan, nafagafos yadi, ginya nafaporiso wan kawas Hwan naato in Hirodis, maskin is Hirodis nabol it tagyaw, is Hirodiyas, in Filipi babay.
40014004	Is Hwan fagaba kabaya in Hirodis, hanya nalwang, Idwa fiya haw no kagaw im tagyaw.
40014005	Yakangas Hirodis kasayag fahatay in Hwan, dapat hanya kadala ka manga Hodyo, maskin ta natwa waglag kitay is Hwan in Diyos fangampang.
40014006	Ginya madi aban, gis nanya fag masohod ta nogtohod in Hirodis kasagayan, in Hirodiyas anak ina natayok san Hirodis manga fakilalaon faglagan. Labi was Hirodis insaya waglag,
40014007	yakanga hanya nafatohoyan has dayaga, nalwang, Nyawa kanam fagsagadon ho domisag wa ha hyamo.
40014008	Ka dayaga naolit kat ina nafasognod, kitay, Kati wan, disagan angko sas basad finggan, in Hwan alfoyo, ka Hwan kagfatogna manga taw hyabi.
40014009	Is Hirodis no nadog ka dayaga fagsagadon, hanyan rongkot wan, dapat idwa nasyagan nabawit hampang kawat manga fakilalaon nadog wat nafatohoyan has dayaga, yakanga nafasognod has taw kitay, Disagan has dayaga it fagsagadon.
40014010	Yakangas Hirodis nafalifong is taw in Hwan liyog.
40014011	Ta nafwalid ka alfoyo sas basad finggan, ginya nadisag has dayaga. Ka dayaga nadiya wan hat ina.
40014012	Araw in Hwan manga katogbong hawas porisowan, nabol in Hwan habilogan, nalobgob wan. Ginya ta nafwayong han Hisos no kinday kasta naibolon han Hwan.
40014013	Is Hisos no nadog di ngay kitonya, nasahay wan basad baloto, ginya hawas difay linaw, somaman yap nangos gis fakaaywanan fag manga taw. Dapat ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw no nadog kitay is Hisos hanya wan, tanbangkad gis manga banwa, nalahaw baba daga, natagbo hanya.
40014014	Is Hisos no nadokson sat nakadagsaan, iglag ka manga taw kaaywanon. Hanyan awa waglag is taw, hanggan nafafiya ka manga ha sagit kasta nataban hanya.
40014015	Ginya madi, araw, myanit no kabalihid wan, in Hisos manga katogbong hawan Hisos, iglwang, Tam istay sawas basad fakahyabogan, ka myanit kasangday yadi wan. Falahawan yap nangos has manga tifonan balay sas ligongan ka manga taw, kaarakitay ta manali ista sadili fanganon.
40014016	Is Hisos iglwang, Ham hawag falahaw ka manga taw, fag ham wa ka domisag fanganon has taw.
40014017	Taglwang, Tam idwa hanon nodwa limak tinapay, dowak oyang.
40014018	Is Hisos iglwang, Ham diyan hastay.
40014019	Ginyas Hisos nafatokaw sas baba lamnon ka manga taw. Ginya no nabol ka limak tinapay hanggan dowak oyang, natangdan has tongod a, nabaya han Diyos ka fanganon. Ginyas Hisos nafaarogbotan ka manga tinapay a, nadisag hat manga katogbong, ginya ka manga katogbong nahoray has manga taw.
40014020	Ginya madi fagayo nangwan wa a, napsog wan. Ta natifon ista sawad nakanan mafaarogbotan safolo ya ha dowak boyog ka napno.
40014021	Manga 5,000 ka manga ama ka nahwan, bokod wa ka manga ina, hanggan manga anak.
40014022	Ginyas Hisos dagos wa nafasahay has basad baloto it manga katogbong, nafagona wa has difay linaw dahol. Is Hisos in-goyan yapdi, bago di nafaoli ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw.
40014023	Ka manga taw nonlahaw wan, is Hisos nalahaw yadi wa has baba moyod kaarakitay mandarangin. Inyabi wa sinya sas baba moyod. Is Hisos idwam dowa sinya,
40014024	dapat ka baloto sawas baba linaw, ayayo gis gobang, manga taob bilang wagsampok, kawa bagyo marigon nogsoba wa has bohid.
40014025	Dapat, no kayawa wan, is Hisos naoyan yadi wat manga katogbong, nalahaw sas baba danom.
40014026	Dapat ay, it manga katogbong kadala wa dahol dahol iglag, taglag haglahaw sas baba danom. Tagrokyaw wan, Tya labang wan.
40014027	Dapat is Hisos nadagos wa ngap nahampang has taw, nalwang, Ham fag idwa kadala, aho di.
40014028	Is Pidro nalwang, Angko Fon, no haw wa ngay, haw falahawan yadi wangko sas baba danom.
40014029	Is Hisos nasagot, Fag hastay ngay. Yakangas Pidro nadokson gis basad baloto, nalahaw yadi wa has baba danom, hawan Hisos baliwa.
40014030	Dapat is Pidro no bago di naayfan kitay ha bagyo mangharaw, indala wan, hanya ganong wan tabon has daga danom. Is Pidro natawag, Angko Fon, angko Fon, ha salahapan wangko.
40014031	Is Hisos nadagos wa nasalahap yabay. Ginya nalwang han Pidro, Laya hadwa bangan igsyag hangko maskin. Kana mayon haw no gadowan?
40014032	Ta nonsahay has basad baloto, ka bagyo dagos wantohas.
40014033	Ka manga taw basad baloto nafasayagdog in Hisos, taglwang, Haw orongan wa in Diyos Anak.
40014034	Ta no nadifay ka linaw dahol, tandagsa wan sas banwa Ginisarit.
40014035	Ka manga taga sinya no nahilala in Hisos, ta dagos wa nafadahit has manga taw sinyasta ligongan kitay is Hisos indasog wan. Yakanga ta nataban hanya fagayo ka ha manga sagit.
40014036	Tagsagad kitay, Ha fatawidan di ngay ka manga ha sagit, ngadim tobwan rotay, kaarakitay tamfiya wan. Fagayo ka natawid infiya ngay.
40015001	Aban, tibak Farisiyo hanggan mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo gis banwa Hirosalim naakbang han Hisos. Ta naintaw hanya kitay,
40015002	Kana mayon im manga katogbong nodwa katanog intam manga magorang ogali gis hyabi hyabi? Ta kwan wa hanon nyawa tadya naogas fiya fiya ista sadili gamat kito ka ogali magorang fwayong.
40015003	Is Hisos nasagot is taw, Kana mayon ham nodwa katanog in Diyos Togon maskin ham katanog yapdi ka ogali magorang gis hyabi hyabi.
40015004	Is Diyos natogon kitay, Ha fag idwag falamang im ama hanggan im ina. Natogon yadi kitay, No fakta ka kampang igsabayon ngatay hat ama, ngatay hat ina, fiya man hanya no matay wan.
40015005	Dapat ham iglwang, Nyawa faktaw noglwang, ngatay hat ama, ngatay hat ina, kangko togbong hara hayo ho nadisag wa han Diyos,
40015006	No nalwang di nga kitonya, nyawag falamang it ama, fiya di. Ka hayo fakatanogon ka odi ogali magorang, yakanga ham idwag fahalga in Diyos togon.
40015007	Ham ha takan wan. Anod, kitonya ngay in Isayas, in Diyos fangampang fwayong hyabi kawa ha hayo,
40015008	Is Diyos iglwang, Hampang odik masayag dog, Dapat ista fangayofan ayayo gingko.
40015009	Idwa ha kahologan ta nogfasayagdog angko Maskin ogali odi taw kasta fagfaadalon.
40015010	Ginyas Hisos nafaakbang hanya ka manga taw, iglwang kitay, Ham fagayo fag matalingan, ham fag tomwa wagdog yadi angko bato fwayongon ha hayo.
