40027024	Is Pilato no natwa kitay hanyadwa ha halimbawan, ngandayo ka manga taw labi man no mangawangan, nafabol danom gis taw, nagonaw it gamat sasta faglagan, nalwang, Bohonwa aho ka managot nyawa ham fahatay to fag taw. Ham bahala wan.
40027025	Ka manga taw nasagot, Hami hanggan wa hyami manga anak ka bahala somagot it kahatayan.
40027026	Yakangas Pilato nafalfas in Barabas, dapat no nafabakbak in Hisos, nafabahala was taw kaarakitay ta fapako hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.
40027027	Ginya madi ka gobirnador fag manga sondalo nataban in Hisos has basad gobirnador balay dahol. Ginya ta nafatifon sadi wak habanan sondalo san Hisos dayo.
40027028	Ka manga sondalo naloslos in Hisos rotay, ginya ta nafasolong hanya sadik balokas aba aba, dararag.
40027029	Ta nahoskos lamnon madogi a, nafasangbaw tonya in Hisos boknga alfoyo. Ta nafabitbit sadik pinotol bagahay sat gamat balis sihon. Ginya tagsway odig lingkohodan, iglwang, Anod, kafiyaon mangharaw ka gorangon manga Hodyo.
40027030	Ta natofay hanya, hanggan nabol ka bagahay, nabakbak in Hisos alfoyo.
40027031	Ginya madi ta nonsagaya wagyod hanya, ta naloslos ka balokas aba aba, nafasolong ya in Hisos sadili rotay, hanggan nataban wa hanya has dayo kaarakitay pomako wan sas nafatimbangan hayo.
40027032	Araw araw ta noglahaw gis basad banwa, ta nahablang sadik ama, is Simon, taga Sirini. Ka manga sondalo napilit wa nafafasan hanya ka nafatimbangan hayo kasta fag fapakowan araw in Hisos.
40027033	Ta nondasog sa sadik foyo tagngayan Golgota, it kahologan Botol Alfoyo,
40027034	ka manga sondalo nafagamit han Hisos langgaw ha aktom mayat. Dapat is Hisos no nandog nainom, nadayo di.
40027035	Manga sondalo napako wan in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo, ginya tagpostahan it manga rotay, nangafodan wan.
40027036	Ginya madi tantokaw wan kaarakitay igbantay hanya.
40027037	Masoratan sas hayo san Hisos tongod alfoyo ista sombong kitay, Tos Hisos ka Gorangon manga Hodyo.
40027038	Gis nanya yadi ta nafapako dowak tolisan, insadi san Hisos balis sihon, insadi sat balis wala.
40027039	Manga taw kagdalan sinya igmaswag, igyod, mabaringan di ista alfoyo,
40027040	taglwang, Anod, haw ka domwat nangos ka Fanimbaan-Dahol, ginya fatobo ya tolo lamang ik sirang, kati bawiyan hyamo sadili. No haw wa ngay kan Diyos Anak, fag dokson wan gis nyamos nafatimbangan hayo.
40027041	Kitonya yadi ka manga fagtahinan fagalan, ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo, hanggan ka manga fagtahinan banwa iglibak in Hisos, tagfwadfwayongan,
40027042	Bati hanya nabawi ongay ka tiba taw, dapat not sadili wa habilogan idyadi wa syagan igbawi. Gwadi tyamo, hono, ka Gorangon manga Israil. Hanya no domokson nga kati gis nwa fag nafatimbangan hayo, mimtiwala wa hanya.
40027043	Gwadi hanyag syag in Diyos, iglwang yadi kitay hanya in Diyos wa Anak. Tam lomag wa araw ngatay is Diyos bomawi hanya no orongan galwasi hanya.
40027044	Kitonya yadi ka manga tolisan kanpako sat akbang nogyod in Hisos.
40027045	Ginya madi yabay, gis boknga sirang balis myanit kabohid wan, inharom sadi wak dahonya banwanan.
40027046	Myanit no kabohid wan, is Hisos natawag marigon, sas fangampangan Aramaik, Ili, Ili, lama sabaktani? It kahologan, Angko Diyos, angko Diyos, kana mayon haw nogfabayaan angko.
40027047	Tiba taw ka sinya malindogan no nadog kitay is Hisos igtawag kitonya, taglwang, Mayon igtawag in Iliyas.
40027048	Ka sadik taw dagos wa nandalandan nabol famasopsop, natogna has langgaw maiglis, nasongkit sas tobwan bagahay ginya nafasopsop in Hisos.
40027049	Dapat tibag lwang, Faya, tam bomantay yap, ngatay is Iliyas imbangkad araw kaarakitay mamawi hanya.
40027050	Is Hisos natawag ya domwag marigon, ginya nafalfas wat ipsaw.
40027051	Ginya yabay ka fanahop rotay sas fagbokngan Fanimbaan-Dahol dagos wanragyang, gis tongod has daga baliwa, namokngan wan. Ka daga inhawig wan, ka manga bato in-gifak lamang.
40027052	Ka manga lobgoban inboklas, hanggan aywan fag manga taw ka natay, ka danwan tohoyan han Diyos, inboyag ya.
40027053	Ginyas Hisos nonboyag ya, ta nadokson gis lobgoban, nasakbaw has basad Hirosalim, ka banwa kantohoyan han Diyos. Kaaywanon fag manga taw nalag yadi sinya ka mangan boyag ya.
40027054	Ka fagtahinan sondalo, hanggan it manga ofod kagbantay in Hisos, inhinol wa dahol dahol ta no nadog nalinog hanggan nalag fagayo kananod sinya. Taglwang, To orongan wan Diyos Anak.
40027055	Aywan fag manga ina sinya yadi mabantayan gis ayayo. Gi yapdis sakop Galiliya to fag manga ina nogtahin in Hisos hanggan igtogbong hanya.
40027056	Tonya fag ina tiba kawa da Mariya Magdalina, da Mariya inda Santyago da Hosi ina, hanggan in Sibidiyo babay.
40027057	Araw, myanit no kasangday wan, sadik ama maakwa, is Hosi gis banwa Arimatiya, indasog wan. Is Hosi in Hisos yadi katogbong sadi.
40027058	Hanya hawan Pilato nasagad in Hisos habilogan. Is Pilato nafasognod it manga sakop kitay disagan han Hosi in Hisos habilogan.
40027059	Yakangas Hosi nabol in Hisos habilogan a, nasafot basad bago fag rotay madamol.
40027060	Is Hosi nafaigyan in Hisos habilogan san Hosi sadili nafatalaga lohib lobgoban, ngalay yapdi no natigib ka bato. Ginya madi is Hosi nafabalolang sadik bato dahol dahol it fanahop sas sakbawan lohib, ginyan lahaw wan.
40027061	Da Mariya Magdalina, hanggan sadi yak Mariya, sinya yadi matokawan sas masohod lobgoban.
40027062	Nonbago marom, nonsagaya ka sirang famatalagaon, ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan manga Farisiyo, ta fagayo nangofodan han Pilato.
40027063	Taglwang, Ama, migtohod kitay tonya fag bohagon no boyagan yapdi igfatakagdog, iglwang kitay, nonsagaya tolok sirang, hanyam boyag ya.
40027064	Yakanga, balis tolok sirang, fag hagbantay nangos fiya fiya ka lobgoban, ngandayo it manga katogbong imbangkad hanya, bomol it habilogan, ginya fadahit has taw kitay hanyan boyag ya. No kitonya ka bohag goyan imbali dwat man ka gona.
40027065	Is Pilato iglwang, Sogi, ham tabanan manga sondalo, fabantayan fiya fiya sas lobgoban.
40027066	Yakanga tanlahaw wan, nafaganit ka tahop lohib, nafwalid tandaan sas boknga sakbawan fanahop bato, hanggan nafabantay ka lobgoban has manga sondalo, kaarakitay fatohoyan idwa ha taw tomanog tonya.
40028001	Nonsagaya wan ka Sirang Kafahowayan, da Mariya taga Magdala hanggan sadi yak Mariya, hawan Hisos lobgoban kaarakitay ta manibaw, dayo kayawa sas sirang gona sa sadik simba.
40028002	Yabay sadi odi ginan nalinog marigon. In Diyos anghil sadi nadokson gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, nafabalolang ka bato fanahop, ginya madi natokaw wa sinya baba fanahop bato.
40028003	Ka anghil mata masilaw kitos hilat, it rotay abohay yadi kito was gafas.
40028004	Ka manga bantay sondalo karokog wa a, inlobay wa kadala no nalag ka anghil.
40028005	Dapat ka anghil nafwayong has manga ina, Ham fag idwa kadala, ho twa kitay ham igsayak in Hisos kanpako sas nafatimbangan hayo itfagonan.
40028006	Hanyadwastay, hanyan boyag ya kito kat fwayong itfagonan. Ham fag hastay, bantayan kasta nagfwalidan hanya is nwa basad lohib.
40028007	Ginya ham fag hanya wan, fag fwayong hat manga katogbong kitay hanyan boyag ya, gomona wa hayo has sakop Galiliya. Ham lomag wa hanya sinya. Yabay ham fag tohod angko fwayong ha hayo.
40028008	Ginya madi da Mariya inlahaw wa madali gis lobgoban. Ista manga fangayofan sayo kadala sayo kasolong wa dahol igdog. Yakanga tagdalandan wan han Hisos manga katogbong kaarakitay fomwayong kat lagan.
40028009	Dapat is Hisos natagbo inda Mariya, nahampang mahoway. Ka manga ina naakbang in Hisos, natahos it bitis, nanlibabaan hat atobangan.
40028010	Is Hisos nafwayong has taw, Ham fag idwa kadala. Ham fag hanya wan, fwayongan hangko manga fadwasay kitay ta fag hawas Galiliya, yakanga ta lomag angko sinya.
40028011	Ka manga ina noglahaw wan, yabay tibak sondalo kagbantay sas lobgoban hawas basad banwa, nafwayong has manga fagtahinan fagalan fagayo kat lagan sinya sas lohib lobgoban.
40028012	Ka manga fagalan nanifonan, ginya madi, nontabo wagtoltolan has manga fagtahinan banwa, ta natangdan dahol has manga sondalo.
40028013	Ta natogon ka manga sondalo fag kiti ham nogfwayong is taw, ham fag lwang kitay, Sayabi, mi no matoyogan wan, it manga katogbong inbangkad has lohib lobgoban, naanggong wan it habilogan.
40028014	Ta nafwayong yadi, Ham fag idwa galibitan, nyawa ka gobirnador domog kitonya, mi bahala wa hanya, ham idwam iktan.
40028015	Yakanga ka manga bantay sondalo natanggap wat tangdan, nafadahit yadi has taw kitonya. Hanggan wa balis kati tonya yapdi ka manga Hodyo fagfadahiton has taw.
40028016	Ginya madi ka safolo ha sadik katogbong hawas Galiliya han Hisos nagfwayongan fag moyod itfagonan.
40028017	Ta no nalag in Hisos ta nanlibabaan hat atobangan, dapat tiba gadowan yapdi.
40028018	Is Hisos naakbang has taw, iglwang, Fagayo fag kangayanan san Diyos banwanan sam tongod hanggan sas baba daga indisag wa hangko.
40028019	Yakanga ham fag lahaw wan, ham fakalig angko manga katogbong sas fagayo fag manga layonan daga. Ham fag fatogna ka manga taw, sangko Ama ngayan, hanggan sat Anak ngayan, hanggan sat Maliyaw fag Falad ngayan.
40028020	Faadalan yadi tonya fag manga taw imtanog fagayo kangko natogon ha hayo. Yabay, fanlag nga aban, no bali da ha daga yapdi, ho omofod wa fagaba hayo.
41001001	Kito ka Fiya fag Barita nogfabago kawa han Kiristo Hisos, in Diyos anak.
41001002	Hyabi hyabi is Isayas, in Diyos fangampang nasorat kitay, is Diyos iglwang, Fandog ngay, hogsogo angko sogowan ha hyamo fagonan, Kaarakitay igyawa hyamo bato lahawan.
41001003	Kiti kat fwayong kagtawag marigon marigon sas basad fakahyabogan, Fatalagaan in Diyos bato lahawan, Fahaslongan it manga dalan.
41001004	Ginya madis Hwan kagfatogna manga taw inbangkad wa ngay, igbanwanan basad fakahyabogan. Is Hwan igfwayong kitay, no fakta ka somoyo hanggan fatogna hanya, is Diyos faliyam it manga naogali dwat.
41001005	Fagayo gis sakop Hodiya hanggan ka manga gis banwa Hirosalim, fagayo nagobok in Hwan. Manga taw nogbaya ista manga sadili naogali dwat, is Hwan igfatogna hanya sas safa Hordan.
41001006	Gis nanya in Hwan rotay olad kamilyo mahaligan, anit yadit fagyahos, manga fan, manga dyahot it fanganon.
41001007	Is Hwan igtoltol has taw, iglwang kitay, Ha akwa omoyan sangko ginanan ha kangayanan abwat man angko, ho kaya wan ngadi manlohas it famaganit lapak.
41001008	Sas danom aho nogfatogna hayo, dapat sas Maliyaw fag Falad hanya no fatogna hayo aban.
41001009	Ginya madi, gis nanya fag manga masohod, is Hisos inbangkad gis banwa Nasarit, sakop Galiliya, hanggan is Hwan nafatogna in Hisos sas safa Hordan.
41001010	Is Hisos no kabangon gis basad danom, hanya nalag ka manga banwa sas tongod dagos wanboklas hanggan ka Maliyaw fag Falad kayokfo ha hanya kitos salompati.
41001011	Ha sadik hasnog gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod iglwang kitay, Haw wa kangko fagalwasiyon fag anak, hogbaya wa dahol dahol hyamo.
41001012	Ka Maliyaw fag Falad nadagos wa nafalahaw in Hisos has basad fakahyabogan.
41001013	Is Hisos nadogay sinya ofat ik safolok sirang hanggan is Satanas nasolay igfaloksowan hanya. Manga odi myala fag hayopan banwanan sinya, dapat ay, manga anghil nafarigon in Hisos gis nanya.
41001014	Ginya madi, ta no nagamat in Hwan kaarakitay igfaporiso hanya, is Hisos hawas sakop Galiliya, nanoltol in Diyos Fiya fag Barita. Is Hisos iglwang,
41001015	Kati wa fag masohod im-anod wan in Diyos sakop, yakanga ham fag soyo wan. Ham fag katiwala ka Fiya fag Barita.
41001016	Is Hisos nogdalan sas bahalan linaw dahol, tagngayan Dagat Galiliya, nalag inda Simon da Andris dowasay. Da Simon gokas sarap has basad danom maskin manga fangoyang.
41001017	Is Hisos nalwang handa Simon, Ham tahinan angko. Ho fabali hayo manga fangiktan manga taw.
41001018	Ginya ginan ta nadagos wa naobon it manga sarap a, nahin wan Hisos.
41001019	Ta noglahaw yapdi, is Hisos nalag inda Santyago, da Hwan dowasay, in Sibidiyo manga anak. Da Santyago masahayan yadi sat basad baloto, igsip it manga sarap.
41001020	Is Hisos dagos natawag wa ka dowasay. Ta naobon wan Sibidiyo, it ama, sas basad sahayan, ha ofod yapdi manga famalo. Ginya madi ka dowasay nahin wan Hisos.
41001021	Da Hisos indasog wa has banwa Kapirnaom. No sas Sirang Kafahowayan, is Hisos dagos wansakbaw ha basad fanimbaan Hodyo, igfaadal has taw.
41001022	Tantaka wagdog is Hisos nogfaadal has taw, maskin kitos ha kangayanan hanya nogfaadal, idwag hono, bondi kitos mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo.
41001023	Sadi odi ginan sadik ama nasakbaw has basad fanimbaan, labang wa kagfahoriyan hanya.
41001024	Ka ama igtawag marigon, kitay, Haw, Hisos taga Nasarit, kana haw nogmawat hyami? Haw awkin hastay kaarakitay domaog wa hyami? Ho fadi wad twa no faktaw haw. Haw wa ka Maliyaw kanbangkad gin Diyos.
41001025	Dapat is Hisos nangabaya ka labang, nalwang, Ha hawa gawang gawang. Haw fag galin gis nyamo fag taw.
41001026	Ginya madi, ka labang no nafalimboyagan yapdi ka ama, narokyaw dahol, bago nalin gi hanya.
41001027	Fagayo fag manga taw intaka wan, ta fagayo nangarintawan kitay, Kana to fag kadonongan? Ngatay sadik adal bago. Ha kangayanan igfasognod, hanggan ka manga labang katanog odi hanya.
41001028	In Hisos naibolon dagos wandahit ha sadik dahonya manga banwanan sas ligongan, sas sakop Galiliya.
41001029	Da Hisos dagos wa nalahaw gis basad fanimbaan, nasakbaw handa Simon da Andris balay. Da Santyago da Hwan naofod yadi wansakbaw.
41001030	Gis nanya in Simon nogang ina maigyanan maskin it sagit kagnaw a, tadwa nafadogayon nafadog in Hisos kawa hanya.
41001031	Is Hisos naakbang has ina, nagamit hanya, nafabangon. It hagnaw dagos wanfiya. Ginya madi ka ina natogbong is taw.
41001032	Araw, no kayabi wan, myanit no kasangday wan, manga taw nataban han Hisos fagayo sinya fag banwanan ka ha manga sagit, hanggan ka ha manga labang igfahoriyan istaw.
41001033	Sadik banwa dahonya, ta nanifonan dayo sakbawan.
41001034	Is Hisos nafafiya kaaywanon fag manga taw ha sagit bokod bokod, nafaalin yadi aywan fag manga labang kagfahoriyan is taw. Is Hisos idwa nafaawang ka manga labang maskin ta kilala wan Hisos.
41001035	Ginya madi, no marom, is Hisos inbangon, yabi yapdi, idya kasirang, hawas talon, nandarangin sinya.
41001036	Araw, da Simon naoyan hanya.
41001037	Ta no nalag in Hisos, ta nalwang hanya kitay, Fagayo fag manga taw igsayak hyamo.
41001038	Is Hisos nasagot kitay, Tam hawas masoson fag manga banwa kaarakitay ho manoltol is taw sinya. Maskin tonya wa kangko bato ibolonon, ho nalahaw wa gintam ginanan.
41001039	Is Hisos nasafong ka manga banwanan fagayo sas sakop Galiliya. Igtoltol sas basad manga fanimbaan Hodyo, igfaalin yadi ka manga labang gis taw.
41001040	Sadik taw ka ha sagit kitong naakbang han Hisos, nanlingkohodan, iglwang hanya, Haw nangos no kasaya digfafiya angko, haw fadi wad somyagan.
41001041	Kawas Hisos kaawa hanya, natawid hanya a, nalwang kitay, Ho kasaya ngay, haw fag imfiya wan.
41001042	Ginya madit kitong dagos wanfiya, ogali wan it anit.
41001043	Is Hisos nabando hanya fiya fiya, bago nafalahaw,
41001044	nafwayong hanya, Hawag fwayong nyawa haday fag manga taw, dapat fag hayapdis fagalan-han-Diyos, fabantayan hanyam habilogan, ginya madi ha disagan kan Mwisis natogon bato disagon, bilang faorongan has taw kitay haw infiya wan.
41001045	Dapat ka ama nonlahaw wan, dagos wagtoltol has manga taw, nafadahit wan. Kawa kitonya, is Hisos idwa has basad manga banwa, dapat nabaybay odi has manga ligongan. Nyawa kitonya, manga taw gis fagayo fag manga banwanan inbarangkadan wa hanya.
41002001	Idya bangan dogay, is Hisos no nwali has banwa Kapirnaom, manga taw nadog kitay is Hisos sawat oliyanan.
41002002	Kaaywanon fag manga taw inbangkad, nanifonan sinya, iglabi di sasta balay hanggan wa sayo sokayan,
41002003	hanggan is Hisos igtoltol has taw. Ha ofat ik ama inbangkad naosong sadik ama kadwa syagan kimot.
41002004	Ta nodwa twa gakbang in Hisos kawa kaaywanon wa fag manga taw, ta nabol ka atop san Hisos tongod. Ginya nonlosbong ngay, ta natonton han Hisos akbang, ka ha sagit sat baba sagmak.
41002005	Ginya madis Hisos no nalag kitay tagsyag marigon ha hanya, iglwang has ama kadwa syagan kimot, Anak, hogfaliyam im manga naogali dwat.
41002006	Dapat gis nanya, ha akwa mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo matokawan sinya. Ista fangayofan iglwang,
41002007	Yakana mayon to fag taw no kampang kitonya? Igsway odin Diyos. Bohonwa awkin is Diyos lamang ka ha kangayanan igfaliyam manga ogali dwat?
41002008	Dapat is Hisos nasarom ista fangayofan kitay ta gisip kitonya. Yakanga nafwayong has taw, Kana mayon ham no nangarisipan kitonya?
41002009	Sida ka malpos fwayongon has idwa syagan kimot, ngatay, Im manga naogali dwat fag imliyam wan, ngatay, Haw fag kabangon wan, anggongan wam sagmak, haw fag lomahaw wan.
41002010	Dapat ho falag ha hayo kitay aho, Kanbali Taw, ha kangayanan istay sas baba daga, igfaliyam ista manga ogali dwat.
41002011	Ginyas Hisos nafwayong has idwa syagan kimot, Aho wa kaglwang kitay, Haw fag kabangon wan, dyan wam sagmak, nyawa ha mwali wa kati.
41002012	Ginya ka ama nalindog, dagos wa naanggong it sagmak, sasta faglagan fagayo, ginya nalahaw wan. Yakanga tandolaw wa dahol dahol, nafasayagdog in Diyos, iglwang, Nyawa ginahin, tam idwa ha lagan kitonya.
41002013	Sadi ya ginan is Hisos inlahaw, hawas akbang linaw dahol. Kaaywanon fag manga taw naakbang hanya, hanggan is Hisos igfaadal has manga taw.
41002014	Araw, da Hisos noglahaw yapdi, ta nalag in Libi, in Alpiyo anak, matokawan sas fanohotan bohis Roma. Is Hisos nafwayong hanya, Ha tahinan wangko. Ginyas Libi dagos wanlindog, natahin wa hanya.
41002015	Ginya madi da Hisos no matokawan san Libi balay, sas bilog fanganan, aywan fag manga fanohot bohis hanggan tiba taw kadwa fiya it ogali, nanayowan kwan sinya, maskin kaaywanon naoyan in Hisos, hanggan in Hisos manga katogbong sinya yadi wan.
41002016	Ka mangag faadal ka Batasan Hodyo hanggan manga Farisiyo, no nalag kitay is Hisos igsayowan kwan has manga ha ogali dwat hanggan manga fanohot bohis, taglwang han Hisos manga katogbong, Kana mayon is Hisos nogsayo has manga fanohot bohis Roma, hanggan has manga taw ka ha ogali dwat?
41002017	Is Hisos no nadog ista fwayong, iglwang has manga taw kitay, Ka manga ha sagit ka kasaya has famolongan, no kadidwa ha manga sagit idwa kasaya hanya. Maskin ngay honbangkad hastay angko fagsayahon ka manga ha ogali dwat, bohonwa ka gayfan kitay it manga ogali fiya.
41002018	Gis nanya fag manga masohod in Hwan manga katogbong, hanggan manga Farisiyo idwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin mahogod. Manga taw naakbang in Hisos, naintaw hanya kiti, Kana mayon in Hwan manga katogbong, hanggan ka manga Farisiyo manga katogbong, nomtoon idwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin mahogod, dapat kam manga katogbong idwa gogali kitonya?
41002019	Is Hisos nasagot has taw, Ka mangag fasakop has famabayan idwa awkin kwan hanon kagbabay no gofod yapdi has taw, ham gayfan? Kagbabay no sinya yapdi, ta homwan yapdi hanon.
41002020	Dapat ay, aban ha gomamat tomaban kagbabay. Gis nanya ta bago didwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin mahogod.
41002021	Idwa haglonob rotay kadyan yamos has daanon fag rotay. Noglonob kitonya, ka daanon fag rotay labi wamdwat aban. Maskin ka bago no sas daanon, kadahol ya kat losbong.
41002022	Idwa yadi ha taw somiblag bago fag alak ha basad daanon fag sohadan anit. Maskin ka alak bago fabosni ka anit daanon, ginya ka alak im-odolanan lamang. Ka fiya, fag somiblag bago fag alak has bago fag sohadan anit.
41002023	Sadi ginan, sas Sirang Kafahowayan, da Hisos nadalan sasta namay ha tirigo. Ta nogdalan sinya, in Hisos manga katogbong igfabago igbol manga haway sayok.
41002024	Manga Farisiyo iglwang han Hisos kitay, Yabay kana mayon im manga katogbong no gibolon kadwa maangay sas Batasan Hodyo, maskin sawas Sirang Kafahowayan?
41002025	Is Hisos nasagot has taw kiti, Ham awkin idwa nabasa, nyawa ginahin, in Dabid naibolon hyabi, da Dabid hanggan it manga ofod nonhori kawa kalonos?
41002026	Kawas Dabid nasakbaw han Diyos basad balay, nos Abiyatar kasta gorangon has manga fagalan-han-Diyos. Ginyas Dabid nahwan ka tinapay kandisag han Diyos. Ka Batasan Hodyo iglwang ka manga fagalan lamang ka fiya homwan tonya fag tinapay. Dapat ay, is Dabid nahwan, ginya nadisag yadi hat manga ofod.
41002027	Is Hisos nalwang ya has taw, Ka Sirang Kafahowayan kagtogbong has taw, bonwa ka taw kagtogbong has Sirang Kafahowayan.
41002028	Maskin ngay, aho, Kanbali Taw, kagbahala yadi has Sirang Kafahowayan.
41003001	Sadi ya ginan is Hisos nasakbaw has basad fanimbaan Hodyo. Sinya ha sadik ama it gamat inrifis wan.
41003002	Ha manga taw igbantay in Hisos, ngatay mamafiya basad Sirang Kafahowayan maskin tagsayak it fabangdanan iglaban in Hisos.
41003003	Is Hisos iglwang has ama kanrifis it gamat kitay, Ha fag hastay.
41003004	Ginya madis Hisos iglwang has fakaaywanan kitay, Sida ka maangay has Batasan Hodyo, ham gayfan, ngatay ka gibolon fiya, ngatay ka gibolon dwat sas Sirang Kafahowayan? Ngatay igbawi taw, ngatay igfahatay taw? Dapat idwa ha nasagot in Hisos.
41003005	Ginyas Hisos namalantayon has taw sat ligongan, kahori wa dahol it fangayofan, maskin karongkot iglag manga taw myasa wa maganit it fangayofan. Ginya madis Hisos igfwayong has ama, Falogdayan im gamat. Ginya ka ama nafalogday ngat gamat, infiya wa dagos, ogali wan.
41003006	Dapat ay, ka manga Farisiyo igdokson a, dagos wa goyonan igtoltolan han Hirodis sakop, no kindasta halimbawan kaarakitay fahatay in Hisos.
41003007	Ginya madis Hisos nataban it manga katogbong, nafatawas wan, hawas linaw dahol. Aywan fag manga taw gis sakop Galiliya goyan is taw, hanggan gis sakop Hodiya,
41003008	gis banwa Hirosalim, gis sakop Idomiya, hanggan gis difay Hordan, hanggan gis ligongan manga banwa Tiro hanggan Sidon, kaaywanon kaaywanon fag manga taw. Kawa tagdog in Hisos manga ibolon myasa wa fiya, ta gobok hanya.
41003009	Ginya madis Hisos igfwayong hat manga katogbong kitay, Fag fatalaga hangko sadik baloto kawa taw kaaywanon, matohon wa dahol, ho ngandayo imlibit.
41003010	Is Hisos iglwang kitonya maskin fagayo ka ha manga sagit igpilit han Hisos kaarakitay is Hisos mandog, manawid ka manga taw. Inbali kitonya kawa kaaywanon kan Hisos nafafiya.
41003011	Nyawa ginahin ka manga labang noglag in Hisos, ka labang fagfahoriyon iglohoban san Hisos fon bitis, ginya ka labang igtawag marigon, iglwang, Haw in Diyos wa Anak.
41003012	Is Hisos igbando marigon has manga labang kitay, Hagfahilala has taw no fakta aho.
41003013	Ginyas Hisos hawas moyod, nafatawag it manga fakilalaon tiba. Tagtahin yadi wa hanya.
41003014	Is Hisos nafatohoyan safolo ha dowak taw ka omofod hanya fagaba, it fagsogoon yadi kaarakitay manoltol has taw.
41003015	Ha kangayanan yadi igfaalin manga labang gis taw.
41003016	To kat manga ngayan ka safolo ha dowak katogbong. Bago bago is Simon, kan Hisos nafangayan is Pidro,
41003017	hanggan da Santyago da Hwan, in Sibidiyo manga anak, kan Hisos nafangayan da Boanirgis, it kahologan, Manga anak dalogdog.
41003018	Hanggan da Andris, da Filipi, da Bartolomi, da Matiyo, da Tomas, in Santyago sangay in Alpiyo anak, da Tadiyo, ginyan Simon sangay, ka goyon marigon it manga kapariho Hodyo,
41003019	hanggan is Hodas Iskariyoti ka naoyon in Hisos kalaban.
41003020	Ginya madi da Hisos nwali wan. Kaaywanon fag manga taw nanifonan sadi ya ginan, yakanga da Hisos idwa twa kwan hanon gis nanya.
41003021	In Hisos manga kaiban no nadog kitay kitonya, ta naoyan kaarakitay tomaban in Hisos maskin taglwang, Is Hisos ngandayo kaliyam it fangayofan.
41003022	Ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo kandasog gis banwa Hirosalim, iglwang kiti, Is Biilsibol, ka tahinan manga labang, kagfon in Hisos, yakangas Biilsibol, kagfasyagan hanya igfaalin manga labang.
41003023	Ginyas Hisos nafaakbang hanya ka manga taw, nafahalimbawa kitay, Kinday araw is Satanas nogfalagyo it sadili, ham gayfan?
41003024	Halimbawa, ka sadik gorangon sakop nombali dowak layonan, idwa domogay.
41003025	Kitonya yadi nangos, no sadik talanahan imbali dowak layonan, idwa yadi domogay.
41003026	Kitonya yadis Satanas, noglaban it sadili sakop, igfabali dowak layonan, idwa domogay, imliyam di.
41003027	Dapat ay, kagfon balay no marigon, idwa ha somakbaw hat basad balay kaarakitay ignahaw it botang nodya gomafos yap hanya, ginya madi idwa somawad it manga botang.
41003028	Hogfwayong ha hayo, bonwa bohag, kasta manga naogali dwat fagayo twam liyam hanggan ista hampang nogfadwat igdog in Diyos ngayan,
41003029	dapat, nyawa faktaw nogfadwat igdog ka Maliyaw fag Falad, tonya sadik ogali dwat idwa twam liyam, nyawa ginahin.
41003030	Is Hisos iglwang kitonya maskin taghalwang kitay, Ha sadik labang kagfon in Hisos.
41003031	Yabay, in Hisos ina, hanggan it manga fadwasay indasog wan, mafanayan di sas sokayan a, igfatawag in Hisos.
41003032	Gis nanya kaaywanon fag manga taw matokawan san Hisos ligongan. Ta nafadog hanya, iglwang, Im ina hanggan im manga fadwasay sas sokayan galingawan hyamo.
41003033	Ginyas Hisos nasagot has taw, Fakta kangko ina, fakta kangko manga fadwasay, ham gayfan?
41003034	Ginya, nogbarantayon it mata has manga taw ka matokawan sat ligongan, is Hisos iglwang, Yabay, to kangko ina, hanggan angko manga fadwasay.
41003035	Maskin, nyawa faktaw no katanog in Diyos kafangayofanan, tonya wa kangko manga fadwasay, angko ina.
41004001	Sadi ya ginan is Hisos igtoltol sas bahalan linaw dahol. Kaaywanon kaaywanon fag manga taw igtifonan yadi sinya, yakangas Hisos nasakbaw has basad baloto, baba danom, matokawan yadi sinya. Ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw sinyas baba daga sas bahalan linaw.
41004002	Yabay, is Hisos igfaadal has taw sinya, dapat sayapdis manga halimbawa. Nogtoltol, is Hisos iglwang,
41004003	Ham fag matalingan. Sadik ama fangiyab hawat namay kaarakitay mamamgas.
41004004	Hanya nogfamgas igsabod odit binhi, yakanga tibak bolhog indagdag has boknga dalan. Ka manga manok indasog a, nahwan wa tonya.
41004005	Ha akwa yadi manga bolhog indagdag has daga libabaw, baba odi dalifi. No kitay di dagos wa natobo kawa libabaw maskin ka daga sinya.
41004006	Ka myanit no nasalog sinya, myanit wa dahol dahol, kat manga tobo inlayong di, maskin idwa ha dalid abasad.
41004007	Ha manga bolhog yadi indagdag ha sayo manga lamnon madogi. Ka manga lamnon inlangba, nasakfaw di ka manga tanom. Ka tanom idwa nabohad.
41004008	Dapat ay, ha akwa yadi manga bolhog kandagdag has fiya fag daga. Yabay tonya ka natobo hanggan inabwat a, malangba, nabohad wan. Ha akwa nabohad tolok safolok bolhog, ha akwa nabohad onom ik safolok bolhog, hanggan ha akwa nabohad sadik daan bolhog.
41004009	Is Hisos nalwang, Ham no ha manga talinga ya ngadi, fag talinga wan.
41004010	Ginya madis Hisos nonboktong, ka tiba taw naintaw hanya, hanggan it manga katogbong, safolo ha dowa, naintaw yadi, kawa hat manga halimbawa no kanat kahologan.
41004011	Is Hisos nalwang has taw, Kati indisag wa ha hayo kitay ham fag tomwa ka mangadyag fadogon kawa han Diyos sakop baliwa, dapat no has iba taw, fagayo sas manga halimbawa yapdi ta no domog.
41004012	Kaarakitay, Nyawa tanyaya wagbantay, tadwa lomag. Nyawa tagtalinga wagtalinga wan, tadwa tomwagdog. Inbali kitonya kaarakitay tadwa somoyo faliyam ista manga naogali dwat.
41004013	Is Hisos nalwang has taw kitay, Ham aw idwa twagdog to fag halimbawa? Kinda odi ham no tomwa wagdog fagayo fag halimbawa, ham gayfan?
41004014	Kagsabod igsabod in Diyos hampang.
41004015	Ka manga bolhog kandagdag sas boknga dalan, kito yadi nangos ka manga taw no nadog tonya fag hampang, is Satanas madali wagbol gista basad fangayofan ka nasabod hampang sinya.
41004016	Kito yadi ka manga bolhog kandagdag sayo baba dalifi, sas daga libabaw. Ta no nadog tonya fag hampang, igtanggap wa dagos, masolong wan no kitay di.
41004017	Dapat, idwa nadalid abasad sasta fangayofan. Ngalay di gagwanta. Dapat no ha donggon ya nga manga mahori, ngatay tagfahoriyan hanya maskin katiwala ka hampang, dagos wa nadayo.
41004018	Ka manga bolhog kandagdag ha sayo lamnon madogi, igfahalimbawa ka mangag talinga has hampang,
41004019	dapat kat manga fagisipon fagaba it manga kakorangan, ngatay kawili wa dahol kaakwaan, ngatay kasaya manga iba bagay. To fag manga fagisipon ka kalangba, ginyag sakfaw ka hampang sat basad fangayofan, yakanga tonya idwag bohad.
41004020	Dapat ay, ka manga bolhog kansabod sas fiya fag daga, ka mangag talinga ka hampang, igfaanod yadi tonya, ginyag bohad wan, tiba tolok safolo, tibat bohad onom ik safolo, tibat bohad sadi wak daan.
41004021	Is Hisos iglwang has taw, Tam awkin igdiya salong kaarakitay tam tomago ka salong sas daga gantangan, ngatay sas daga igyanan? Idwa awkin tam igsalifit ka salong sas tongod salangan, ham gayfan?
41004022	Idwa ha matagowan, kadwam lag aban. Idwa yadi ha mafyaloman kadwam diya aban has faglagan.
41004023	Ham no ha manga talinga ya ngadi, fag talinga wan.
41004024	Ginyas Hisos iglwang has taw, Ham fag matagahan no kana ka hayo fagtalingaon. No kinday ham nogfalag has iba taw, ta aba kitonya yadi nogfalag ha hayo, hanggan bondi kitonya kat disagon ha hayo aban.
41004025	Dapat ay, ka ha akwa, ha tanggapon ya domwag, hanggan kadwa ha akwa, nyawa ka ogbot sa hanya, imbol di tonya aban.
41004026	Is Hisos iglwang has taw kitay, kito yadi nangos in Diyos sakop. Sadik taw igsabod manga botol sas baba daga.
41004027	Ginya kagsabod, no yabi intoyog wan, no sirang mabangon. Dapat ka botol igtobo di, kaabwat wan, nyawa kagsabod idwa twagdog no kinday no kabali kitonya.
41004028	Yabay, ka dagag fatobo wan it natanom. Bago bago igtorang, ginya kaabwat, ginya kaway, ginya ha afo wan.
41004029	Ka manga bohad no loto wan, igdagos wagfangta, kawa fanganiyon wan.
41004030	Ginyas Hisos iglwang, Kinday odi ngap intam fatoladan in Diyos sakop, ham gayfan? Kinday tam nogfahalimbawa tonya?
41004031	Kitos sadik botol mostasa, ka ogbot man has fagayo fag botol kasta tanomon sadik baba daga,
41004032	dapat tonya nontanom, kalangba aban, kabali dahol man has fagayo fag fangofiyon, somanga yadi dahol fag manga sanga, yakanga manga manok igfogad sinya.
41004033	Is Hisos nafwayong has fakaaywanan fag manga taw kaaywanon fag manga halimbawa kitonya, no kinday ka manga taw no tomwa wagdog.
41004034	Idwa yadig toltol no bohonwa las halimbawa. Dapat nafwayong it manga kahologan fagayo hat manga sadili katogbong, ka tiba taw nodwa matalingan.
41004035	Araw no kayabi wan, is Hisos nalwang hat manga katogbong, Tam domifay wa has difay danom.
41004036	Ginya ta no naobon ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw, ka manga katogbong nataban in Hisos, danwa masahayan, nafalahaw wat baloto has baba linaw. Tiba sahayan nahoyog yadi was taw.
41004037	Yabay araw nabagyo dahol dahol, ka manga taob nabakbak ha boknga baloto, yakanga kapno wa ka danom sinyas basad baloto.
41004038	Dapat is Hisos sa dis ginanan ginanan, basad habot sahayan matoyogan, matangyawanan. Ta nafolaw in Hisos, nalwang hanya, Haw kagfaadal hyami, haw awkin idwa galibitan tam nomlogom ha daga danom?
41004039	Ginyas Hisos infolaw wan, nabando has bagyo, nalwang yadi has danom kitay, Fag kahalyaw wan, fag katohas wan. Ginya ka bagyo insiwang wa dagos, inhalyaw ya fiya fiya ka danom.
41004040	Is Hisos nalwang hat manga katogbong, Yakana ham no kadala? Ham awkin idwag syag angko?
41004041	Tandolaw wa dahol a, ta nangarintawan ha sadi ha sadi kitay, Yabay faktaw to? Nyawa manga bagyo, manga danom katanog it fwayong.
41005001	Da Hisos indasog wan sas difay linaw sas banwanan manga Girasino.
41005002	Is Hisos no nadokson gis basad baloto, sadik ama ka ha manga labang igfahoriyan hanya natagbo in Hisos. Ka ama inbangkad gis basad manga lohib fanlobgobanan taw,
41005003	kawa sinya no maoliyanan. Kati idwa ha taw syagan gafos ka ama, nyawa kadina ka fanggafos.
41005004	Itfagonan ta fagaba wagbinggas ya, gafos ya manga lobid baol, dapat hanyag bogloy digbogloy di ka kadina, igtogo digtogo di ka binggas. Idwa ha taw syagan igdaog ka ama.
41005005	Fagaba wa marokyawan, yabi sirang, sinyas basad manga lohib fanlobgobanan, hanggan wa basad moyod. Igfabaran wat sadili habilogan ha sayo manga bato.
41005006	Dapat ay, ka ama no nalag in Hisos gis ayayo, nadalandan hanya a, nanlibabaan hat atobangan,
41005007	igtawag marigon, iglwang, Hisos, in Diyos ka Abwat-man-has-Fagayo-Fagayo it Anak, kana haw nogmawat angko? Is Diyos igdog angko, aho nogtangkod kitay haw fag idwag fahoriyan angko.
41005008	Ka labang nalwang kitonya kawas Hisos nafwayong hanya kati kati haraw, Haw sadik labang dwat, fag galin gis nyamo fag ama.
41005009	Ginyas Hisos naintaw hanya, Faktam ngayan? Ka labang nasagot kitay, Ahos Mahabanan maskin hami kaaywanon.
41005010	Ka labang nafaawaon in Hisos, nalwang, Ha nangos fag idwag faalin hyami gistay fag talon.
41005011	Gis nanya ha sadik tifonan baboy ayo ayo kwan manga lamnon sasta akbang, baba moyod.
41005012	Ka manga labang nafwayong in Hisos, kitay, Ha nangos sogowan wa hyami has manga baboy, mi fag has basad manga baboy.
41005013	Yakangas Hisos nafaangay wa ngay. Ginya ka manga labang, no nalin gis ama, hawas basad manga baboy. Ka tifonan manga baboy, manga 2,000, dagos wa nanhadalandanan madali has lwad indahodan, has basad linaw dahol. Fagayo inlimos wan.
41005014	Ka manga gano ista tifonan baboy nalagyo wan, namarita has manga basad banwa hanggan sas ligongan. Ka manga taw inbarangkadan, namantay no kana ka sinya.
41005015	Ta nondasog han Hisos, taglag ka ama ka haraw ka labang, is Mahabanan, it fagfahoriyon, kati matokawan yadi sinya, ha solong rotay, it fangayofan ogali man di. Tandala waglag.
41005016	Ka manga nalag is Hisos nogfafiya ka ama, natoltol kawa hanya hanggan has manga baboy.
41005017	Ginya ka manga taw igsogo wan Hisos kitay, fag lahaw gista banwanan.
41005018	Ginya madi araw araw, is Hisos nogsakbaw wan has basad baloto, ka ama, ka manga labang fagfahoriyon haraw, gwayan wa kasaya mahin in Hisos,
41005019	dapat is Hisos idwag faangay, iglwang hanya, Haw fag goli yapdi ham manga fakilalaon. Fwayongan has taw ka hayo Fon naibolon kafiyaon sa hyamo, hanggan in-awa hyamo.
41005020	Ginya ka ama nwali wa ngay, namarita has taw sas banwanan Safolok-Banwa kitay, in Hisos naibolon ha hanya kafiyaon. Ka manga taw fagayo intaka wagdog.
41005021	Da Hisos nondasog ya has difay linaw, kaaywanon fag manga taw nagobok hanya sas baba daga, sas bahalan danom.
41005022	Ginya madi sadi kagbahala sas fanimbaan Hodyo, kawas Hayro, inbangkad wan. Ginya, no nalag in Hisos, nanlibabaan san Hisos atobangan,
41005023	igfaaronganon wan, iglwang kitay, Angko anak ina kaodikitay sas balay yapdi. Haw nangos tahinan angko, fwalidan yap im manga gamat hanya kaarakitay hanyam boyag yapdi.
41005024	Yabay, is Hisos naofod wan Hayro. Sadik tifonan taw kaaywanon naoyan yadi wan, igdarotdotan wa hanya.
41005025	Ya mangharaw, ha sadik ina mahoyogan yadi has taw. Ka ina ha fagdogon dogay, kawa safolo ha dowak fangaraw idwa kafiya it sagit ina.
41005026	Inhori gis manga famolongan ayo no kitay di, hanggan di namin it manga sangkap, nabayad fagayo fagayo has manga famolongan, dapat ay idwa kaoman. Yatokitay, mahori man kat fagonan.
41005027	Ka ina nadog kawas Hisos igfafiya ista manga sagit, yakanga naakbang han Hisos gis ginanan, dayo goyoy, sas fagbokngan fakaaywanan, nasapkid in Hisos rotay.
41005028	Maskin ka ina fangayofan iglwang, ngadi ho somapkid in Hisos rotay, homfiya wan.
41005029	Dagos wanfiya it sagit ina. Ka ina nadog kitay fawag folot yabay.
41005030	Ginya madis Hisos no natwa kitay ha nabol karigonan gi hanya, namalihidan wan sas fagbokngan fakaaywanan taw, iglwang kiti, Fakta kagsapkid angko manga rotay?
41005031	In Hisos manga katogbong nafwayong hanya, Haw fadi wadaglag taw kaaywanon, igdarotdotan wa ha hyamo, ginya haw iglwang, Faktaw kagsapkid angko?
41005032	Dapat is Hisos nafasaligawan it mata sat ligongan kaarakitay lomag no faktaw ka nasapkid it rotay.
41005033	Ginya madi ka ina, maskin natwa kitay hanyan fiya, naakbang hanya, indala wa dahol, nangarokogan wan, nanlibabaan san Hisos atobangan a, nabaya wa fagayo han Hisos.
41005034	Ginyas Hisos nalwang hanya, Anak ina, maskin hagsyag angko, haw infiya wan. Nyawa ha mwali wa kati, im fangayofan fag imhoway wan, hyamo fagdogon infiya wan.
41005035	Is Hisos no kampang yapdi has ina, tiban dasog wan gin Hayro balay. Ta nafwayong hanya kiti, Hyamo anak ina natay wan. Hawag falibang yapdi kagfaadal has taw.
41005036	Dapat is Hisos idwa nabati ista nafwayong, nalwang has ama ka fagtahinan sa sadik fanimbaan Hodyo, Haw fag idwa kadala, haw fag syag di ngay hangko.
41005037	Is Hisos idwa nafatahin ka fakaaywanan. Nataban lamang in Pidro, hanggan da Santyago da Hwan dowasay.
41005038	Ta nondasog san Hayro balay, tagdog ka manga taw gagran igwaraywayan wan, goraw ka anak natay.
41005039	Is Hisos nonsakbaw, nalwang has taw, Yakana ham no gagran hanggan goraw? Ka anak idwa natay, matoyogan di.
41005040	Ta kasay odin Hisos. Dapat is Hisos nafadokson fagayo fag manga taw. Ginya nataban ka anak it ama hanggan it ina, hanggan in Hisos nataban manga katogbong, ginya ta nasakbaw has basad oliyanan anak.
41005041	Is Hisos igtawid ka anak gamat, nafwayong kiti, Talita komi, sat sadili sanglitan. It kahologan nangos, Anak ina, hogfwayong hyamo, fakabangon wan.
41005042	Ginya ka anak ina dagos wanbangon a, iglahaw ya. Ka anak ina ha safolo ha dowak fangaraw it kadogayan. Fagayo fagayo fag manga taw indolaw waglag.
41005043	Ginyas Hisos natogon fiya has taw kitay, Ham fag idwag fwayong nyawa haday ka hayo mata lagan. Ginya madis Hisos natogon has taw, Ham fahwanan fafa has anak ina.
41006001	Is Hisos inlahaw wa ginya, nwali hat sadili banwanan. It manga katogbong natahin yadi hanya.
41006002	No sas Sirang Kafahowayan, is Hisos igfaadal ya ngay has basad fanimbaan. Kaaywanon ka manga nadog in Hisos toltol, intaka wan, taglwang, To fag ama gindak nabol to? Kana fag kadonongan ka nafalobos hanya? Twa oman gibolon ka kitonya fag manga madolaw?
41006003	Bohonwa awkin to ka famanday balay, in Mariya anak, inda Santyago, da Hosi, da Hodas, da Simon fadwasay? Idwa awkin istay yadit manga fadwasay ina no maoliyanan? Yakanga tadwa katalinga in Hisos.
41006004	Ginyas Hisos nafwayong has taw, Nyawa siday manga taw magalang has fangampang, nodwa sat sadili banwanan, it sadili iba, ngatay sat sadili talanahan.
41006005	Is Hisos idwa nasyagan naibolon manga madolaw sinya, no bonwa sayok odi kat nafafiya ista manga sagit no nandog is taw.
41006006	Is Hisos ngap indolaw wan kawa tadwa katiwala hanya. Ginya madis Hisos nasafong has manga tifonan balay sas sokayan banwa, igtoltol yadi sinya.
41006007	Ginyas Hisos nafatifonan ya ka Safolo-ha-Dowa, nafalobos has taw it kangayanan hasagfaalin manga labang gis taw.
41006008	Natogon yadi hat manga katogbong kitay, Ham fag idwa ha balon ngadi kana sas lahawan, no bohonwa sokod odi hayo diya. Nyawa fanganon, nyawa boyog, nyawa kwarta sa hayo hagkos, fag idwa ha diya.
41006009	Dapat fag ha lapak di, fag idwa gosniban hayo rotay.
41006010	Ginya nafwayong yadi hat manga katogbong, Nyawa siday hayo nagdasogan fag balay, ham fag sinya wak gigya ham nodyag lahaw ginya fag banwanan.
41006011	Nyawa sida fag foro ta nodwag fasakbaw hayo, nodwa yadig talinga hayo, ham no kalahaw ginya, fadagdagan ka fogis daga gi hayo manga bitis, bilang wagfaayfan ka taga sinya fag manga taw. Ginya madis Hisos nasogo ka Safolo-ha-Dowa ha sadik foro, ha sadik foro, myasa dowa, myasa dowa.
41006012	Yakanga ka Safolo-ha-Dowa inlahaw wan, natoltol has taw kitay ta fag soyo wan. Ta fag dayo wasta manga ogali dwat.
41006013	Aywan fag manga labang kasta nafaalin gis taw. Ta naasnahi lana ogbot sasta baba alfoyo nogfafiya aywan ka ha manga fagdogon.
41006014	Gis nanya fag masohod, is Hirodis kasta gorangon sas sakop Galiliya, nadog yadi kan Hisos manga naibolon madolaw, maskin in Hisos ngayan inbantog wan. Tiba taw iglwang is Hisos kawas Hwan kagfatogna manga taw hyabi. Hanya hono, inbangon ya gis kahatayan, yakangas Hisos syagan gibolon manga madolaw.
41006015	Tibag lwang, To is Iliyas wan. Tibag lwang, To in Diyos fangampang sadi, kito mandi ka hyabi it manga fangampang.
41006016	Dapat is Hirodis, no nadog, nalwang, To kawa ngas Hwan, kangko nafalifong it liyog hyabi, dapat ay, inbangon ya.
41006017	Maskin hyabi, is Hirodis mandi ka nafagamat has manga taw in Hwan, nafagafos yadi, nafaporiso wan, kawas Hwan gato in Hirodis maskin is Hirodis nabol in Hirodiyas, it tagyaw, in Filipi babay.
41006018	Kawas Hwan igfwayong han Hirodis kitay, Idwa fiya haw no kagaw im tagyaw.
41006019	Is Hirodiyas kahori in Hwan, kasaya wagfahatay hanya, dapat bago bago idya syagan,
41006020	maskin is Hirodis kadala in Hwan. Is Hirodis natwa kitay is Hwan sadik ama fiya it ogali, maliyaw, yakangas Hirodis gapin in Hwan. Is Hirodis kasayag talinga in Hwan manga toltol madi ngap, nyawa gadowan it fangayofan.
41006021	Dapat ay aban, is Hirodiyas nalag it halimbawan kaarakitay fahatayan in Hwan. Ta nogtohod in Hirodis kasagayan fag sirang, is Hirodis nafasyahod is taw kaaywanon fag manga hanon. Is Hirodis nafatawag it manga nahalig, ka ha manga kangayanan, ka manga fagtahinan has manga sondalo, hanggan kasta manga fakilalaon fag manga taw gis sakop Galiliya.
41006022	Araw in Hirodiyas anak ina, nasakbaw, natayok sasta faglagan manga ama. Is Hirodis, hanggan ka manga ama matokawan yadi sinya, igbaya waglag ka dayaga nogtayok. Ginyas Hirodis, ka gorangon, nafwayong has dayaga, Ho domisag hyamo nyawa kana kam fagsagadon gingko, nalwang ya domwag,
41006023	Is Diyos igdog wan aho noglwang, bonwa bohag, nyawa kanam fagsagadon, ho domisag hyamo, nyawa hanggan wagboknga angko sakop.
41006024	Ginya ka dayaga hawat ina, naintaw hanya, Kana araw angko sagadon? It ina nalwang kitay, Fag kawas Hwan, kagfatogna manga taw, fag it alfoyo im fagsagadon.
41006025	Ginya madi ka dayaga infwali ya madali has gorangon, nanagad madali, iglwang, Ho kasaya nangos, in Hwan alfoyo basad finggan, ka Hwan kagfatogna manga taw hyabi, fag tonya kam disagon angko.
41006026	Ginya madi yabay, ka gorangon is Hirodis inrongkot wa dahol it fangayofan. Dapat idwa nasyagan nabawit hampang kawat manga fakilalaon nadog wat nafatohoyan has dayaga haraw.
41006027	Is Hirodis dagos nasogo sadik sondalo, nalwang, Lifongan in Hwan liyog a, diyan it alfoyo hastay. Ka sondalo hanya wan, nalifong in Hwan liyog basad porisowan.
41006028	Ginya ta nadiya it alfoyo basad finggan, nadisag has dayaga, ginya madi ka dayaga nadisag hat ina.
41006029	In Hwan manga katogbong, no nadog kitay ta nafahatay in Hwan, ta hawas porisowan, nabol in Hwan habilogan a, nafwalid basad lohib fanlobgobanan.
41006030	Ka manga Fandiya-Barita nwali ya gis famaritaan. Ta natoltol han Hisos it manga naibolon fagayo fagayo hanggan it manga natoltol has taw.
41006031	Ginya madis Hisos nalwang hat manga katogbong, Tam hawas basad fakahyabogan, kaarakitay tam fahoway yap ogbot. Nalwang kitonya maskin kaaywanon fag manga taw igsaliwan wan, tadwa twa kwan hanon.
41006032	Yakanga ta nasahay baloto, hawas difay sayo fakahyabogan ngay, masamanan nangos gis taw.
41006033	Dapat aywan nalag wan ta no kaginan, nalag kitay da Hisos wa tonya fag manga taw. Ta nandalandanan sas baba daga gis fagayo fag manga banwa, has bahalan danom. Ta nagona man inda Hisos indasog.
41006034	Is Hisos no nadokson gis sahayan sat nakadagsaan, iglag ka manga taw kaaywanon. Hanyan awa waglag is taw, maskin ka manga taw bilang wa topa idwa ha gano taw. Ginyas Hisos natoltol kaaywanon fag manga bagay has taw.
41006035	Ka myanit no kasangday wan, in Hisos manga katogbong hawan Hisos, nalwang,
41006036	Tam istay basad fakahyabogan, kayabi wan. Falahawan yap nangos has manga tifonan balay sas ligongan ka manga taw kaarakitay ta manali ista sadili fanganon.
41006037	Dapat is Hisos nasagot hat manga katogbong kitay, Fag ham wa ka domisag fanganon has taw. Ginya ta nasagot han Hisos, Mi manali awkin 200 dinariyo tinapay, ginya fahoray has taw?
41006038	Ginyas Hisos nalwang hat manga katogbong kitay, Kayodak tinapay hayo diya? Famantay ngay. Ginya ta no namantay, taglwang, Lima di hanggan dowak oyang.
41006039	Ginyas Hisos nafatokaw sas baba lamnonan ka manga taw, malayonan.
41006040	Ginya ka manga taw intokaw wan, malayonan ngay. Tibak layonan sadik daan, tibak layonan limak safolo.
41006041	Ginya madis Hisos nabol ka limak tinapay, hanggan dowak oyang, natangdan has tongod a, nabaya in Diyos ka fanganon. Ginya nafaarogbotan ka tinapay a, nadisag hat manga katogbong kaarakitay homoray has taw. Ginya no nafaarogbotan ka dowak oyang, nahoray yadi has taw fagayo.
41006042	Ginya madi fagayo nangwan wa a, napsog wan.
41006043	Ta natifon ista sawad nakanan mafaarogbotan, safolo ha dowak boyog napno manga tinapay hanggan oyang.
41006044	Manga 5,000 ka manga ama ka nangwan tinapay.
41006045	Is Hisos nafasahay wa dagos it manga katogbong, has basad baloto nafagona wa has difay linaw dahol, hawas banwa Bitsayda. Is Hisos in-goyan, nafaoli yap ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw.
41006046	Ka manga taw nonlahaw di ngay, is Hisos nalahaw yadi wan has baba moyod kaarakitay mandarangin.
41006047	Araw, nonyabi wan, ka baloto sawas fakabokngan linaw, is Hisos sadi odi sas baba daga.
41006048	Ginya madis Hisos nalag kitay it manga katogbong kahori waglowag, kawa bagyo igsibwa wa has bohid. Dapat no kayawa wan, is Hisos naoyan yadi wat manga katogbong, nalahaw sas baba danom, kawas Hisos kasaya nangos gomona hasta fagonan.
41006049	Dapat in Hisos manga katogbong no nalag in Hisos iglahaw sas baba danom, ta gayfan ngan wa labang. Tagharokyawan wan,
41006050	kawa ta gafalad wan Hisos. Dapat is Hisos dagos nahampang has taw, nalwang, Fag marigon hayo fangayofan, aho di, ham fag idwa kadala.
41006051	Ginyas Hisos nasahay has basad sahayan. Ka bagyo dagos yadi wantolong.
41006052	Ta kadolaw waglag, kawa tadya twagdog no kinday is Hisos nafatimawa no nafaaywan ka tinapay, maskin tadyag syag orangan in Hisos.
41006053	Ta no nadifay ka linaw dahol, tandagsa wan sas banwa Ginisarit, natarabing it baloto sinya.
41006054	Ta nondokson gis basad sahayan, ka manga dan sinya fag manga taw is difay, dagos wa nahilala in Hisos.
41006055	Dagos nasonson ka ha manga sagit git manga balay sas ligongan. Ta naanggong sasta baba fangigyanan kaarakitay domiya han Hisos. Nyawa ta sidak nadog in Hisos, ta hanya yadi wan.
41006056	Nyawas Hisos haday kandasog, ta nafaigyan ka manga ha sagit sas manga faktaban balay, nyawas Hisos has manga tifonan balay sayok, nyawa has manga banwa dahol, nyawa has moyod, tagsagad kitay, Ha fatawidan yap man ka manga ha sagit, ngadim tobwan rotay, kaarakitay tamfiya wan. Fagayo ka natawid infiya wan.
41007001	Ginya madi, gis banwa Hirosalim, ha manga Farisiyo hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo, naakbang in Hisos,
41007002	taglag kitay in Hisos manga katogbong tiba, kwan hanon nyawadya naogas fiya fiya ista sadili gamat kito ka togon magorang fwayong.
41007003	Maskin ka manga Hodyo fagayo, labi man ka manga Farisiyo, tadwa kwan hanon nodya nanggonaw it manga gamat kito kasta kaogaliyan gis magorang hyabi.
41007004	Hanggan ta no goli gis fanaliyan, ta nodya nanggonaw it manga gamat kitonya, tadya kwan hanon. Tadwag liyam it manga ogali gis hagorangan kitay, fag kitonya no manga gogas it manga fanginoman, manga anglit, hanggan manga sangkap tanso.
41007005	Ginya ka manga Farisiyo hanggan ka mangag faadal ka Batasan Hodyo naintaw yadi han Hisos kitay, Kana mayon im manga katogbong no kaliyam wa ka manga ogali hyabi, gis manga magorang, kawat manga gamat idwan gonaw kito kantam ogali gis hyabi, ta no kwan hanon?
41007006	Is Hisos nalwang has taw kitay, Anod, kitonya ngay in Diyos fangampang Isayas fwayong kawa ha hayo, manga taw ka ha takan. Kito kanfwalid sat sorat kitay, Hampang odik masayagdog, Dapat ista fangayofan ayayo gingko.
41007007	Idwa ha kahologan ta nogsimba hangko, Maskin ogali odi taw kasta fagfaadalon.
41007008	Ham igfasigpala in Diyos togon, dapat ham matawidan fiya fiya has ogali magorang.
41007009	Is Hisos iglwang has taw, Anod ham, ham igdayo in Diyos togon kaarakitay hayo sadili fag manga ogali fagayo ka hayo fakatanogon.
41007010	Maskin is Mwisis nalwang kitay, Haw fag idwag falamang im ama hanggan im ina. Nalwang yadi kitay, No fakta ka kampang igsabayon, ngatay hat ama, ngatay hat ina, fiya man hanya no matay wan.
41007011	Dapat ham iglwang, Nyawa faktaw noglwang, ngatay hat ama, ngatay hat ina, Kangko togbong hara hayo, ya Korban wan. It kahologan no Korban, nadisag wa han Diyos ka kitonya.
41007012	Basta nalwang kitonya, gis nanya ham fawag fafalo tonya fag taw it ama hanggan it ina, nyawa kana.
41007013	No kitonya ham idwag fahalga in Diyos togon maskin ham igfalamang odig fadog hayo manga ogali has taw. Dapat aywan yadi fag manga bagay, bonwa kitay matoonan odi tonya, ka hayo fagfalamangon.
41007014	Ginyas Hisos nafaakbang ya hanya ka manga taw, iglwang kitay, Ham fagayo fagayo fag matalingan hangko. Ham fag tomwagdog kitay,
41007015	idwa ha fanganon igfadwat ista fangayofan, dapat gista basad fangayofan kagfadwat ista ogali.
41007016	Ham no ha manga talinga ya ngadi, fag talinga wan.
41007017	Is Hisos nonsakbaw ha basad balay, saman gis fakaaywanan taw, it manga katogbong naintaw hanya kat nafahalimbawa haraw, no kanat kahologan.
41007018	Ginyas Hisos nalwang hat manga katogbong kitay, Ham aw idwa yadi natwagdog? Ham awkin idwa twa kitay bonwa ka hanon kagfadwat ista ogali?
41007019	Ka hanon idwa has basad fangayofan, dapat ha odis basad tiyan, ginyam olay di aban. Maskin nafwayong kitonya, is Hisos nafatohoyan kitay idwa ha fagbaybayon fanganon.
41007020	Ginyas Hisos iglwang, Kadi gis basad fangayofan taw kagfadwat it ogali.
41007021	Maskin gis fangayofan taw nogfabago ka gisip dwat, nyawa anahan nyawa dayaga nogdoyogan lamang, mangag nahaw, mangag fahatay taw,
41007022	mangag fabayowan, manga kaingli is taw. Ginya yadi ka manga dwat fag ogali, kitos igbalibad, mangadwa ha nahayan, hanggan igsadili odi, ka mangag fadwat igdog ka tiba, igfataka has manga taw, hanggan manga dwat fag hakot.
41007023	Tonya fag manga dwat fag ogali fagayo gis basad fangayofan taw nogfabago, igfabali ka taw idwa fiya.
41007024	Ginyas Hisos inlahaw ginya fag banwanan, hawas akbang banwa Tiro hanggan banwa Sidon. Is Hisos insakbaw sasta balay, no kitay di, kwangit igfadog has taw kitay hanyan dasog wan. Dapat, nyawa kitonya, taglag di hanya.
41007025	Sinya ha sadik ina, it anak ina ogbot ha sadik labang igfahoriyan hanya. Ka ina no nadog kitay is Hisos sinya, hanya dagos wa naakbang in Hisos, nanlibabaan san Hisos dayo bitis.
41007026	Tonya fag ina taga Sirofinisya, it fangampangan Girigo. To fag ina igfaaronganon in Hisos kitay, Faalinan ka labang gingko anak ina.
41007027	Ginyas Hisos nasagot kitay, Idwa fiya bomol ka anak taw fanganon ginyag disag has manga ido.
41007028	Dapat ka ina nasagot kitay, Anod, angko Fon, dapat nyawa di kasta manga ido sas daga fanganan, kwan ka manga anak tingaw ka kadagdag.
41007029	Ginyas Hisos nalwang has ina kitay, Kawa haw nalwang kitonya, nyawa haw mwali wa kati, ka labang nalin wan gim anak ina.
41007030	Ka ina nwali wa dagos hat balay, nalag it anak maigyanan sas baba sagmak. Kat ina nondasog, ka labang danwa nalin ginya fag anak.
41007031	Is Hisos nwali ya gis manga sakop Tiro, nadalan sas banwa Sidon hanggan wandasog sas Linaw Galiliya. Nadalan yadi sas sakop Safolok-Banwa fag banwanan.
41007032	Ka sinya fag manga taw nataban han Hisos sadik ama gabongkok, idwa twa kampang fiya. Tagfaaronganon in Hisos kitay nangos, in Hisos gamat fag manawid yap man ka ama boyon.
41007033	Is Hisos nafasaman ka ama boyon gis fakaaywanan taw, natolsok it manga timoyo faniyo has ha bongkok fag manga talinga. Ginyas Hisos natofay a, nasapkid has ama baba dila.
41007034	Ginyas Hisos, no nabantay has tongod, naayangasan a, nafwayong hanya, Ifata, sat sadili sanglitan. It kahologan, Fag katolas wan.
41007035	Ginya madit talinga intolas wan, it tahod dila inlohas yadi a, ginya nahampang maslong.
41007036	Is Hisos iglwang has manga taw kitay, Hawag fwayong has taw, ngadi siday. Dapat is Hisos nogbando has taw, kwangit igfadog, ta labi man igfwayong di ngap has taw.
41007037	Tantaka wa dahol dahol igdog, tagfwadfwayongan kitay, In Hisos manga ibolon fagayo myasa wa fiya. Nafafiya ka gabongkok, ginyag dog ya. Nafafiya ka boyon, ginya ogali mandi, kampang mandi fiya fiya.
41008001	Gis nanya fag manga masohod, sadi ya ginan taw kaaywanon nonbangkad han Hisos, tadwa ha hanon, hanggan is Hisos nafaakbang hanya it manga katogbong, iglwang kitay,
41008002	Ho kaawa wa to fag manga taw kaaywanon, maskin kati tolo wak sirang ta no gofod intam, namin wat manga balon.
41008003	Aho nogfaoli was taw hat manga balay, ta no kalonos yapdi, tamlombay wat lonos boknga dalan, kawa tiba giwas fakaayayowan.
41008004	Ginyan Hisos manga katogbong nasagot hanya kiti, Kinda fag mapsog fanganon to fag manga taw istay, maskin tam sawas basad fakahyabogan.
41008005	Ginyas Hisos naintaw hat manga katogbong, Kayoday hayo tinapay is nyamo? Taglwang, Fito dik tinapay.
41008006	Ginyas Hisos nafatokaw ka manga taw sas baba daga a, nabol ka fitok tinapay. Nontabo wagbaya in Diyos, nafaarogbotan, ginya nadisag hat manga katogbong kaarakitay ta homoray has manga taw. Ginyat manga katogbong nangorayan wan has fakaaywanan.
41008007	Ha ofi yadi oyang ogbot. Ginya madi; is Hisos, no nabaya yadi han Diyos ka manga oyang, nalwang, Toy ham fahafodan yadi has taw.
41008008	Fagayo nangwan, napsog ya ngadi. Ta no natifon ista sawad nakanan fanganon mafaarogbotan, napno fitok baban.
41008009	Ka manga taw sinya manga ofat ik libot kaaywanan.
41008010	Is Hisos nafaoli wan ka fakaaywanan a, ginya madi nataban it manga katogbong, dagos nasahay has basad baloto, hawas akbang banwa Dalmanota.
41008011	Ka manga Farisiyo inbangkad ya ngay han Hisos, nafabohondit toltol. Tagsagad kitay is Hisos fag ha falagon madolaw gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, kawa tagsolay in Hisos.
41008012	Yakangas Hisos inhori odit fangayofan, nalwang has taw kitay, Yakana ka kati fag masohod fag manga taw nogsagad falagon madolaw? Hogfwayong hayo, orongan wan hodwa ha falagon madolaw ha hayo, ham ka kati fag masohod fag manga taw.
41008013	Is Hisos nafatawas was taw. Ginya madi nasahay has baloto hawas difay linaw.
41008014	In Hisos manga katogbong idwa natohod nadiya it manga balon tinapay, sadi odi ista nadiya.
41008015	Ginyas Hisos iglwang hat manga katogbong kitay, Ham fag matagahan, fag idwa kasaya ka manga Farisiyo hanggan in Hirodis famadahol tinapay.
41008016	In Hisos manga katogbong nangarintawan no kanat kahologan in Hisos fwayong. Taglwang, Kawa tam idwa ha balon tinapay.
41008017	Kawas Hisos nadog ta nogtoltolan, hanyag Iwang kitay, Kana ham nagtoltolan yapdi kawa ham idwa ha balon tinapay? Ham awkin idya twagdog? Hayo fangayofan laya idyag dasog sinya, kawa maganit.
41008018	Kawa bilang odi bota, idwag lag, nyawa ha mata. Bilang odi bongkok, nyawa ham ha manga talinga. Ham awkin idwag tohod?
41008019	Aho no nafaarogbotan limak tinapay has 5,000 ama, kayodak boyog ka napno nafaarogbotan tinapay ka hayo naanggong kasta sawad nakanan? Ta nasagot in Hisos, Safolo ha dowa. Ginyas Hisos naintaw ya domwag,
41008020	Sadi ya ginan aho no nafaarogbotan fitok tinapay has 4,000 kayodak baban ham igdog kasta sawad nakanan ka hayo naanggong itfagonan? Ta nasagot, Fito ya.
41008021	Ginyas Hisos nafwayong has taw, Ham awkin idya twagdog?
41008022	Da Hisos nondasog wan has banwa Bitsayda, ka manga taga sinya nataban sadik ama bota, galibitan wagfwayong han Hisos, is Hisos fag tomawid yap.
41008023	Is Hisos nagamit ka ama bota, nafasaman yap gis taw, hawas dayo manga balay. Is Hisos natofay ka ama bota mata, ginya natawid ka ama, naintaw hanya, Kati hagdog awkin hanfoga wan? Haw awkin iglag wan?
41008024	Ka ama namarantayon wan, iglwang, Hoglag manga taw bilang wa manga hayo iglahaw.
41008025	Ginya, sadi ya ginan is Hisos nandog it mata, ginya ka ama igdoro wan, it mata infoga wa fiya fiya, nalag nyawa kana fag bagay.
41008026	Is Hisos nafaoli ya ka ama, dapat iglwang kitay, Haw fag idwag dalan sas tifonan manga balay.
41008027	Ginyas Hisos hanggan it manga katogbong nafadagos it lahawan. Hawas manga tifonan balay sas sakop Sisariya, ka Sisariya ka san gorangon Filipi sakop. Ta noglahaw yapdi, is Hisos naintaw hat manga katogbong kitay, Fakta hono aho, ta noglwang?
41008028	Ginya madi ta nasagot han Hisos, Tiba taw noglwang, haw, hono, hyabi, is Hwan kagfatogna manga taw. Dapat tiba taw iglwang, haw kawas Iliyas hyabi, ginya tibag lwang, haw in Diyos fangampang sadi hyabi.
41008029	Ginya madis Hisos naintaw ya domwag hat manga katogbong, Dapat no ham kaglwang, faktaw aho, ham gayfan? Is Pidro nasagot, Haw wa kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi.
41008030	Ginyas Hisos nabando has taw kitay ta fag idyapdig fwayong nyawa hada fag taw kitay hanya in Diyosnatogon-Famawi.
41008031	Ginya madis Hisos bago digfadog hat manga katogbong kitay hanya, Kanbali Taw, omagwanta aywan fag manga mahori aban. Ka manga fagtahinan sas banwa, ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo domayo, hanggan wa fahatay hanya. Dapat ay aban, nomsagaya tolok sirang, hanyam boyag ya.
41008032	Is Hisos no nalwang kitonya, nafatigna fiya fiya. Ginyas Pidro nafasaman ogbot gis taw in Hisos, igfabago gato hanya.
41008033	Dapat is Hisos nasayango hat manga katogbong tiba, naato in Pidro, nalwang, Satanas, fag lahaw wa gistay haw. Hadwa goyon in Diyos, haw goyon odis taw.
41008034	Ginyas Hisos nafaakbang hanya ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw hanggan it manga katogbong, ginyag lwang, Nyawa faktaw no kasayag tahin angko, falibangan fagaba it sadili fakasayaon, fasanan it sadili fatimbangan hayo, ginya madi tahinan wangko.
41008035	Maskin, nyawa faktaw, not sadili haboyagan it fagfahalgaon, tonyam liyam di, dapat ay, nyawa faktaw kadwa kwangit it sadili haboyagan kawa hangko, hanggan ka Fiya fag Barita, it haboyagan idwam liyam.
41008036	Kana kat fakinabangon, ham gayfan, sadik taw no omafo sadi wak dahonya baba daga, halimbawa, dapat ay it sadili haboyagan nomliyam di aban?
41008037	Kana ara it bayad kaarakitay bomawi it sadili haboyagan, ham gayfan?
41008038	Maskin aban, aho, Kanbali Taw nombangkad ya, angko Ama kafiyan imlag sangko gis nanya, hanggan ka manga maliyaw fag anghil mahoyogan yadingko. Gis nanya aban ho maya wagfadog ista ngayan nyawa faktaw, hanya no kayag fadog angko ngayan hanggan angko manga hampang has manga taw, kati fag kasohodan, ka ha ogali dwat, hanggan dayog fasakop hangko.
41009001	Is Hisos iglwang is taw, Hogfwayong hayo, bonwa bohag, tiba taw istay idya matay nodya lomag kitay is Diyos kabali wa hari, ha karigonan dahol.
41009002	Nonsagaya onom ik sirang, is Hisos nafasaman git manga katogbong iba, inda Pidro, da Santyago, da Hwan, nataban ka tolo has baba moyod abwat. Ta no sinya wan, ta nalag in Hisos habilogan in-oman wan, fiya wa dahol kabantay, hanggan
41009003	it manga rotay it kaabohayan di masilaw wan, abohay wa dahol dahol, bondi kitos nabakbak non-abohay kat rotay, nyawa faktaw.
41009004	Da Pidro nalag inda Iliyas da Mwisis kampang han Hisos.
41009005	Yakangas Pidro nalwang han Hisos, Kafiyaon, hyami Fon. Tam fag istay yapdik madogayan. Mi fomalo hayo tolok dongdongan, insadi hyamo, insadi in Mwisis, insadi in Iliyas.
41009006	Is Pidro nalwang kitonya kawa ka tolok katogbong indala wa dahol iglag, yakangas Pidro gadaliyan wa kampang.
41009007	Ginya madi sadik linyabo nalanbong is taw. Gis basad linyabo ha nahampang, iglwang kiti, Toy angko fagalwasiyon fag anak, fag hanya ka hayo fagtalingaon.
41009008	Ginya da Pidro fadi wadnamarantayon madali hasta dayo, yabay tadwa ha lagan kasta ofod haraw, no bonwas Hisos lamang kasta lagan kan-goyan.
41009009	Araw, ta noglahaw has lwad, is Hisos natogon it manga katogbong kitay, Aho, Kanbali Taw, nodyan boyag ya gis kahatayan, ham hayap igfwayong has taw kan Diyos nafalag hayo kati haraw.
41009010	Yakanga da Pidro idyapdig fwayong has taw it lagan, dapat ta garintawan no kanat kahologan is Hisos no gwas kitay, hamboyag ya domwag gis kahatayan.
41009011	Ta gintaw in Hisos, Kana mayon ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo noglwang kitay bago bago is Iliyas fag imbangkad yapdi?
41009012	Is Hisos nasagot kitay, Bago bago is Iliyas imbangkad ya ngay, mamatalaga fagayo fag manga bagay. Kana mayon nonsorat yadi kitay, aywan angko fagagwantaon mahori, aho Kanbali Taw, manga taw yomod yadingko.
41009013	Dapat hogfwayong hayo, is Iliyas inbangkad wan. Manga taw naibolon ha hanya no kinda odista fakasayaon. In-anod wa ngap kito kansorat hyabi no kinday ha hanya.
41009014	Da Hisos nondasog hat manga katogbong tiba, ta nalag manga taw kaaywanon sasta ligongan. Ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo igfabodbohagan yadi in Hisos manga katogbong.
41009015	Ginya madi, ka manga taw ayo ayo, no nalag di ngay in Hisos, ta dagos wandolaw wa dahol. Ta nagobok hanya a, ta gintaw, Ha gindawan?
41009016	Is Hisos naintaw has taw, Kana ka hayo fagfabodbohaganon has taw?
41009017	Ginya madi sadik ama gis basad fakaaywanan taw nasagot in Hisos, iglwang kiti, Haw, kagfaadal has taw, ho nataban angko anak ama ha hayo, maskin sadik labang kagfaboyon, igfahoriyan hanya.
41009018	No siday no natoid, ka labang igfahakfo hanya marigon marigon, it bibig igboraan wan a, hanggan it ngifon garigitan wan. It habilogan di kagwang wan. Maskin di nga hogfaaronganon ha hyamo manga katogbong ta nangos faalinan ka labang, dapat tadwa nasyagan nafaalin.
41009019	Is Hisos nalwang has taw, Ham kawa ka kati fag masohod fag manga taw idyag syag angko. Ginahin ya kin aho nangos fag omofod yapdi hayo, ham gayfan? Kandogay da aho fag gagwanta yapdi hayo? Tabanan ka anak hastay.
41009020	Ginya madi ta nataban ka anak han Hisos. Ka labang no nalag in Hisos, dagos wa nafakidkisayan ka anak, nafahakfo hanya has baba daga. Ka anak infolid wanfolid. It bibig igboraan wan.
41009021	Is Hisos naintaw hat ama, Kandogay day im anak no kito? Ka ama nasagot, Giwas ogbot ginan danwa kitonya.
41009022	Ka labang fagaba wagfahakfo angko anak has basad afoy, hanggan igfatogna has basad danom kaarakitay igdaog hanya. Dapat, haw no somyagan di, fakaawa wa hyami, togbongan yap hyami nangos.
41009023	Is Hisos iglwang hanya kitay, Kana mayon haw noglwang kitay, Aho no somyagan di? Manga taw nogsyag angko nyawa kana im-anod wa ngay.
41009024	Ka ama madali wa nasagot, nahampang marigon, iglwang, Hogsyag ha hyamo ngay. Haw noglag aho korang yapdi nogsyag ha hyamo, togbongan yap angko igsyag marigon.
41009025	Ginyas Hisos no nalag ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw kabarangkadan ya ngay, is Hisos nangabaya ka labang. Nalwang hanya kitay, Haw, ka sadik labang kagfaboyon yagfabongkok ya, hogsogo wa hyamo, fag galin wa gis nwa fag anak. Ha fag fawa kafwali domwag hanya.
41009026	Ginya ka labang no nafarokyaw ka anak hanggan nafahidkisayan wa dahol dahol, ginya yabay nalin wa ginya. Ka anak in-igyan wa baba daga, bilang wa natay. Yakanga aywan ka nalwang, Yabay yabay, natay wan.
41009027	Dapat is Hisos natawid ka anak gamat a, nafabangon ka anak. Ginya ka anak nalindog ya.
41009028	Is Hisos nonsakbaw has basad balay, it manga katogbong naintaw hanya, idwa sas manga taw fagdogan, Kana mayon mi nodwa nasyagan nafaalin tonya fag labang?
41009029	Is Hisos nafwayong is taw, Kito fag labang idwa malin no bohonwa kitay ham domarangin mahogod.
41009030	Da Hisos nalahaw wa ginya, nadalan sas sakop Galiliya. Is Hisos idwa kasayag fadog is taw kitay hanyan bangkad,
41009031	kaarakitay hayapdit manga katogbong nogfaadal. Is Hisos iglwang kitay, Ta kaakbang wa fagamat angko has taw aban, aho Kanbali Taw. Ta fahatay yadingko. Dapat ay nomsagaya tolok sirang, ahom boyag ya.
41009032	Dapat in Hisos manga katogbong idwa natwagdog kan Hisos faglwangon, ta kadala yadi gintaw hanya.
41009033	Da Hisos indasog ya ngawan has banwa Kapirnaom. Ginya ta nonsakbaw wan hasta basad balay, is Hisos naintaw hat manga katogbong, Kana hayo fagdaraogon haraw sas boknga dalan?
41009034	Dapat tadwa naawang, maskin it fagdaraogon sas dalan no faktaw sas taw ka abwat it kangayanan.
41009035	Ginya madis Hisos no matokawan, nafaakbang ka Safolo-ha-Dowa. Ginyag lwang has taw, Fag bali man ista ginanan nyawa faktaw no kasaya kabali abwat man it kangayanan. Hanya fag imbali ista sogowan fagayo fagayo.
41009036	Is Hisos nagamit sadik anak ogbot, nafalindog sasta fagbokngan. Ginya, is Hisos no nasafofo ka anak, iglwang has taw kitay,
41009037	No faktaw kagtanggap sadik anak kito, maskin galwasi angko, aho yadi kat fagtanggapon. Kagtanggap yadingko bondi aho kat fagtanggapon, igtanggap yadi kagsogo angko.
41009038	Is Hwan nafwayong in Hisos kitay, haw kagfaadal, Mi nalag sadik taw ka gwas hyamo ngayan nogfaalin manga labang. Mi nabando hanya maskin idwa gofod intam.
41009039	Dapat is Hisos iglwang kitay, Ham fag idwag bando hanya maskin nyawa faktaw no gwas angko ngayan no gibolon manga madolaw, idwa lomibak angko madali.
41009040	Maskin kadwag laban intam, intam yadi wa kaoyon.
41009041	Hogfwayong hayo, orongan wan, nyawa faktaw nogfainom hayo sadik ongot danom maskin ham in Diyos-natogon-Famawi sakop, matohoyanan wa kitay hanya tomanggap it fasalamat aban.
41009042	Nyawa faktaw nogfayayom has ogali dwat sadik anak ogbot to kagsyag angko, fiya man ha hanya ta no somiyok sadik bato gilingan mabyat sat boknga liyog kagfayayom has dwat, ginya omokas tonya fag taw ha basad dagat.
41009043	Nom gamat ibolon kagtaban hyamo has ogali dwat, lifongan lamang tonya. Nyawam gamat nodwam dowa ha no hayap man has haboyagan, balay balay, fiya man has gamat no dowa haw nodyap man has fadosaan taw sas afoy kadwa kapsa.
41009044	(Sinya manga olod idwa katay, idwa yadi kapsa ka afoy.)
41009045	Nangos nom bitis lahawan kagtaban hyamo has ogali dwat, lifongan yadim bitis. Nyawam bitis nodwam dowa ha no hayap man has haboyagan, balay balay, fiya man has bitis no dowa haw nodyap man im-okas has fadosaan taw.
41009046	(Sinya manga olod idwa katay, idwa yadi kapsa ka afoy.)
41009047	Nom mata lagan man kagfasayag lag hyamo has ogali dwat, sowatan wam mata ka sadi, nyawam mata nodwam dowa ha no hayap man han Diyos sakop, balay balay, fiya man has mata no dowa haw nodyap man im-okas has fadosaaan taw.
41009048	Sinya manga olod idwa katay, idwa yadi kapsa ka afoy.
41009049	Fagayo im-aktom sas afoy kito yadi ka fanganon no ha asin.
41009050	Tam fadi wadtwa kitay ka asin kafiyaon. Dapat ay, nonbol wat tamis, kinda odi nogfatamis ya ka asin, ham gayfan? Hayo manga fangayofan fag bilang wantamis kitos fanganon ha asin, ginya ham mangafiyan wa ha sadi ha sadi.
41010001	Is Hisos nalahaw wa ginya, hawas manga banwanan sakop Hodiya, hawas difay safa Hordan yadi. Sadi ya ginan manga taw kaaywanon inbarangkadan ya ngay han Hisos. Is Hisos nafaadal has fakaaywanan kawa dandi kitonyat ogali.
41010002	Ha manga Farisiyo gakbang han Hisos, igtikis wa nangos igfasalan hanya. Yakanga ta gintaw hanya kitay, Maangay di aw has Batasan Hodyo ka ama no omobon it babay?
41010003	Ginya madis Hisos iglwang has taw, Kinday in Mwisis togon hayo?
41010004	Ta nafwayong kiti, Is Mwisis igfaangay di ka ama no domisag yap fangobonan kasoratan hat babay bago di gobon hanya.
41010005	Dapat is Hisos igfwayong has taw, Kawa maganit hayo fangayofan yakangas Mwisis nasorat tonya fag togon.
41010006	Dapat gis bago bago, is Diyos no nahalig manga taw, nahalig ama hanggan ina.
41010007	Maskin kitonya, ka ama somaman git ama hanggan git ina, omofod hat babay.
41010008	Nyawa dowa haraw, tambali sadi di. Yakanga ginya ginan fawa dowa, inbali wa sadi.
41010009	Yakanga kan Diyos nafasadi, fag idwa ha taw igfasarowayan.
41010010	Araw no sas balay, in Hisos manga katogbong naintaw ya domwag in Hisos kawa has manga godgobonan.
41010011	Ginyas Hisos nafwayong is taw, Nyawa fakta fag ama no gobon it babay, ginyag babay has iba ina, igfabayowan, ha kasalanan wan hat babay gona.
41010012	Ka babay no omobon it indogan, ginya omindogan has iba ama igfabayowan yadi wan.
41010013	Ginya madi tagtaban manga anak han Hisos kaarakitay is Hisos tomawid ista manga anak. Dapat in Hisos manga katogbong nangabaya was taw.
41010014	Is Hisos no nalag it katogbong naibolon, inhori dit fangayofan, igfwayong hat manga katogbong kitay, Ham hawa kabaya ka manga anak no gakbang hangko. Ham fag idwag bando tonya, maskin ka manga ha fangayofan kitos anak ka omafo in Dios sakop.
41010015	Ham fag tohod kitay nyawa faktaw kat fangayofan kadwa kitos anak ogbot nogfasakop han Diyos, tonya fag taw idwam-aktom san Diyos sakop.
41010016	Ginya madis Hisos nasafofo ka manga anak a, nahampang mahoway, gayohap odi kaawa.
41010017	Da Hisos no kalahaw wan, sadik ama nadalandan han Hisos, nalingkohodan sat atobangan, naintaw hanya, Haw kagfaadal kafiyaon, kana ara angko ibolonon kaarakitay hombali ha haboyagan idwa ha katabowanan?
41010018	Ginyas Hisos naintaw ya hanya kitay, Kana haw no nalwang kitay aho fiya? Is Diyos lamang ka fiya.
41010019	Haw fadi wadtwa ka manga Batasan Hodyo kitay, Haw fag idwag fahatay taw, haw fag idwag fabayowan, haw fag idwag nahaw, haw fag idwag bangdan is taw, haw fag idwag daya iba taw, haw fag idwag falamang im ama hanggan im ina.
41010020	Ka ama nasagot in Hisos, No kitay di, gingko ogbot ginan, ho katanog wa tonya fagayo.
41010021	Yabay is Hisos nogbantay hanya, kabaya waglag no kitay di. Ginyag lwang kiti, Dapat ha ha korang yapdi sadik fakatwawon. Haw fag goli yap, fag fasali im manga botang fagayo fagayo. Ginya fahafodan has manga myabog it manga sali. Yabay, no kitonya, haw ha kaakwaan san Diyos banwanan sam tongod. Ginya madi haw fag hayastay, tahinan wangko.
41010022	Ka ama kabayong odi, nalahaw wan, maskin hanya maakwa wa dahol.
41010023	Ginya madis Hisos namarantayon has manga taw sat ligongan, nalwang hat manga katogbong kitay, Ka maakwa fag manga taw, mahorig fasakop han Diyos.
41010024	In Hisos manga katogbong indolaw wagdog in Hisos fwayong. Dapat is Hisos naolit yat hampang has taw, nalwang kitay, Angko manga anak, mahori wa dahol igfasakop han Diyos.
41010025	Malpos man ka hayopan kamilyo nogdalan has basad toho dagom, ha sadik taw maakwa nogfasakop han Diyos.
41010026	In Hisos manga katogbong indolaw wa dahol igdog, ta gintaw in Hisos, No kitonya mangharaw, fakta fag manga taw kambawi?
41010027	Ginyas Hisos no mabantayan hat manga katogbong, iglwang, No taw di, idwa ha somyagan omibolon tonya, dapat is Diyos syagan di omibolon fagayo fag manga bagay.
41010028	Is Pidro igfwayong han Hisos kitay, Lag nga hami kati toy, mi naobon wa hyami akwa fagayo a, migtahin wa hyamo.
41010029	Ginyas Hisos iglwang kitay, Hogfwayong wa hayo, bonwa bohag, nyawa faktaw no omobon yap it balay, ngatay it manga fadwasay, ngatay it ina, ngatay it ama, ngatay it manga anak, ngatay hanggan it manga daga, kawa ahot fagalwasiyon, hanggan angko Fiya fag Barita,
41010030	hanya tomanggap kati kayonya fag gatos, nyawa manga balay, manga fadwasay, hanggan manga bilang wat ina, hanggan it manga anak, hanggan manga daga. Nyawa kitonya, manga taw igfahoriyan yapdi hanya. Ginya madi yabay, hanya lomag yadi haboyagan kadwa ha katabowanan gis nanya fag masohod nomdasog aban.
41010031	Nyawa kitonya, aywan ka gona omoyan man, hanggan ka goyan gomona wa aban.
41010032	Ginya madi da Hisos noglahaw has bohid, hawas banwa Hirosalim, is Hisos gona wa gona was taw. In Hisos manga katogbong kadolaw kitay is Hisos hawas Hirosalim. Ta kadala odi goyan. Is Hisos sadi ya ginan nafasaramanan ka Safolo-ha-Dowa gis fakaaywanan manga taw, ginyag fabago iglwang no kinday hanya no lomag mahori aban.
41010033	Iglwang kitay, Yabay, tam hawas bohid has Hirosalim kati. No sinya wan, ta fagamat angko, aho Kanbali Taw, hasta manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, hanggan has mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo. Tonya fag manga taw fatohoyan angko has kahatayan. Ta fabahala yadingko has manga Hintil.
41010034	Ka manga Hintil yomod wangko, manga tomofay, manga bomakbak hanggan wa fahatay angko. Dapat ay, nomsagaya wa tolok sirang, ahom boyag ya.
41010035	Ginya da Santyago da Hwan, in Sibidiyo manga anak naakbang han Hisos, iglwang kitay, Haw kagfaadal hyami, mi ha fagsagadon nangos gi hyamo, haw faangayan nangos.
41010036	Is Hisos nasagot handa Santyago da Hwan, iglwang kitay, Kana ka hayo fagsagadon gingko?
41010037	Ta nasagot in Hisos kiti, Aban, tam no sawam kafiyan, haw faangayan hyami fag ha kangayanan igtokaw sa hyamo akbang, insadi sam balis sihon, insadi sam balis wala.
41010038	Dapat is Hisos nalwang has taw, Ham idwa twa hayo fagsagadon. Ham awkin syagan omagwanta ominom gingko fanginoman kahoriyan aban? Ham awkin syagan yadi fatogna hayo sas mahori, kito yadingko no fatogna angko aban?
41010039	Taglwang, Ala, mi somyagan di. Ginyas Hisos iglwang has taw, Ham ominom ngay gingko fanginoman kahoriyan aban, hanggan ham fatogna hayo kito yadingko aban.
41010040	Dapat bonwa aho ka bahalag fili no faktaw ka tomokaw aban sangko balis sihon, ngatay balis wala, dapat ka hayo faglwangon tokawan, danwan talaga no fakta fag manga taw ka tomokaw sinya.
41010041	Dapat in Hisos manga katogbong tiba, ka safolo, no nadog ista fagsagadon, ta kahori wa dahol inda Santyago da Hwan.
41010042	Yakangas Hisos nafaakbang ha hanya it manga katogbong fagayo, ginyag lwang, Ham fadi wadtwa ka manga gayfan kitay, hanya ka manga fagtahinan Hintil, ha takan nogbahala has taw, hanggan ista manga gorangon igbaya wagfasognod it sakop.
41010043	Dapat ham fagayo fag idwa kitonya. Yatokitay, nyawa fakta sa hayo ka kasaya kabali abwat it kangayanan, fag kabali di ngap hayo sogowan.
41010044	Nyawa faktaw ka kasaya kabali fagtahinan, fag kabali di ngap bilang hayo nasali sogowan.
41010045	Kitongko, aho Kanbali Taw kanbangkad hastay, bonwa kitay aho kasta fagtogbongon, fag aho di ngap ka tomogbong is taw, hanggan igdisag angko haboyagan ka fangafiyan, kaarakitay tomobos has fakaaywanan taw.
41010046	Ginya tandasog has banwa Hiriko, dapat ta noglahaw wa ginya, in Hisos manga katogbong hanggan ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw nahoyog yadi wan. Sadik ama bota, is Bartimiyo, fanagad fanagad odi, in Timiyo anak, matokawan sas bilog dalan.
41010047	Is Bartimiyo, no nadog kitay is Hisos taga Nasarit kagdalan sinya, igtawag marigon, iglwang, Hisos, in Dabid hasokfonan anak, haw fakaawa wangko.
41010048	Ginya madi ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw nangabaya in Bartimiyo, tadwag faawang nangos. Dapat kadahol di ngap nogtawag, mapiit wan, igtawag, In Dabid hasokfonan anak, fakaawa wangko.
41010049	Ginyas Hisos intorosan, iglwang has taw kitay, Tawagan tonya fag ama. Ginya ta natawag ka ama bota, iglwang kiti, Hadwa ha fakadalaon. Fag lindog wan, is Hisos igtawag hyamo.
41010050	Ka ama bota nabol it homot, nalokso, nalindog, naakbang in Hisos.
41010051	Ginyas Hisos naintaw hanya kitay, Kanam fakasayaon angko bato togbongon hyamo? Ginya ka ama bota nasagot hanya kitay, Haw kagfaadal has taw, angko mata fag imfoga ya nangos.
41010052	Is Hisos nasagot hanya kitay, Nyawa ha mwali kati, kawa haw igsyag wangko, im mata imfoga wa yabay. Gis nanya yadi dagos wanfogat mata, nalag wa fiya fiya. Yabay ka ama natahin wan Hisos.
41011001	Kati yabay, ta kadasog wa has banwa Hirosalim. Araw ta nondasog sas Moyod Oliboan, sas akbang manga tifonan balay Bitfagi hanggan Bitanya, is Hisos nafagonat manga katogbong dowa.
41011002	Is Hisos natogon kitay, Ham fag hawas masoson fag tifonan balay. Ham araw nomdasog sinya, ham dagos lomag sadik anak habayo libaba, matarabingan, idyapdi ha taw nasahay sinya. Lohasan it tarabing a, goyodan hastay.
41011003	No ha gintaw hayo kitay, Kana hayo fakamolon is nyamo? Ham fag lwang kitay, Kagfon intam kasayag sahay, fomwali ya araw, ngalay di.
41011004	Ginya ka dowak katogbong inlahaw, nalag ngay ka anak habayo sas boknga karsada, matarabingan sas bilog sakbawan balay. Ta nalohas it tarabing.
41011005	Ginya ka manga taw malindogan sasta akbang naintaw has dowak katogbong, Kana hayo fakamolon is nyamo noglohas ka anak habayo tarabing?
41011006	Ginya ta nasagot has taw kan Hisos togon fag manga hampang. Ginya madi ka manga taw nafadiya han Hisos manga katogbong ka anak habayo.
41011007	Ta nagoyod ka anak habayo han Hisos, nasagmak it manga rotay aba sas baba goyoy anak habayo, ginyas Hisos nasahay wan.
41011008	Kaaywanon fag manga taw nasagmak yadit manga rotay san Hisos fagonan lahawan. Tiba nabonggo manga sanga hayo galabongan gis talon, ginya ta nasagmak sas dalan san Hisos fagonan.
41011009	Ka manga taw ka gona in Hisos hanggan goyan igtarawagan marigon, taglwang, Kafiyaon kafiyaon, Ka kadasog hastay san Diyos ngayan, fag bomaya wan.
41011010	Is Dabid intam pinagka wa ama, it sakop ka kaakbang wamlag fag bomaya yadi wan. Kafiyaon ka san Diyos banwanan hayam tongod im tongod.
41011011	Is Hisos hawas basad alad banwa Hirosalim a, nasakbaw yadi has basad Fanimbaan-Dahol. Ginya madi, no namarantayan di nga sat ligongan, is Hisos nadokson ya, igtaban ka Safolo-ha-Dowa has Bitanya, kawa kayabi wan.
41011012	Nonsirang wan, ta no kafwali ya gis Bitanya, is Hisos kalonos wan sas boknga dalan.
41011013	Is Hisos no nalag sadik fon igos malabong, ayayo yapdi, nagobok has fon igos maskin gayfan ngandayo ha bohad. Dapat is Hisos no akbang wan has fon igos, idwa ha lagan bohad sinya fag fon, manga odi labong maskin idya famolon manga bohad igos.
41011014	Is Hisos iglwang has fon igos, Fag idwa ha taw homwan domwag bohad igos gistay fag fon. In Hisos manga katogbong nadog it hampang.
41011015	Ginya madi ta nondasog wa sas Hirosalim, is Hisos nasakbaw basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol a, dagos nasogo has dayo alad ka mangag balidya hanggan igsali sas basad aladan. Nafatobong lamang kasta fwalidan kagbalyo kwarta hanggan ka mangag balidya salompati manga tokawan.
41011016	Is Hisos kwangit igfalahaw has basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol nyawa faktaw no ha diya.
41011017	Is Hisos nafaadal has taw kitay, Gwadi insorat san Diyos kasoratan kitay, Sas fagayo fag layonan taw, ta fag ngomayan angko balay, Balay Fandaranginan, Dapat ham nafabali angko balay oliyanan odi manga fangnahaw.
41011018	Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo nadog in Hisos fwayong. Yakanga ta gisip no kinda nangos ta nogdaog in Hisos, maskin ta kadala hanya, kawa ka fakaaywanan intaka wagdog in Hisos adal.
41011019	No kayabi wan, da Hisos inlahaw gis basad banwa.
41011020	Nonsirang, da Hisos no hanya ya has basad Hirosalim, ta nalag tonya fag fon igos, hanggan wat manga dalid intonga wan.
41011021	Is Pidro natohod in Hisos sabayon, yakangag lwang hanya, Haw kagfon hyami, fanlag kin, tonya fag fon igos, kam nasabayon, intonga wan.
41011022	Is Hisos nalwang hat manga katogbong kitay, Ham fag syag fagaba han Diyos.
41011023	Hogfwayong hayo kitay bonwa bohag, nyawa faktaw no lomwang toy fag moyod, Haw fag galin wa gis nyamo, loksowan ha basad dagat, tonya fag taw nodwa gadowan it fangayofan, dapat sadi wak fangayofan igsyag kitay im-anod wat fwayong, orongan wam-anod kitonya.
41011024	Yakanga, hogfwayong hayo, ham nogsyag kitay ham tomanggap gin Diyos hayo fagdaranginon, ham tomanggap wa tonya.
41011025	No ginahin ham nogdarangin, taw no ha nafahoriyan hayo, ham fag faliyam tonya, kaarakitay hayo Ama ka sat banwanan sam tongod, mamaliyam yadi hayo manga naogali dwat.
41011026	(Dapat ham nodwag faliyam kasta nafahoriyan hayo, hayo Ama sam tongod idwa yadi mamaliyam hayo manga naogali dwat.)
41011027	Ta nonfwali ya has banwa Hirosalim, is Hisos igsakbaw ya domwag has basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol. Manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo, hanggan ka manga fagtahinan sas banwa naakbang han Hisos.
41011028	Ta gintaw hanya kiti, Kanam kangayanan haw no gibolon to fag manga bagay? Fakta ka nadisag hyamo kangayanan gibolon kitonya?
41011029	Is Hisos nasagot has taw, iglwang, Ho ngap omintaw yadi hayo, ham sagotan angko, ho bago di fomwayong ha hayo no kana kangko kangayanan gibolon to fag manga bagay.
41011030	Ginda kan-ginan in Hwan kangayanan igfatogna manga taw, ngatay gim tongod, ngatay gis taw?
41011031	Ginya madi tagfabarohagan ha sadi ha sadi, taglwang, Tam no lomwang, Giwam tongod, is Hisos lomwang, Kana mayon ham nodwa katiwala in Hwan hyabi?
41011032	Dapat tam no lomwang, Gi odis taw, tam kadala has fakaaywanan, maskin ta katiwala kitay is Hwan in Diyos fangampang orongan.
41011033	Yakanga ta nasagot in Hisos kitay, Midwa twa, Ginyas Hisos nafwayong, Hodwa yadi fomwayong hayo no ginday angko kangayanan gibolon to fag manga bagay.
