41012001	Is Hisos igfabago igfahalimbawa ya has taw iglwang kitay, Ha sadik taw nananom manga obas sat baba daga, maaladan ya ngadi. Natigib dalifi yadi ista fanlidan obas. Nahalig sadik ansagan abwat, ista bantayan, nafabahala it obasan hat manga fangano, ginya nalahaw hawas ayayo.
41012002	Nondasog was famohadon, famangtaon wan, kagfon obasan nasogo wat sogowan sadi kaarakitay mamol ista horay hanya bohad obas.
41012003	Dapat ay ka manga gano obasan nabakbak di ngap kat fon sogowan. Ta nafaoli wa gominan, idwa ha diya.
41012004	Ginya kagfon obasan nasogo has manga gano obas, sadi yak sogowan. Ta kaisog ya ngay hanya, nafabaran hat boknga alfoyo. Ta nafahayan ya ngadi hanya.
41012005	Fatolo wa ginan kagfon obasan nasogot sogowan. Ta nafahatay wa hanya. Hanggan wa ka tiba sogowan ayo dogay dogay. Tiba ta nabakbak yap man, dapat tiba ta nafahatay wan.
41012006	No dogay, ka odit fakaawaon fag anak ama kan-goyan sa hanya. Yakanga hanya ka goyan goyan kat nasogo. It fangayofan iglwang kitay, Gwadi ta gomalang wa nangos angko anak.
41012007	Dapat ka manga gano tanom nanoltolan yap kiti, To wa aba ka omafo it ama kaakwaan. Kalibang, tam fahatay wa hanya, ngan aba tam wa ka omafo ka obasan.
41012008	Yakanga ta nagamat hanggan wa nafahatay hanya, ginya naokas lamang it habilogan has dayo alad obasan.
41012009	Kinday nangos ham gayfan, kagfon obasan ibolonon hat manga fangano? Anod, hanyam bangkad, fahatay yadi wa ka manga gano, ginya faano ya has iba taw.
41012010	Ham idya awkin nabasa to fag toltolan gis Kasoratan? Ka manga fangalig balay fagdayoon fag bato, Tonya di ngap kagfaganit ka balay sas basad solok.
41012011	Tam kadolaw waglag, To in Diyos naibolon.
41012012	Yakangan Hisos manga kahampang kasaya gomamat hanya, maskin ta nasalom kitay hawa ngap ista manga sadili in Hisos fagfatangonon sat natoltol halimbawa. Dapat tadyapdi nagamat in Hisos kawa ta kadala ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw. Yakanga gis nanya ta nwali yapdi, naobon wan Hisos.
41012013	Ginya madi ta nasogo han Hisos manga Farisiyo hanggan tiba gin Gorangon Hirodis manga sakop, kaarakitay igsayak fabangdanan gin Hisos hampang.
41012014	Tagmaswag odi hanya, taglwang kitay, Haw kagfaadal has taw, mi twa kitay haw idwag bohag, haw idwa ha fagihidon taw, maskin hagfapariho wan di fagayo fag manga taw, hanggan sonson wa orongan kam faadalon has taw kan Diyos fakasayaon ista manga ogaliyon. Maangay awkin sas Batasan Hodyo tam nogbayad bohis han Sisar, ngatay idwan?
41012015	Ngatay tam fag bohis yadi, ngatay fag idwan? Dapat maskin is Hisos twa kitay tagfataka odi, is Hisos igsagot has taw, iglwang kitay, Kana mayon ham nogtikis wa nangos igfasalan angko? Falagan angko sadik kwarta mabilog, diyan hastay.
41012016	Ginya ta nafalag ngay sadik kwarta mabilog han Hisos. Is Hisos naintaw has manga taw kiti, Gafo tolad hanggan ngayan insorat istay? Tagsagot, In Sisar wa nga tolad tonya.
41012017	Ginyas Hisos iglwang has taw, Kan Sisar disagan wa han Sisar, kan Diyos disagan wa han Diyos. Tandolaw wagdog in Hisos sagot.
41012018	Ginya madi manga Sadosiyo, kagfabohag kitay ka manga natay idwam boyag ya domwag, gakbang han Hisos. Taglwang kitay,
41012019	Haw kagfaadal has taw, is Mwisis nasorat it togon hantam kitay, Sadik ama no ha fadwasay ama natay, dapat it babay in-goyan dit indogan, idwa ha anak, ka ama fag babay kat tagyaw ka balo, kaarakitay no ganak, bilang man di ka natay it ama.
41012020	Yabay ha tasayan fitok ama kagdowasayan. Kasta ahan nababay, ya ginya no katay idya ha anak.
41012021	Ka masoson it ahan nababay yat tagyaw kanbalo, dapat natay yadi wan, idwa yadi ha anak. Kitonya yadit fatolo wan.
41012022	Hanggan wa kat fafito fag indogan, ka ina idyadi wa naanak. No natay wa fagayo fag tasayan ama, hanggan ka ina natay yadi wan.
41012023	Yabay, gafo babay tonya fag ina ta nomboyag ya aban, kawa ka fitok tasayan nababay hanya istay?
41012024	Is Hisos nasagot is taw, nalwang kitay, Ham fagaba wagfalamang maskin ham idwa twa ka Kasoratan hanggan ham idwa yadi twa in Diyos karigonan.
41012025	Maskin manga taw nomboyag ya gis kahatayan, manga taw fawag babay, gindogan gis nanya aban. Tambali kitos manga anghil san Diyos banwanan sam tongod kadwa yadig babay.
41012026	Dapat ay, kawa has manga natay no kaboyag ya, ham idwa awkin nabasa gin Mwisis nasorat, kawa no sas kakbang fon hayo libaba hyabi, is Diyos nafwayong hanya kitay, Aho in Abraham wa Diyos, aho in Isaak wa Diyos, hanggan in Hakob yadi Diyos.
41012027	Ka manga taw boyagan lamang kan Diyos fagsakopon, bonwa ka manga mahatayan. Ham noglwang kitay taw idwam boyag ya, ham igfalamang wa orongan.
41012028	Kati kati haraw, sadik ama kagfaadal Batasan Hodyo naakbang inda Hisos. Nadog manga taw nogdaraogan hanggan nadog yadi in Hisos sagot kafiyaon. Yakanga, hanya naintaw yadin Hisos, Sida fag togon sas Batasan Hodyo ka marigon man has fagayo fagayo?
41012029	In Hisos sagot kitay, To fag togon ka marigon man has fagayo fagayo kitay, Ham, in Israil manga ha sokfonan, ham fag matalingan, is Diyos kagfon intam sadi lamang, idwa ha akwa tiba Diyos.
41012030	Haw fag galwasi in Diyos kagfon hyamo, fag sadi wak dahonya fangayofan, sadi wak dahonya isip hanggan sadi wak dahonya karigonan.
41012031	It fadowa fag togon kiti, Haw fag galwasi im kapariho taw kito yadim sadili. Idwa ha togon iba marigon man to fag manga togon.
41012032	Ginya kagfaadal Batasan Hodyo nalwang han Hisos kitay, Anod, haw kagfaadal is taw, orongan wan hyamo fwayong, Is Diyos sadi di. Idwa ha akwa tiba Diyos.
41012033	No galwasi hanya sadi wak dahonya fangayofan, sadi wak dahonya isip, hanggan sadi wak dahonya karigonan, hanggan no galwasi intam kapariho taw, kito yadintam sadili, tonya fagayo nom anod, bondi kito kantam manga nasogba hayopan kan irog sadik dahonya, hanggan tiba disagon fangafiyan.
41012034	Ginyas Hisos no nadog kafiyaon it sagot, iglwang kitay, Haw mangharaw akbang han Diyos sakop. Ginya wa ginan fagayo fag manga taw fawag fasolopan han Hisos kaarakitay omintaw hanya, maskin tadwa syagan igfasalan hanya.
41012035	Is Hisos nogfaadal is taw basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol, iglwang kitay, Kana mayon ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo noglwang kitay, In Diyos-natogon-Famawi in Dabid wa hasokfonan anak?
41012036	Kawa ka Maliyaw fag Falad nogfaisip in Dabid, hanya mandi kaglwang, Is Diyos nafwayong hasagfon angko, Haw fag matokawan yap sangko balis sihon, no baliday hodya nafasakop fiya fiya ha hyamo im manga kaaway.
41012037	Yabay is Dabid mandi kagngayan in Diyos-natogon-Famawi, kagfon hanya. Kinday hanya nogfon in Dabid, not sadili odi hasokfonan anak, ham gayfan? Ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw nabaya wagdog in Hisos fwayong.
41012038	Is Hisos nogfaadal has taw, igfwayong kiti, Ham fag idwag sokfon ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo it manga ogali. Ta kasayag solong manga rotay aba aba, hanggan ta gwayan wa kasayag dog manga taw nogbaya hanya ta noglahaw basad banwa.
41012039	No sas basad manga fanimbaan ta kasayag tokaw sas fanokawan ka manga ha kangayanan, hanggan ka manga fanokawan akbang hasagfon balay no sasta fanyahodan hanon aywan.
41012040	Bohondi tonya, taglogos wa ngap manga ina balo banwanan, hanggan ista odi famadogan is taw ta nogdarangin kadogayon. Ka fadosaan kamtohoyan has taw aban mahori man ka tiba taw.
41012041	Is Hisos natokaw sas akbang haban ista fandisagan kwarta basad Fanimbaan-Dahol. Is Hisos mabantayan manga taw kaaywanon nogfwalid kwarta sinya. Kaaywanon fag manga taw maakwa, aywan it manga nafwalid kwarta sinya.
41012042	Ginya madi sadik ina balo myabog naakbang has haban, nafwalid sinya dowak saga, it halga nangos idya sika walo.
41012043	Ginyas Hisos nafaakbang hanya it manga katogbong, nalwang kitay, Hogfwayong hayo, bonwa bohag, to fag ina balo myabog, it disag mahalga man kasta disag fagayo.
41012044	Maskin ka tiba nadisag gi odista sadili labi kwarta, dapat to fag ina balo myabog, nadisag wa ka hanya sadik kayonya.
41013001	Da Hisos nogdokson gis basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol, it katogbong sadi iglwang kitay, Haw kagfaadal, lag nga kin, to fag manga bato gorangon, hanggan dahol fag manga balay, kafiyaon kabantay.
41013002	Dapat is Hisos nasagot kitay, Nyawa kitay kati haglag kafiyaon to fag manga balay gorangon, aban idwa hamgoyan dowak bato igtarongbawan, fagayo imrofad lamang.
41013003	Araw, da Hisos no matokawan sas baba Moyod Oliboan, sas masohod Fanimbaan-Dahol, da Pidro da Santyago da Hwan da Andris naintaw in Hisos, idwa sasta fagdogan fakaaywanan,
41013004	iglwang kitay, Ginahin fag masohod aban ka Fanimbaan-Dahol nomdwat? Kana fag falagon madolaw kamlag aban kagfatohoyan kitay to fag manga bagay kaanod wan?
41013005	Ginyas Hisos iglwang has taw kitay, Ham fag matagahan. Ham fag idwa gadayaan nyawa faktaw,
41013006	maskin aywan kambangkad aban, ngomayan yadingko ngayan, lomwang hanya wa kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi. Ta fatalang aywan fag manga taw aban.
41013007	Ham no domog aban ka manga madalagdog gis awayan, hanggan manga barita awayan dahol dahol, ham fag idwa galibitan, maskin talaga wa kitonya kamlag aban, dapat bonya tonya ka katabowanan.
41013008	Maskin aban ka manga layonan daga dahol manlabanan, kitonya yadi ka sadik gorangon sakop lomaban ha sadik gorangon sakop. No sida no siday aban ka daga lominog, ha manga banwanan idwa aba ha hanon hanon, dapat to fagayo kat fabagowanan lamang kahoriyan.
41013009	Ham fag matagahan hayo sadili maskin ta fagamat hayo hasagtalinga hampangan aban. Ta fabakbak hayo sas manga fanimbaan Hodyo. Maskin aho hayo fagalwasiyon, ham aba lomindog sas atobangan manga gobirnador hanggan manga gorangon, ham mamaorongan yadi sasta fagdogan.
41013010	Dapat ay, ta nodya natoltol fiya fiya ka Fiya fag Barita has fagayo fag manga layonan taw, ka katabowanan fagayo idyam lag.
41013011	Ta nogtaban hayo hasagtalinga hampangan, hanggan fagamat hayo has taw, ham fag idwa galibitan hayo bato fwayongon, dapat no kana ka nafatohod hayo gis nanya, fag tonya wan kam fwayongon, maskin im hampang aban idwa gi hayo sadili fangayofan, dapat gis Falad Maliyaw ka faisip hayo.
41013012	Gis nanya fag masohod aban, kayadit fadwasay kagfagamat it fadwasay has iba taw kaarakitay ta fahatay hanya, kitonya yadi kat ama hat sadili yadi anak. Manga anak lomaban it magorang, fasognod has iba taw kitay fahatayan wan.
41013013	Maskin aho hayo fagalwasiyon, fagayo fag manga taw kadwat iglag hayo aban. Dapat kadwag fagomon hanggan wa has katabowanan, yabay hanya wa kambawi.
41013014	Dapat aban ham lomag kagsagaya wa ogali fag dwat, idwa ha fag kitonyan infwalid sas idwa fiya fwalidan. Kagbasa fag tomwa wagdog tonya. Nom-anod aban, ka manga taw sas sakop Hodiya, fag dan waglagyo has moyod.
41013015	Ka sas sokayan balay fag idwam libang somakbaw domwag has basad balay kaarakitay bomol it botang.
41013016	Ka sas iyab, fag fawa goli kaarakitay bomol it rotay.
41013017	Isyay wan, no ka yangadi manga gabosog hanggan ka ha manga anak ogbot, igfasoso yapdi gis nanya fag masohod aban.
41013018	Ham fag darangin kakitay to fag manga bagay fag idwa tomoon dayo abagat.
41013019	Maskin gis nanya fag manga sirang manga taw domog mahori wa dahol dahol. Gi yapdis hyabi, is Diyos no bago di nahalig ka daga, balis kati, tadya ha nagdogan kitonya fag mahori, hanggan idwa yadi domog mahori man inya aban.
41013020	No bonwas Diyos kagfatohas ngalay tonya fag manga mahori, idwa hamsawad manga taw, ngadi sadi. Dapat ay, maskin is Diyos kaawa yapdit manga nafili fag manga taw, hanya ngalay digfatohas tonya fag manga mahori.
41013021	Aban, no ha akwag fwayong ha hayo kitay, Istay wan kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi, ngatay sinya wan, ham fag idwa katiwala.
41013022	Aban ha akwa mangag faniring in Diyos-natogon-Famawi. Ha akwa yadi manga bohagon fag fangampang imbangkad. Ta mamalag aban manga madolaw fag manga falagon, hanggan manga fatimawa, kaarakitay fatalang in Diyos manga nafili, no somyagan di.
41013023	Yabay, ham fag matagahan. Ho dan wa nafadog hayo fagayo kamlag aban.
41013024	Dapat gis nanya fag manga sirang, tonya fag manga kahoriyan nomtolas wan, Ka myanit imharom, Ka magdanon idwa yomawa.
41013025	Ka manga fanggasan imdagdag yadi gis banwa sam tongod, Hanggan ka manga karigonan sam tongod sas boknga fakayawan imhadhawigan wan.
41013026	Ginya madi ta lomag angko, aho Kanbali Taw, kadasog sas baba linyabo, ha karigonan dahol hanggan kangayanan abwat.
41013027	Ginya madi aho, Kanbali Taw, somogo angko manga anghil, fatifon angko manga nafili fag manga taw gis ofat ik fongfongan daga gis fagayo fag manga banwanan.
41013028	Ham fag twagdog ka adal kawa gis fon igos. Nogsalingsing, igsofot wan, tam twa kitay ka fangaraw kaakbang wan.
41013029	Kitonya yadi ham noglag to kangko manga nafwayong kaanod wan, ham tomwa kitay aho, Kanbali Taw, kaakbang wa kadasog, sawas sakbawan alad.
41013030	Hogfwayong hayo, bonwa bohag, to fagayo im-anod wan ka kati fag masohod fag manga taw no boyagan yapdi.
41013031	Ka banwa sam tongod, hanggan ka daga imliyam wa aban, dapat ay angko hampang idwam liyam nyawa ginahin.
41013032	Dapat idwa ha taw twa no ginahin fag sirang, no kana fag oras gis nanya tonya nom-anod. Nyawa ka manga anghil ka san Diyos banwanan sam tongod, nyawa aho in Diyos anak, no bohonwas Diyos angko Ama, idwa ha twa no ginahin.
41013033	Ham fag matagahan, fag danwa matalagan maskin ham idwa twa no ginahin fag masohod kangko nafwayong nom-anod.
41013034	Kitos sadik taw mamaklay has ayayo, halimbawa. No kalahaw igtogon yap igfaano it manga sangkap has taw, igfahafod hat manga sogowan ista bato ibolonon. Ginyag togon yadi hasagbantay sakbawan kitay, fag fagaba matanodan.
41013035	Kitonya yadi ham fag matagahan maskin ham idwa twa no ginahin kagfon balay nomdasog, ngatay kayabi, ngatay boknga yabi, ngatay manok igtaraokan wan, ngatay dayo marom marom.
41013036	Ngandayo hanyam dasog sadi odi ginan, tomahod hayo kalibang odi matoyogan.
41013037	Kangko fwayong ha hayo, hogfadog yadi has fagayo fag manga taw, ham fag danwa matagahan.
41014001	Kati dowa yak yabi bago dista Fanohodan Nagsagayan, ta nogtohod ka anghil nogsagaya ista balay hyabi, hanggan ka Fanohodan Tinapay Mayangfis. Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo, igsayak it halimbawan no kinday ara ta no gomamat mafyaloman in Hisos hanggan wagfahatay hanya.
41014002	Maskin fag idwa hono sas Fanohodan, ngandayo manga taw mangagran wan.
41014003	Da Hisos no sawas Bitanya san Simon balay, ka Simon ka ha kitong hyabi, sadik ina naakbang in Hisos, ha diya sohadan alabastoro fag bato, napno famabanglo nardo, idwa ha aktom iba, dahol it sali. Is Hisos no sas bilog fanganan, ka ina nabolang ka sohadan, nabohos ka famabanglo han Hisos boknga alfoyo.
41014004	Dapat ha manga taw tiba sinya kahori odit manga fangayofan. Ista fangayofan iglwang, Anogon di famabanglo,
41014005	balay balay no nafasali yapman tonya, bondi tolok gatos dinaryo haraw, ginyan disag has manga myabog it sali. Ta nangabaya ka ina.
41014006	Dapat is Hisos nalwang kitay, Ham fabayaanan wa ka ina, kana ham no kabaya hanya? Kafiyaon to kat naibolon hangko.
41014007	Maskin ka manga myabog idwa ha fagalinan gi hayo akbang, nyawa ginahin ham no kasayag togbong has myabog, ham tomwa wan, dapat aho idwa fagaba maofodan hayo aban.
41014008	Ka ina naiblon kat fagsyaganon kati, nagona wa nabohos famabanglo, maskin igfatalaga angko habilogan has lobgoban aban.
41014009	Hogfwayong hayo, bonwa bohag, nyawa siday, sadik baba daga, ta no tomoltol ka Fiya fag Barita aban, ta fagaba wa aba omowas to fag ina it naibolon, yakanga tomohod hanya fagaba.
41014010	Ginyas Hodas Israkiyoti, ka sadi gis Safolo-ha-Dowa, hawas manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos kaarakitay goyon in Hisos manga kalaban.
41014011	Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan igbaya wan ta no nadog kitay is Hodas goyon is taw. Taglwang ta tomangdan ara hanya. Ginya wa ginan is Hodas gisip no ginahin no somyagan wa fagamat has taw in Hisos.
41014012	Ka sirang gona ta no kwan Tinapay Mayangfis indasog wan hanggan gis nanya yadi fag sirang tagsogba ka anak topa fangafiyan kawa hasta Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan. In Hisos manga katogbong naintaw hanya, kitay, Siday nangos araw hyamo fakasayaon hami nogfatalaga intam Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan?
41014013	Is Hisos nasogot katogbong dowa, nalwang kitay, Ham, fag hawas basad banwa. Ham homablang araw sadik ama ka ha songgoy tapayan fwalidan danom. Ham tahinan wa hanya.
41014014	Nyawa haday hanya no somakbaw, intawan hasagfon balay, fag lwang kitay, Kagfaadal has taw iglwang, Siday fag lingoban araw angko fasakbawan famaklay kaarakitay manayowan yadi, angko manga katogbong no kwan intam Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan?
41014015	Hanya falag ara hayo sadik lingoban dahol, matalagaan, sas tongod fag salogan. Ham fag fatalaga intam Yafon sinya.
41014016	Ginya madi in Hisos manga katogbong inlahaw wan, hawas banwa, hanggan ta nalag wa fagayo kito kan Hisos fwayong, yakanga ta sinya wak nafatalaga ista Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan.
41014017	Ginya madi araw, no kayabi wan, is Hisos hanggan it manga katogbong, safolo ha dowa, ta fagayo sinya wan.
41014018	Ta no sas bilog fanganan, kwan yapdi, is Hisos iglwang, Hogfwayong ha hayo, bonwa bohag, insadi sa hayo kaoyon angko kalaban, sadi kagsayo angko kati.
41014019	Ginya madi ka manga katogbong inrongkot wagdog, igsadig sadi gintaw kitay, Aho awkin kam faglwangon?
41014020	Is Hisos nasagot kitay, Sadi sas Safolo-ha-Dowa, angko kasayo kati igtogna tinapay sas basad mangkok.
41014021	Maskin aho, Kanbali Taw, kaakbang wa kalahaw kito kansorat hyabi, kawa angko dalanon, dapat ay, isyay wan, angko ofod ka goyon angko manga kalaban. Fiya man hara ha hanya, hanya nodwan sagaya git ina hyabi.
41014022	Ta no kwan yapdi, is Hisos nabol tinapay, nabaya in Diyos, nafaarogbotan, ginya nadisag has taw. Is Hisos iglwang, Toy angko habilogan, ham fag bol.
41014023	Ginya madi is Hisos nabol ka fanginoman ka ha sohad danom obas, nabaya in Diyos, ginya nafagamit is taw. Ta fagayo nainom wan.
41014024	Ginya madis Hisos nalwang has taw, Toy angko folot kagfaganit intam taranggapan. Angko folot kamwatwat kawa has fakaaywanan fag manga taw.
41014025	Hogfwayong ha hayo, bonwa bohag, hodwa ominom domwag danom obas, nodwa aban ya aho no ominom bago fag danom obas san Diyos sakop banwanan.
41014026	Ta no nangambahan sadik ambahan, tanlahaw wa a, hawas Moyod Oliboan.
41014027	Ginyas Hisos iglwang hat manga katogbong, Ham fagayo omobon wangko, maskin insorat sas Kasoratan kitay, Ho fahatay ka fangano, ginya madit anoon fag manga topa manarowayan wan.
41014028	Dapat ay aban, aho nomboyag ya domwag, aho gomona wa hayo has sakop Galiliya.
41014029	Is Pidrog lwang han Hisos kitay, Nyawa ta fagayo omobon hyamo araw, hodwa omobon hyamo.
41014030	Ginya madis Hisos nalwang han Pidro, Yatokitay, lag nga araw, araw basad yabi, bago it fadowa ginan fag kataraok tabag, tolo ginan haw tomangkod angko has taw.
41014031	Dapat is Pidro marigon wagfwayong, Nyawa ta hanggan wa fahatay intam dowa, hodwa tomangkod hyamo has taw. Ka tibak manga katogbong iglwang yadi kitonya.
41014032	Ginya madi da Hisos nalahaw wan, hawas sadik foyo, taglwang, Gitsimani. Is Hisos iglwang hat manga katogbong, Ham fag matokawan yap istay, aho nogdarangin yapdi.
41014033	Ginyas Hisos nataban inda Pidro da Santyago da Hwan. In Hisos fangayofan igfabago wagdog marongkot, galibitan wan.
41014034	Is Hisos nafwayong handa Pidro, Angko karongkotan bilang wa kodkod sangko basad fangayofan. Hogdog angko kahoriyan ho bilang wa kahatay wan. Ham fag mafanayan yapdistay, matagahan.
41014035	Is Hisos nonayayo ogbot gis taw, iglohoban wan sas baba daga, igdarangin kitay, no katwa di nangos, ka gis nanya fag mahori fag kasohodan, fag somagaya lamang hanya.
41014036	Nalwang kitay, Mama, angko Ama, idwa hagsagaya hyamo fagsyaganon. Fag bol nangos gingko to fag fanginoman kahoriyan kati. Dapat, nyawa hoglwang kitonya, fag hyamo kafangayofanan kam-anod, bohonwa angko.
41014037	Is Hisos nonfwali ya hat manga katogbong tolo, nalag kitay ta matoyogan wan. Nafwayong han Pidro, Simon, haw awkin matoyogan? Haw awkin idwa gagwanta mafolawan matagahan mangharaw, ngadi sik tama sinyahod?
41014038	Ham fag matagahan, fag darangin wan kaarakitay idwa hagfaloksowan hayo. Ka fangayofan orongan wa kasaya has fiya, dapat ka habilogan malombay.
41014039	Fadowa ginan is Hisos nasaman ya gis taw a, nandarangin, kito mandi ka haraw.
41014040	Sadi ya ginan is Hisos infwali ya hat manga ofod, ya mangharaw, ta matoyogan ya ngawan, maskin ista mata matapyaton. In Hisos manga katogbong kaya wan, idwa twag sagot hanya.
41014041	It fatolo fag swali araw is Hisos naakbang ya, ginya nalwang handa Pidro kitay, Ham awkin matoyogan yapdi, mafahowayan odi, fiya wan. Yabay, kati wan, ka yadi angko ofod ka goyon angko kalaban igfagamat angko, aho Kanbali Taw, has manga taw dwat.
41014042	Ham ha kalibang, fakabangon wan, tya wan, kangko ofod ka goyon has taw.
41014043	Sadi wa ginan, is Hisos no kampang yapdi, is Hodas, sadi gis Safolo-ha-Dowa, indasog wan. Ha taban kaaywanon fag manga taw, salawidan manga talibong, mabitbitan manga pinotol. Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo, hanggan manga fagtahinan sas banwa ka nasogo tonya fag manga taw.
41014044	Ta nodyan dasog sinya, kanoyon has taw danwa nafatohoyan is taw, iglwang kitay, No sida kangko ayohon fag ama, tonya wan kantam iktanon. Gamatan wa dagos tonya. Tabanan wan.
41014045	Is Hodas nondasog wa sinya, naakbang wa dagos han Hisos, iglwang kiti, Haw kagfaadal has taw. Ginyas Hodas naayok in Hisos faringfing.
41014046	Manga taw natoklos in Hisos a, nagamat hanya.
41014047	Dapat insadi ka malindogan akbang sinya nagonos it talibong a, nabasing ka gorangon fag fagalan sogowan, natigbas it talinga.
41014048	Ginya madis Hisos nalwang has fakaaywanan fag manga taw kitay, Aho awkin tolisan, ham gayfan, maskin ham ha diya manga talibong, mabitbitan manga pinotol famogfog, kaarakitay gomamat angko?
41014049	Sirang sirang ho gofod hayo igfaadal basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, bati ham idwa gamat angko gis nanya. Dapat fag im-anod wan no kinday kansorat sas Kasoratan.
41014050	Ginya madi in Hisos manga katogbong fagayo naobon in Hisos idwam dowa, nalagyo dan.
41014051	Sadik anahan maholimpayan homot goyan yadin Hisos. Manga sondalo nagamat yadi hanya,
41014052	dapat ka anahan nalfas di, it homot odi kangoyan sasta gamat. Nalagyo idwa ha rotay.
41014053	Ka manga nagamat in Hisos nataban hanya has gorangon fag fagalan-han-Diyos. Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan fagayo, ka manga fagtahinan sas banwa hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo matifonan yadi sinya.
41014054	No kitay di, is Pidro goyan haraw in Hisos, dapat ayayo sat ginanan. Ginya, nondasog sas gorangon fag fagalan it balay, is Pidro nasakbaw has basad aladan, intokaw maofodan yadi has manga bantay sondalo, mafanayangan afoy.
41014055	Yabay, ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan ka tifonan manga fagtahinan Hodyo fagayo igsayak manga taw ka bomangdan in Hisos kaarakitay ta fahatay hanya. Dapat tadwa ha lagan it fagbohagon han Hisos.
41014056	Maskin ha akwag bangdan hanya, dapat idwa pariho ista fwayong.
41014057	Dapat ha akwa yadi tiba nalindog, nabangdan in Hisos, iglwang kitay,
41014058	Mi nadog to fag ama igfwayong kitay, Ho domwat to fag Fanimbaan-Dahol ista gamat nahalig. Dapat ay, sas tolo lamang ik sirang, ho fatobo ya sadi yak Fanimbaan-Dahol, bonwa gamat taw nahalig.
41014059	Dapat nyawa kitonya, ista bangdan idwa myasa kitonya.
41014060	Ginya madi ka gorangon fag fagalan-han-Diyos nalindog sasta fagbokngan, naintaw han Hisos, Haw awkin idwag sagot? Kana tonya kasta sombong kawa ha hyamo?
41014061	Dapat is Hisos idwa naawang, idwa yadi nasagot. Ka Gorangon fag fagalan naintaw ya domwag in Hisos, nalwang kitay, Haw awkin in Diyos-natogon-Famawi? Haw awkin kantam Fagbayaon, it anak?
41014062	Is Hisos iglwang, Ala, aho ngay. Aban ham lomag yadingko, aho Kanbali Taw, matokawan sat akbang, sat balis sihon, kadwa ha bosal. Ham lomag yadi wangko, kadasog aban sas baba manga linyabo gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod.
41014063	Ginya madi, ka gorangon fag fagalan-han-Diyos naragyang it sadili solong rotay, nalwang, Kana mayon tam nogsayak yapdi ista sombong tiba taw?
41014064	Ham ngap fadi wad nadog kati, gi wa ngap it sadili bibig, igsway wa orongan in Diyos. Kinday hayo fangayofan? Fagayo fagayo nafatohoyan kitay ka fiya fahatayan in Hisos.
41014065	Ginya madi ka tiba igtofay in Hisos. Tagtaklob it mata, ginyag sontok hanya, bago diglwang, Sogi, boktongan. Ginya ka manga bantay sondalo natofa yadi marigon in Hisos.
41014066	Is Pidro no sayapdista basad aladan, ka gorangon fag fagalan sogowan ina sadi inbangkad yadi sinya.
41014067	No nalag in Pidro igfanayang afoy, nabantay hanya fiya fiya, ginyag lwang, Haw mangharaw tonya fag ama it ofod yadi, kawas Hisos taga Nasarit.
41014068	Dapat is Pidro natangkod wan, iglwang wa hanya fag ina, Twa man. Hodwa twagdog im faglwangon. Is Pidro igfatawas wan, hawas bilog sakbawan alad.
41014069	Ka sogowan ina nalag ya in Pidro, nafadahit ya has manga taw ka manga malindogan sinya kitay, To fag ama in Hisos wa nga ofod.
41014070	Dapat is Pidro sadiya ginan natangkod. Ginya madi, araw araw ogbot, ka manga taw sinya, sadi ya ginan nalwang han Pidro, Yabay, haw it ofod yadi wa sadi, matohoyanan wan, haw taga Galiliya yadi.
41014071	Dapat is Pidro natangkod marigon, iglwang, Nyawa ho matay wan, orongan wan hodwa kilala tonya fag ama hayo faglwangon.
41014072	Ginya madi ka tabag dagos wa nataraok it fadowa ginan. Is Pidro bago di natohod in Hisos fwayong hanya kitay, Ka tabag nodyag taraok it fadowa ginan, tolo ginan haw tomangkod has taw angko. Ginya madis Pidro naoraw wa marigon.
41015001	Araw, no dayo kasirang, ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, ka manga fagtahinan banwa, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan ka fanifonan magorang Hodyo sadik dahonya nangampangan wan. Ginya ta nagafos in Hisos a, nataban hanya han Pilato.
41015002	Ginya madis Pilato naintaw in Hisos, nalwang kitay, Haw awkin ka gorangon manga Hodyo? Is Hisos iglwang, Haw wa ngap kaglwang.
41015003	Aywan ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos igbangdan han Hisos.
41015004	Is Pilato naintaw ya domwag in Hisos, Kana kin ha nodwag sagot? Fandog kin kaaywanon ista manga sombong ha hyamo.
41015005	Dapat is Hisos idwa nasagot domwag. Yakangas Pilato kataka wan.
41015006	Ka manga Hodyo nogtohod ka Fanohodan Nagsagayan, is Pilato ha ogalig falfas sadik Hodyo kanporiso, no fakta ka manga Hodyo fakasayaon falfason.
41015007	Itfagonan ha manga taw iglaban ista gorangon hanggan wa nangadkatayan noglaban. Insadi ka nalaban is Barabas, kati maporisowan.
41015008	Ka fakaaywanan nalwang han Pilato, Haw fag idwag liyam im ogali. Ha fag falfas mandi sadik Hodyo kito ka nogbanwan.
41015009	Ginyas Pilato nasagot has taw kitay, Kinda nangos hayo fangayofan? Fag ka gorangon manga Hodyo awkin kangko falfason?
41015010	Maskin is Pilato naintaw ngatay fag is Hisos kat falfason, hanya natwa wa kitay kawa manga fagtahinan fag fagalan kaingli odin Hisos, yakanga ta nataban hanya han Pilato.
41015011	Dapat ka manga fagtahinan fag fagalan nafasognod has manga taw kaaywanon kitay, ta fag somagad gin Pilato fag is Barabas kat falfason.
41015012	Is Pilato naintaw has taw, iglwang sadi ya ginan, No kitonya, kana araw angko ibolonon has nwa fag ama ka hayo faglwangon gorangon manga Hodyo?
41015013	Ta nanarawagan di ngap, Fapakowan wa hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.
41015014	Ginyas Pilato gintaw ya domwag has taw, Kana mayon? Kana kat naibolon dwat? Dapat ta labi wan nanarawagan marigon, Fapakowan hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.
41015015	Maskin is Pilato kasaya kitay ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw fag igbaya hanya, ya nafalfas in Barabas. Ginya madis Pilato no nafabakbak in Hisos it manga sondalo, nafabahala hanya has taw kaarakitay ta fapako hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.
41015016	Yakanga ka manga sondalo nataban in Hisos hasta gorangon basad balay dahol. Ta nafatifon sadi wak habanan sondalo san Hisos dayo.
41015017	Ka manga sondalo nafasolong di nga hanya sadik rotay aba, boragaw. Ta nahoskos di lamnon madogi a, nafasangbaw tonya in Hisos baba alfoyo.
41015018	Ginya ka manga sondalo igsway odi in Hisos, iglwang, Anod, kafiyaon mangharaw ka gorangon manga Hodyo.
41015019	Ta nabakbak in Hisos boknga alfoyo pinotol bagahay. Tagtofay hanya hanggan igsway odig lingkohodan hanya.
41015020	Ginya madi ta nonsagaya wagyod hanya, ta naloslos ya ka rotay boragaw, nafasolong ya in Hisos sadili rotay, hanggan nataban wa hanya has dayo, kaarakitay pomako wan sas nafatimbangan hayo.
41015021	Araw, ta no sawas boknga dalan, ta nahablang sadik ama goli has banwa git iyab, kawas Simon, taga Sirini, inda Alihandro da Rofo ama. Ka manga sondalo napilit wa nafafasan hanya ka nafatimbangan hayo kasta fag fapakowan araw in Hisos.
41015022	Ta nataban in Hisos ha sadik foyo, tagngayan Golgota, it kahologan Botol Alfoyo.
41015023	Ka manga sondalo nafagamit in Hisos langgaw ha aktom lamnon mira. Dapat is Hisos nadayo di.
41015024	Manga sondalo napako in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo, ginya ta nangafodan wan in Hisos manga rotay, tagpostahan no kinday nogfahafod.
41015025	Myanit faginan wa kaabwat ta no napako in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo.
41015026	Kasta sombong masoratan sat tongod alfoyo iglwang, Ka gorangon manga Hodyo.
41015027	Gis nanya yadi ta nafapako dowak tolisan, insadi san Hisos balis sihon, insadi san Hisos balis wala.
41015028	In-anod kansorat sas Kasoratan kitay, Ta nafatimbang hanya bilang sadik taw ha kasalanan.
41015029	Ka manga taw kagdalan sinya, igmaswag, igyod, mabaringan odista alfoyo, taglwang, Nabi, anod, haw ka domwat nangos ka Fanimbaan-Dahol, ginya fatobo ya tolo lamang ik sirang,
41015030	kati, bawiyan hyamo sadili. Fag dokson lamang gis nyamos fatimbangan hayo.
41015031	Kitonya yadi ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo noglibak in Hisos, tagtoltolan, Bati hanya nabawi ongay ka tiba taw, dapat not sadili wa habilogan, idyadi wa syagan igbawi.
41015032	Tagmaswag iglwang, Tonya fag in Diyos-natogon-Famawi, ka gorangon manga Israil, fag domokson nga kati gis nwa fag nafatimbangan hayo. Nontam wa mata lagan, tam imtiwala wan. Ka manga tolisan kanpako yadi san Hisos akbang nafasidyowan yadi hanya.
41015033	Ginya madi yabay, gis boknga wa sirang fiya fiya, balis myanit kabohid wan, sadi wak dahonya banwanan inharom wan.
41015034	Myanit no kabohid wan, is Hisos natawag marigon sas fangampangan Aramaik, Iloy, Iloy, lama sabaktani? It kahologan, Angko Diyos, angko Diyos, kana mayon haw nogfabayaan angko?
41015035	Tiba taw ka sinya malindogan, no nadog kitay is Hisos igtawag kitonya, taglwang, Yabay, igtawag in Iliyas.
41015036	Sadik taw nadalandan wan natogna famasopsop has basad langgaw maiglis, nasongkit sas tobwan bagahay, ginya nafasopsop in Hisos, iglwang has fakaaywanan, Faya, tam bomantay yap, ngatay is Iliyas imbangkad araw kaarakitay fadokson hanya.
41015037	Is Hisos natawag ya domwag marigon, ginya nafos wat ipsaw.
41015038	Ginya yabay, ka fanahop rotay sas fagbokngan Fanimbaan-Dahol inragyang sadi odi ginan, gis tongod has daga baliwa, namokngan wan.
41015039	Ka fagtahinan sondalo ka masayangowan in Hisos, no nalag no kinday in Hisos ipsaw no nafos, iglwang kitay, Bonwa bohag to fag ama in Diyos wa Anak.
41015040	Ha akwa yadi manga ina sinya mabantayan gis ayayo. Tonya fag manga ina tiba kawa da Mariya Magdalina, da Mariya inda Santyago sangay ina, hanggan in Hosi ina, hanggan is Salomi.
41015041	Gi yapdis sakop Galiliya to fag manga ina nogtahin in Hisos hanggan igtogbong hanya. Ha akwa yadi sinya tibak ina aywan kan Hisos manga ofod no hawas Hirosalim itfagonan.
41015042	Kawa myanit kasangday wan sas Sirang Famatalagan hanggan no marom Sirang Kafahowayan, is Hosi, gis banwa Arimatiya, inrigon it fangayofan, hawan Pilato, nasagad in Hisos habilogan. Is Hosi sadik ama ha kangayanan, sadi sas fanoltolan manga fagtahinan Hodyo. Hanyag fanaya no ginahin is Diyos nogfabago it sakop.
41015044	Dapat is Pilato gadowan ngatay is Hisos idya ha lahaw natay. No nafatawag ka fagtahinan has manga sondalo, naintaw hanya is Hisos ngatay natay wa ngay.
41015045	Is Pilato no nadog gis fagtahinan manga sondalo kawas Hisos natay wa ngay, nafaangay kitay is Hosi bol wa nga kan Hisos habilogan gis nafatimbangan hayo.
41015046	Is Hosi nasali sadik homot madamol fag rotay kafiyaon, ginya nabol in Hisos habilogan, nasafot basad homot. Ginyas Hosi nafaigyan in Hisos habilogan sas basad natigib lohib bato. Ginya madi nafabalolang bato dahol dahol it tahop sas sakbawan lohib.
41015047	Da Mariya Magdalina hanggan da Mariya in Hosi ina mabantayan yapdi hanggan ta nalag no sida nafwalid in Hisos habilogan.
41016001	Nonsagaya wan ka Sirang Kafahowayan, da Mariya Magdalina, da Mariya in Santyago ina, hanggan da Salomi nasali famabanglo kaarakitay fomiyad in Hisos habilogan.
41016002	No dayo kayawa sas sirang gona sa sadik simba, ka manga ina hawas lohib bato.
41016003	No boknga wa dalan tagtoltolan wagtoltolan wan kitay, Fakta araw ka fomalo intam bomoklas ka tahop bato gis boknga sakbawan lohib?
41016004	Ta no nabantay wan, taglag ka lohib fanahop bato in-oson wan has dayo sakbawan maskin kadaholon ka bato.
41016005	Ta nonsakbaw wa has basad lohib bato, ta nalag sadik anahan matokawan sas balis sihon, ha solong rotay abohay. Ka manga ina inhinol odi.
41016006	Ka anahan nalwang has taw, Ham fag idwa kahinol. Ka hayo fagsayahon is Hisos, taga Nasarit, kasta napako sas nafatimbangan hayo. Hanyan boyag ya domwag, idwastay. Ham bantayan ista nagfwalidan hanya is nwa.
41016007	Ham fag goli wan, fwayongan han Hisos manga katogbong, labi man han Pidro, kitay is Hisos gomona hayo has sakop Galiliya. Sinya ham bago di lomag hanya, kito kat togon hayo.
41016008	Ka manga ina nadokson di ngay gis lohib bato, nalagyo wan, karokog wa kadala, indolaw wan. Tadwa nafwayong nyawa hada fag taw maskin tandala wan.
41016009	Ka manga ina hawan da Pidro hanggan nafwayong has fagayo kasta lagan anahan, basad lohib, it nafwayong fagayo has taw.
41016010	Ginya madis Hisos nasogo kitay it manga katogbong fag bomarita ha sadik dahonya baba daga. Ta nafaadal has taw ka maliyaw hanggan maanod fag barita no kinday tam nombawi hanggan aban aban.
41016011	Dapat nyawa ta nadog kitay is Hisos inboyag ya, nyawa in Mariya wa mata lagan, tadya katiwala in Mariya fwayong.
41016012	Ginya madis Hisos nafalag it sadili hat katogbong dowa, ta noglahaw has moyod, dapat it fanwalongan in-oman.
41016013	Tanfwali ya has basad banwa, nafwayong han Hisos manga katogbong tiba kitay ta nalag wan Hisos. Dapat tadwa katiwala ista fwayong.
41016014	Ginya madis Hisos nafalag it sadili hat manga katogbong Safolo-ha-Sadi, ta no kwan fafa. Is Hisos nangabaya is taw, maskin maganit ista fangayofan, tadwa katiwala ista fwayong, nyawa kagfadog has taw nalag kitay is Hisos inboyag ya.
41016015	Ginyas Hisos natogon has taw, Ham fag hanya wan sadik baba daga, fwayongan ka Fiya fag Barita has fagayo fag manga taw.
41016016	Ka manga taw kantiwala hanggan igfatogna yadi hanya imbawi wan, dapat kadwam tiwala imtohoyan has fadosaan.
41016017	Ka mangam tiwala mamalag to fag manga falagon madolaw. Ta nogsyag angko, ta somyagan igfaalin manga labang gis taw, ta tomwa yadi homampang ka tiba fangampangan.
41016018	Nyawa abyanon homoskos hanya, hanggan nyawa ta domaya igfainom fakalangoon hanya, tadwam kinday. Ta nogfalangday it manga gamat has manga taw ha sagit, tamfiya wan.
41016019	Ginya madis Hisos nontabo wagtogon kiti hat manga katogbong, inabwat has tongod, intokaw san Diyos balis sihon.
41016020	Ginya madin Hisos manga katogbong nalahaw wan, natoltol has fagayo fag manga banwanan taw. Kagfon intam gofod yadi has taw gibolon, igfalag yadi manga falagon madolaw has manga taw kaarakitay igfaanod kitay orongan ista toltol.
42001001	Hogsorat ha hyamo, Tiyofilo, sadik taw ha kangayanan. Aywan fag manga taw danwa nasorat kawa hantam donggon ka manga nadalanan sa hyami banwanan itfagonan.
42001002	Ka manga nalag to fag manga bagay gis fabagowanan hanggan nafaadal in Diyos hampang, ka nafwayong ha hyami it mata lagan, ginya hyami ofod tiba nasorat yadi kasta nafwayong.
42001003	Ginya madi, aho no naintaw wa fiya fiya fagayo fag mangan anod gis fabagowanan, ho naisip yadi kitay hanggan aho somorat yadi wan sadik toltolan fiya wa donggon, idwa ha labi, idwa ha korang.
42001004	Hogsorat ha hyamo kaarakitay haw tomwa matohoyanan kitay, kam manga donggon orongan wan-anod kitonya.
42001005	Hyabi, nos Hirodis ka gorangon sas sakop Hodiya, ha sadik fagalan-han-Diyos san Abiyas habanan, it ngayan is Sakariyas, in Aaron hasokfonan. In Sakariyas babay is Ilisabit gi yadin Aaron hasokfonan.
42001006	Ka talsawa myasa wa kitonya in Diyos wa fagbayaon, katanog it manga togon fagayo fagayo.
42001007	Dapat ay, hanggan wa magorang tadya ha anak maskin is Ilisabit malayos.
42001008	Ginya madi yabay, in Sakariyas fag habanan, no gibolon ka fagalan bato ibolonon san Diyos faglagan, tagbahala sas Fanimbaan-Dahol.
42001009	Gis nanya, ta no nafaaraktoman ista manga ngayan, kito kasta ogali manga fagalan, in Sakariyas ngayan kasta nabol gis sohadan, yakanga hanya ka domiya sonogon kamangyan. Yakanga gis nanya fag masohod ta nogsonog kamangyan, is Sakariyas insakbaw han Diyos basad Fanimbaan-Dahol a,
42001010	kat fakaaywanan fag manga taw matifonan sas sokayan, igdarangin.
42001011	Ginyan sadi odi ginan, in Diyos anghil sadi dagos wa nafalag han Sakariyas, sawas balis sihon baliwa fagsonogan kamangyan.
42001012	Is Sakariyas no nalag ka anghil, inhinol wa a, indala wa dahol dahol.
42001013	Dapat ka anghil nafwayong han Sakariyas kitay, Haw fag idwa kadala, Sakariyas. Is Diyos nadog wa hyamo darangin. Ham da Ilisabit omanak yapdi anak ama aban. Fag is Hwan ham no ngomayan hanya.
42001014	Ham bomaya wa a, hamsolong yadi waglag, hanggan fagayo fag manga taw, ta bomaya waglag hanya no bago sagaya.
42001015	Hanyam bali wa ha kangayanan dahol aban san Diyos faglagan. Hayo anak aban fag idwa ominom alak, nyawa kana fag fakalangoon. Gi yapdit ina basad tiyan, ka Maliyaw fag Falad danwa sa hanya sadi wak dahonya fangayofan aban.
42001016	Tonya hayo anak ama ka fafwali ya aban hasta fakatiwalaon fag Diyos, hasagfon has taw, kaaywanon in Israil manga hasokfonan fag manga taw.
42001017	Tonya hayo anak ama ka gomona man kagfon intam, hanggan ka fangayofan hanggan karigonan ka nafasyagan in Diyos fangampang is Iliyas hyabi, mamasyagan yadi hanya. Imbali wa kitonya kaarakitay hanyag faamigosan ya ka manga ama hat manga anak, hanggan fafwali ya ka mangag sway has fiya fag ogali. Ginya madi yabay, sadik tifonan taw imtalaga han Diyos.
42001018	Is Sakariyas nalwang has anghil kitay, Kinday ho no tomwa matohoyanan kitay ha akwa anak aban, maskin aho magorang wa dahol kati, hanggan angko babay, mi myasa wa kitonya.
42001019	Ka anghil nasagot, Ahos Gabriyal ka gibolon san Diyos atobangan. Is Diyos nasogo angko ha hyamo kaarakitay fomwayong hyamo kangko nafadog fiya fag barita ha hyamo kati haraw.
42001020	Maskin hadwa katiwala kangko fwayong hyamo, gis kati ginan haw imbali wa boyon hanggan bongkok no kandogay day nodyam anod.
42001021	Gis nanya yabay, no bali day is Sakariyas idyan dokson, ka manga taw mafanayan yapdi sas sokayan. Tandolaw wan no kana mayon nondogay sas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol.
42001022	Ginya hanya nondokson wan, fawa twa kampang has taw, igfaaman odi. Yakanga ta natwa wa kitay hanya ha lagan madolaw sas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol.
42001023	Nonsagaya in Sakariyas habanan taranggapan ibolon, is Sakariyas nwali wa hat balay.
42001024	Ginya madi yabay, fawa dogay, is Ilisabit gabosog wan. Manga limak magdanon, is Ilisabit idwa galin galin git balay.
42001025	Is Ilisabit nalwang, Kati yabay is Diyos bago dinawa angko, naibolon kito kaarakitay tadwa ha fagwason aban kitay, hodwa ha anak.
42001026	Is Ilisabit no onom wak magdanon gabosog, is Diyos nasogo ya ka anghil Gabriyal
42001027	has banwa Nasarit, sakop Galiliya, ha sadik dayaga, it ngayan is Mariya. Is Mariya idya nangindogan. No kitay di, is Mariya ha bato wa indoganon, is Hosi, sadik ama gin Dabid ha sokfonan, ka gorangon fag Dabid.
42001028	Ka anghil nondasog has oliyanan dayaga, naakbang wa a, nafasayagdog hanya kiti, Yabay yabay, is Diyos igbaya wa hyamo, sawa yadi hyamo.
42001029	Dapat is Mariya indolaw wa dahol dahol igdog kat nafwayong a, nangayfanan wa fiya fiya no kanat kahologan ka anghil no kampang kitonya.
42001030	Yakanga ka anghil nafwayong hanya, Mariya, haw fag idwa kadala, maskin haw in Diyos wa fagbayaon.
42001031	Haw fag talinga wan. Haw imbali gabosog hanggan omanak yadi sadik anak ama. Haw aban ngomayan hanya is Hisos.
42001032	Hanyam bali dahol it kangayanan hanggan ta lomwang yadi kitay kat Ama is Diyos ka ha kangayanan abwat man has fagayo fagayo. Is Diyos, kagfon intam, fatokaw yadim Anak, san Dabid it hafofowan nagtokawan fanokawan gorangon hyabi.
42001033	Ginya madi hanya bomahala han Hakob manga hasokfonan hanggan aban aban. Hanya nombali wa gorangon idwa ha katabowanan nogbahala.
42001034	Is Mariya naintaw has anghil, Kinday nom-anod tonya kawa hodyan saya ama?
42001035	Ka anghil nasagot, Ka Maliyaw fag Falad domokson ha hyamo a, ka Abwat-man-has-Fagayo-Fagayo it karigonan ka lomanbong ha hyamo. Yakanga kam fasagayaon fag anak aban imtohoyan han Diyos, hanggan it ngayan in Diyos wa Anak.
42001036	Ha awkin idwag tohod in Ilisabit im kaiban? Nyawa magorang wan, gabosog kati a, sadik anak ama aban it fagfasagayaon. Kati faonom wa fag magdanon hanya no gabosog, nyawa hyabi taglwang hanya baog.
42001037	Maskin nyawa kana fag madolaw idwa hagsagaya in Diyos fagsyaganon.
42001038	Is Mariya nasagot, Aho intam Fon sogowan. Nyawa kana kam nafwayong angko fag im-anod wan. Ginya yabay ka anghil naobon wan Mariya.
42001039	Ginya madis Mariya idwa dogay nadagos wan has manga moyod sakop Hoda hawas sadik banwa sinya.
42001040	Is Mariya nonsakbaw han Sakariyas balay, nahampang masaya wagdog han Ilisabit.
42001041	Is Ilisabit no nadog in Mariya hampang, ka anak san Ilisabit basad tiyan nahimot marigon. Ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawan Ilisabit basad fangayofan sadi wak dahonya,
42001042	ginyas Ilisabit nahampang marigon a, nalwang han Mariya, Haw bomaya wan bohondi kitos iba ina hanggan kam fagfasagayaon fag anak aban bomaya yadi.
42001043	Hodwa ha fangayofan kitay, kambali angko Fon it ina manabang angko.
42001044	Maskin aho no nadog hyamo hampang, haw no kadasog, ka anak sangko basad tiyan nabaya wan, nahimot marigon.
42001045	Maskin haw nasyag kitay, im-anod wan kagfon intam nafwayong ha hyamo, git anghil, haw bomaya wan.
42001046	Ginya madis Mariya nasagot in Ilisabit kiti, Angko fangayofan igfasayagdog kagfon intam,
42001047	Angko fangayofan igbaya in Diyos angko Famawi,
42001048	Maskin nyawa ahot sogowan odi, hanyan-awa wangko. Gis kati ginan hanggan wa aban, maskin is Diyos kadwa ha bosal
42001049	Naibolon sangko madolaw, fagayo fag manga taw lomwang kitay, aho ka bomaya wan. Is Diyos maliyaw wan.
42001050	Hanya kaawa ka manga katanog hanya gis fagayo fagayo fag manga hasokfonan taw.
42001051	In Diyos manga ibolon igfalag has taw it karigonan, Hanyag fasarowayan yadi ka manga ha takan.
42001052	Hanya nafaalin manga gorangon git kangayanan a, Nafaabwat it kangayanan ka mangadwa ha takan.
42001053	Nafahapsog manga fiya fag fanganon ka manga kalonos, Dapat ay, nasogo ka manga maakwa, nyawadwa ha nahwan.
42001054	Maskin igfaanod it togonan hantam manga magorang, Hanya natogbong in Israil manga hasokfonan, in Diyos manga sogowan,
42001055	Kawa tonya wat togonan han Abraham hanggan hat manga hasokfonan hanggan aban aban.
42001056	Is Mariya nandogayan san Ilisabit balay tolok magdanon, ginya madi nwali wan.
42001057	Ginya madi aban, nondasog in Ilisabit anak kasagayan fag masohod, yabay insagaya anak nga ama.
42001058	It manga faakbang balay hanggan kaiban, no nadog kitay kagfon intam inawa wa dahol in Ilisabit, ta nagobok wa ngap hanya, igbaya yadi wa ngap iglag.
42001059	Ginya madi, ta nogfatoli ka anak dararag sas fawalo fag sirang, tonya fag manga taw nafasakop yadi sinya. Ta gayfan kitay is Sakariyas nogfangayan it anak, is Sakariyas mandi, kito mandi it ama.
42001060	Dapat ay, it ina nalwang, Bohonwas Sakariyas, is Hwan di kat ngayan.
42001061	Dapat taglwang, Ngadi sadi sa hayo kaiban idwa ha ngayan kitonya.
42001062	Yakanga ta nafaaman odin Sakariyas it ama, ta no gintaw hanya no faktaw kat fakasayaon it anak ngayan.
42001063	Is Sakariyas nafaaman, nanagad soratan a, ginya nasorat kiti, It ngayan is Hwan. Fagayo indolaw wan.
42001064	Ginya sadi wa ginan is Sakariyas nahampang ya, nafasayagdog in Diyos.
42001065	Ka manga taga sinya fag banwanan, fagayo fagayo, indolaw wa dahol, yakanga igfadadahitan ha sadi ha sadi kat manga lagan, sadi wak dahonya manga banwanan sas manga moyod sakop Hodiya.
42001066	Fagayo ka nadog naayfan wa fiya fiya no kanat kahologan, maskin kalag wa kitay, is Diyos sinya wa fag anak, ka manga taw garintawan yadi, Kinday mayon aban to fag anak?
42001067	Ginya madi ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawan Sakariyas in Hwan ama, sadi wak dahonya fangayofan. Ginyas Sakariyas inbalin Diyos fangampang, nalwang kito,
42001068	Maskin kagfon in Israil manga hasokfonan, is Diyos, in-awa waglag hanggan nafalo nafalfas it sakop, Yakanga tam fag fasayagdog hanya.
42001069	Hanya nafabangkad yadi hantam sadik Famaliwa, marigon wa dahol, Hanyan Diyos sogowan is Dabid, it hasokfonan.
42001070	Hyabi hyabi is Diyos ha togonan hantam git manga fangampang maliyaw kitay,
42001071	hanya bomawi intam gintam manga kalaban Hanggan gis manga taw ka kadwat iglag intam.
42001072	Hanya ha togonan yadi hantam manga magorang kitay, hanya kaawa has taw. Hanya tomohod yadit fiya fag taranggapan.
42001073	To kan Diyos nafatohoyan fiya fiya hantam hafofowan fag ama is Abraham kitay,
42001074	Hanya bomawi intam gintam manga kalaban, Kaarakitay tam somyagan mamasayagdog hanya, idwa ha fakadalaon,
42001075	Imbali maliyaw hanggan maslong intam manga ogali sat faglagan, no kandogay day tam no boyagan yapdi.
42001076	Kati haw man angko anak kangko fagwason. Maskin haw gomona kagfon intam, kaarakitay igfatalagat manga bato lahawan, Yakanga ta ngomayan hyamo kitay, haw wat fangampang, ka Abwat-man-has-fagayo-fagayo-it-kangayanan.
42001077	Haw fomwayong hat sakop no kinday ta nombawi, No kinday it manga ogali dwat nomliyam.
42001078	Maskin intam Diyos maawaon wa dahol dahol, Ka mayawa ka bomawi intam kaakbang wagfayawa intam,
42001079	Kaarakitay igyawa ka manga basad marom yapdi, ka manga sas daga gohom kahatayan, Hanggan tomaban intam has dalan kahowayan.
42001080	Ka anak, is Hwan, no kadahol wan, kabali yadi marigon it fangayofan a, nabanwanan basad fakahyabogan nodyan bali ha bantog sas manga banwanan Israil.
42002001	Gis nanya fag manga masohod, is Sisar Agosto ka gorangon sas fagayo fag layonan daga ka banwa Roma sakop sadi wak dahonya. Is Sisar Agosto nalwang kitay fagayo fagayo fag manga taw sas sakop Roma fag falistat manga ngayan.
42002002	Toy ka gona fag nafalista nos Kiriniyo hyabi ka gobirnador sas Siriya.
42002003	Yakanga fagayo fag manga taw nwali hat magorang banwanan kaarakitay mamalista it manga ngayan.
42002004	Is Hosi nalahaw gis banwa Nasarit, sakop Galiliya, hawas sakop Hodiya, has banwa Bitlihim kan Dabid nakasagayan fag banwa hyabi, maskin is Hosi in Dabid hasokfonan.
42002005	Is Mariya, kan Hosi bato babayon, nahin yadi wan Hosi kaarakitay mamalista yadit ngayan. Is Mariya danwa gabosog gis nanya.
42002006	Ta no sinya yapdi, natoon wa ngap sinyat anak kasagayan.
42002007	Ginyas Mariya nafasagaya wa sinya, sas banwa Bitlihim, kat anak ahan, anak ya ngadi ama. Is Mariya nafasafot manga rotay hat anak dararag. Ginya madi, kawa napno wa manga taw kasta balay bato hadasogan, yakanga ta nafaigyan odi ka anak dararag sas basad fanganan manga hayopan.
42002008	Dayo gis nanya fag manga masohod, ha manga gano topa basad yabi sas bahalan banwa, hawas talon baliwa.
42002009	Ginya madi, sadi wa ginan, in Diyos anghil sadi inbangkad hasta akbang a, in Diyos masilaw wa dahol fag kayawaan nayawa sasta ligongan. Ka manga gano topa indala wa dahol dahol iglag.
42002010	Dapat ka anghil nalwang has taw, Ham fag idwa kadala. Fandog ngay, aho ha fwayongon ha hayo fiya fag barita a, fagayo fag manga taw imsaya wagdog.
42002011	Maskin kati hayo Famawi insagaya wan san Dabid banwa, kawan Diyos-natogon-Famawi, kagfon intam.
42002012	Ka fatohoyan hayo no sida fag anak, ham lomag tonya fag anak dararag masafotan manga rotay a, maigyanan sas basad fanganan hayopan.
42002013	Ginya madi, sadi wa ginan, sadik habanan anghil gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, inbangkad has anghil gona akbang. Tagfasayagdog in Diyos kiti,
42002014	Fag fasayagdog in Diyos sat banwanan sam tongod, Hanggan kan Diyos fagbayaon fag manga taw istay is baba daga fag lomag yadi kahowayan.
42002015	Ginya madi, ka manga anghil no nwali han Diyos banwanan sam tongod, ka manga gano topa nanoltolan a, taglwang, Kalibang, tam hawas basad banwa Bitlihim. Tam mamantay ngay ka madolaw sinya kagfon intam nafadog hantam.
42002016	Ginya ta nalahaw madali hanya a, ta nasayak inda Mariya, da Hosi hanggan ta nalag yadi anak dararag sinya, maigyanan basad fanganan hayopan.
42002017	Ta no nalag di ngay, ta natoltol has taw it donggon ka anghil fwayong, kawa has nwa fag anak dararag.
42002018	Fagayo fag manga taw ka nadog ka manga gano topa fwayong indolaw wa dahol.
42002019	Dapat is Mariya fagaba wa maayfanan to fagayo kan-anod kitonya.
42002020	Ka manga gano topa nwali wa a, igfasayagdog in Diyos, igbaya hanya kawat donggon hanggan it manga lagan fagayo, kito kan anghil fwayong has taw.
42002021	Nondasog ka fawalo fag sirang git kasagayan, ta natoli ka anak dararag, hanggan nafangayan hanya is Hisos. Is Mariya nodya gabosog, ka anghil danwa nadisag it ngayan tonya.
42002022	Ginya madi, nondasog ka sirang gis nanya ta nogfatonglos ka ogali kan Mwisis natogon kawa has manga nafasagaya anak, hasaglinay baliwa, ka talanahan nalahaw has banwa Hirosalim. Maskin in Diyos togon iglwang, Fagayo fag anak ama it ahan, ham fakoray hasagfon intam, yakanga, ta nadiya yadi wa ka anak dararag kaarakitay fabangkad has fagalan-han-Diyos faglagan.
42002024	Ta nadisag yadi kasta bato disagon no kana kan Diyos togon iglwang, kitos sadik talsawa manok bilang tokmo, ngatay dowak anak salompati.
42002025	Gis nanya fag manga masohod ha sadik ama sas Hirosalim, it ngayan is Simyon. Kalag wa kitay hanya galwasi in Diyos maskin matanogon a, igfanaya odi kitay no ginahin nangos is Diyos nogbawi in Israil sakop. Ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawan Simyon fangayofan,
42002026	hanggan nafatagak hanya kitay, hadya matay ha lomag yapdin Diyos-natogon-Famawi.
42002027	Ka Maliyaw fag Falad nataban in Simyon has basad Fanimbaan-Dahol. Ginya madi, it manga magorang no nadiya ka anak, kawas Hisos, ha basad Fanimbaan-Dahol kaarakitay igfatonglos kan Diyos togon fagsagadon,
42002028	is Simyon nababa ka anak, nabaya in Diyos, nalwang kiti,
42002029	Haw kagfon angko, maskin angko wa mata lagan ka Famawi manga taw, Kam nafatalaga sasta faglagan fagayo, ka mamayawa has manga Hintil, Hanggan gi hanya, manga taw mamasayag dog ha hyamo sakop sas Israil. Yakanga, in-anod wan kam fwayong angko. Nyawa aho, im sogowan, gomona was taw kati, fiya was fangayofan.
42002033	Ka anak dararag manga magorang indolaw wagdog in Simyon fwayong kawa han Hisos.
42002034	Is Simyon nafasayag dog inda Hosi kitay ta bomaya wan, ginya madi nafwayong han Mariya kitay, Haw fag danwa twa kitay, to fag anak danwan talaga kaarakitay aywan fag manga taga Israil omayayo gin Diyos, dapat aywan yadi ka omakbang. Is Diyos nasogo to fag anak hastay, sadik falagon madolaw, dapat aywan ka yomod hanya.
42002035	Yakanga ista manga basad fangayofan imlag wa fiya fiya. Haw domog yadi aban kitay, bilang wa ha dagom matobohan sa hyamo basad fangayofan.
42002036	Gis nanya yadi ha sadik ina in Diyos fangampang sinyas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, it ngayan is Ana, in Fanwil anak, in Asir hasokfonan. Is Ana magorang wa dahol. Fitok fangaraw lamang hyabi, hanya no gofodan hat indogan,
42002037	ginya madit indogan natay wan, yakanga hanyan balo yadi wan kati. It kagorangan walok safolo ha ofat ik fangaraw. In Ana ibolon ha odis basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, yabi sirang, igfasayagdog in Diyos. Nomtoon idwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin.
42002038	Gis nanya yadi, is Ana naakbang handa Hosi, nafasalamat han Diyos. Hanya natoltol yadi, kawa han Hisos baliwa, has fagayo ka manga mafanayan no ginahin is Diyos no bomawi ka banwa Hirosalim gis mahori.
42002039	Da Hosi da Mariya, no nafatonglos fagayo fag manga bagay ka maangay han Diyos togon has manga Hodyo, ta nwali ya ngawan hat sadili banwanan has banwa Nasarit, sakop Galiliya.
42002040	Ka anak kadahol wan a, inbali marigon it fangayofan hanggan madonong ya ngadi, maskin in Diyos kafiyan sawa hanya.
42002041	Yabay, fangaraw fangaraw, sas Fanohodan Nagsagayan, manga Hodyo nogtohod ka anghil no nasagaya ista manga balay hyabi, in Hisos manga magorang has banwa Hirosalim.
42002042	Is Hisos no safolo wa ha dowak fangaraw it kadogayan, hanyag tahin yadi wat manga magorang, ta no has Hirosalim kito kasta ogali nogbanwan.
42002043	Nonsagaya ka Fanohodan, ta nwali ya nga wan. Is Hisos in-goyan yapdi sas Hirosalim dapat it manga magorang idwa naisip kitay hanyan goyan.
42002044	Ta gayfan ngatay is Hisos nahoyog yapdi has iba taw, yakanga ta nafadagos yapdit lahawan sadi wak sirangan. Ta no nasayak hat manga kaiban hanggan hat manga fakilalaon, ta bago di natwa kitay, is Hisos idwa mangharaw natahin it manga magorang.
42002045	Ta nodwa nalag in Hisos, tanfwali ya has banwa Hirosalim kaarakitay somayak hanya.
42002046	Sayas fatolo fag sirang ta bago di nalag in Hisos, ya mangharaw, sadis basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, matokawan sinya maofodan yadi ka mangag faadal. Hanya matalingan has taw, ginya gintaw yadi.
42002047	Fagayo ka nadog in Hisos hampang tandolaw wa dahol kitay hanya madonong mangharaw, twa yadig sagot has taw.
42002048	Hanggan it manga magorang intaka wan, ta no nalag hanya, it inag lwang, Anak, kana mayon haw no kitonya ha hyami? Aho hanggan im ama, minyaya wa galingawan hyamo mi nogsayak hyamo.
42002049	Is Hisos nasagot, Kana mayon ham nogsayak angko? Ham awkin idwa natwa kitay aho fag sawangko Ama balay?
42002050	Dapat tadwa natwagdog in Hisos nafwayong, no kanat kahologan.
42002051	Is Hisos natahin ya ngawan it manga magorang a, nwali ya has banwa Nasarit, nafasakop fiya fiya hat manga magorang. It ina naayfan fiya fiya to fag manga bagay fagayo sat basad fangayofan.
42002052	Is Hisos kadahol wan gis nanya, madonong ya ngadi. Labi was Diyos hanggan manga taw igbaya wa dahol dahol hanya.
42003001	Ginya madi aban, sas fasafolo ha lima fag fangaraw, nos Tibiriyo Sisar kasta abwat fag gorangon sas manga layonan daga ka sakop Roma, is Ponsiyo Pilato ka gobirnador sas sakop Hodiya, is Hirodis kasta gorangon, no sas sakop di Galiliya, hanggan kaman it fadwasay, is Filipi, ka gorangon sas manga sakop di Itoriya hanggan Tarakoniti. Is Lisaniyas ka gorangon sas sakop di Abiliniya.
42003002	Gis nanya da Anas da Kayfas ka tarogbongan gorangon fag fagalan-han-Diyos. Gis nanya fag masohod is Hwan, in Sakariyas anak no maoliyanan sas basad fakahyabogan, is Diyos nafadog hanya it bato toltolon has taw.
42003003	Yakangas Hwan nasafong wa bali bali difay safa Hordan, igfaadal has taw. Hanyag lwang, Ham fag soyo, fag dayo yadi hayo manga ogali dwat. Ham fag fatogna hayo kaarakitay ha tandaan sas danom kagfatohoyan has taw kitay ham igsoyo, hanggan is Diyos faliyam wa fagayo hayo manga naogali dwat.
42003004	Kito kansorat san Isayas, in Diyos fangampang, sorat kitay, Kiti kat nafwayong kagtawag marigon marigon, gis basad fakahyabogan, Fatalagaan in Diyos bato lahawan, Fahaslongan it manga dalan fagayo.
42003005	Dafogan ka manga losot, Hodkodan, fadatagan ka manga moyod, manga fongso, Fahaslongan ka dalan igbarikwangan, Fasohodan fiya fiya ka manga losot garogbot garogbot.
42003006	Ginya madi fagayo fag manga taw lomag no kinday is Diyos nogbawi manga taw.
42003007	Aywan fag manga taw ka nagobok in Hwan kaarakitay mamatogna. Is Hwan iglwang has manga taw, Ham bilang odi manga abyanon no madaya. Fakta kagfatagak hayo kitay ham fag lagyo wan gin Diyos fadosaan ka kadasog aban?
42003008	Fag hanggan wa hayo manga bohad ogali kagfalag kitay ham igsoyo wan. Ham fag idwa kasyag kitay maskin ham in Abraham manga hasokfonan, ya fiya wan. Gwadi hogfwayong ha hayo kitay gistay fag manga bato is Diyos syagan kalig in Abraham manga hasokfonan orongan.
42003009	Gis kati ginan ka wasay danwan hatak sas dalid hayo, omobang fagayo fagayo fag manga fon hayo kadwa fiya it bohad a, omokas wa has basad afoy.
42003010	Ginya ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw gintaw in Hwan, No kitonya mangharaw, kana ka hyami bato ibolonon kaarakitay midwam sakop has fadosaan?
42003011	Is Hwan nasagot, Hayo balokas no dowa, disagan wa ka sadi hasadwa akwa. Ka manga ha hanon fag kitonya yadi, disagan hasadwa akwa.
42003012	Mangag falo igsohot ka gobirno Roma bohis indasog wan han Hwan maskin kasaya mamatogna. Ta naintaw yadi han Hwan kitay, Haw kagfaadal, kinda odi hami?
42003013	Is Hwan iglwang has manga fanohot bohis, Ham fag idwag sagad iglabi ka fiya hayo fagsagadon.
42003014	Ka manga sondalo naintaw yadin Hwan, Hami yadi, kinda odi? Hanyag lwang, Nyawa ham igsagad, fag idwag logos is taw. Fag idwag fadala nodwa orongan. Ham fag idwag manaw hayo tangdanan.
42003015	Gis nanya fag masohod aywan fag manga taw mafanayan odi no ginahin in Diyos-natogon-Famawi nombangkad, yakanga kat fakaaywanan naayfan kitay ngatay is Hwan kasta fagfanayaon.
42003016	Dapat is Hwan nafwayong has taw, No kitay di, sas danom aho nogfatogna hayo, dapat ha akwa ya kadasog aban, ka madonong man angko, hanya ka fatogna hayo sas Maliyaw fag Falad, hanggan sas afoy. Ho kaya wa manlohas it siyok lapak.
42003017	Hanya ha bitbit fanayang kaarakitay falayon it opa, manga ohot. Tomifon it tirigo sas basad dongdong, dapat ay, somonog wa ka manga ohot sas afoy kadwa kapsa.
42003018	Yakanga aywan yapdi fag manga fatagak in Hwan fagtoltolon has taw nogfadog ka Fiya fag Barita.
42003019	Dapat is Hwan nangabaya in Hirodis, kasta gorangon, maskin kahagaw in Filipi babay, is Hirodiyas, it tagyaw yadi. Bohondi tonya kan Hirodis naibolon dwat kan Hwan fakabayaon.
42003020	Yakangas Hirodis nadogang ya to kat kasalanan, hanya nafaporiso yadin Hwan.
42003021	Itfagonan, fagayo fagayo fag manga taw no nafatogna wan, hanggan is Hisos nafatogna yadi. Ginyas Hisos nogdarangin yapdi, ka banwa sas tongod inboklas wan.
42003022	Ka Maliyaw fag Falad, bilang wa salompati, nayokfo han Hisos. Ginya ha nahasnog gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, iglwang kitay, Haw wa kangko fagalwasiyon fag Anak, hogbaya wa dahol dahol hyamo.
42003023	Is Hisos manga wa tolok safolok fangaraw it kagorangan bago digfaadal has taw. Ista fangayofan is Hisos in Hosi odi anak. In Hosi hafofowan gin Adan ginan kiti,
42003024	Bago bago is Adan bilang wan Diyos anak. Ginyan Adan anak is Sit. Ginyan Sit anak is Inos. Ginyan Inos anak is Kainan. In Kainan anak is Mahalalil. In Mahalalil anak is Harid. In Harid anak is Inok. In Inok anak is Matosalim. In Matosalim anak is Lamik. In Lamik anak is Nowi. In Nowi anak is Sim. In Sim anak is Arfaksad. In Arfaksad anak is Kainan. In Kainan anak is Sala. In Sala anak is Hibir. In Hibir anak is Pilig. In Pilig anak is Ragaw. In Ragaw anak is Sirog. In Sirog anak is Nakor. In Nakor anak is Tira. In Tira anak is Abraham. In Abraham anak is Isaak. In Isaak anak is Hakob. In Hakob anak is Hoda. In Hoda anak is Faris. In Faris anak is Isrom. In Isrom anak is Arni. In Arni anak is Admin. In Admin anak is Aminadab. In Aminadab anak is Naason. In Naason anak is Salmon. In Salmon anak is Boos. In Boos anak is Obid. In Obid anak is Hisi. In Hisi anak is Dabid. In Dabid anak is Natan. In Natan anak is Matata. In Matata anak is Mainan. In Mainan anak is Miliya. In Miliya anak is Iliyakim. In Iliyakim anak is Honan. In Honan anak is Hosi. In Hosi anak is Hoda. In Hoda anak is Simyon. In Simyon anak is Libi. In Libi anak is Matat. In Matat anak is Horin. In Horin anak is Ilyasar. In Ilyasar anak is Hoswi. In Hoswi anak is Ir. In Ir anak is Ilmodam. In Ilmodam anak is Kosam. In Kosam anak is Adi. In Adi anak is Milki. In Milki anak is Niri. In Niri anak is Saltiyal. In Saltiyal anak is Sorobabil. In Sorobabil anak is Risa. In Risa anak is Hoana. In Hoana anak is Hoda. In Hoda anak is Hosi. In Hosi anak is Simi. In Simi anak is Matatiyas. In Matatiyas anak is Maat. In Maat anak is Nagi. In Nagi anak is Isli. In Isli anak is Nahom. In Nahom anak is Amos. In Amos anak is Matatiyas. In Matatiyas anak is Hosi. In Hosi anak is Hanan. In Hanan anak is Milki. In Milki anak is Libi. In Libi anak is Matat. In Matat anak is Ili. Ginya madin Ili anak kawas Hosi. To fag is Hosi kasta fangayofan in Hisos wa ama.
42004001	Gis nanya ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawan Hisos fangayofan sadi wak dahonya, hanggan is Hisos nwali ya gis safa Hordan. Ka Maliyaw fag Falad nataban in Hisos has basad fakahyabogan.
42004002	Is Hisos no sinya wan, is Fandaya nasolay igfaloksowan hanya ofat ik safolok sirang. Is Hisos idwa ha nahwan hanon kandogay inya, yakanga kalonos wa dahol dahol.
42004003	Ginyas Fandayag lwang han Hisos, Haw non Diyos wa nga Anak, haw fag lwang has nwa fag bato, Fag imbali tinapay.
42004004	Dapat is Hisos nasagot hanya, Insorat kitay, Bohondi ka odi fanganon kagfaboyag manga taw.
42004005	Ginyas Fandaya nataban in Hisos has abwat, sas fakabantayan, nafalag hanya, sadi wa ginan, ka manga gorangon sakop fagayo fagayo sadik dahonya baba daga.
42004006	Ginyas Fandayag lwang han Hisos, Haw no ha ngangkok manimba, ho domisag ha hyamo to fag manga gorangon sakop, it manga kangayanan hanggan kafiyan fagayo, maskin to fagayo indisag wa hangko a, kati ho domisag wan nyawa faktaw kangko fakasayaon disagan.
42004008	Is Hisos nasagot, nalwang, Insorat kitay, Fag is Diyos kagfon hyamo kam fagsimbaon. Fag hanya lamang kam fakatanogon.
42004009	Ginya madis Fandaya nataban ya in Hisos has baba atop Fanimbaan-Dahol sas Hirosalim, iglwang han Hisos, Haw non Diyos wa nga Anak, fadagdagan hyamo gistay is baba atop, ham daga is baba daga,
42004010	maskin insorat kitay, Hanya tomogon it manga anghil kitay, ta fag omano hyamo,
42004011	insorat yadi kitay, Ta somambot di hyamo kaarakitay im bitis idwam-iktan has bato.
42004012	Dapat is Hisos nasagot, Ka Kasoratan iglwang, Haw fag idwag tikis igsolay kagfon hyamo, hyamo Diyos.
42004013	Is Fandaya nontabo wagsolay igfaloksowan in Hisos git manga halimbawan fagayo, naobon ya nga wan Hisos a, igfanaya nangos no ginahin fag masohod aban no somolay ya hanya.
42004014	Is Hisos infwali ya has sakop Galiliya a, in Diyos Maliyaw fag Falad karigonan sawa hanya. In Hisos manga toltol hanggan ibolon indahit wan sas ligongan.
42004015	Is Hisos nafaadal has taw sasta manga basad fanimbaan. Fagayo fag manga taw nafasayagdog hanya.
42004016	Ginyas Hisos nwali has banwa Nasarit hat nakadaholan fag banwa. Is Hisos nasakbaw has basad fanimbaan sas Sirang Kafahowayan kito kat ogali nogbanwan. Is Hisos nalindog kaarakitay bomasa gis Kasoratan.
42004017	Ta nafagamit hanya in Isayas, in Diyos fangampang kasoratan malohotan. Is Hisos naladlad ka kasoratan kansorat kito, ginya nabasa wan,
42004018	Kati in Diyos Maliyaw fag Falad sawangko Maskin hanya nafili wangko kaarakitay ho manoltol ka Fiya fag Barita has manga myabog. Hanya nasogo angko kaarakitay igfadog hasta manga napilit nataban kitay, ta malfas ya, Fadog yadi has manga bota kitay, ista manga mata imfoga ya, Kaarakitay fomalfas kasta fagfahoriyon.
42004019	Fadog yadi has taw kitay, kati fag fangaraw kagfon intam falag it kahowayan has taw.
42004020	Is Hisos nalohot ya ngawan ka Kasoratan, nafwali ya hasag bahala, ginya madis Hisos intokaw ya. Fagayo ka sas basad fanimbaan indolaw wagdog, ta nabantay in Hisos.
42004021	Ginya madis Hisos igfwayong has taw, Ka hayo donggon gis Kasoratan in-anod wa kati.
42004022	Fagayo nafasayagdog hanya a, tandolaw wa dahol kawa kafiyaon maskin nogtoltol. Ta garintawan, Bohonwa awkin in Hosi anak to?
42004023	Yakangas Hisos iglwang, Ham ngandayo somokfon to fag fwayongon, Haw kagbolong has taw, fag im sadili yap im fagbolongon. Ham lomwang yadi hangko, Ibolonan yadistay sam sadili banwanan kito ka hyami donggon kam naibolon sas banwa Kapirnaom.
42004024	Is Hisos igfadagos yapdig fwayong kitay, Hogfwayong ha hayo kitay orongan wan, idwa ha akwa in Diyos fangampang kabantog sat sadili banwanan.
42004025	Dapat hogfwayong hayo kitay, hyabi hyabi, san Iliyas fag kasohodan, nodwa nahwayan tolok fangaraw hagboknga, yakanga malonos wa dahol sadi wak dahonya banwanan, gis nanya, bonwa bohag, aywan ka manga ina balo sas Israil.
42004026	Dapat ay, is Diyos idwa nafalahaw in Iliyas has ina balo sas Israil, dapat ha sadik ina balo sas Saripta, sakop Sidon.
42004027	San Ilisiyo man fag kasohodan, no kitay di, kaaywanon fag manga taw ka ha sagit kitong sas banwanan manga Israil, dapat idwa hanfiya ngadi sadi. Kan Diyos nafafiya is Naaman lamang, gis sakop Siriya.
42004028	Ta no nadog in Hisos manga hampang, fagayo ka sas basad fanimbaan kaisog wa dahol.
42004029	Ta nanhalindogan, natawid marigon in Hisos boknga takyay ginya nataban hanya has sokayan banwa has bohid has baba dalifi kaarakitay ta fomolid hanya ha basad gobang.
42004030	Dapat ay, is Hisos nalahaw lamang hasta fagbokngan a, nwali wan.
42004031	Ginya madis Hisos hawas lwad has banwa Kapirnaom, sakop Galiliya. Sas Sirang Kafahowayan, is Hisos igfaadal has manga taw sinya.
42004032	Tantaka wagdog is Hisos nogfaadal is taw maskin kitos ha kangayanan no kampang, idwag hono.
42004033	Sinyas basad fanimbaan, ha sadik ama, labang wa kagfahoriyan hanya, igtawag marigon kitay,
42004034	Yabay, haw Hisos taga Nasarit, kana haw nogmawat hyami. Haw awkin hastay kaarakitay domaog wa hyami? Ho fadi wadtwa no fakta haw. Haw ka Maliyaw kanbangkad gin Diyos.
42004035	Dapat is Hisos nangabaya ka labang, nalwang, Ha hawa gawang gawang. Haw fag galin wa gis nyamo fag taw. Ginya madi, sasta faglagan fagayo, ka labang nafahakfo wa dagos ka ama, ginya madi nalin lamang, idwa nafabaran ka ama.
42004036	Fagayo fag manga taw intaka wan, ta nangarintawan ha sadi ha sadi kitay, Kana ti fag manga hampang? Ha kangayanan, marigon ya ngadi, nogfasognod ka manga labang, ta katanog yadi wa galin.
42004037	Ka barita kawan Hisos manga ibolon indahit ha sadik dahonya sinya fag manga banwanan.
42004038	Is Hisos nalahaw wa gis fanimbaan, nasakbaw han Simon balay. Gis nanya in Simon nogang ina ha sagit, kagnaw wa dahol dahol, yakanga tagfaaronganon han Hisos kitay, Haw nangos fafiyaan yap hanya.
42004039	Is Hisos nalindog sas ina dayo igyanan a, nasogo kitay ka hagnaw fag galin wa gi hanya. Ka ina infiya wan, dagos wanbangon, ogali man di, nanogbong was taw.
42004040	Araw, myanit no kasangday wan, ista manga kahilala nataban han Hisos fagayo fagayo ka ha manga sagit, bokod bokod. Is Hisos nafwalid it gamat ha sadi ha sadi, hanggan nafafiya fagayo.
42004041	Manga labang nalin wa gis aywan fag manga taw, igsohodan wagharokyawan kitay, Haw in Diyos wa Anak. Dapat is Hisos nangabaya ka manga labang, idwa nafaawang maskin ka manga labang kilala wa kitay is Hisos wa kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi.
42004042	Ginya madi, no bago marom, is Hisos nabisok has talon. Ka manga taw galingawan in Hisos. Ta no nalag ya nga hanya, taglwang, Ha hayap iglahaw gistay.
42004043	Dapat is Hisos iglwang has taw, Ho fag mamaadal yapdi has iba fag manga banwanan ka Fiya fag Barita han Diyos sakop baliwa. Maskin nga is Diyos nasogo angko hastay, tonya wa kangko bato ibolonon.
42004044	Ginyas Hisos igtoltol yapdi sas manga fanimbaan Hodyo sas sakop Hodiya.
42005001	Aban, kawa manga taw kaaywanon kasayag talinga in Diyos hampang, ta tifonan tifonan ya san Hisos akbang. Is Hisos malindogan sas akbang linaw Ginisarit.
42005002	Ginyas Hisos nalag dowak baloto sas bahalan linaw. Ka mangag fon baloto, manga fangoyang fag manga taw, indokson wan git manga basad baloto, gogas wat manga sarap.
42005003	Yakangas Hisos nasakbaw has basad baloto sadi a, nalwang han Simon, kagfon tonya fag baloto, No fiya di, ha faosonan yap ogbot gis bahalan im baloto. Ginya madis Hisos matokawan sas basad baloto a, igfaadal ka manga taw sas baba bintalan.
42005004	Araw, is Hisos nontabo wagfaadal has manga taw, nalwang han Simon, Ham fag hawas fagbokngan linaw. Ham fadagdagan hayo manga sarap ha basad linaw kaarakitay omiktan oyang.
42005005	Is Simon nasagot kitay, Haw kagfaadal, sadi wak yabi hanggan wa kayawa midwa ha naiktan, minyaya wan. Dapat kawa haw nalwang fag fadagdag ka manga sarap, ho fadagdag ngay.
42005006	Ginya ta nafaanod odi ngay, ta nafadagdag it manga sarap. Nyawa kitonya, kaaywanon wa fag manga oyang ista iktan araw, madala wamragyang kasta manga sarap it kaaywanan it iktan.
42005007	Yakanga ta nafaaman ha sadik baloto kaarakitay igfatogbong it manga ofod. Ginya ka sadik baloto nagobok wan da Simon. Ta nafahapno wa oyang fagayo dowak baloto, madala wamlogom ha daga danom.
42005008	Is Simon Pidro no nalag kitay aywan it iktan, nanlibabaan san Hisos atobangan a, nalwang, Angko Fon, ha fag ayayo yap gingko, maskin dwat angko manga ogali.
42005009	Is Pidro hanggan it manga ofod indolaw wan kawat iktan oyang kaaywanan wan.
42005010	Hanggan in Simon manga ofod sa sadik baloto, da Santyago da Hwan, in Sibidiyo manga anak, tandolaw yadi wan. Ginyas Hisos iglwang han Simon, Haw fag idwa kadala, gis kati ginan taw man kam iktanon aban.
42005011	Ginya madi kasta manga baloto nondagsa wan, da Pidro naobon wat manga akwa fagayo a, natahin wan Hisos.
42005012	Ginya madis Hisos no sawa sadik banwa, ha sadik ama ha sagit kitong, nakfos wa sadik habilogan, naakbang han Hisos. Ka ha kitong no nalag in Hisos, nanlibabaan a, nafaaronganon hanya, iglwang, Ama, haw no kasaya di, haw fadi wad somyagan igfafiya angko sagit.
42005013	Ginyas Hisos natawid hanya, iglwang, Ho kasaya ngay, haw fag imfiya wan. Ginya madit kitong dagos wanfiya.
42005014	Yakangas Hisos natogon hanya kitay, Hawag fwayong nyawa hada fag manga taw, dapat fag ha yap has fagalan-han-Diyos, fabantayan hanya im habilogan. Ginya madi ha disagan kan Mwisis natogon bato disagon bilang faorongan has taw kitay haw infiya wan.
42005015	Yatokitay, indahit di ngap has manga taw kawan Hisos naibolon. Yakanga ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw inbarangkadan di ngap han Hisos kaarakitay tomalinga hanya, hanggan igfafiya ista manga sagit.
42005016	Dapat ay, is Hisos hawas ayayo gista manga banwanan kaarakitay mandarangin sinya.
42005017	Dapat gis nanya fag kasohodan is Hisos nogfaadal, ha akwa manga Farisiyo hanggan ka mangag faadal in Mwisis manga togon gis fagayo fag banwa, sakop Galiliya hanggan sakop Hodiya hanggan gis Hirosalim, ta matokawan yadi sinya. In Diyos kadonongan sawan Hisos kaarakitay igfafiya ka manga ha sagit.
42005018	Yabay, gis nanya ha manga taw kadasog, gosong sat baba sagmak, sadik taw kadwa syagan kimot. No kitay di, tagpilit wagfasakbaw nangos hanya has basad balay kaarakitay ta fomwalid ka ha sagit han Hisos akbang.
42005019	Dapat ay, tadwa twag fasakbaw hanya, kawa sawas fakaaywanan fag manga taw, yakanga ta hawas baba balay. Ta nalosbong ka atop a, natonton han Hisos akbang, ka ha sagit sat baba sagmak.
42005020	Is Hisos no nalag kitay tagsyag marigon ha hanya, nafwayong has ama kadwa syagan kimot, Ama, hogfaliyam im manga naogali dwat.
42005021	Ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan ka manga Farisiyo nangarisipan kitay, Fakta tonya ka kampang igsway in Diyos? Bohonwa awkin is Diyos lamang ka ha kangayanan igfaliyam manga ogali dwat?
42005022	Dapat is Hisos nasarom ista fagisipon, yakanga nalwang has taw kiti, Kana mayon ham no nangarisipan kitonya?
42005023	Sida ka malpos fwayongon, ngatay, Im manga naogali dwat fag imliyam wan, ngatay Ha fag kabangon, haw fag lomahaw wan?
42005024	Dapat ho falag ha hayo kitay, aho Kanbali Taw, ha kangayanan igfaliyam ista manga ogali dwat istay sas baba daga. Ginyas Hisos nafwayong has idwa syagan kimot Aho wa kaglwang kitay, Haw fag kabangon wan, diyan wam sagmak, nyawa ha mwali wa kati.
42005025	Ka ama dagos wa nalindog sas faglagan manga taw, naanggong wat sagmak, nwali wa a, igfasayagdog ya ngadi han Diyos.
42005026	Ka manga taw indolaw wa dahol iglag, ta nataka wan, nafasaya ya ngadig dog in Diyos, taglwang, Madolaw wa dahol dahol kantam lagan kati.
42005027	Ginya madi araw, is Hisos nadokson wan gis basad balay, inlahaw wan, nalag sadik ama kagsohot bohis Roma, it ngayan is Libi, matokawan sas fanohotan bohis. Is Hisos iglwang hanya, Ha tahinan wangko.
42005028	Is Libi dagos wanlindog, naobon wat manga sangkap fagayo fagayo a, natahin wa hanya.
42005029	Ginya madis Libi nasyahod it manga fanganon aywan sat balay kawas Hisos nondasog. Manga fanohot bohis Roma aywan, hanggan ka iba taw sinya yadi igsayowan kwan handa Hisos.
42005030	Ka manga Farisiyo hanggan kat manga ofod kagfaadal Batasan Hodyo, gidginasan wa gidginasan wan. Taglwang han Hisos manga katogbong, Kana ham no kwan, manga ginom, igsayowan has manga fanohot bohis hanggan has manga taw ka ha ogali dwat?
42005031	Is Hisos nasagot has taw, Ka manga ha sagit ka kasaya has famolongan, no kadidwa ha manga sagit idwa kasaya hanya.
42005032	Maskin honbangkad hastay, kangko fagsayahon, bohonwa ka gayfan kitay it manga ogali fiya, dapat ka manga taw ka ha ogali dwat kangko fagsayahon kaarakitay ta somoyo wan.
42005033	Ginya tibag lwang han Hisos kitay, In Hwan manga katogbong fagabadwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin mahogod. Kitonya yadi ka manga Farisiyo katogbong ogali. Bati im manga katogbong kwan di hanon fagaba, hanggan ginom.
42005034	Is Hisos nasagot is taw, Ham awkin idwag fahwan hanon hasagfasakop hasta fangsawan fatalagaan fanganon, kagbabay no gofod yapdis taw?
42005035	Dapat ay, aban, ha gomamat tomaban kagbabay, gis nanya ta bago didwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin mahogod.
42005036	Ginyas Hisos nafahalimbawa yadi kitay, Idwa ha romagyang rotay bago, falonob has daanon. No omibolon kitonya imdwat wa ka rotay bago, hanggan ka lonob bago idwa yadi maangay has rotay daanon.
42005037	Idwa yadi ha taw somiblag alak bago has basad sohadan anit daanon. No omibolon kitonya ka sohadan anit imbosni wan, ka alak im-od-olanan lamang, ka sohadan anit imdwat yadi wan.
42005038	Yatokitay, tagsiblag bago fag alak has bago fag sohadan anit.
42005039	Nyawa faktaw no gayfan yapdi kitay ka gona fag alak ka fiya kainom, idya kasaya manginom ka bago, maskin iglwang ka gona fag alak fiya wan.
42006001	Sadi ginan, sas Sirang Kafahowayan, da Hisos igdalan sasta namay ha tirigo. In Hisos manga katogbong nabol manga haway tirigo sayok, ginya no naligis basad dalohap, ta nahwan wan.
42006002	Tibak Farisiyo nangabaya has taw, taglwang, Kana ham no gibolon kadwa maangay sas Batasan Hodyo maskin sawas Sirang Kafahowayan?
42006003	Is Hisos nasagot has taw, nalwang, Ham awkin idwa nabasa in Dabid naibolon hyabi no kalonos, hanggan wat manga ofod kalonos yadi?
42006004	Is Dabid nasakbaw han Diyos basad balay a, nabol ka tinapay kandisag han Diyos, ginya madi nahwan wan. Is Dabid nadisag ya ngadi hat manga ofod. Ka Batasan Hodyo iglwang kitay ka manga fagalan-han-Diyos lamang ka fiya homwan tonya fag tinapay.
42006005	Ginyas Hisos nalwang yadi kitay, Aho, Kanbali Taw, kagbahala has Sirang Kafahowayan.
42006006	Ginya, aban sa sadi yak Sirang Kafahowayan, is Hisos igsakbaw ya has basad fanimbaan a, igfaadal has taw. Sinya ha sadik ama it gamat balis sihon inrifis wan.
42006007	Ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan ka manga Farisiyo igbantay ya ngay in Hisos, ngatay fafiya ya nga araw sas basad Sirang Kafahowayan, maskin tagsayak it fabangdanan hanya.
42006008	Dapat is Hisos fadi wad twa ista manga fagisipon, yakanga hanya nafwayong has ama kanrifis it gamat, Ha fag hastay is fagonan. Ka ama naakbang han Hisos, nalindog ya ngadi sasta fagonan.
42006009	Is Hisos nafwayong has fakaaywanan kiti, Ho mangintaw hayo, sida ka maangay has Batasan Hodyo, ham gayfan, ngatay ka gibolon fiya, ngatay ka gibolon dwat sas Sirang Kafahowayan? Ngatay igbawi taw, ngatay igfahatay?
42006010	Is Hisos namarantayon yapdi has taw sat ligongan, bago di nahampang has ama kanrifis it gamat, nalwang, Falogdayan yap im gamat. Ka ama nafalogday ngat gamat, infiya wa dagos, ogali wan.
42006011	Ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan manga Farisiyo it mata di myasa wa bayong kawa kaisog wa dahol in Hisos. Yakanga tagtoltolan no kana kasta ibolonon hanya aban.
42006012	Ginya madi, gis nanya fag masohod, is Hisos hawas moyod kaarakitay mandarangin. Hanya nandarangin han Diyos sadi wak yabi hanggan wa kayawa.
42006013	Yakanga, no sirang wan, nafatawag it manga katogbong, ginyas Hisos nafili ka Safolo-ha-Dowa, kat nangayan it manga Fandiya-Barita.
42006014	To kat manga nafili, is Simon, kawan Hisos nangayan is Pidro, hanggan is Andris it fadwasay, da Santyago, da Hwan, da Filipi, da Bartolomi,
42006015	da Matiyo, da Tomas, in Santyago yadi sangay in Alfiyo anak, ginyan Simon yadi sangay ka goyon marigon it manga kapariho Hodyo,
42006016	da Hodas in Santyago anak, hanggan da Hodas Iskariyoti ka naoyon it ofod kalaban.
42006017	Is Hisos hanggan it manga ofod haya nga was lwad baliwa, hawas basad datag. In Hisos manga katogbong fagayo sinya yadi wan. Kaaywanan wa fag manga taw inbarangkadan wan gis sakop Hodiya hanggan gis banwa Hirosalim, ka yadi gis manga banwa Tiro hanggan banwa Sidon sas bahalan dagat. Ta fagayo nagobok in Hisos kaarakitay tomalinga hanya hanggan igfafiya ista manga sagit.
42006018	Is Hisos nafafiya yadi ka ha manga labang igfahoriyan hanya.
42006019	Maskin ha karigonan gin Hisos kagfafiya has fagayo, fagayo fag manga taw gwayan wa kasaya ngadi somapkid, ta fag somapkid wan Hisos.
42006020	Is Hisos nabantay hat manga katogbong a, nalwang, Nyawa ham manga myabog, ham bomaya wan maskin in Diyos sakop hayo wan.
42006021	Nyawa ham kalonos kati, ham bomaya wan maskin ham mapsog aban. Nyawa ham ha karongkotan kati, ham bomaya wan, maskin ham ha kasolongan aban.
42006022	Manga taw no kadwat iglag hayo, kawa ham galwasi angko, Kanbali Taw, ta nogsogo hayo, ta nogyod hayo, nyawa taglingo wa hayo manga ngayan, ham bomaya wan.
42006023	Nyawa hamlag kitonya, ham fag masolong wa dahol dahol, fag lokso ya ngadi, maskin dahol aban hayo tanggapon fasalamat san Diyos banwanan sam tongod. Ista manga hafofowan magorang naibolon yadi kitonya han Diyos manga fangampang hyabi.
42006024	Dapat ay, isyay wan, ka hayo lagon aban, ham ka manga maakwa, maskin ham nadog wa hayo kafiyan kati.
42006025	Isyay wa ka ham ka fagaba wa mahapsogan kati, Aban ham imlonos wan. Isyay wan aban, ka ham, ka fagaba wa mahasayan, Aban ham imhori wan, mangodgorawan ya ngadi.
42006026	Isyay wan no aba fagayo fag manga taw igfasayagdog hayo, maskin ista manga hafofowan magorang igfasayagdog yadi kitonya has manga bohagon fag fangampang hyabi.
42006027	Dapat, ham ka mangag talinga angko, hogfwayong ha hayo kitay, ham fakaawa hayo manga kaaway. Ham fag fiya has manga taw ka kadwat iglag hayo.
42006028	Ham fag kampang mahoway has mangag fadwat igdog hayo. Ham fag darangin yadi kawa has mangag fahoriyan hayo.
42006029	No hagtofa hayo marigon sas faringfing, fag kaman balis baliw. Ta nogbol hayo balokas ka aba-aba, disagan yadi wa ka agod kat famabasad.
42006030	Ham disagan has fagayo kagsagad gi hayo, no nabol hayo manga botang, ham hawag bawi.
42006031	Fag maangay hayo manga ogali has taw, no kinday hayo fakasayaon nangos taw no gogali ha hayo, ham fag kitonya yadi has taw.
42006032	Ham idwa fiya man has taw hayo ogali, no ka lamang kaawa hayo ka hayo fakaawaon. Nyawa ka ha manga ogali dwat fadi wad twa kaawa ka manga kaawa has taw.
42006033	Ham idwa fiya man has taw hayo ogali no ka lamang syagan igtogbong hayo ka hayo fagtogbongon. Nyawa ka ha manga ogali dwat fadi wad tomogbong has syagan igtogbong hanya.
42006034	Ham idwa fiya man has taw hayo ogali no hayo fagfaoyamon ka lamang syagan igbayad. Nyawa ka ha manga ogali dwat igfaodoyaman ha sadi ha sadi, ta no twa di kitay bomayad di aban.
42006035	Yatokitay, ham ngap fag kaawa hayo manga kaaway, fag falag has fiya. Ham fag faoyam has taw nyawa ham idwa ha faglagon ista bato bayadon.
