42016030	Ka ama maakwa iglwang ya, Hyami ama Abraham, korang di tonya, dapat sadik natay inboyag ya no somabang has taw, yabay ta somoyo wat manga ogali dwat.
42016031	Is Abraham nasagot hanya, Ta no dayog talinga in Mwisis togon hanggan in Diyos manga fangampang nasorat, nyawa sadik taw imboyag ya, tadwa yadim tiwala.
42017001	Ginya madis Hisos nafwayong hat manga katogbong, Tam idwa syagan igbaybay kitay idwa hagfaloksowan manga taw has ogali dwat. Dapat isyay wan kagfaloksowan kitonya.
42017002	Fiya man ha hanya ta no somiyok sadik bato gilingan sat boknga liyog, ginya omokas hanya ha basad dagat kaarakitay idwag fadagos igfayayom has ogali dwat ngadi sadik anak ogbot to.
42017003	Yakanga ham fag matagahan. Kam fadwasay no ha naibolon dwat ha hyamo, haw fakabaya hanya, ginya hanya nogsoyo, haw fag faliyam wa tonya kat naibolon.
42017004	Nyawa hanggan wa balis fito ginan sadik sirang, hanggan kayabi, hanya no gibolon dwat ha hyamo, dapat fito yadi ginan no omakbang ha hyamo, igsoyo, haw fag faliyam wa tonya fagayo kat naibolon dwat.
42017005	Ka manga Fandiya-Barita igfwayong hasagfon intam, Ha farigonan hyami, hami nogsyag ha hyamo.
42017006	Kagfon intam igsagot, Ham nogsyag hangko ngadi ogbot ogbot, dahos botol mostasa ogbot, haw somyagan lomwang has nwa fag fon hayo, halimbawa, Haw fag imgoyod wan gi basad daga, ha fag hawas basad dagat nomtanom. Yakanga im-anod wa kam fwayong hanya.
42017007	Ginyas Hisos iglwang, Halimbawa, insadi sa hayo no ha sogowan gadado, ngatay gano topa, it sogowan no mwali gis iyab, haw awkin lomwang has sogowan, Haw fag hastay, fag haw ka kwan yap, ham gayfan?
42017008	Yatokitay, idwa awkin haw lomwang kiti, Fatalagaan yap angko yafon, ginya tobosan im rotay. Haw fag sayapdingko akbang, haw fag lag yapdingko manga fafa, manga danom, ho no kasamok yapdi. Ginya madi haw man araw ka homwan, ho nomtabo wa kwan.
42017009	It sogowan no katanog di ista sogo, fag idwa gayfan kitay it fon fagabag fasalamat hanya.
42017010	Ham fag kitonya yadi, ham nomtanog wa fagayo, fag idwag fatakagdog is taw, ham fag lwang odi kitay, Hami it manga sogowan kadwa bangan, mi katanog odi hyami bato ibolonon.
42017011	Da Hisos noglahaw yapdi has Hirosalim, nadalan has fagbokngan sakop Samariya hanggan sakop Galiliya.
42017012	Da Hisos nondasog ha sadik forowan balay, safolok taw ka ha sagit kitong natagbo hanya. Ta natorosan sas ayayo ayayo ogbot,
42017013	natawag marigon, Hisos, hyami Fon, haw fakaawa hyami nangos.
42017014	Is Hisos no nalag ka manga ha sagit kitong, nalwang has taw, Nyawa ham iglahaw wa kati, ham falagan hayo has manga fagalan-han-Diyos. Ginya madi, ta noglahaw yapdi, kasta sagit kitong infiya wa boknga dalan.
42017015	Insadi no nalag kitay hanyan fiya wa mangharaw, infwali ya han Hisos, igtawag marigon, igfasayagdog in Diyos.
42017016	Nanlohodan han Hisos atobangan a, nabaya wa dahol hanya, maskin hanya infiya wan. To fag taw kagbaya, taga Samariya.
42017017	Is Hisos iglwang, Idwa awkin safolok taw kanfiya haraw, hadawa mayon ka siyam?
42017018	Idwa awkin hanfwali igfasayagdog in Diyos no bohonwa to fag sadik ama ka bohonwa Hodyo?
42017019	Is Hisos nafwayong hasagbaya, Ha fag kabangon wan, fiya di, nyawa ha goli wa kati, kawa haw nogsyag angko, haw infiya wan.
42017020	Sadi ginan manga Farisiyo gintaw in Hisos, Ginahin fag masohod in Diyos sakop nomlag? Is Hisos nasagot kiti, In Diyos sakop fabagowanan idwa ha hoyog manga falagon madolaw.
42017021	Idwa yadi ha syagan lomwang, Lag ngay, in Diyos sakop igfabago wan ngatay istay, ngatay sinya, maskin ka orongan in Diyos sakop danwastay sas manga fangayofan taw.
42017022	Ginyas Hisos iglwang hat manga katogbong, Nomdasog gis nanya fag masohod aban, no kitay di, ham gwayan wa kasaya lomag angko, Aho Kanbali Taw, igbahala ngadi sadik sirang, dapat ham idyapdi lomag gis nanya.
42017023	No ha taw igfasayagdog hayo kitay, Aho Kanbali taw sinya wan, ngatay istay wan, ham fag idwa hanya kaarakitay ham bomantay.
42017024	Maskin gis nanya fag sirang kamtohoyan aban, aho, Kanbali Taw, imdasog bilang wa hilat igyawa sas banwa sam tongod, gim lwad has bohid.
42017025	Dapat ka fiya, aho, Kanbali Taw, aho fag omagwanta yapdi aywan fag manga mahori hanggan ka kati fag manga taw domayo yadingko.
42017026	Aho Kanbali Taw, no kadasog aban, kitos gonaw hyabi san Nowi fag kasohodan.
42017027	Gis nanya hyabi, ka daga nodyan gonaw, manga taw kwan hanon, manga ginom, mangag babay, manga gindogan, mangag tomboy it anak has anahan has dayaga, hanggan was Nowi insahay hat basad sahayan baloto. Sadi wa ginan ka gonaw indasog a, tanlogom wa fagayo.
42017028	Kitonya yadi ista manga ogali san Lot fag kasohodan, ka manga taw kwan hanon, manga ginom, tibag balidya, tibag sali, mangag tanom, manga kalig balay.
42017029	Dapat ay, is Lot no nalagyo gis Sodoma, ha afoy hanggan asopri bilang wa mwayan gis tongod, tansonog wa a, inyagaw wa fagayo.
42017030	Aho Kanbali Taw no kabangkad aban, kitonya yadi kamlag, ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw idwa matalagaan.
42017031	Gis nanya fag sirang no ha taw sas sokayan balay, fag idwag sakbaw kaarakitay bomol yapdit manga botang git basad balay. Hanggan ka sas iyab fag fawa golingan has manga bagay sat ginanan.
42017032	Ham fag tohod in Lot babay nadalanan.
42017033	Nyawa faktaw not sadili odi haboyagan it fagisipon kaarakitay fadogay tonya, imliyam di. Dapat kadwa kwangit it haboyagan kawa hangko, it haboyagan domogay hanggan aban aban.
42017034	Hogfwayong hayo kitay ha dowak taw matoyogan sa sadik igyanan gis nanya fag yabi aban, insadi im-anggong wan, insadi imgoyan di.
42017035	Ha dowak ina aban igtarogbongan iglobok gis nanya fag sirang, insadi im-anggong wan, insadi imgoyan di.
42017036	Ha dowak ama gibolon sas iyab insadi im-anggong wan, insadi imgoyan di.
42017037	In Hisos manga katogbong naintaw, Haw kagfon hyami, siday tonya aban? Is Hisos nasagot, nafalimbay kiti, No siday ham iglag ka manga boyaw hagang igtifonan, ya sinya wa ka habilogan natay.
42018001	Ginya madis Hisos igfwayong has taw sadik halimbawa, kaarakitay igfaadal has taw kitay, ta fag fagabag darangin, fag idwa kalombay ista manga fangayofan.
42018002	Is Hisos iglwang, Sa sadik banwa ha sadik fangabaya kadwa kadala in Diyos, idwa yadi magalang has taw.
42018003	Ha akwa yadi sadik ina balo sinya fag banwa ka fagabag syag has fangabaya. Ka ina fagabag sagad kitay, Togbongan angko, fatabo hyami hampangan maskin ha akwa igfahoriyan angko.
42018004	No kayodak swali ka fangabaya kafang yapdig togbong ka ina balo. Dapat no dogay, it fangayofan iglwang, Nyawa ahodwa kadala in Diyos, idwa yadi gomalang nyawa hada fag taw,
42018005	ho tomogbong fafiyan to fag ina fakahoriyon, maskin hanya fagaba waglibang angko, homyaya waglag hanya nogswaliyan wagswaliyan nogsyag hangko.
42018006	Kagfon intam iglwang, Yabay, ham nadog ka dwat fag fangabaya fwayong.
42018007	Dapat is Diyos idwa kafang igfafiyan no ha taw igfahoriyan it manga nafili kagsagad togbong gi hanya yabi sirang. Hanya dogay aw bago digtogbong, ham gayfan?
42018008	Yatokitay hogfwayong hayo, is Diyos dagos wagfafiyan ista fakahoriyon. Dapat ay, aho Kanbali Taw nombangkad hastay is baba daga, aho awkin ha lagon manga taw igsyag hangko, ham gayfan?
42018009	Is Hisos igfwayong to sadi yak halimbawa, igfatangon has manga taw kagfadaholon it sadili, kagsyag hat sadili kafiyan, dapat igyod ka tiba taw.
42018010	Is Hisos iglwang, Ha dowak ama, insadi Farisiyo, insadi fanohot bohis Roma, hawas Fanimbaan-Dahol kaarakitay mandarangin.
42018011	Ka Farisiyo nalindog a, nogdarangin bilang odi ginas kiti, Diyos, hogbaya wa hyamo kitay ahodwa kito ka tiba taw ka mangag nahaw, mangag daya, mangag fabayowan, hodwa yadi kito kas nwa fag fanohot bohis.
42018012	Dowa ginan sadik simba ahodwa kwan hanon kaarakitay igdarangin. Hogdisag yadi angko fasafolo gingko lagan fagayo.
42018013	Dapat ay, ka fanohot bohis Roma nalindog sas bahalan bahalan Fanimbaan-Dahol, idwa yadig bantay has tongod, igfogfog it sadili dobdob, maskin karongkot it fangayofan. Ginyag lwang, Diyos, haw fag kaawangko, ho sadik taw ha ogali dwat.
42018014	Hogfwayong hayo kitay hanya fag taw no nwali hat balay, it fangayofan inbali fiya san Diyos faglagan, dapat ka sadi idwan. Maskin nyawa faktaw kagfaabwaton it sadili, is Diyos igfalibaba di hanya, dapat kagfalibaba it sadili, is Diyos igfaabwat hanya.
42018015	Tiba taw nadiya han Hisos ista manga anak garogbot kaarakitay is Hisos tomawid it manga anak. In Hisos manga katogbong, no nalag kasta taban manga anak garogbot, ta nangabaya was taw.
42018016	Dapat is Hisos nafaakbang it manga katogbong, iglwang, Ham hawa kabaya ka manga anak no gakbang angko, fiya di. Ham fag idwag bando tonya, maskin ka manga ha fangayofan kitos anak ka omafo in Diyos sakop.
42018017	Ham fag tohod kitay nyawa faktaw kat fangayofan kadwa kitos anak ogbot nogfasakop han Diyos, tonya fag taw idwam aktom san Diyos sakop.
42018018	Ginya sadik fagtahinan Hodyo gintaw in Hisos, kiti, Haw kagfaadal kafiyaon, kana ara angko bato ibolonon kaarakitay ho omafo haboyagan kadwa ha katabowanan?
42018019	Is Hisos naintaw hanya, Kana haw nogngayan angko kafiyaon? Is Diyos lamang ka kafiyaon.
42018020	Haw fadi wadtwa ka manga Batasan Hodyo kitay, Haw fag idwag fabayowan, haw fag idwag fahatay taw, haw fag idwag nahaw, haw fag idwag bangdan is taw, haw fag idwag falamang im ama hanggan im ina.
42018021	Ka ama nasagot in Hisos, No kitay di, gingko yapdi ogbot ginan, ho katanog wa tonya fagayo.
42018022	Is Hisos no nadog it sagot, hanyag lwang, Dapat haw ha korang yapdi sadik fakatwawon. Haw fag fasali im manga botang fagayo, ginya fahafodan has manga myabog it manga sali. Yabay no kitonya, haw ha akwa wa kaakwaan san Diyos banwanan sam tongod. Ginya madi ha fag hayastay, tahinan wangko.
42018023	Dapat ay ka ama inrongkot no nadog kitonya maskin hanya maakwa wa dahol a, nahwangit it kaakwaan.
42018024	Is Hisos nogbantay yapdi hanya, iglwang kitay, Ka maakwa fag manga taw mahorig fasakop han Diyos.
42018025	Malpos man ka hayopan kamilyo nogdalan has basad toho dagom has taw maakwa nogfasakop han Diyos.
42018026	Ka manga nadog is Hisos nogfalimbay kitonya naintaw, No kitonya mangharaw, fakta fag manga taw kambawi?
42018027	Is Hisos nasagot is taw, Is Diyos syagan gibolon kagsagaya fagsyaganon taw.
42018028	Ginyas Pidro iglwang han Hisos, Lag nga hami, mi naobon hyami manga banwanan hanggan igtahin wa hyamo.
42018029	Ginyas Hisos nafwayong has taw, Hogfwayong ha hayo, bonwa bohag, nyawa faktaw ka gobon yap it balay, ngatay it babay, ngatay it manga fadwasay, ngatay it manga magorang, ngatay it manga anak maskin galwasi in Diyos sakop,
42018030	hanya tomanggap yadi aywan ginan iglabi man kat naobon ka kati fag masohod, ginya madi, gis nanya fag masohod aban nomdasog, ha akwa yadi haboyagan kadwa ha katabowanan.
42018031	Is Hisos nafasaman ka Safolo-ha-Dowa gis fakaaywanan fag manga taw, ginyag lwang has taw, Yabay, tam hawam bohid has Hirosalim kati. Fagayo kan Diyos manga fangampang nasorat hyabi, kawa hangko, aho Kanbali Taw, im-anod wa sinya.
42018032	Ta fabahala angko has manga Hintil. Ka manga Hintil yomod angko, mahaya yadi it ibolonon hangko aban, ta tomofay ya ngadingko.
42018033	Ta bomakbak angko, fahatay yadi, dapat ay, homboyag ya sas fatolo fag sirang.
42018034	Dapat in Hisos manga katogbong idwa natwagdog it donggon. Idyan angay kitay ta fag tomwa yapdi, tadwa nasalom no kana tonya kan Hisos nafwayong.
42018035	Da Hisos no kaakbang has banwa Hiriko, sinya ha sadik ama bota matokawan sas bilog dalan, igsagad igsagad odi.
42018036	Ka ama bota no nadog kitay kaaywanon fag manga taw igdalan sat akbang, naintaw no kana ka sinya.
42018037	Taglwang hanya kitay, is Hisos, taga Nasarit, igdalan wan.
42018038	Ginya madi yabay, ka ama bota igtawag marigon, iglwang, Hisos, in Dabid hasokfonan anak, haw fakaawa wangko.
42018039	Ka manga taw balis fagonan fakaaywanan nangabaya hanya, idwag faawang nangos, dapat ka ama bota kadahol di ngap nogtawag, igsakitan wan, In Dabid hasokfonan, haw fakaawa wangko.
42018040	Yakangas Hisos intorosan sinya, ginya nafasognod has taw, iglwang, Tabanan hastay tonya fag ama. No naakbang, is Hisos gintaw hanya,
42018041	Kana kam fakasayaon angko togbongon ha hyamo? Hanyag lwang, Angko Fon, angko mata fag imfoga ya nangos.
42018042	Is Hisos nafwayong hanya, Im mata fag imfoga ya kati. Haw infiya wan maskin haw igsyag wa hangko.
42018043	Gis nanya yadi dagos wanfiyat mata. Yakanga ka amag tahin wan Hisos, igbaya han Diyos. Manga taw no nalag kitay infoga it mata, fagayo nafasayagdog in Diyos.
42019001	Ginya da Hisos igdalan has banwa Hiriko.
42019002	Ha akwa sinya fag banwa sadik maakwa fag fagtahinan fanohot bohis Roma, kawas Sakiyo.
42019003	Hanya gwayan wa kasaya lomag no faktas Hisos. Dapat, maskin hanya sadik ama libaba libaba odi, aywan fag taw igfarom hanya, hanyadwag lag in Hisos.
42019004	Yakanga hanya nadalandan hasta fagonan madali madali a, nafanyak has tongod fon hayo sikomoro kaarakitay lomag in Hisos, ta nogdalan sinya.
42019005	Is Hisos nondasog sinya sat masohod, natangdan has tongod a, iglwang han Sakiyo, Sakiyo, kalibang, haw fag dokson gis nyamo, maskin kati aho fag migya wa ham balay.
42019006	Yakangas Sakiyo madali odin dokson gis tongod sikomoro, igbaya wa dahol dahol igtaban in Hisos.
42019007	Fagayo ka nalag kitay is Hisos igtahin in Sakiyo, ta gidginasan gidginasan wan, taglwang, Is Hisos igtahin ha sadik taw ha ogali dwat, migya hat balay.
42019008	Ginya madi araw, is Sakiyo nafwayong hasagfon intam kiti, Angko Fon, hogfabokngan wan kangko kaakwaan. Kati yabay ho domisag wa has manga myabog it baliw. Hanggan aho no ha nadaya nyawa faktaw, no sadi kangko nadaya hanya, ho domogang ya tolo ya, yabay inbali ofat kangko fafwaliyon hanya.
42019009	Is Hisos iglwang han Sakiyo, Kati ka Famawi ibolon igsakop wa hastay fag talanahan kawas Sakiyo in Abraham yadi hasokfonan.
42019010	Maskin Aho, Kanbali Taw inbangkad hastay, kaarakitay ho somayak, bomawi ya ka mangan liyam.
42019011	Manga taw no matalingan yapdin Hisos, is Hisos dagos wagtoltol sadi yak halimbawa. Is Hisos natoltol to fag halimbawa maskin hanya kadasog wa has banwa Hirosalim, hanggan manga taw gasolop kitay, ngandayo is Hisos dagos wa farigon in Diyos sakop sinya.
42019012	Yakangas Hisos igtoltol kiti, Ha sadik ama it manga hafofowan ha kangayanan abwat, iglahaw has ayayo fag banwanan kaarakitay ta fabali hanya gorangon. Ginya aban, nombali wa gorangon, goli ya.
42019013	To fag ama, nodyan ginan git balay, nafatawag it manga sogowan safolo a, nafahafod myasa sadik daan piso. Nafwayong hat manga sogowan, No baliday hodya mwali, to fag kwarta ngatay ham fag sali, ginyag fasali ya domwag kaarakitay lomag tobo.
42019014	Dapat kat manga sakop, ka bohonwat sogowan, ka myasa wa ginya, kadwat wa dahol iglag ka kabali ista gorangon. Yakanga hanya nonlahaw wan, ta nafasonson it manga sogowan hasagbahala kaarakitay lomwang, Mi dayo kitay to fag taw fag idwam bali hyami gorangon.
42019015	Ginya madi aban, hanya nonbali wa gorangon, nwali ya ngawat balay, nafatawag ya nga kat manga sogowan it nagdisagan manga kwarta kaarakitay tomwa no dahoday fagayo kasta nafatobo.
42019016	Ka bago bago fag sogowan naakbang has gorangon, nalwang, Angko fon, hyamo nafaano angko kwarta sadik daan piso, ho nafatobo safolok daan.
42019017	Ka gorangon nasagot, Yabay kafiyaon, haw fiya fag sogowan, kawa haw naano fiya, nyawa ogbot fag halga, kati aho fabahala hyamo ha safolok banwa.
42019018	Ginya madi kat fadowa fag sogowan naakbang yadi hanya, nalwang, Angko fon, hyamo nafaano angko kwarta sadik daan piso, ho nafatobo limak daan.
42019019	Ka gorangon iglwang ha hanya, Ho fabahala hyamo has limak banwa.
42019020	Ka sadi yak sogowan naakbang has gorangon a, nalwang, Angko fon, to kam nafaano kwarta hangko sadik daan piso. Ho nasafot sas basad taong, ho natago odi.
42019021	Hondala digfatobo maskin haw mahigpit wan nogsohot, nyawa ka bohonwa hyamo naano, haw igbol di, ha gani wan, nyawa bohonwa ka hyamo nafamgas.
42019022	Kat fon iglwang, Idwa fiya fag sogowan haw. Gim sadili bibig hampang hogfatohoyan hyamo has fadosaan. Gwadi ha mangharaw danwa twa kitay aho mahigpit, haglwang kitay ahogbol ka bohonwa angko, aho gani ka bohonwa angko nafamgas.
42019023	No kitonya, kana mayon ha nodwa nafwalid angko kwarta sas fanifonan has famotangan? Ginya ha tobo yap man araw aho nogbol ginya, aho no nwali.
42019024	Ka gorangon iglwang hat manga ofod sinya, Ham bol wa gi hanya ka kwarta sadik daan piso, disagan tonya fag sogowan ka ha safolok daan.
42019025	Taglwang, Hyami fon, gwadi ka hanya aywan man, safolok daan piso.
42019026	Ka gorangon iglwang, Hogfwayong ha hayo, fagayo ka ha nafatobo wan ha tanggapon ya domwag, dapat kangko nadisag kadwa ha nafatobo, ho ngap bomawi ya ginya.
42019027	No ka man has mangag laban angko, kagdayo angko, fag nangos bohonwa aho kasta gorangon, tabanan hastay tonya fag manga taw, fahatayan sangko faglagan.
42019028	Nontabo wagtoltol kitonya, da Hisos nadagos wa has bohid has banwa Hirosalim baliwa.
42019029	Ta no gakbang has tifonan balay sas Bitfagi hanggan Bitanya, sas Moyod Oliboan, is Hisos nafagonat manga katogbong dowa.
42019030	Is Hisos igtogon kitay, Ham fag hawas masoson fag tifonan balay. Ham araw nomdasog sinya, ham dagos lomag sadik anak habayo libaba, matarabingan, idyapdi ha taw nasahay sinya. Lohasan it tarabing a, goyodan hastay.
42019031	No ha gintaw hayo kitay, Kana ham noglohas tonya? Ham fag lwang, Kagfon intam kasayag sahay to.
42019032	Yakangan Hisos nasogo hanya wan. Ta nalag nga ka anak habayo, no kinday in Hisos fwayong.
42019033	Ta noglohas yapdi ka anak habayo tarabing, it manga fon gintaw, Kana ham noglohas tyamo?
42019034	Taglwang, Kagfon intam kasayag sahay to.
42019035	Yakanga ta nagoyod ka habayo libaba han Hisos, ginya madi ta no nasagmak wan it manga rotay aba has baba goyoy habayo, ta nafasahay in Hisos.
42019036	Is Hisos noglahaw, manga taw igladlad it manga rotay san Hisos fagonan lahawan.
42019037	Is Hisos no kaakbang has banwa Hirosalim igloslos has lwad Moyod Oliboan, kat tifonan manga katogbong fagayo fagayo igtarawagan wa kasolong iglag, igfasayagdog han Diyos kawasta lagan in Hisos manga naibolon madolaw fagayo.
42019038	Taglwang kiti, Ka Gorangon ka kadasog hastay kati, san Diyos ngayan, fag bomaya wan. Fag ha kahowayan san Diyos banwanan sam tongod, hanggan fag kafiyan kamlag sam tongod im tongod.
42019039	Dapat ay, tibak Farisiyo ka koyog has fakaaywanan iglwang han Hisos, Haw kagfaadal, haw fag kabayam manga katogbong.
42019040	Is Hisos nasagot kitay, Hogfwayong ha hayo, taw nodwa omawang, matohoyanan wan ka odi manga bato ka romokyaw mamasayagdog angko.
42019041	Is Hisos no gakbang, kabantay has banwa Hirosalim, goraw wan.
42019042	Hanyag lwang, Hirosalim, haw nangos no dandi twa kati fag manga masohod, no kana fag manga bagay kagdisag kahowayan ha hyamo. Dapat kati to fag manga bagay inharom gi hyamo.
42019043	Maskin no ginahin aba fag manga sirang, im manga kalaban somafong wa hyamo, fasafong yadi wa alad dahol dahol, ta somaklawan wa hyamo bali bali banwa.
42019044	Ta homamin wa domwat hyamo aban, hanggan im manga anak basad balay dahol, ta mamin wa fahatay. Ngadi sadik bato idwa hamgoyan kagtarongbawan ha sadi ha sadi, maskin hadwa nabati in Diyos, dayo kadasog kaarakitay bomawi hyamo.
42019045	Is Hisos nasakbaw basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol a, dagos nasogo has dayo alad ka mangag balidya.
42019046	Nalwang has taw, Insorat san Diyos kasoratan kitay, Ngayanan angko balay, balay fandaranginan, Dapat ham nafabali angko balay, oliyanan odi manga fangnahaw.
42019047	Is Hisos igfaadal sirang sirang basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol. Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan ka manga fagtahinan sas banwa Hirosalim, igsayak wa yabay no kinday no fahatay in Hisos.
42019048	Dapat tadwag lag it halimbawan kaarakitay fahatay hanya, maskin fagayo fag manga taw igtalinga wa fiya fiya is Hisos nogfaadal.
42020001	Ginya madi aban is Hisos nogfaadal yapdi hanggan igtoltol ka Fiya fag Barita has manga taw basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol, ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo hanggan manga fagtahinan sas basad banwa naakbang hanya,
42020002	taglwang han Hisos, Ha fwayongan ha hyami, kanam kangayanan haw no gibolon to fag manga bagay. Fakta ka nadisag hyamo kangayanan gibolon kitonya?
42020003	Is Hisos nasagot has taw, Ho ngap omintaw yadi hayo, ham sagotan angko.
42020004	Ginday kan-ginan in Hwan kangayanan nogfatogna manga taw, ngatay gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, ngatay gis taw?
42020005	Ta nanoltolan yapdi kiti, Tam no lomwang kitay giwam tongod, is Hisos lomwang ara hantam, no kitonya, kana mayon ham nodwa katiwalan Hwan hyabi?
42020006	Dapat tam no lomwang kitay gi odis taw, ka manga taw bomintok fahatay intam maskin ta katiwala kitay is Hwan in Diyos fangampang.
42020007	Yakanga ta nasagot in Hisos, Midwa twa no ginday in Hwan kangayanan.
42020008	Ginyas Hisos iglwang has taw, Ho balaw yadi mamwayong hayo no ginday angko kangayanan aho no gibolon to fag manga bagay.
42020009	Ginya madis Hisos igfabago igfahalimbawa ya has taw, iglwang kitay, Ha sadik taw nananom manga obas sat baba iyab, nafabahalat obasan hat manga fangano, ginya nalahaw has ayayo, dogay idya nwali.
42020010	Nondasog was famohadon, no famangtaon wan, kagfon obasan nasogo wat sogowan sadi, kaarakitay bomol ista horay hanya gis bohad obas. Dapat ay, ka manga gano obasan nabakbak di ngap kat fon sogowan, ta nafaoli wa gominan idwa ha diya.
42020011	Ginya kagfon obasan nasogo has manga gano obasan sadi yak sogowan, hanggan yadi tonya ta nabakbak, ta nafahayan ya ngadi hanya, nafaoli wa gominan, idwa ha diya.
42020012	Kagfon nasogo ya kat fatolo fag sogowan. Ta naisog di ngap hanya, hanggan wa nafabaran, ginya naokas lamang ha dayo alad.
42020013	Ginya kagfon obasan iglwang, Kinda odi angko halimbawan? Yabay, ho somogo angko fakaawaon fag anak, ngatay ta gomalang wa hanya.
42020014	Yatokitay, ka manga fangano obasan no nalag di ngap it anak, tagtoltolan kitay, To wa aba ka omafo it ama kaakwaan, kalibang, tam fahatay wa hanya, ngan aba tam wa ka omafo ka obasan.
42020015	Ginya ta nagoyod wa hanya has dayo obasan a, nafahatay wa sinya. Kana araw, ham gayfan kagfon obasan ibolonon hat manga fangano?
42020016	Kagfon hawas obasan fahatay yadi wan ka manga gano sinya, ginya faano has iba fag manga taw ka obasan. Manga taw no nadog in Hisos toltol, taglwang, Liwas, liwas, fag idwa nangos im-anod tonya.
42020017	Dapat is Hisos nabantay fiya fiya has manga taw, ginya nalwang, Tonya nodwam anod, kana arat kahologan kansorat sas Kasoratan noglwang kiti, Kasta fagdayoon fag bato, ka manga fangalig balay, Tonya di ngap kagfaganit ka balay sas basad solok.
42020018	Kamdagdag has nwas baba bato imbolang ongay, dapat ay, kamlibit sas balis daga bato, ka bato nomdagdag ha hanya, imrogrog lamang.
42020019	Ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo, hanggan manga fagtahinan fagalanhan-Diyos mabantayan madogan in Hisos natoltol halimbawa. Ta kasaya nangos gomamat hanya dagos, maskin ta nasarom kitay, kawa ngap ista manga sadili in Hisos fagfatangonon sat natoltol halimbawa, dapat ta kadala yapdi has fakaaywanan fag manga taw.
42020020	Yakanga tagbantay han Hisos fagaba. Ta nasogo tiba taw kaarakitay igfalagon odi kitay tagsayak ka fakaoronganan no gintaw in Hisos, ginya tagsolay di hanya, igfasalan nangos no kampang kaarakitay ta ha fagsombongon nogfagamat in Hisos, igfabahala hanya has gobirnador Roma.
42020021	To kasta nasogo fag manga taw igmaswag odi iglwang han Hisos, Haw kagfaadal has taw, mi twa wa kitay hyamo manga fwayong hanggan faadal igtoon wa fiya fiya. Hadwa ha fagihidon taw. Sonson wa orongan kam faadalon has taw kan Diyos fakasayaon ista manga ogaliyon.
42020022	Maangay awkin sas Batasan Hodyo tam nogbayad bohis han Sisar, ngatay idwan?
42020023	Dapat is Hisos igsarom kitay tagtikis wa nangos igfasalan hanya, yakanga hanyag lwang,
42020024	Falagan angko sadik kwarta mabilog. Gafo tolad hanggan ngayan kansorat is nyamo? Tagsagot, In Sisar wa nga tolad tonya.
42020025	Ginyas Hisos iglwang, No kitonya, kan Sisar disagan wa han Sisar, kan Diyos disagan wa han Diyos.
42020026	Yakanga tadwa syagan giktan in Hisos git hampang sasta fagdogan fakaaywanan. Tandolaw odi in Hisos sagot, ta kyabog it bato fwayongon, fawa ha naawang domwag.
42020027	Ginya madi tibak Sadosiyo kagfabohag kitay ka manga natay idwam boyag ya domwag, gakbang in Hisos.
42020028	Taglwang kitay, Haw kagfaadal has taw, is Mwisis nasorat it togon hantam kitay, sadik ama no ha fadwasay ama natay, dapat it babay in-goyan dit indogan, idwa ha anak, ka ama fag babay kat tagyaw kanbalo, kaarakitay no ganak, bilang mandi ka natay it ama.
42020029	Yabay, ha tasayan fitok ama kagdowasayan. Kasta ahan nababay. Yabay natay wadya ha anak.
42020030	Ka masoson it ahan nababay it tagyaw kanbalo a, natay yadi wan.
42020031	Kitonya yadi kat fatolo hanggan wa kat fafito, fagayo nababay wat tagyaw nonbalo. Tasayan nangolbosan, nababay ka ina, dapat fagayo natay wadwa ha anak.
42020032	Ginya madi no has ginanan ka ina natay yadi wan.
42020033	Yakanga, gafo babay tonya fag ina ta nomboyag ya aban, kawa ka fitok tasayan nababay hanya istay?
42020034	Is Hisos nasagot kiti, Manga ama igbabay hanggan manga ina gindogan no kati yapdi fag masohod.
42020035	Dapat ay, ka manga ama hanggan ina ka fiya lomag ka aban fag kasohodan, ka maangay yadim boyag ya gis kahatayan, fawag babay, gindogan gis nanya aban.
42020036	Fayadi wa matay domwag, kawa tambali kito yadi wa ka anghil, idwag babay idwa yadi katay. Hanggan tonya fag manga taw in Diyos wa nga anak maskin inboyag ya domwag.
42020037	Nyawas Mwisis wan igfaorongan wa kitay ka natay imboyag ya. Maskin is Mwisis no nalag ka fon hayo libaba gigang hyabi, gis nanya is Mwisis nangayan in Diyos kitay, In Abraham wa Diyos, in Isaak wa Diyos hanggan in Hakob wa Diyos.
42020038	Yabay ka manga taw boyagan lamang kan Diyos fagsakopon, bohonwa ka manga mahatayan. Fagayo ka san Diyos boyagan wa fagaba.
42020039	Tiba kagfaadal Batasan Hodyo iglwang han Hisos, Haw kagfaadal, kafiyaon im sagot.
42020040	Maskin manga taw idwag bongol gintaw ya domwag in Hisos.
42020041	Ginyas Hisos gintaw has taw, Kinday ta no twag lwang kitay kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi in Dabid wa hasokfonan anak?
42020042	Gwadi is Dabid yadi wa ka nalwang sat sorat sas manga Ambahan, Is Diyos nafwayong hasagfon angko, Haw fag matokawan yap sangko balis sihon
42020043	No kandogay day hodya nafasakop fiya fiya ha hyamo im manga kalaban.
42020044	Yabay is Dabid mandi ka nangayan in Diyos-natogon-Famawi, kagfon hanya. Kinday hanya nogfon in Dabid, not sadili odi hasokfonan anak, ham gayfan?
42020045	Fagayo no matalingan yapdi hanya, is Hisos igfwayong hat manga katogbong kiti,
42020046	Ham fag idwag sokfon ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo manga ogali. Ta kasayag solong manga rotay aba aba, hanggan ta gwayan wa kasayagdog manga taw nogbaya hanya ta no gayayag basad banwa. No sas basad manga fanimbaan, ta kasayag tokaw sas fanokawan ka manga ha kangayanan, hanggan ka manga fanokawan akbang hasagfon balay no sasta fanyahodan hanon aywan.
42020047	Bohondi tonya, taglogos wa ngap manga ina balo banwanan, hanggan ista odi famadogan is taw ta nogdarangin kadogayon. Ka fadosaan kamtohoyan has taw aban mahori man ka tiba taw.
42021001	Gis nanyas Hisos mabantayan has manga taw maakwa ta nogfwalid it manga disag basad haban fandisagan kwarta sas Fanimbaan-Dahol.
42021002	Ginyas Hisos nalag sadik ina balo myabog igfwalid yadi ka hanya, dowa odik saga.
42021003	Is Hisos iglwang, Hogfwayong ha hayo, bonwa bohag, to fag ina balo myabog, it disag mahalga man kasta disag ka manga maakwa.
42021004	Maskin ka tiba nadisag gi odista labi, dapat to fag ina balo myabog nadisag wa ka hanya sadik kayonya.
42021005	Gis nanya yadi tiba taw nabaya ka Fanimbaan-Dahol kawa fiya wa kabantay ka manga bato ista nahalig sinya hanggan kasta manga nadisag kanfwalid sinya, myasa wa fiya kabantay. Dapat is Hisos iglwang,
42021006	Nomdasog gis nanya fag masohod aban, ka hayo faglagon kati tyamo, idwa hamgoyan ngadi dowak bato igtarongbawan, fagayo imrofad lamang.
42021007	Yakanga ta gintaw in Hisos, Haw kagfaadal hyami, ginahin fag masohod aban ka Fanimbaan-Dahol nomdwat? Kana fag falagon madolaw kamlag aban kagfatohoyan kitay to kaanod wan?
42021008	Is Hisos nasagot is taw, Ham fag matagahan, ham fag idwa gadayaan nyawa faktaw, maskin aywan kambangkad aban, ngomayan yadingko ngayan, lomwang kitay, hanya wa kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi. Ka manga taw lomwang yadi, Kati fag masohod kan Diyos nafatohoyan. Ham fag idwag tahin kaglwang kitonya.
42021009	Ham no domog aban manga barita awayan, ngatay kaid-isogan, ham fag idwa galibitan, maskin talaga wa kitonya kamlag aban, dapat bonya tonya ka katabowanan dagos.
42021010	Ginyas Hisos iglwang has taw, Manga layonan daga dahol manlabanan, kitonya yadi ka sadik gorangon sakop lomaban ha sadik gorangon sakop.
42021011	Ha manga linog dahol dahol hanggan no siday no siday fag banwanan, idwa aba ha hanon hanon, hanggan ha manga fanalafod. Manga fakadalaon hanggan manga falagon madolaw imlag yadi gis banwa sam tongod.
42021012	Dapat bagom-anod to fag manga bagay fagayo, ta gomamat yapdi hayo hanggan fahoriyan hayo. Ta fagamat hayo hasagbahala sas manga fanimbaan hanggan sas manga porisowan. Maskin aho hayo fagalwasiyon, ta tomaban hayo has manga gorangon hanggan has manga gobirnador.
42021013	Gis nanya fag masohod ham mamaorongan yadi sasta fagdogan.
42021014	Ham fag danwag fatohoyan sa hayo manga basad fangayofan gis kati kitay, ham idwa galibitan hayo bato sagoton gis nanya aban.
42021015	Maskin gis nanya ho domisag ha hayo kadonongan hanggan fatohod hayo hayo bato hampangon has taw. Ngadi sadi sa hayo manga kalaban idwa syagan lomaban hanggan igfabohag hayo.
42021016	Ka yadi hayo manga magorang, ngatay manga fadwasay, manga kaiban, manga fakilalaon ka fagamat hayo has taw. Ta fahatay yadi tiba sa hayo.
42021017	Maskin aho hayo fagalwasiyon, fagayo fag manga taw kadwat iglag hayo aban.
42021018	Dapat ay, ngadi sadik ogat bok gi hayo alfoyo idwa hambohin.
42021019	Ham nodwag fagomon, ham tomanggap haboyagan orongan.
42021020	Dapat ham noglag manga tifonan sondalo igsafong wa ka banwa Hirosalim, ham fag twa kitay tonya fag banwa kaakbang wamdwat.
42021021	Gis nanya aban ka manga taw sas sakop Hodiya fag danwag lagyo has moyod. Ka manga sas basad banwa Hirosalim, faglahaw wan, hanggan ka manga sas moyod, hawa goli has banwa.
42021022	Maskin gis nanya fag masohod aban, ka manga sirang fadosaan kawam anod fagayo ka Kasoratan fwayong.
42021023	Isyay wan no ka yangadi manga gabosog hanggan ka ha manga anak ogbot, igfasoso yapdi gis nanya fag masohod aban. Maskin ka manga taw sas baba daga domog mahori wa dahol dahol gis nanya. Hanggan is Diyos omisog to fag layonan taw.
42021024	Tiba ista kalaban fahatay. Tiba ta pomilit tomaban has fagayo fag manga layonan banwanan. Ka manga Hintil domaog, hanggan yomod wa fiya fiya ka banwa Hirosalim, no kandogay day kaanod kitay, manga Hintil kagbahala yapdi sinya.
42021025	Aban ha manga falagon madolaw sas myanit, sas magdanon hanggan sas manga fanggasan. Ka manga taw sas manga layonan daga fagayo sadik baba daga imhinol wan, tamdala yadi wan kawa ka dagat nomsaribwaan, ka manga taob homatok wan.
42021026	Manga taw imlobay wasdala kawa ta no gisip wa gisip wan ka mahori kamlag aban istay is baba daga, maskin ka manga karigonan sas boknga fakayawan imhadhawigan wan.
42021027	Ginya madi yabay ta lomag wangko, aho Kanbali Taw, kadasog sas baba linyabo, ha karigonan dahol hanggan kangayanan abwat.
42021028	Yabay, ham, no ha lagan wa kitonya fag manga bagay igfabago, ham fag kasolong wan, ya kaakbang wa ka bomawi hayo.
42021029	Ginyas Hisos igfahalimbawa ya ngay, iglwang, Lag nga ka manga fon igos hanggan ka tiba fon hayo.
42021030	Kat manga sanga nogfalongfong wan, tam twa wa kitay kafangaraw wan.
42021031	Kitonya yadi ham noglag to kangko manga nafwayong kaanod wan, is Diyos kaakbang wa somakop fagayo.
42021032	Hogfwayong hayo kitay, bonwa bohag, to fagayo im-anod wan ka kati fag masohod fag manga taw no boyagan yapdi.
42021033	Ka banwa sam tongod hanggan ka daga imliyam wa aban, dapat ay, angko hampang idwam liyam, nyawa ginahin.
42021034	Ham fag danwa matagahan, ham fag idwa kalibang has kasolongan fagaba, has manga fakalangoon, hanggan ha hayo manga fagisipon istay is baba daga tiba, kaarakitay tonya fag Mahalga fag Sirang idwa omiktan hayo kitos bitik.
42021035	Maskin ka Mahalga fag Sirang tomahod has fagayo fag manga taw sadik baba daga.
42021036	Yakanga nyawa ginahin ham fag matalagaan wan, fag fagabag darangin, kaarakitay ham syagan imtolas to fag manga bagay fagayo kam-anod aban, ginya somayango hangko, Aho Kanbali Taw.
42021037	Gis nanya fag manga masohod, no sirang, is Hisos igfaadal sas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, no yabi is Hisos sawas baba Moyod Oliboan hanggan wagfasirang.
42021038	Yakanga marom yapdi ka manga taw hawas Fanimbaan-Dahol kaarakitay tomalingat toltol.
42022001	Gis nanya ka Fanohodan Tinapay Mayangfis kaakbang wan. Tonya fag fanohodan tagngayan yadi Fanohodan Nagsagayan, ta nogtohod ka anghil no nasagaya ista balay hyabi.
42022002	Gis nanya ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo igsayak yapdit halimbawan kaarakitay fahatay in Hisos maskin ta kadala ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw.
42022003	Ginyas Satanas hawan Hodas basad fangayofan. In Hodas bansagan is Iskariyoti, hanya sadi ka gis Safolo-ha-Dowa.
42022004	Yakangas Hodas inlahaw wan, igtoltol has manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos, hanggan has manga fagtahinan kagbahala sas Fanimbaan-Dahol, no kinday hanya no fagamat has taw in Hisos.
42022005	Tagbaya wan, taglwang han Hodas, Mi tomangdan wa hyamo.
42022006	Is Hodas nafaoyon was taw, hanggan gisip gis nanya no ginahin no somyagan fagamat has taw in Hisos nomsaman di gis fakaaywanan.
42022007	Aban ka sirang ta no kwan Tinapay Mayangfis indasog wan, hanggan gis nanya yadi fag sirang tagsogba ka anak topa fangafiyan, kawa hasta Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan.
42022008	Yakangas Hisos igsogo inda Pidro da Hwan, igtogon kitay, Ham fag hanya wan fatalagaan intam Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan.
42022009	Da Pidro naintaw in Hisos, Siday nangos hyamo fakasayaon mi nogfatalaga?
42022010	Is Hisos iglwang, Yabay, nomdasog has basad banwa, ham homablang araw sadik ama ka ha songgoy tapayan fwalidan danom. Ham tahinan wa hanya hat fagsakbawan fag balay.
42022011	Ham fag lwang hasagfon balay kiti, Kagfaadal has taw gintaw hyamo kitay siday angko fasakbawan famaklay fag lingoban araw, kaarakitay manayowan yadi angko manga katogbong no kwan intam Yafon Fanohodan?
42022012	Hanya falag ara hayo sadik lingoban dahol, matalagaan sas tongod fag salogan. Ham fag fatalaga intam Yafon sinya.
42022013	Da Pidro inlahaw wan hanggan ta nalag wa fagayo kito kan Hisos fwayong. Yakanga ta sinya wak nafatalaga ista Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan.
42022014	Nondasog gis nanya fag masohod ta nogyafon, is Hisos ha yadi was bilog fanganan hanggan it manga Fandiya-Barita.
42022015	Is Hisos igfwayong has taw, Ho danwa kasaya wa dahol kitay, tam fag manayowan yapdi kwan intam Yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan, ho bago domog mahori.
42022016	Hogfwayong ha hayo hodwa yapdi homwan domwag kito, to nodyam anod san Diyos sakop banwanan.
42022017	Ginyas Hisos nabol fanginoman ka ha sabahan obas, nabaya in Diyos, nafagamit has taw, iglwang, Ham fag bol toy, ham fagayo fag golbosan ginom gistay fag fanginoman.
42022018	Hogfwayong ha hayo hodwa ominom domwag sabahan obas no baliday is Diyos nodyag sakop fagayo.
42022019	Ginya madis Hisos nabol tinapay, nabaya in Diyos, nafaarogbotan, ginya nadisag has taw, iglwang has taw, Toy angko habilogan kangko fagdisagon kaarakitay ha hayo. Ham fag sokfon yadi aban to fag ogali kaarakitay ham maayfanan ya angko.
42022020	Kitonya yadi, ta nontabo wagyafon, is Hisos nabol ka fanginoman, iglwang, To fag fanginoman ka bago fag taranggapan kan-ganit sangko folot kamwatwat kaarakitay ha hayo.
42022021	Dapat istay yadi wan ka kaoyon angko manga kalaban, igsayo yadi wangko.
42022022	Maskin aho, Kanbali Taw, kaakbang wa kalahaw, kito kan Diyos nafatohoyan, dapat ay, isyay wan kangko ofod ka kaoyon angko manga kalaban.
42022023	In Hisos manga katogbong garintawan ha sadi ha sadi kitay, Faktaw santam kam-oyon in Hisos kalaban?
42022024	Araw araw ogbot, in Hisos manga katogbong igdaraogan no faktaw kambali abwat man it kangayanan.
42022025	Is Hisos igfwayong has taw, Ka manga gorangon istay sas baba daga igfatakat manga sakop hanggan ka manga ha kangayanan istay kagfasayagdog it sadili has taw.
42022026	Dapat ham fag idwa kitonya. Ka abwat man has fagayo it kangayanan sa hayo, hanya fag fatimbang kitay hanya ka libaba man has taw it kangayanan. Ka hayo fagtahinan fag hanya ka matogbongon is taw.
42022027	Fakta ka abwat man is taw it kangayanan, ham gayfan? Ngatay kagtokaw odi sasta bilog fanganan, ngatay kat sogowan kagfalo igsyahod? Bohonwa awkin ka matokawan sas bilog fanganan ka abwat man it kangayanan? Dapat tam no gofodan, aho bilang odi sadik famalo yadi.
42022028	Ham ka naofod angko fagaba nyawa sawangko basad fakahoriyan kagsolay angko.
42022029	Yakanga no kinday angko Ama igfatalaga angko bato sakopon aban, kitonya yadi ahog fatalaga hayo kangayanan sangko sakop aban.
42022030	Tam fagaba wagsayowan kwan, manga ginom gis nanya aban hanggan ho fatokaw yadi wa hayo sas manga tokawan fanokawan gorangon aban, kaarakitay ham kabali manga fangabaya han Israil manga hasokfonan safolo ha dowak layonan.
42022031	Ginyas Hisos iglwang, Simon, Simon, yabay is Satanas nanagad kitay hanya fag somolay hayo kitos igfalayon fayay gis manga opa sas nigo.
42022032	Dapat ahog darangin wa kitay, haw fag idwag fagomon igsyag hangko. Ginya, im fangayofan nogsoyo ya, farigonan yadim manga fadwasay fangayofan.
42022033	Is Pidro nasagot, Angko Fon, gwadi hodwa kafang omofod hyamo kati, nyawa hanggan wamporiso hanggan wa matay.
42022034	Is Hisos iglwang, Yatokitay, Pidro, hogfwayong hyamo, ka tabag idyag taraok, ha tomangkod araw hangko tolo ginan kitay, hadwa kilala angko.
42022035	Ginya madis Hisos gintaw hat manga katogbong kiti, Aho no nasogo hayo igbarita itfagonan, ha korang awkin sa hayo, nyawa kana, nyawa ham idwa ha diya ngadi sokloban, manga sopot, idwa yadi ha diya lapak? Taglwang, Idwa ha korang.
42022036	Is Hisos iglwang, Dapat kati, ham no ha sokloban, ngatay sopot, ham fag diya mandi. Kadwa ha binagaw, fasaliyan wat balokas, ginya madi, saliyan sadik binagaw.
42022037	Maskin hogfwayong ha hayo kitay ka Kasoratan fwayong kawa hangko, fag im-anod wan. Ka Kasoratan iglwang kiti, Ta nafatimbang hanya bilang sadik taw ha kasalanan. Maskin kansorat kawa hangko kaanod wa kati.
42022038	In Hisos manga katogbong iglwang, Hyami Fon, yabay to wa ka dowak binagaw. Is Hisos nasagot, Hosto wa tonya.
42022039	Da Hisos nadokson gis lingoban sas tongod fag salogan, nalahaw ya ngawan, hawas Moyod Oliboan kito kan Hisos ogali nogbanwan, hanggan it manga katogbong natahin yadi wa hanya.
42022040	Ta nondasog wa sinya, is Hisos igfwayong has taw, Ham fag darangin kaarakitay idwa hagfaloksowan hayo.
42022041	Is Hisos nasaman yapdi ogbot it manga katogbong, manga kayos bintohan bato, ginya nalingkohodan hanggan nandarangin.
42022042	Is Hisos iglwang, Mama, no maangay sa hyamo, fag bol nangos gingko to fag fanginoman kahoriyan kati. Dapat nyawa hoglwang kitonya, fag hyamo wa kafangayofanan kam-anod, bohonwa kangko.
42022043	Ginya sadik anghil gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod inbangkad han Hisos, nafarigon hanya.
42022044	Dapat in Hisos fangayofan inhori wa dahol dahol, yakanga bohondi kito ka haraw nogdarangin, hanggan dit gayamon bilang dahol fag tiktik folot kantigna has baba daga.
42022045	Nontabo wagdarangin, is Hisos nalindog ya ngawan, infwali ya hat manga katogbong, iglag mangharaw, ta matoyogan wan, maskin inrongkot wa dahol dahol haraw.
42022046	Is Hisos iglwang has taw, Kana mayon ham no matoyogan? Ham fag kabangon wan, ham fag darangin wan kaarakitay idwa hagfaloksowan hayo.
42022047	Is Hisos no kampang yapdi, sadik habanan taw kadasog wan, igtahin in Hodas, sadik ama gis Safolo-ha-Dowa. Is Hodas gakbang in Hisos kaarakitay omayok hanya.
42022048	Dapat is Hisos igfwayong hanya, Hodas, haw awkin omayok angko, aho Kanbali Taw, haw no kaoyon angko manga kalaban?
42022049	In Hisos manga ofod katogbong no nalag ista bato ibolonon, taglwang, Hyami Fon, ngatay mi bomasing yadi was taw?
42022050	Ginya ka sadik katogbong nabasing ka gorangon fag fagalan sogowan a, natigbas ka balis sihon fag talinga.
42022051	Dapat is Hisos iglwang hat manga katogbong, Ham fag idwa kityamo, ham. Ginyas Hisos natawid ya ka sogowan talinga, yakangan somag ya.
42022052	Ginya madis Hisos igfwayong has fagtahinan fagalan, hanggan has manga fagtahinan igbahala sas Fanimbaan-Dahol, hanggan has manga fagtahinan sas banwa, kanbangkad yadi wan kaarakitay gomamat in Hisos, iglwang kitay, Aho awkin tolisan, ham gayfan, maskin ham masalawidan manga talibong, mabitbitan manga pinotol kaarakitay gomamat angko?
42022053	Aho fagaba gofod hayo sirang sirang sas Fanimbaan-Dahol, bati ham idwa gamat angko gis nanya. Dapat kati ya, basad yabi ka hayo fakasayaon hanggan ka karigonan marom kagbahala kati.
42022054	Ginya ta nagamat wa ngay in Hisos hanggan nataban hanya has Gorangon fag fagalan balay. No kitay di is Pidro goyan haraw in Hisos, dapat ayayo sat ginanan.
42022055	Ta no nafagba afoy sas basad aladan, is Pidro matodtodan sasta akbang, mafanayangan yadi.
42022056	Ginya sadik sogowan ina nalag in Pidro sinya, ka yawa afoy nogsakop in Pidro hanggan nabantay wa hanya fiya fiya, iglwang, To fag taw in Hisos yadi wa ofod hoglag.
42022057	Dapat is Pidro igtangkod yapdi, hanyag lwang, Yabay ina, hodwa kilala hanya.
42022058	Araw araw ogbot, sadi yak taw sinya, nalag in Pidro, iglwang, Haw yadi kat ofod sadi, ha? Dapat is Pidro nasagot, Yabay yabay ama, aho bohonwat ofod.
42022059	Nonsagaya manga sadik tama sinyahod, sadi yak taw igfaaronganon iglwang, Matohoyanan to fag ama it ofod sadi, maskin pariho gis sakop Galiliya.
42022060	Dapat is Pidro igsagot ya, Ama, hodwa natwagdog kam faglwangon. Is Pidro no kampang yapdi, ka tabag dagos wa nanaraok.
42022061	Ginya kagfon intam naolingan han Pidro, nabantay hanya fiya fiya. Ginya madi yabay is Pidro bago di natohod kagfon intam it fwayong kitay, Ka tabag bago tomaraok araw, haw tolo wa ginan tomangkod has taw angko.
42022062	Is Pidro nadokson gis basad aladan, naoraw marigon.
42022063	Gis nanya yadi fag masohod ka mangag bantay in Hisos igyod, igfasidyowan odi hanya, igsontok ya ngadi.
42022064	Ta nataklob yadin Hisos mata, ginya taglwang, Fanlag ngay boktongan fakta nga kagsontok hyamo kati?
42022065	Aywan yapdi ista manga hampang dwat kawa han Hisos igfasidyowan odi hanya.
42022066	No bago marom ka manga fagtahinan fanifonan Hodyo fagayo, ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo matifonan wan. Ta nataban in Hisos has Fanoltolan Hodyo ka ha manga kangayanan.
42022067	Taglwang han Hisos, Fwayongan hyami, haw awkin kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi? Dapat is Hisos igsagot, Nyawa ho fomwayong hayo, ham idwa yadim tiwala.
42022068	Hanggan aho no mangintaw hayo, ham idwa yadi somagot.
42022069	Dapat ay, gis kati ginan, aho, Kanbali Taw, tomokaw san Diyos karigonan akbang, sat balis sihon.
42022070	Ta fagayo gintaw in Hisos, Haw wa awkin kan Diyos Anak, mangharaw? Is Hisos nasagot, Ham mandi ngap ka gwas kitonya.
42022071	Yakanga ta nanoltolan ha sadi ha sadi, taglwang, Kana yapdi fag sombong kantam fagfanayaon? Tam ngap nadog wa fiya fiya gi wat sadili bibig ka nafwayong.
42023001	Ginya madi yabay sadik kayonya tifonan inlindog a, nataban wan Hisos han Pilato.
42023002	Gis nanya tagfabago wagsombong han Pilato, taglwang, To fag taw mi naiktan maskin igfasognod hyami kapariho iglaban has manga ha kangayanan, igbando yadi fag idwag bayad bohis han Sisar. Igfasayagdog ya ngadi has taw kitay hanya wa hono kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi, ka sadik gorangon.
42023003	Ginyas Pilato gintaw in Hisos kiti, Haw awkin ka Gorangon manga Hodyo? Is Hisos nasagot, Haw wa ngap kaglwang.
42023004	Is Pilato igfwayong has manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan has fakaaywanan fag manga taw, Hodwa ha donggon it kasalanan to fag taw.
42023005	Dapat tagpilit wagsombong, taglwang, Hanya wa kagfasognod sadi wak dahonya sakop Hodiya, igfwayong has taw kitay fag lomaban ka manga ha kangayanan. Gi yapdis sakop Galiliya nogfabago igfasognod ka manga taw hanggan wandasog hastay kati.
42023006	Is Pilato no nadog kitay is Hisos gis Galiliya, hono, nogfabago igfasognod has manga taw, naintaw has taw ngatay is Hisos taga yadi Galiliya.
42023007	Yakangas Pilato no nadog kitay is Hisos giwas Gorangon Hirodis sakop fag banwanan, is Pilato nasogo in Hisos han Hirodis maskin is Hirodis sawas Hirosalim gis nanya.
42023008	Is Hirodis nabaya wa dahol dahol iglag in Hisos, maskin aywan it donggon ista fwayong gin Hisos. Hanya dogay wa kasaya lomag hanya. In Hirodis fakasayaon, is Hisos nangos fag omibolon sadik bagay madolaw san Hirodis faglagan.
42023009	Yakangas Hirodis, nyawa gintaw wa gintaw wan Hisos, is Hisos fawa nasagot ngadi sadik hampang.
42023010	Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo sinya yadi wan idwag fagomon igtawag marigon, igsombong kan Hisos naibolon.
42023011	Is Hirodis hanggan it manga sondalo nayod in Hisos hanggan nafaniring kitay hanya sadik gorangon. Ta nafasolong rotay ha kangayanan, fiya kabantay, han Hisos, ginya ta nafafwali ya han Pilato.
42023012	Gis nanya lamang fag sirang da Hirodis da Pilato nangamigosan yadi wan, nyawat fagonan haraw kahodhoriyan.
42023013	Is Pilato nafatawag ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan ka manga fagtahinan sas banwa Hirosalim hanggan ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw.
42023014	Ginyas Pilato iglwang has taw, Ham no nataban hastay to fag ama, hayo sombong hangko kitay, to fag taw kawag fasognod manga taw fag lomaban ka ha manga kangayanan. Kati yabay ho no nasaysay hanya sa hayo fagdogan, ho nadog hayo manga sombong ha hanya idwa ha fakaoronganan.
42023015	Is Hirodis kito yadingko idwag dog kitay hanya ha kasalanan, yakanga nafafwali ya hantam. Idwa fiya igfatohoyan hanya has kahatayan, maskin hanya idwa ha kasalanan daho wasagfahatay hanya.
42023016	Yakanga ho fabakbak lamang is taw hanya, ginya ho fomalfas ya.
42023017	Fagaba sas masohod Fanohodan Nagsagayan, is Pilato fag ha falfason ka sadik Hodyo kanporiso kaarakitay ka manga Hodyo bomaya hanya.
42023018	Dapat ay, ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw nanarawagan di ngap igsohodan, taglwang, Mi dayo tyamo fag taw. Fag is Barabas kantam fagfalfason.
42023019	Is Barabas kasta nafaporiso itfagonan, kawa hanya nafasognod ngay has taw ka nalaban has manga ha kangayanan sas banwa Hirosalim, hanggan ha nafahatay yadi taw.
42023020	Sadi ya ginan is Pilato nahampang has taw maskin hanya kasayag falfas in Hisos.
42023021	Dapat ta nanarawagan di ngap kitay, Fapakowan in Hisos, fapakowan hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.
42023022	Fatolo wak olit is Pilato gintaw has manga taw, Kana mayon, kanat naibolon dwat ham gayfan? Hodwa ha lagan in Hisos fabangdanan no kitay daho wasagfahatay hanya. Yakanga ho fabakbak lamang is taw hanya, ginya ho fomalfas wan.
42023023	Ta ngap inbagat wan, inlabi wa ngap igtarawagan kitay, Fapakowan in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo. No dogay ista tawag nadaog wan Pilato fwayong.
42023024	Yakangas Pilato nafatohoyan kitay hanyag faangay no kinda kasta fagsagadon.
42023025	Nafalfas kasta fagsagadon, ka taw kanporiso maskin iglaban has manga ha kangayanan hanggan ha nafahatay taw, ginya nafabahala in Hisos has taw kaarakitay ta omibolon nyawa kana kasta fakasayaon ha hanya.
42023026	Ka manga sondalo nogtaban in Hisos kaarakitay igfapako hanya, ta ha nahablang sadik ama, is Simon, taga Sirini, goli has banwa git iyab. Tagpilit igtaban hanggan nafafasan hanya ka nafatimbangan hayo, balin Hisos ginanan.
42023027	Kaaywanon fag manga taw goyan san Hisos ginanan, ha akwa manga ina ayo goraw wa dahol maskin kaawa hanya.
42023028	Dapat is Hisos natakfili ginyag lwang has manga ina, Manga anak ina, taga Hirosalim, ham fag idwa goraw angko. Fag ka hayo sadili hanggan hayo sadili manga anak ka hayo fakaawaon.
42023029	Yabay, aban fag manga sirang ta lomwang, Fiya man mangharaw ka manga galayos, kadwa naanak, kadwa yadi ha nagfasosowan.
42023030	Gis nanya fag manga sirang aban, manga taw lomwang has manga fongso, Ham fag katono ha hyami, hanggan has manga moyod, Ham fag tomabon wa hyami.
42023031	Maskin halimbawa, ta no gibolon kito ka fon hayo no latoy yapdi, kinday aban, ista ibolonon ka hayo no tonga wan, ham gayfan?
42023032	Ka manga sondalo nataban yadi dowak ama ka ha kasalanan orongan kaarakitay ta fasohod yadi wan Hisos nogfahatay.
42023033	Ta nondasog sa sadik foyo, tagngayan Botol Alfoyo, ta nafapako in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo sinya. Ta nafapako yadi ka dowak ama tolisan, insadi san Hisos balis sihon, insadi sat balis wala.
42023034	Ginyas Hisos iglwang, Mama, haw fag faliyam ista ibolon dwat, fag idwa kahori is taw, maskin tadwa twa kasta kasalanan ta nogfapako angko. Ginya ka manga sondalo namostahan no fakta ka omafo in Hisos manga rotay.
42023035	Ka manga taw malindogan sas ligongan mabantayan odi in Hisos. Dapat ka manga fagtahinan gis banwa igfasidyowan odi hanya, taglwang, Hanyag bawi tiba taw, no hanya nga kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi, kan Diyos nafili, gwadi hanya fag bomawi yadit sadili habilogan.
42023036	Ka manga sondalo nayod yadin Hisos, gakbang hanya, igfagamit ha hanya langgaw.
42023037	Taglwang yadi hanya, No haw wa nga ka Gorangon manga Hodyo, gwadi bawiyan wam sadili.
42023038	Masoratan yadi san Hisos tongod alfoyo ista sombong sas manga fangampangan manga Girigo, manga taga Roma, manga Hibriyo, kitay, To wa ka gorangon manga Hodyo.
42023039	Ka sadi ka ha kasalanan, ka mapakowan yadi sinya, igmaswag odin Hisos iglwang, Bohonwa awkin haw kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi? Gwadi bawiyan hyamo sadili, bawiyan yadi hyami gistay.
42023040	Dapat it fadowa nangabaya hanya, nalwang, Hadwa awkin kadala in Diyos? Bati tagfadosa yadi hyamo kito hanya.
42023041	Tam wa ngap ka fiya fadosaon kito, kawa ganti intam manga kasalanan, dapat ay, to fag taw idwa ha naibolon dwat.
42023042	Ginyag lwang yadi han Hisos, Hisos, haw nangos fag tomohod yadingko haw no kabali wa hari aban.
42023043	Is Hisos nasagot hanya, Hogfwayong ha hyamo, tam araw mangoyogan wan has fiya fag oliyanan ka manga natay.
42023044	Araw, no manga boknga wa sirang, sadi wak dahonya banwanan inharom wan, hanggan wa myanit kabohid.
42023045	Ka kandogay inya ka myanit fawa nasalog, inliyam wan, hanggan ka fanahop rotay sas fagbokngan Fanimbaan-Dahol dagos wanragyang, namokngan wan.
42023046	Ginyas Hisos igtawag marigon, iglwang, Mama hogfaano ha hyamo angko falad. Hanya nalwang di nga kitonya, nafalfas wat ipsaw.
42023047	Ka fagtahinan sondalo no nalag to fag manga bagay, nafasayagdog in Diyos, iglwang, To fag taw orongan wadwa ha kasalanan.
42023048	Fagayo fag manga taw ka matifonan mabantayan sinya nalag wa fagayo no kinda kananod, tandala wan, yakanga no goli hat manga balay, tagbakbak hat manga sadili boknga dobdob.
42023049	In Hisos manga fakilalaon fagayo malindogan yadi sas dayo ogbot, hanggan ka manga ina ka natahin in Hisos gi yapdis sakop Galiliya sinya yadi wan. Ta fagayo nalag tonya fag manga bagay.
42023050	Yabay, ha sadik ama is Hosi, gis banwa Arimatiya, sadik banwa Hodyo. To fag ama it fangayofan hanggan it ogali kafiyaon. Hanya mafanayan yadi no ginahin is Diyos nogfabago it sakop. Nyawa kitay is Hosi sadi gis fanoltolan manga fagtahinan Hodyo, hanyadwa goyon is taw ista naibolon han Hisos.
42023052	Is Hosi hawan Pilato, nasagad in Hisos habilogan.
42023053	No nabol wa gis tongod fatimbangan hayo in Hisos habilogan, nasafot basad homot madamol, ginya nafaigyan sasta basad natigib dalifi, tadyapdi ha naglobgobanan taw sinya.
42023054	Gis nanya fag sirang, sirang Famatalaga, faginan yadi wa has Sirang Kafahowayan.
42023055	Ka manga ina ka natahin in Hisos gi yapdis sakop Galiliya naoyan in Hosi a, ta nalag yadi wa kat nagfwalidan in Hisos hanggan no kinday no mafwalidan sinya.
42023056	Ginya madi ka manga ina nwali wan, igfatalaga manga famabanglo hanggan lana. Ka Sirang Kafahowayan nondasog wan, ka manga ina nafahoway no kinday ka Batasan Hodyo fwayong.
42024001	Dapat ay, no marom marom yapdi sas sirang gona sa sadik simba, ka manga ina hawas lobgoban nagtigiban bato, ha diya it manga nafatalaga famabanglo.
42024002	Ta nondasog wan, taglag ka lohib fanahop bato inoson wan has dayo sakbawan.
42024003	Yakanga ta nasakbaw, dapat tadwa ha lagan in Hisos habilogan sinya.
42024004	Yabay, ta no nangarisipon yapdi, sadi odi ginan ta nalag dowak ama sasta akbang, it rotay di masilaw wan.
42024005	Maskin tandala wa dahol dahol, ka manga ina matarohongan wa fiya fiya, ista walong di matignaan wa fiya fiya has boknga daga. Ginya ka manga ama nalwang has manga ina, Kana mayon ham nogsayak ka boyagan sasta nagfwalidan natay?
42024006	Idwastay, hanyan boyag ya domwag. Ham fag tohod kat fwayong ha hayo ham no sayapdis sakop Galiliya. Hanya danwa nalwang kitay,
42024007	Ka fiya hanya, Kanbali taw, ta fag fagamat has manga taw ha kasalanan, fag impako yadi sas nafatimbangan hayo, ginya madi fag imboyag ya sas fatolo fag sirang.
42024008	Ginya madi ka manga ina bago di natohod in Hisos fwayong.
42024009	Ka manga ina no nwali gis lobgoban, ta natoltol han Hisos manga katogbong kasta lagan fagayo, natoltol has Safolo-ha-Sadi hanggan hasta ofod tiba.
42024010	To fag manga ina kawa da Mariya Magdalina, da Hwana hanggan da Mariya in Santyago ina. To fag manga ina, hanggan it manga ofod tibak ina, ka natoltol tonya has manga Fandiya-Barita.
42024011	Dapat ka manga Fandiya-Barita naayfan ka manga ina igfatoga odi, yakanga tadwa katiwala.
42024012	Nyawa kitonya, is Pidro inlindog wan, igdalandan, namantay wa has naglobgoban. Is Pidro natalonggaw has basad nagfwalidan, dapat idwa nga hanlag, no bohonwa ka odista nagsafotan it habilogan. Yakangas Pidro nwali wa a, nataka wa ngay kat lagan.
42024013	Gis nanya yadi fag sirang in Hisos katogbong dowa hawas sadik forowan balay sayok, Imaos. It kaayayowan gis Hirosalim manga safolo ha sadik liho.
42024014	Ta no boknga wa dalan, tagtoltolan kasta lagan fagayo madayo.
42024015	Ta nogtoltolan yapdi, is Hisos wan ka natahod is taw, ginya ta koyogan wan.
42024016	Ka dowak katogbong iglag in Hisos, dapat tadyapdi kilala hanya.
42024017	Is Hisos gintaw has taw, Kana ka hayo fagtoltolon boknga dalan? Ta natorosan wa a, marongkotan odi.
42024018	Ginyan sadi, kat ngayan is Kilyopas iglwang kiti, Haw laya ka sadi dik famaklay has Hirosalim kadya nadog ka manga bagay ka ngalay yapdin lag sinya.
42024019	Is Hisos naintaw, Kana fag manga bagay tonya? Ta nasagot kiti, Kawas Hisos, taga Nasarit, in Diyos fangampang sadi, nyawa gibolon, nyawa kampang, idwa ha bosal san Diyos faglagan, hanggan sasta faglagan fagayo fag manga taw.
42024020	Hyami yadi manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan manga fagtahinan banwa nafagamat hanya has taw kaarakitay fatohoyan has kahatayan. Ta napako yadi hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.
42024021	No kitay di migsyag kitay hanya ka fomalfas ka manga taga Israil. Bohondi tonya ka hyami fagisipon. Kati madayowan nonlag kitonya,
42024022	hanggan mindolaw wan ka tiba hyami ofod manga ina no nabarita ha hyami. Ta marom yapdi, hono, namantay has lobgoban,
42024023	dapat tadwa ha lagan in Hisos habilogan sinya. Tanfwali ya, taglwang, Mi ha lagan sadik madolaw, manga anghil kaglwang kitay is Hisos boyagan.
42024024	Hyami manga ofod tiba ginya yadi was lobgoban, kitonya nga kasta lagan, dapat tadwa ha lagan in Hisos.
42024025	Ginyas Hisos iglwang has taw, Yabay yabay ham. Kana mayon ham nodwa katiwala fagayo kan Diyos manga fangampang fwayong.
42024026	Idwa awkin ka fiya kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi fag omagwanta to fag manga bagay fagayo bago domog it kafiyan?
42024027	Is Hisos nafatwagdog has taw kansorat sas manga Kasoratan fagayo kawa hat sadili. Gin Mwisis manga nasorat has taw nogfabago igfatwagdog, hanggan wa han Diyos manga fangampang nasorat.
42024028	Araw ta no kaakbang wa hasta hadasogan fag forowan balay. No kalag di, is Hisos igfadagos yapdit lahawan.
42024029	Dapat ta kwangit yapdig falahaw hanya, taglwang, Haw fag hawa hyami balay, maskin ka myanit kasangday wa a, kaharom wan. Yakangas Hisos nasakbaw wa sinya.
42024030	Ta nogsayowan wa kwan sas fanganan, is Hisos nabol tinapay a, nabaya han Diyos, ginya nafaarogbotan, nadisag yadi has taw.
42024031	Ta bago di nahilala kitay, is Hisos wa ngap mangharaw. Ginya madi is Hisos idwa hanlag domwag.
42024032	Ginya tagtoltolan kiti, Yabay yabay, maskin manghara kitonya wak masayagdog nogtoltol intam sas boknga dalan, hanggan igfatwagdog intam gis Kasoratan manga fwayong.
42024033	Ka dowak katogbong dagos wanlindog a, nwali has Hirosalim. Ta nondasog, taglag ka Safolo-ha-Sadi matifonan hanggan ista manga ofod tiba.
42024034	Tagtoltolan kitay, Orongan wan kagfon intam inboyag ya. Nafalag wa han Simon.
42024035	Ka dowak katogbong natoltol yadi has taw kat lagan sas boknga dalan, hanggan no kinday ta no nahilala in Hisos, hanya no nafaarogbotan ka tinapay.
42024036	Ginya ta nogtoltolan yapdi kitonya, is Hisos mandi kandasog sasta fagbokngan. Is Hisos igfwayong has taw, Fag sawa hayo ka kahowayan kati.
42024037	Dapat ay tanhinol wa ngap, tandala wan, ta gayfan ngan di falad ka sasta fagbokngan.
42024038	Yakangas Hisos igfwayong has taw, Kana ham no marongkotan odi? Kana ham no gadowan yapdi?
42024039	Bantayan angko manga gamat, manga bitis, aho wa ngay. Sapkidan angko, bantayan wa fiya fiya. Ka falad idwa ha botol, idwa ha faknol, dapat ham iglag kitay aho ha habilogan mandi.
42024040	Is Hisos nalwang di nga kitonya, nafalag has taw it manga gamat hanggan it manga bitis.
42024041	Sas kabayaan ngap tadya katiwala fiya fiya, ta gadowan yapdi. Yakangas Hisos gintaw has taw, Tam ha fanganon yapdi awkin is nyamo?
42024042	Tagdisag hanya sadik lifong oyang masogban.
42024043	Is Hisos nabol a, nahwan wa sasta faglagan.
42024044	Ginyas Hisos igfwayong has taw, Ka manga nadalanan sangko, kangko nafwayong ha hayo tam no gofodan yapdi, kitay, ka fiya, fag im-anod fagayo kansorat kawa hangko san Mwisis Togon, san Diyos manga fangampang manga famasaan, hanggan sas manga Ambahan fag famasaan.
42024045	Ginyas Hisos naboklas ista manga fangayofan kaarakitay ta tomwagdog ka manga Kasoratan fwayong.
42024046	Ginyag lwang, Kito kansorat, ka fiya, aho, in Diyos-natogon-Famawi, fag omagwanta mahori, ginya fag imboyag ya gis kahatayan sas fatolo fag sirang.
42024047	Ginya ka fiya, manga taw kagsyag hangko fag tomoltol has taw sas fagayo fag layonan banwanan. Fag imbarita kitay manga taw fag soyo wan, ginyat manga naogali dwat imliyam wan. Fag gis Hirosalim nogfabago igbarita.
42024048	Ham ka nalag angko manga nadalanan fagayo, yakanga ham fadogan yadi wan has tiba taw.
42024049	Yabay, ho somogo ha hayo kangko Ama nagtogonan ha hayo. Dapat ham fag idyag lahaw gis banwa Hirosalim no baliday ham idya ha natanggap karigonan fagsyaganon gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod.
42024050	Ginya madis Hisos nataban it manga katogbong has dayo banwa. Ta nondasog sas Bitanya, is Hisos nafaabwat it gamat has tongod, ginyag lwang has taw, Ham bomaya wan.
42024051	Is Hisos, nyawa kampang yapdi, igfabago wa kaabwat has tongod.
42024052	Kan Hisos manga katogbong nafasayagdog hanya. Ginya madi ta nwali ya nga has banwa Hirosalim, kasolong wa dahol dahol.
42024053	Ta fagaba wa sas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol igfasayagdog in Diyos sinya.
43001001	Gis fabagowanan, ka daga nodyan halig, ka Hampang dan wa ha akwa, dan wa san Diyos. Ka Hampang Diyos yadi.
43001002	Gis fabagowanan ka Hampang dan wa san Diyos.
43001003	Ka Hampang in Diyos fangalig no nahalig fagayo fag manga bagay. Ngadi sadik bagay kanhalig idwa ha nahalig iba.
43001004	Ka Hampang kagfaboyag fagayo. It haboyagan ka yawa kagfayawa has manga taw.
43001005	Ka yawa igfayawa has basad marom, dapat, nyawa ginahin, ka marom idwag fahapsa ka mayawa.
43001006	Ginya madi, is Diyos nasogo hastay, has baba daga, sadik ama, it ngayan is Hwan.
43001007	Is Hwan inbangkad kaarakitay faorongan ka yawa kagfayawa has manga taw, kaarakitay fagayo domog hanggan katiwalat fwayong.
43001008	Bohonwas Hwan ka yawa. Is Hwan inbangkad kaarakitay mamaorongan lamang tonya fag yawa.
43001009	Tonya ka yawa orongan ka kabangkad hastay hanggan igfayawa has fagayo fag manga taw istay sas baba daga.
43001010	Ka Hampang sawas baba daga. Dapat ay, nyawa hanya in Diyos fangalig no nahalig intam daga, ka manga taw sas baba daga idwa nahilala hanya no faktaw.
43001011	Ka Hampang inbangkad hat sadili banwanan, dapat kat manga kapariho taw idwa natanggap ha hanya.
43001012	Dapat ay, no kayoday ka natanggap ha hanya, ka manga nasyag ha hanya, hanya nafaangay kitay ta fag imbali in Diyos manga anak.
43001013	Tonya fag manga taw inbali in Diyos manga anak maskin is Diyos ka kasaya kabali it Ama, idwa kitos anak dararag no kabali ista anak maskin it ama taw ka kasaya anak.
43001014	Ka Hampang inbali taw, nabanwanan santam faglagan. Mi nalag it kafiyan, kat Ama nadisag hat Anak sadi sadi, orongan hanggan mahoway wa dahol.
43001015	Is Hwan igfaorongan kawa hanya. Is Hwan igtawag, Tya ngay kangko faglwangon ka kabangkad balingko ginanan, ka dahol man angko it kangayanan, kawa hanya danwa ha akwa gi yapdis hyabi, nyawa hodyan sagaya.
43001016	Maskin malooy wa dahol it kahowayan, hanyag disag fagaba hantam it kahowayan.
43001017	Is Mwisis ka nafadonong in Diyos manga togon has taw, dapat is Kiristo Hisos kagfalag has taw no kinday is Diyos orongan, hanggan it malooy fag kahowayan.
43001018	Idwa ha taw iglag in Diyos. In Diyos Anak sadi sadi, ka sawat Ama akbang fagaba, tonya kagfahilala has manga taw no kinday is Diyos.
43001019	Ginya madi ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo gis Hirosalim nasogo han Hwan manga fagalan-han-Diyos hanggan in Libi manga hasokfonan tiba, kaarakitay ta omintaw kitay, Ha ginda fag taw?
43001020	Is Hwan idwa kadalag sagot, nafwayong fiya fiya, Bohonwa aho kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi.
43001021	Ta naintaw ya hanya, No kitonya, fakta di haw? Ha aw is Iliyas? Is Hwan nasagot, Bohonwas Iliyas aho. Ta naintaw ya domwag, Ha aw kan Diyos fangampang? Is Hwan nasagot, Bohonwa aho yabay.
43001022	Ta gintaw yapdi, Fakta nga haw? Fwayongan hyami mi ara fomwayong hasagsogo hyami. Kanam sadili fwayongon haw no ginda fag taw?
43001023	Is Hwan nafwayong, Aho kan Isayas, in Diyos fangampang fagfwayongon noglwang, Aho wa Kagtawag marigon marigon, sas basad fakahyabogan, Fahaslongan in Diyos dalan bato lahawan.
43001024	Ginya madi ka manga taw ka manga Farisiyo nasogo,
43001025	naintaw ya domwag, Haw no bohonwa kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi, bohonwa yadis Iliyas, bohonwa yadi kan Diyos fangampang, fakta ka nahalig hyamo ha kangayanan igfatogna manga taw sas danom?
43001026	Is Hwan nasagot has taw, Ahog fatogna ngay manga taw sas danom, dapat ay, ha akwa sadik taw malindogan sa hayo fagbokngan kati, ham idwa kilala hanya no faktaw.
43001027	Nyawa hanya goyan man angko indasog, ho kaya manlohas it siyok lapak.
43001028	Gis nanya fag masohod da Hwan sas banwa Bitanya sas salogan myanit baliwa safa Hordan, san Hwan fagfatognaan manga taw.
43001029	Nonbago marom is Hwan nalag in Hisos gakbang ha hanya. Is Hwan iglwang, Tya ngay kan Diyos fangafiyan Anak Topa kagfaliyam ka manga ogali dwat sadik baba daga.
43001030	Tonya wa nga kangko faglwangon ha hayo, ka goyan gingko ginanan fag ama, dapat ay, dahol man angko it kangayanan maskin hanya danwa ha akwa hyabi, nyawa hodyan sagaya.
43001031	Aho yadi idwa kilala hanya fiya fiya hyabi, dapat ay, ahon bangkad igfatogna manga taw sas danom kaarakitay igfahilala hanya has manga taga Israil.
43001032	Is Hwan nafaorongan kiti, Aho nalag ka Maliyaw fag Falad gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, igyokfo hanya kitos salompati, idwa yadi galin gi hanya.
43001033	Nyawa aho hyabi, hodya kilala hanya fiya fiya, dapat is Diyos kagsogo angko kaarakitay igfatogna manga taw sas danom, hanya danwa nafwayong angko kitay, Ka hyamo lagon aba ka Maliyaw fag Falad it fagyokfowan, idwa yadi malin gi hanya, tonya wa ngay kagfatogna manga taw sas Maliyaw fag Falad.
43001034	Is Hwan iglwang, Kati in-anod wan. Angko wa mata lagan. Hogfaorongan wa nga kitay to in Diyos wa Anak.
43001035	Nonbago marom, is Hwan sinya ya ngay, hanggan it katogbong dowa.
43001036	Is Hwan igbantay in Hisos, is Hisos nogdalan, ginyag lwang, Yabay, tya ngay, kan Diyos Anak Topa.
43001037	Ginya madi in Hwan katogbong dowa ka nadog it fwayong, natahin in Hisos.
43001038	Is Hisos no natakfili, nalag kitay ta goyan hanya, naintaw has taw, Kana hayo fagsayahon? Tagsagot in Hisos, Rabi, sida kin haw no goli? Ta noglwang Rabi, it kahologan, Kagfaadal.
43001039	Is Hisos nasagot, Hawi, tam hanya wan, ham lomag wa araw. Ta natahin in Hisos a, ta nalag kitay sinya no goli. Ka myanit kalibaba wan gis nanya, yakanga ta ngap nigya wa sinya.
43001040	Insadi ka nadog in Hwan fwayong, ginya natahin han Hisos, kawas Andris, in Simon Pidro fadwasay.
43001041	Is Andris nadagos wa hat fadwasay Simon, nafwayong hanya kitay, Mi nalag in Diyos-natogon-Famawi kat kahologan is Kiristo.
43001042	Ginya nataban in Simon han Hisos. Is Hisos nadoro in Simon a, nafwayong hanya, Haw mangharaw is Simon, in Hwan anak, dapat aba ta ngomayan hyamo is Sifas. To fag ngayan kawas Pidro yadi, it kahologan, bato.
43001043	Nonbago marom yabay, is Hisos kasaya has sakop Galiliya. Ginya madi, nondasog sinya, is Hisos nalag in Filipi a, nalwang hanya, Tahinan wangko.
43001044	Is Filipi taga Bitsayda yadi, ginda Andris da Pidro banwanan.
43001045	Is Filipi nasayak in Natanail a, nafwayong hanya, Mi nalag kan Mwisis fagsoraton sas Batasan Hodyo, kan Diyos manga fangampang fagsoraton, kangas Hisos, gis banwa Nasarit, in Hosi anak.
43001046	Is Natanail naintaw in Filipi, Da ngap, tam awkin ha fagasolopon fiya gis banwa Nasarit? Is Filipi nasagot, Hawi, tam hanya wan, fanlag ngay.
43001047	Is Hisos nalag ngay in Natanail no kaakbang ha hanya, nafwayong has taw kawa han Natanail, Yabay, to orongan kan Israil hasokfonan sadi. Maanod it manga hampang fagayo.
43001048	Is Natanail nalwang han Hisos, Twa oman ha no nahilala angko? Is Hisos nasagot, Haw no masarirongan daga fon igos, is Filipi nyawa idyag tawag hyamo, aho dandig lag hyamo haraw.
43001049	Is Natanail nalwang, Rabi, haw wa nga in Diyos Anak. Haw wa ka gorangon manga taga Israil.
43001050	Is Hisos nalwang, Hantiwala wangko maskin aho nalwang ha hyamo kitay, hoglag hyamo haraw, haw no sayapdis daga fon igos? Bondi kitonya fag madolaw kam manga lagon aban.
43001051	Is Hisos iglwang ya kitay, Orongan wan, bohonwa bohag, hogfwayong ha hayo, ham lomag ka banwa sam tongod idwa hagfarom, in Diyos manga anghil igdokson yagsakbaw ya sangko, aho Kanbali Taw.
43002001	Nonsagaya dowak yabi, ha fangsawan sas banwa Kana, sakop Galiliya. In Hisos ina sinya yadi.
43002002	Ta nafatawag in Hisos hanggan it manga katogbong hasta fangsawan.
43002003	No namin wan ista inomon alak, in Hisos inag lwang han Hisos, Ista alak namin wan.
43002004	Is Hisos iglwang, Ina, nyawa hadwa fomwayong angko, angko ibolonon bon yapdi tonya.
43002005	Ginya in Hisos ina igfwayong hasta manga sogowan, Ham fakatanog ha hanya, nyawa kanat sogoon hayo.
43002006	Ka manga Hodyo ha ogali bilang wa fagliyon ta nodwag fatonglos. No faginan mangwan hanon, ta gonaw yap fiya fiya it manga bitis hanggan gamat. Yakanga ha onom ik tapayan sinya ista sohadan danom. Tonya fag manga tapayan no napno, manga dowak safolo, ngatay tolok safolok gawadan danom.
43002007	Is Hisos iglwang hasta manga sogowan, Fahapnowan danom ka manga tapayan. Ginya ta nafahapno ngay balis bayang.
43002008	Ginya madis Hisos nafwayong has taw, Kati sarokan ginya, dyan hasagbahala sas fangsawan. Ginya ta nadiya ngay.
43002009	Tonya fag danom inbali alak a, hanggan kagbahala nandog nanginom ogbot. Hanyadwa natwa no ginday ka alak, dapat ay, kasta manga sogowan ka nasarok ka danom fadi wad natwa no ginday tonya. Ginya kagbahala nafatawag ka ama mamabay,
43002010	nalwang ha hanya, Nogbanwan sas fangsawan, ta nogbangkad bago bago, kawa manga fiya fag alak, ginya madi, manga taw no nanginom wa fagayo, yabay bago di nabangkad kadwa bangan fiya, dapat kam nabangkad goyan goyan, fiya man ka gona.
43002011	To in Hisos naibolon bago bago fag falagon madolaw sas banwa Kana, sakop Galiliya. Is Hisos nafalag has taw it kafiyan sinya, yakangat manga katogbong igsyag yadi ha hanya.
43002012	Ginya madis Hisos hanggan it ina, it manga fadwasay hanggan it manga katogbong, hawas lwad has banwa Kapirnaom. Ta nadogay sinya manga fiyahin ik yabi.
43002013	Aban, no kaakbang wa ka Fanohodan Nagsagayan, ka manga Hodyo nogtohod ka anghil no nasagaya ista manga balay hyabi hyabi, is Hisos hawas bohid, has banwa Hirosalim.
43002014	Is Hisos nondasog has basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol, nalag ka mangag fasali manga baka, manga topa, manga salompati, hanggan kagfabalyo ista kwarta, matokawan sat bilog manga fwalidan kwarta sas basad aladan fanimbaan.
43002015	Ginya madis Hisos nalanit ista manga tarabing, nafabali famakbak, nafalimo manga baka hanggan topa, nafaalin yadi was taw gis basad aladan fanimbaan. Nafasarabodan kasta kwarta ka mangag fabalyo kwarta a, nafahakfo ista manga fwalidan.
43002016	Is Hisos nasogo ka manga taw kagfasali salompati, nalwang, Faalinan ka manga manok gis basad aladan. Ham fag idwag fabali angko Ama balay sadik balay fanalian.
43002017	Ginyan Hisos manga katogbong natohod kitay insorat kiti, Angko Diyos, kawa ho kawili wa dahol im balay, kito was afoy ik mayanbong sangko basad fangayofan.
43002018	Yakanga ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo kaglaban in Hisos, gintaw hanya, Kana fag madolaw kam fagfalagon hyami kaarakitay igfatohoyan kitay haw ha kangayanan gibolon kito?
43002019	Is Hisos igsagot has taw, Nyawa ham fahakfo to fag Fanimbaan-Dahol, tolo lamang ik sirang ho fatobo ya.
43002020	Ka manga Hodyo iglwang, Ha aw gayfan kitay haw somyagan fatobo ya to fag fanimbaan tolo lamang ik sirang? Gwadi hyabi, ofat ik safolo ha onom ik fangaraw bago dintabo kalig to fag fanimbaan.
43002021	Dapat in Hisos faglwangon Fanimbaan-Dahol, kawat sadili habilogan.
43002022	Ginya madi aban, is Hisos nonboyag ya domwag gis kahatayan, it manga katogbong natohod kawa hanya nalwang kitonya, yakanga ta katiwala kitay orongan in Diyos Kasoratan, hanggan in Hisos manga fwayong.
43002023	Is Hisos no sayapdis basad banwa Hirosalim sas Fanohodan Nagsagayan, aywan igsyag ha hanya noglag it naibolon manga falagon madolaw.
43002024	Dapat ay, is Hisos idwa yadi kasyag has taw,
43002025	maskin hanya kilala fiya fiya fagayo fag manga taw. Nyawa idwa ha taw igtoltol hanya, is Hisos fadi wad twa sasta basad fangayofan.
43003001	Yabay, ha sadik ama fagtahinan Hodyo, gis layonan manga taw tagngayan manga Farisiyo, kawas Nikodimo.
43003002	Gis nanya basad yabi, is Nikodimo nasabang han Hisos, iglwang, Rabi, mi twa waglag kitay haw sadi kagfaadal, kan Diyos nasogo, maskin nyawa faktaw idwa syagan gibolon kito fag manga falagon madolaw is Diyos nodwa sa hanya.
43003003	Is Hisos iglwang, Orongan wan, bohonwa bohag, hogfwayong hyamo, nyawa faktaw nodwam sagaya ya domwag anak dararag bago, idwam aktom san Diyos sakop.
43003004	Is Nikodimo gintaw kitay, Kinday araw sadik taw nomsagaya ya bago, no magorang wan? Idwa twa mwali ya hat ina basad tyan, ginyam sagaya ya.
43003005	Is Hisos igsagot kitay, Orongan wan, bohonwa bohag hogfwayong hyamo, nyawa faktaw nodwam bali anak dararag gis danom hanggan gis Maliyaw fag Falad idwam aktom san Diyos sakop.
43003006	Ka anak gis taw, taw mandi. Ka anak gis Falad, falad mandi.
43003007	Haw fag idwa katakag dog aho noglwang ha hyamo, ham fagayo fag imsagaya ya bago.
43003008	Ka bagyo igfalayfayan no hadat fakasayaon, tam igdog igfawas, dapat tam idwa twa no ginday ka bagyo hanggan no haday kamdiya. Kitonya yadi ka fagayo ka Maliyaw fag Falad nafaanak.
43003009	Is Nikodimo gintaw, Kinda araw tonya nangos?
43003010	Is Hisos igsagot han Nikodimo, Gwadi haw sadik famaadal sas Israil, dapat haw aw idwa twag dog to fag bagay?
43003011	Orongan wan bonwa bohag kangko fwayong hyamo, migfwayong ka hyami natwa, migfaorongan yadi ka hyami mata lagan, dapat ham idwag faanod hyami barita.
43003012	Ham nodwag faanod kangko fwayong hayo manga fakaoronganan sas baba daga, kinda araw ham nogfaanod angko fwayong hayo ka san Diyos banwanan sam tongod fag maga fakaoronganan?
43003013	Idwa ha taw nasakbaw han Diyos banwanan ham tongod no bohonwa aho, Kanbali Taw, ka nadokson mandi gim tongod.
43003014	No kinday hyabi is Mwisis nafaabwat sas tongod hayo ka abyanon tanso, ta no sas basad fakahyabogan, kitonya yadi, aho, Kanbali Taw, nomabwat aban,
43003015	kaarakitay nyawa faktaw nogsyag hangko ha haboyagan hanggan aban aban.
43003016	Maskin is Diyos galwasi wa dahol dahol ka manga taw sadik baba daga, yakanga hanya nadisag it anak sadi sadi, kaarakitay nyawa faktaw nogsyag hanya, idwa has kadwatan, dapat ay, imboyag hanggan aban aban.
43003017	Kawas Diyos idwa nasogo angko, it Anak, has baba daga kaarakitay igfatohoyan manga taw has fadosaan, dapat kaarakitay gingko agwantaon, bomawi ka manga taw.
43003018	Is Diyos idwag fatohoyan has fadosaan kagsyag hangko, in Diyos Anak, dapat ay, kadwag syag hangko, danwa nafatohoyan has fadosaan, maskin ngay tadwag syag hangko ngayan, kan Diyos Anak sadi sadi.
43003019	Kiti is Diyos nogfatohoyan has fadosaan ka manga taw. Ka yawa inbangkad hastay is baba daga, dapat ay, manga taw kasaya man ka marom has mayawa, maskin dwat ista manga ogali.
43003020	Nyawa fakta ka gogali dwat, kadwat iglag ka yawa, idwa yadi gakbang has mayawa maskin kadala kitay it manga ogali dwat imlag.
43003021	Dapat ay, nyawa faktaw no fiya it ogali, idwa kwangit igfalag it manga ogali sas basad fakayawan, kaarakitay manga taw lomag fiya fiya kitay it ogali kitonya, maskin hanyan sadi san Diyos.
43003022	Ginya madi aban, is Hisos hanggan it manga katogbong nadasog has sakop Hodiya a, ta nadogay ogbot sinya, hanggan is Hisos igfatogna manga taw.
43003023	Gis nanya fag masohod, is Hwan igfatogna yadi manga taw sas Inon, akbang has Salim, kawa dahol yadi ka danom sinya. Manga taw gobok in Hwan hanggan is Hwan igfatogna manga taw sinya,
43003024	kawa tadyag poriso in Hwan gis nanya.
43003025	In Hwan manga katogbong hanggan sadik Hodyo igdaraogan kawa has ogali Hodyo bilang fagliyon ta nodwag linay hosto.
43003026	Ginya madi in Hwan manga katogbong hawan Hwan, iglwang, Haw kagfaadal, haw igtohod aw kam nahablang itfagonan sas salogan myanit baliwa Hordan, kam nafasayag dog has taw? Yabay hanyag fatogna yadi manga taw, fagayo gobok hanya kati.
43003027	Is Hwan igsagot, Nyawa faktaw idwa ha tanggapon kitonya no bohonwas Diyos kagdisag hanya.
43003028	Ham mandi ka nadog angko bibig hampang aho nogfaorongan kitay bohonwa aho kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi. Is Diyos nasogo lamang angko kaarakitay gomona hanya.
43003029	Sas fangsawan, ka ama mamabay kasolong wa dahol maskin hanya wan ka ina mangindogan. Dapat ay, ka ama kahilala sinya yadi sas fangsawan, igtalinga has ama mamabay, kasolong yadi wa dahol nogdog it hasnog. Kitonya yadi aho no kasolong wa dahol kati.
43003030	It kangayanan fag kadahol wa kadahol wa nangos, dapat ay, kangko fag kaogbot wan.
43003031	Ka gis tongod dahol man has fagayo it kangayanan. Ka taga daga gi odis baba daga a, ka odi manga bagay gis baba daga it manga fagfwayongon. Dapat ay, ka gin Diyos banwanan sam tongod, dahol man has fagayo it kangayanan.
43003032	Nyawa hanyag faorongan it mata lagan, hanggan it talinga donggon, idwa hagfaanod it fwayong.
43003033	Dapat ay, kagfaanod it fwayong igfaanod yadi kitay orongan wan in Diyos fwayong.
43003034	Kan Diyos nasogo igfwayong yadi in Diyos manga hampang, maskin idwa ha korang is Diyos nogdisag it Maliyaw fag Falad ha hanya.
43003035	Is Diyos, kat Ama, galwasi it Anak, nafaano yadi fagayo fag manga bagay hat Anak.
43003036	Kagsyag han Diyos Anak ha haboyagan hanggan aban aban, dapat nyawa faktaw kadwa katanog it Anak, idwa lomag kitonya fag haboyagan, dapat hanya in Diyos odi fakaisogon fagaba.
43004001	Is Hisos no sayapdis sakop Hodiya, ka manga Farisyo nadog kitay kan Hisos fagfatognaon manga taw hanggan kanbali in Hisos manga katogbong aywan man kan Hwan.
43004002	Ka orongan, bohonwas Hisos kagfatogna manga taw, ka dit manga katogbong kagfatogna is taw.
43004003	Yakangas Hisos no nadog kitay manga taw igfadahit kitay kitonya, da Hisos nalahaw ginya, nwali has sakop Galiliya.
43004004	Noglahaw hanya, ka fiya da Hisos fag domalan sas sakop Samariya.
43004005	Ginya madi da Hisos indasog has sakop Samariya, has bahalan banwa Sikar. In Hakob nagtogonan iyab hyabi hyabi han Hosi, it anak, akbang yadi sinya.
43004006	Hanggan kan Hakob gobon hyabi hyabi sinya yapdi. Is Hisos inyaya wan kawa ayayot naglahawan, yakanga dagos wantokaw sas bilog salongawan gobon. Gis nanya manga boknga sirang ka myanit.
43004007	In Hisos manga katogbong nadagos ha basad banwa kaarakitay manali fanganon. Ista ginanan, sadik ina taga Samariya inbangkad has gobon kaarakitay managob danom. Is Hisos iglwang has ina, Ho kainom nangos.
43004009	Ka inag lwang han Hisos, Haw Hodyo wan, aho ina di, taga Samariya. Kana mayon haw nogsagad inomon gingko? Ka ina indolaw wan maskin ka manga Hodyo idwa gamigosan has manga taga Samariya.
43004010	Is Hisos igsagot has ina, Haw nangos, no natwa wagdog in Diyos disagon, hanggan no kilala no fakta kagsagad inomon danom, fag haw man nangos ka somagad gi hanya, kawa danom kagfaboyag manga taw it fagdisagon hyamo.
43004011	Ka inag lwang, Ama, hadwa ha fanarok a, abasad yadi ka gobon. Kinda haw no bomolay ka danom kagfaboyag manga taw?
43004012	Gwadi to fag gobon hyami yapdi hafofowan Hakob faobonan hyami hyabi hyabi. Is Hakob hanggan it manga anak, hanggan it manga hayopan fagayo, giwastay fag danom no ginom hyabi. Haw aw gayfan haw madonong man in Hakob?
43004013	Is Hisos igsagot, Fagayo ka ominom gistay fag danom, im-inom ya.
43004014	Dapat nyawa faktaw ka ginom kangko disag fag danom idwam inom domwag, nyawa ginahin. Maskin ka danom kangko fainomon ha hanya imbali bilang sadik bolbogan sat basad fangayofan, kagbolos danom fagaba kagfaboyag hanya hanggan aban aban.
43004015	Ka inag lwang, Ama, hogyay tonya fag danom kaarakitay hodwam inom domwag, idwa yadi hastay aban manarok.
43004016	Is Hisos iglwang has ina, Fagoli wan, tawagan im indogan a, tabanan hastay.
43004017	Ka inag sagot, Hodwa ha indogan. Is Hisos iglwang, Hadwag bohag ha noglwang hadwa ha indogan.
43004018	Maskin im manga indogan gis hyabi lima wan, hanggan kam ofod ama kati bohonwam indogan. Hadwag fyalom haw noglwang kitonya.
43004019	Ka inag lwang, Ama, kati ho natwa wagdog yabay, haw in Diyos wa fangampang.
43004020	Istay fag moyod hyami ha fofowan nogsimba han Diyos, dapat ham manga Hodyo iglwang, fag sas Hirosalim manga taw nogsimba han Diyos.
43004021	Is Hisos iglwang, Ina, haw fakatiwala angko fwayong. Aban idwastay baba moyod, idwa yadi sas Hirosalim manga taw no mamasayagdog hantam Ama.
43004022	Ham manga taga Samariya idwa kilala orongan ka hayo fagsimbaon. Dapat hami manga Hodyo, mi kilala fiya fiya ka hyami fagsimbaon, maskin gis Hodyo is Diyos no bomawi manga taw.
43004023	Dapat aban, hanggan nyawa kati madi ngap, in Diyos Falad kagfasyagan manga taw igfasayagdog hantam Ama kawa kilala hanya orongan, yakanga maangay nogfasayagdog hanya. Kitonya fag manga taw kantam Ama fagsayahon kaarakitay fasayagdog hanya.
43004024	Is Diyos Falad wan. Ka mangagsimba han Diyos, fag it Falad kagfasyagan igfasayagdog orongan.
43004025	Ka inag lwang, Ho twa kitay in Diyos-natogon-Famawi imbangkad aban, kasta faglwangon is Kiristo. Hanya, hono, nombangkad fomwayong hantam fagayo fag manga bagay.
43004026	Is Hisos iglwang, Aho ka kampang ha hyamo kati, aho wa ngap tonya fag taw.
