43016010	no kana ka kahaslongan maskin aho hawangko Ama, ham fawa lomag angko aban.
43016011	Fatwagdog yadi no kinday nomtohoyan has fadosaan kawas Diyos danwa nafatohoyan has fadosaan ka gorangon istay is baba daga.
43016012	No kitay di aywan yapdi angko bato fwayongon ha hayo, dapat ham idya fagayo twagdog, aho no fomwayong hayo fagayo kati.
43016013	Dapat ay, ka Falad fakaoronganan nomdasog ha hayo, hanya ka fadonong hayo ka manga fakaoronganan fagayo. Bohonwat sadili fangayofan it fagfwayongon aban, kat donggon lamang gingko it bato fwayongon. Hanya fomwayong yadi ha hayo ka manga bagay kamlag aban.
43016014	Hanya mamalag angko kafiyan maskin hanya fomwayong hayo kat donggon gingko.
43016015	Fagayo kangko Ama, angko yadi wan, yakanga hoglwang ka Falad tomalinga angko fwayong, ginya madi hanya ka fomwayong tonya ha hayo.
43016016	Kati aba sadik ngalay, ham idwa lomag angko, ginya sadi yak ngalay ham lomag ya angko aban.
43016017	In Hisos manga katogbong tiba nangarintawan kiti, Kanat kahologan it nafwayong intam kitay, sadik ngalay tam idwa lomag hanya, ginya madi sadi yak ngalay tam lomag ya, hanggan hanya iglwang kitay hanya hawat Ama?
43016018	Kana tonya fag ngalay lamang aban it kahologan? Tam idwa natwagdog no kanat kahologan.
43016019	Is Hisos natwa kitay ta kasaya gintaw hanya, yakanga hanyag fwayong has taw kiti, To awkin hayo fagarintawanon ha sadi ha sadi no kana angko bato lwangon, aho noglwang, aban, ngalay ham idwa lomag angko, ginya madi sadi yak ngalay ham lomag ya angko?
43016020	Orongan wan, bohonwa bohag, angko fwayong ha hayo kitay ham omoraw hanggan ngomongoy, dapat ka manga tagastay is baba daga fag manga taw bomaya wan. Anod, bago bago ham galibitan wan, dapat hayo kaalibitan imbali kasolongan.
43016021	Kitos ina nogfasagaya it anak igdog galibitan wa dahol gis nanya fag masohod, dapat nonsagaya wan, fawag tohod kitay galibitan haraw, maskin igbaya wan kawa sadi yak anak dararag insagaya wan istay is baba daga.
43016022	Kitonya mandi ham. Ham galibitan kati, dapat tam manladlagan ya aban. Ham bomaya wa dahol dahol gis nanya fag masohod aban. Fawa ha taw syagan faliyam hayo kasolongan aban.
43016023	Gis nanya aban ham idwa ha intawon angko domwag. Orongan wan, bohonwa bohag, angko fwayong hayo kitay, nyawa kana hayo sagadon gingko Ama, sangko ngayan, angko Ama domisag ha hayo.
43016024	Balis kati ham idya ha nasagad nyawa kana sangko ngayan. Ham fag sagad, ham tomanggap wan kaarakitay ham kasolong wa dahol dahol.
43016025	To fag manga bagay ho natoltol ha hayo las manga halimbawa. Dapat ay, aban, fawa las manga halimbawa ho no manoltol ha hayo, ho tomigna wa fiya fiya, aho no manoltol ha hayo gis nanya kawa angko Ama.
43016026	Gis nanya fag manga masohod aban, sangko ngayan, ham somagad hayo fakasayaon gingko Ama. Nyawa hodwag fwayong hayo kitay ho fomalo hayo igdarangin hangko Ama,
43016027	maskin angko Ama galwasi yadi hayo. Ham angko Ama fagalwasiyon kawa ham galwasi angko, hanggan ham katiwala kawa aho giwan Diyos.
43016028	Ho giwangko Ama hyabi, ginya honbangkad ya hastay is baba daga, kati aho lomahaw ya gistay is baba daga, ho haya ngawangko Ama.
43016029	In Hisos manga katogbong igfwayong, Kati yabay, hagfatigna wa fiya fiya, hadwa kampang las manga halimbawa.
43016030	Kati mi natwa wagdog kitay ha talastas wa fagayo fagayo, nyawa manga taw idya gintaw hyamo. Yakanga mi katiwala kitay haw giwan Diyos.
43016031	Is Hisos gintaw has taw, Kati ham awkin katiwala wan?
43016032	Dapat ay, araw ogbot, no kitay di kati wan, ham manarowayan wa fagayo, ham mangodgoliyan wan. Aho idwam dowa kam-goyan. Dapat ay, ka orongan, aho bohondi sadi, maskin angko Ama sa yadingko.
43016033	Hogfwayong ha hayo to fag manga bagay kaarakitay ham ha kahowayan sangko. Istay is baba daga ham lomag kahoriyan. Dapat ay, fag marigon hayo manga fangayofan, aho nadaog ka karigonan istay is baba daga.
43017001	Is Hisos nontabo wagtoltol kitonya, nabantay has tongod, iglwang, Mama, kati wan fag masohod fag falag im Anak kafiyan kaarakitay aho, im Anak, mamalag yadi has taw im kafiyan.
43017002	Kawa haw igfabahala angko has manga taw, fagayo fagayo sadik baba daga, kaarakitay igfaboyag hanggan aban aban, fagayo fag manga taw kam fagdisagon angko.
43017003	To ka haboyagan hanggan aban aban, manga taw no kilala hyamo, ka sadi dik Diyos orongan, hanggan kilala yadin Kiristo Hisos kam nasogo.
43017004	Ho nafalag im kafiyan istay is baba daga, kawa ho nafatabo im faibolonon angko.
43017005	Mama, falagan ya has taw angko kafiyan kati, kito yadi angko kafiyan hyabi, tam no gofodan ka daga nodyan halig.
43017006	Aho nafahilala hyamo ngayan has manga taw kam nadisag angko gistay is baba daga. Tonya fag manga taw danwa hyamo, ginya haw nadisag wangko. Ta katanog hyamo hampang fagaba.
43017007	Kati ta natwa wagdog fiya fiya kitay, fagayo kam nadisag angko, gi hyamo orongan.
43017008	Ho natoltol yadi has taw kam nafwayong angko, ta nafaanod yadi wan. Ta twa kitay aho orongan gi wa hyamo nonbangkad hastay hanggan ta katiwala kitay haw ka nasogo angko.
43017009	Kam nadisag angko fag manga taw kangko fagdaranginon. Hodwag darangin kawa has fagayo fag manga taw sas baba daga, dapat kawa has manga taw kam disag angko, maskin hyamo wa tonya.
43017010	Kangko fag manga taw fagayo, hyamo yadi wan, hanggan fagayo ka hyamo, angko yadi wan. To fag manga taw kagfalag angko kafiyan.
43017011	Dapat ay, to fag manga taw istay yapdis baba daga, ho fawa sas baba daga kati. Ho kaoli wan has nyamo hyamo. Mama, anowan nangos to fag manga taw sa hyamo Maliyaw fag ngayan karigonan, kam disag yadingko ngayan, kaarakitay tamsadi kito yadintam, tam sadi di.
43017012	No kandogay day aho no gofod yapdis taw, aho naano tonya sa hyamo ngayan karigonan, kam nadisag yadingko ngayan. Ho naano has taw fiya fiya a, idwa hanliyam no bohonwa tonya fag taw ka danwan tohoyan has kadwatan kaarakitay im-anod wan kansorat sas Kasoratan.
43017013	Dapat kati ho kabangkad has nyamo hyamo. Hogfwayong to fagayo aho nostay yapdi sas baba daga, kaarakitay ta domog yadingko kasolongan kadwa ha korang.
43017014	Ho natoltol has taw kam hampang, yakanga ka manga tagastay is baba daga kadwat iglag angko manga taw, maskin ta bohonwa tagastay fag manga taw kati, kito yadingko, aho bohonwa tagastay.
43017015	Ahodwag sagad kitay haw fag faalin gis baba daga ka mangag syag angko, dapat ay, kangko fagsagadon nangos, haw fag taktak hanya gin Fandaya.
43017016	No kinday aho bohonwa tagastay, kitonya yadi kagsyag angko bohonwa tagastay is baba daga kati.
43017017	Fag ka fakaoronganan kagfatohoyan ha hyamo to fag manga taw. Im hampang ka fakaoronganan.
43017018	No kinday haw nasogo angko has baba daga, kitonya yadi aho nogsogo kagsyag angko has manga tagastay fag manga taw.
43017019	Maskin ho galwasi ka mangag syag angko, hogfatohoyan angko sadili ha hyamo kaarakitay ka fakaoronganan fatohoyan yadi ha hyamo, kangko fag manga taw.
43017020	Bohondi kagsyag angko kati kangko fagdaranginon, hanggan yadi wa has manga somyag angko aban no domog ista manga hampang.
43017021	Tonya angko fagdaranginon kitay, nangos fagayo fag kasadi no kinday haw Mama, sawangko, hanggan aho sa yadi wa hyamo, kaarakitay ta kasadi santam. No kitonya, ka tagastay fag manga taw imtiwala yadi kitay haw ka nasogo angko.
43017022	Hogdisag yadi has taw kam disag angko kafiyan, kaarakitay ta kasadi, kito yadintam, tam sadi di.
43017023	Aho kasadi sas taw hanggan ta kasadi hangko kaarakitay tamsadi orongan. Ginya madi ka tagastay is baba daga fag manga taw tomwa kitay haw nasogo angko hanggan haw galwasi ka manga taw kagsyag angko kito yadi hyamo, haw no galwasingko.
43017024	Mama, angko fakasayaon, kam nadisag hangko fag manga taw fag omofod angko santam banwanan aban, kaarakitay lomag angko kafiyan, kam nadisag angko, maskin nyawa ka daga idyan halig hyabi, haw danwa galwasi angko.
43017025	Mama maslong, ka manga tagastay is baba daga idwa kilala hyamo, dapat aho danwa kilala hyamo hanggan tongko manga ofod natwa wa kitay haw ka nasogongko.
43017026	Aho nafahilala hyamo ngayan has taw, hanggan hogfadagos yapdig fahilala tonya kaarakitay no kinda ha no galwasingko, ta kitonya yadi, hanggan aho kasadi yadi has taw.
43018001	Ginya madis Hisos, nontabo wagdarangin, nadokson wan, hanggan it manga katogbong. Tanlahaw wan, hawas difay safa Kidron. Ha akwa sadik iyab sinya. Da Hisos hanya wan.
43018002	Yabay, is Hodas, ka goyon in Hisos manga kalaban, iglag yadi tonya fag iyab kawas Hisos hanggan it manga katogbong fagabag tifonan sinya no mabanwanan.
43018003	Yakangas Hodas hanya yadi was iyab, hanggan wat manga nasagad sondalo taga Roma, hanggan manga polis kagbahala sas Fanimbaan-Dahol, kat nasagad gis manga fagtahinan fagalan, hanggan gis manga Farisiyo. In Hodas manga taban ha diya manga salong, manga fatay, masalawidan yadi manga talibong.
43018004	Kawas Hisos, danwa twa wan no kana ka madalananan ha hanya, yakanga hanya dagos natagbo is taw, naintaw kiti, Fakta ka hayo fagsayahon?
43018005	Ta nasagot hanya, Is Hisos ka taga Nasarit ka hyami fagsayahon. Is Hisos igsagot, Aho wa ngap kas Hisos. Is Hodas ka goyon in Hisos manga kalaban malindogan yadi sinya, ista ofod.
43018006	Is Hisos no nafwayong has taw kitay Aho wa kas Hisos, ka manga sondalo hanggan polis infwali has ginanan, tanlohob has boknga daga.
43018007	Sadi ya ginan is Hisos gintaw has taw, Fakta hayo fagsayahon? Ta nasagot ya hanya, Is Hisos taga Nasarit.
43018008	Is Hisos nasagot, Ho danwag fwayong hayo kitay aho wa kas Hisos. No aho ka hayo fagsayahon, fag falahaw angko manga ofod to.
43018009	Is Hisos nafwayong kitonya kaarakitay im-anod it hampang noglwang, Mama, ahodwa ha naliyam ngadi sadik taw kam nadisag angko.
43018010	Ginyas Simon Pidro, ka ha diya talibong, dagos wa nagonos, nabasing ka gorangon fag fagalan sogowan, natigbas ka balis sihon fag talinga. Tonya fag sogowan kawas Malko.
43018011	Is Hisos nafwayong han Pidro, Halobanan yap im talibong. Aho awkin fag idwa ginom gingko Ama disagon angko fanginoman kahoriyan, ha gayfan?
43018012	Yabay, ka manga sondalo taga Roma, hanggan it fagtahinan, hanggan ka manga polis gis Fanimbaan-Dahol nagamat in Hisos, nagafos yadi hanya.
43018013	Bago bago ta nataban in Hisos han Anas. Gis nanya fag fangaraw is Kayfas ka gorangon fag fagalan, dapat is Anas in Kayfas nogang, kawat anak ina in Kayfas wa babay.
43018014	Is Kayfas kagfwayong itfagonan has manga fagtahinan Hodyo kitay fiya man no sadi dik taw ka matay, kaarakitay ka sadik layonan Hodyo idwa matay.
43018015	Is Simon Pidro hanggan sadi yak katogbong naoyan in Hisos. To fag katogbong ka gorangon fagalan fakilalaon, yakanga naofod in Hisos nasakbaw has basad aladan gorangon fagalan balay.
43018016	Dapat is Pidro malindogan sasta dayo sakbawan alad. Yakanga ka sadik katogbong, ka gorangon fagalan fakilalaon, nadokson gis basad alad a, nahampang has sogowan ina kagbantay sakbawan, ginya nataban in Pidro has basad aladan.
43018017	Ka sogowan ina kagbantay sakbawan gintaw in Pidro, Bohonwa awkin haw in Hisos katogbong sadi? Is Pidro nasagot, Bohonwa aho yabay.
43018018	Magnaw gis nanya fag masohod, yakanga ka manga sogowan hanggan manga polis nafagba afoy, manga baga, ginya ta malindogan sas akbang afoy igfanayang wan. Yakangas Pidro gofodan has taw, igfanayang yadi.
43018019	Ginya ka gorangon fag fagalan naintaw in Hisos kawat manga katogbong hanggan no kanat faadalon has taw.
43018020	Is Hisos igsagot hanya kitay, Sawasta fagdogan aho nahampang has manga taw fagayo. Sas iba fag manga banwa ahog faadal basad manga fanimbaan Hodyo, hanggan sas Hirosalim sas Fanimbaan-Dahol, sinya ka fanifonan manga Hodyo fagayo. Hodwa ha nafaadal mafyaloman.
43018021	Kana mayon no aho ka hayo fagintawon? Intawan ka manga nadog angko aho nogtoltol has taw. Ta fadi wadtwa angko manga fwayong.
43018022	Is Hisos no nalwang di nga kitonya, sadik polis natofa marigon in Hisos, ginya nalwang, Kitonya aw ha nogsagot has gorangon fag fagalan?
43018023	Is Hisos igsagot hanya, Aho no ha nafalamang angko hampang, fadogan is taw fagayo istay no kana tonya. Dapat angko fwayong no maanod wan, kana mayon haw nogtofa angko?
43018024	Ginya madis Anas nafafangolo in Hisos, magafosan yapdi, han Kayfas, ka gorangon fag fagalan.
43018025	Is Simon Pidro malindogan yapdi, igfanayang afoy sinya. Ginya tiba kagfanayang yadi iglwang hanya, Haw tonya fag ama it katogbong sadi, idwa aw? Dapat is Pidro igtangkod, iglwang, Bohonwan, bohonwa aho yabay.
43018026	Kan Pidro natigbas it talinga ha kaiban sinya. Pariho ka gorangon fag fagalan sogowan. Kat kaiban gintaw yadin Pidro. Bohonwa aw haw kangko lagan it ofod basad iyab haraw?
43018027	Sadi ya ginan is Pidro natangkod, iglwang, Bohonwan. Ginya madi ka tabag nataraok wa dagos.
43018028	Araw, no kasirang wan, ta nataban in Hisos gin Kayfas balay has balay gobirnador Roma. Ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo idwan sakbaw has basad balay gorangon kaarakitay idwa alafitan it fagliyon, maskin araw ta kasaya homwan yafon Fanohodan Nagsagayan, ta nogtohod ka anghil no nasagaya ista manga balay hyabi hyabi.
43018029	Yakangas Pilato, ka gobirnador, nadokson has taw, gintaw kitay, Kana araw ka hayo fagsombongon to fag taw?
43018030	Tagsagot in Pilato kiti, Nodwa ha nahalig dwat, gwadi midwa yadi twa tabanon ha hyamo.
43018031	Ginyas Pilato iglwang has taw, Tabanan wan, ham wa ka bahala fatohoyan it fadosaan no kinday hayo manga ogali. Ka manga Hodyo igfwayong han Pilato, Ka batas Roma idwag faangay hyami nogfahatay taw, nyawa faktaw.
43018032	Inbali kito kaarakitay im-anod in Hisos fwayong itfagonan, no nafwayong no kinday hanya no matay.
43018033	Is Pilato infwali ya has basad balay dahol, nafatawag in Hisos, ginya gintaw hanya, Haw awkin ka gorangon manga Hodyo?
43018034	Is Hisos gintaw in Pilato, Hyamo aw sadili fangayofan haw no gintaw kitonya, ngatay ista odi fadahit ha hyamo?
43018035	Is Pilato igsagot, Aho awkin Hodyo, ha gayfan? Hyamo sadili fag layonan taw, hanggan manga fagtahinan fagalan ka nataban hyamo hangko. Kanam naibolon dwat?
43018036	Is Hisos igsagot in Pilato, Aho bohonwa kastay is baba daga fag gorangon. No ka odis baba daga fag gorangon kangko sakop, angko manga sogowan lomaban wan, kaarakitay ahodwam disag has manga fagtahinan Hodyo. Dapat ay, bohonwa has baba daga angko fag kabali gorangon.
43018037	Is Pilato gintaw in Hisos, Ya mangharaw, haw wa aw ka sadik gorangon? Is Hisos igsagot, Haw wa ka gwas kitay aho sadik gorangon. Ahon sagaya anak dararag hyabi, hanggan inbangkad hastay has baba daga kaarakitay aho faorongan ka fakaoronganan. No fakta ka sakop fakaoronganan, tonya kagtalinga angko fwayong.
43018038	Is Pilato gintaw hanya, Yabay, kana ka fakaoronganan? No nalwang di nga kitonya, is Pilato nadokson ya has sokayan, hawas manga Hodyo, iglwang, Ahodwa ha faglagon kasalanan to fag taw.
43018039	Dapat ay, tam ha ogali kitay sa hayo Fanohodan Nagsagayan, ahog falfas ha hayo sadi kanporiso. Ham aw kasaya kitay aho fag fomalfas ka gorangon manga Hodyo?
43018040	Ta natawag marigon nogsagot, Fag bohonwa to fag taw, fag is Barabas kantam fagfalfason. Yabay, is Barabas tolisan wan.
43019001	Ginya madis Pilato nafadokson in Hisos, nafabakbak is manga sondalo.
43019002	Ka manga sondalo nahoskos di lamnon dogi a, nafasangbaw tonya in Hisos boknga alfoyo, ginya ta nafasolong yadi hanya rotay aba, boragaw.
43019003	Tagmaswag odi hanya, igbarangkadan hat atobangan, iglwang, Anod, kafiyaon mangharaw ka gorangon manga Hodyo. Ginya tagtofa ya ngadin Hisos marigon.
43019004	Sadi ya ginan is Pilato nadokson has sokayan a, igfwayong has taw, Fandog ngay, hogfadokson ya hanya ha hayo, kaarakitay ham tomwa wagdog kitay ahodwa ha donggon it kasalanan.
43019005	Yakangas Hisos nadokson ya ngay, ha solong sangbaw dogi, hanggan balokas boragaw. Is Pilato igfwayong has taw, Fanlag ngay, to wa ka ama.
43019006	Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan, hanggan ka manga polis gis Fanimbaan-Dahol, natawag marigon ta no nalag in Hisos, taglwang, Fapakowan hanya, fapakowan hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo. Is Pilato igfwayong, Sogi, tabanan wa hanya. Fag ham ka pomako hanya, sas nafatimbangan hayo. Maskin ahodwag dog it kasalanan.
43019007	Aywan fag manga Hodyo ka nasagot, Hami ha togon kagfatohoyan kitay, hanya fag matay wan maskin igfabali hanya in Diyos wa Anak hono.
43019008	Is Pilato labi wak kadalag fatohoyan in Hisos has kahatayan no nadog ista fwayong.
43019009	Is Pilato nasakbaw ya ngawan has basad balay dahol, naintaw in Hisos, Ha taga ginday? Dapat is Hisos idwa nasagot hanya.
43019010	Yakangas Pilato iglwang han Hisos, Ha awkin dayo kampang angko? Haw aw idwag tohod kitay aho ka bahala ngatay igfalfas hyamo, ngatay igfapako hyamo sas nafatimbangan hayo?
43019011	Is Hisos nasagot hanya, Hadwa ha bahala angko no bohonwas Diyos kagfaangay kitonya. Yakanga ka manga nataban angko ha hyamo, it kasalanan dwat man hyamo.
43019012	Is Pilato no nadog in Hisos fwayong, naligaw it halimbawan kaarakitay fomalfas nangos in Hisos. Dapat ka fakaaywanan fag manga Hodyo nanarawagan ya, Haw nogfalfas to fag taw haw bohonwan Sisar amigos. Kagfadaholon it sadili, sadik gorangon, iglaban in Sisar.
43019013	Is Pilato no nadog ista fwayong nataban in Hisos has sokayan a, intokaw sas fanokawan fangabaya, sasta fagngayanon Salogan Bato. No sas fangampangan Hibriyo tagngayan tonya Gabata.
43019014	Yabay kati kaboknga wa sirang sas sirang Fatalagaan has Fanohodan Nagsagayan. Is Pilato igfwayong has manga Hodyo, Fanlag ngay to wa hayo Gorangon.
43019015	Ta nanarawagan di ngap, Mi dayo hanya, mi dayo wan, fapakowan wan sas nafatimbangan hayo. Is Pilato gintaw, Aho aw fapako hayo gorangon sas nafatimbangan hayo? Ka manga fagtahinan fag fagalan nasagot, Midwa ha gorangon no bohonwas Sisar.
43019016	Ginya madi yabay, is Pilato nafabahala in Hisos has manga fagtahinan fagalan kaarakitay ta fapako wa hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo. Yakanga ta nataban in Hisos.
43019017	Is Hisos noglahaw ha fasan nafatimbangan hayo kasta fag fapakowan araw hanya, hawas sadik foyo ta nogngayan, Botol Alfoyo, dapat no sas fangampangan Hibriyo, it ngayan Golgota.
43019018	Sinya ta nafapako in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo hanggan dowa yak taw san Hisos dayo, myasa sadik taw mapakowan sas dowa yak hayo, baliw baliw sadi, is Hisos sasta fagbokngan.
43019019	Is Pilato ka nafasorat is taw kasta sombong hanggan nafatokba san Hisos tongod alfoyo sas nafatimbangan hayo. Kansorat kiti, Is Hisos, taga Nasarit, ka gorangon manga Hodyo.
43019020	Kaaywanon fag manga Hodyo kagbasa tonya fag sorat maskin akbang has banwa kasta nagfapakowan in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo. Ka sorat insorat sas sanglitan manga Hibriyo, manga taga Roma, hanggan manga Girigo.
43019021	Ka manga fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos iglwang han Pilato, Fag idwag sorat, Gorangon manga Hodyo, dapat ka fiya, haw fag sorat kitay hanyag lwang, hono, hanya ka gorangon manga Hodyo.
43019022	Is Pilato igsagot, Kangko nasorat aho nasorat wan.
43019023	Ginya ka manga sondalo nontabo wagpako in Hisos, nabol in Hisos manga rotay kasta naloslos haraw. Ta nahoray ofat ik layonan, nafahafod has manga sondalo, dapat ka rotay aba, gis tongod hanggan wa has daga, inhalig sadik dahonya, idwa ha bolig.
43019024	Yakanga tagtoltolan kiti, Tam fag idwag gisi toy. Anogon. Tam mamostahan yap no fakta ara ka domaog, toy ara hanya wan. Inbali kitonya kaarakitay kansorat sas Kasoratan hyabi im-anod wan, kitay, Ta nafahafod angko manga rotay has taw, Ta nafapostahan yap angko solong. Kitonya ngay ka manga sondalo naibolon.
43019025	Dapat in Hisos ina, hanggan in Hisos ina fadwasay ina, malindogan san Hisos dayo, sas akbang nafatimbangan hayo. Sinya yadis Mariya, in Kilyopas babay, hanggan is Mariya Magdalina.
43019026	In Hisos fagalwasiyon fag katogbong gofod yadis taw sinya. Is Hisos noglag it ina hanggan tonya fag katogbong, natogon it ina hanya, iglwang, Yabay, ina, to kam anak kati.
43019027	Ginya natogon yadi hat katogbong, iglwang, Yabay, to wam ina kati. Ginya wa ginan yabay, tonya fag katogbong nafaoliyan in Hisos ina sat sadili balay.
43019028	Ginya madi, is Hisos no natwa kitay gis nanya intonglos wan it manga bato ibolonon fagayo, kaarakitay im-anod kansorat sas Kasoratan, iglwang, Aho kainom.
43019029	Ha sadik mangkok sinya it sohad langgaw. Ta natogna famasopsop sas langgaw ginya naosok sas tobwan bagahay, nafasopsop in Hisos bibig.
43019030	Is Hisos no nasopsop ka langgaw, iglwang, In-anod wa kati. Ginya hanyan tarohong wan it alfoyo, nafalfas wat ipsaw.
43019031	Kawa gis nanya fag sirang, famatalagaan was Fanohodan Nagsagayan, ka manga Hodyo idwa kasayag fagoyan ka manga habilogan sas tongod nafatimbangan hayo, labi man kawa to fag Sirang Kafahowayan araw, bohondi kito ka tiba no mahalga. Yakanga ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo nasagad gin Pilato kitay, is Pilato faangayan nangos, fodan ista bitis kanpako sas nafatimbangan hayo. Ginya ta no natay wan, bomol ista manga habilogan ginya.
43019032	Yakanga ka manga sondalo nabakbak marigon, nafod it manga bitis ka gona hanggan ka sadi ya, ista napako sas nafatimbangan hayo san Hisos akbang.
43019033	Dapat ay, ta no gakbang in Hisos, taglag hanya danwa natay, yabay tadwa nafod it manga bitis.
43019034	Dapat ka sadik sondalo naoros in Hisos daga tagyangan. Dagos wan-olan it folot hanggan danom.
43019035	Ka nalag tonya kagfwayong it mata lagan kaarakitay ham katiwala wan. Kat fwayong orongan wan, hanggan hanya twa kitay hanya idwag bohag.
43019036	In-anod kitonya kaarakitay imtonglos kansorat sas Kasoratan kitay, Idwa hamfod it botol, nyawa di sadi.
43019037	Insorat yadi kitay, Ta bomantay hanya kat naoros.
43019038	Ginya madi, araw ogbot, is Hosi, gis banwa Arimatiya, nanagad gin Pilato kitay, fiya di aw no bomol in Hisos habilogan. Is Pilato nafaangay wan. No kitay di is Hosi in Hisos katogbong yadi, dapat mafyaloman di, kawa kadala ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo. Yakangas Hosi nabol in Hisos habilogan.
43019039	Hanggan is Nikodimo, ka nasabang in Hisos hyabi basad yabi, naofod in Hosi. Is Nikodimo ha diya banglo fag tagok mira, ha aktom banglo fag rogrog hayo, aloi. Ka famabanglo fagayo kayosagboknga haban fayay it kaaywanan.
43019040	Ka dowak ama nadiya in Hisos habilogan a, nasafot sas rotay madamol, ha famabanglo yadi, no kinday ka ogali Hodyo nogfatalaga has lobgoban.
43019041	Ha sadik iyab akbang sasta nagpakowan in Hisos sas nafatimbangan hayo. Sas basad iyab ha akwa sadik bago fag lohib lobgoban, idyapdi ha naglobgobanan taw sinya.
43019042	Kawa gis nanya, sirang Famatalagaan has Fanohodan Nagsagayan, hanggan tonya fag lohib akbang di, yakanga ta sinya wak nafaigyan in Hisos habilogan.
43020001	Yabay, nondasog sas sirang Simba, dayo marom marom yapdi, is Mariya Magdalina, inbangkad has lohib fanlobgobanan. Nalag kitay ka toplan bato gis sakbawan lohib inbol wan.
43020002	Yakangas Mariya nadalandan wan, hawan Simon Pidro hanggan sadik katogbong kan Hisos fagalwasiyon, nafwayong has taw, Ta nabol kagfon intam it habilogan gis basad lohib bato. Tam idwa twa no hadawan ta no nafwalid.
43020003	Yakangas Pidro, hanggan tonya fag katogbong sadi, inlahaw wan, hawas lohib fanlobgoban.
43020004	Tagbandalandanan wan, dapat ay, ka sadik katogbong nagona man in Pidro nadasog has lobgoban.
43020005	Tonya fag katogbong nogbantay has basad lohib, nalag ka manga fanamong rotay, dapat idwa nasakbaw has basad.
43020006	Is Simon Pidro man kandasog goyan, nasakbaw has basad lohib bato, nalag ka manga fanamong rotay.
43020007	Nalag yadi ka famogong rotay ka san Hisos alfoyo itfagonan, idwa mafaaktoman ka gis habilogan, bokod man di, mafogongan yapdi.
43020008	Ginya madi ka sadik katogbong, ka nagonan dasog has lobgoban, insakbaw yadi a, hanya nalag wan, haggan intiwala wan kitay is Hisos inboyag ya.
43020009	Dapat ay, ka manga katogbong idya twagdog kansorat sas Kasoratan kitay, hanya fag imboyag ya gis kahatayan.
43020010	Ginya madi ka dowak katogbong nwali wan hat manga fagoliyanan manga balay.
43020011	Dapat ay is Mariya idwan lahaw a, malindogan odi sas sokayan, akbang has lohib bato, goraw wan. No goraw yapdi, is Mariya igtarohongan kaarakitay bomantay has basad lohib.
43020012	Iglag dowak anghil, ha solong rotay abohay, matokawan sasta nagfwalidan in Hisos habilogan, insadi sas akbang alfoyo nangos, insadi sas akbang bitis.
43020013	Ka manga anghil gintaw in Mariya, Ina, kanam fagorawon? Is Mariya igsagot, Maskin ta naanggong kagfon angko it habilogan. Ahodwa twa ta no hadak nafwalid.
43020014	Is Mariya nogfwayong kitonya, inbalihid a, iglag wan Hisos malindogan sinya, dapat ay, idwa kilala kitay tonyas Hisos.
43020015	Is Hisos gintaw hanya, Ina, kanam fagorawon? Faktam fagsayahon? Is Mariya gayfan ngandi ka giyab sinya, yakanga nasagot kiti, Ama, no haw wa ka naanggong it habilogan, fwayongan angko, haw no hadak nafwalid. Aho bomol ya.
43020016	Is Hisos nangayan hanya, Mariya. Is Mariya insayango wa han Hisos, iglwang, sas fangampangan Hibriyo, Raboni. It kahologan santam sanglitan, Kagfaadal.
43020017	Is Hisos nafwayong han Mariya, Ha hagtawid yap angko maskin ahodyan sakbaw hangko ama sam tongod. Ha fag hawangko manga fadwasay, hangko manga katogbong, fwayongan has taw kitay ho goli wan hangko Ama has tongod, ha hayo yadi Ama, hawangko Diyos hanggan ha hayo yadi Diyos.
43020018	Ginya madis Mariya Magdalina hanya wan, nafwayong han Hisos manga katogbong kitay, Ho nalag kagfon intam, natoltol yadi has taw in Hisos fwayong.
43020019	No kayabi wan araw gis nanya mandi fag sirang, ka sirang gona sa sadik simba, in Hisos manga katogbong matifonan sa sadik balay, dapat matahopan di kawa ta kadala ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo. Ginyas Hisos indasog sasta fagbokngan, nafwayong has taw, Hayo manga fangayofan fag malokmay wan.
43020020	No nalwang di nga kitonya, is Hisos nafalag has taw it manga gamat, hanggan tagyangan. Ginya madi in Hisos manga katogbong kasolong wa dahol iglag kagfon intam.
43020021	Is Hisos naolit ya has taw, iglwang, Hayo manga fangayofan fag malokmay wan. No kinday angko Ama igsogo angko, kitonya yadi aho nogsogo hayo istay sas baba daga.
43020022	No nafwayong wa kitonya, is Hisos naoyop has taw, nafwayong, Ham fag tanggap ka Maliyaw fag Falad sa hayo manga basad fangayofan.
43020023	Ham nogfaliyam ista manga ogali dwat, is Diyos igfaliyam yadi tonya, dapat ham nodwag faliyam ista manga ogali dwat, is Diyos idwa yadig faliyam tonya.
43020024	Dapat ay, is Tomas, kasta fagngayanon, Singan, insadi gis Safolo ha Dowa, idwa sinya is Hisos nondasog.
43020025	Ginya ka tiba in Hisos manga katogbong igfwayong han Tomas kiti, Mi nalag kagfon intam. Dapat ay, is Tomas igfwayong has taw, Aho nodwa lomag ista nagbaranan pako sat gamat, angko timoyo nodyag dog yadi tonya, angko gamat nodyag dog it daga tagyangan, hodwa katiwala kitay hanyan boyag ya.
43020026	Nonsagaya sadik simba, in Hisos manga katogbong matifonan ya nga basad balay. Gis nanya yabay, is Tomas sinya yadi wan. Nyawa ta nafaganit ka tahop sakbawan, is Hisos igtolas di has basad balay, sawasta fagbokngan, iglwang, Hayo manga fangayofan fag malokmay wan, ham fag idwa kadala.
43020027	Ginya madi nafwayong han Tomas, Ha fandog istay im timoyo a, ha famantay angko manga gamat. Fag falogday im gamat, fandog angko daga tagyangan. Ha fag bohonwa kitay idwa katiwala, yatokitay, ha ngap fag katiwala wan.
43020028	Ginya madis Tomas iglwang, Haw wa kagfon angko, angko wa Diyos.
43020029	Is Hisos nasagot han Tomas, Maskin ha nalag wangko, ha awkin katiwala wa kati? Ka manga taw ka katiwala hangko, nyawadya nalag angko, ka bomaya wan.
43020030	In Hisos manga naibolon falagon madolaw sat manga katogbong faglagan, aywan di kadwan sorat istay fag kasoratan.
43020031	Dapat ay, kansorat istay insorat kaarakitay ham imtiwala kawas Hisos kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi, in Diyos yadi wa Anak, hanggan maskin ham igsyag hanya, ham ha haboyagan wan.
43021001	Ginya madis Hisos nafalag ya domwag it sadili hat manga katogbong sas bintalan linaw Tibiriyadis. Kito no nafalag has taw.
43021002	Da Simon Pidro, da Tomas, kasta nangayan Singan, da Natanail, taga Kana, sakop Galiliya, hanggan in Sibidiyo manga anak, ginya dowa ya in Hisos manga katogbong, gofodan kito mandi ka hyabi.
43021003	Is Simon Pidro igfwayong has taw, Aho mangoyang ya nga wan. Taglwang, Mi mahin yadi wa hyamo. Ginya tanlahaw wan, nasahay wa has basad baloto, dapat ay, sadi wak yabi, tadwa ha iktan.
43021004	No kasirang wan is Hisos malindogan sas bintalan, dapat ay, it manga katogbong idya kilala kitay is Hisos wa tonya.
43021005	Ginyas Hisos gintaw has taw, Manga anahan, ham aw ha iktan nga oyang? Tag-sagot, Idwa akwa ngap.
43021006	Is Hisos igfwayong handa Pidro, Fag fadagdag hayo sarap has sihon baliwa baloto, ham omiktan wa araw manga oyang. Ginya madi ta nafadagdag ngay hanya ka sarap, dapat tadwa syagan igfasahay ka oyang kawa aywan wa dahol dahol, mabyat wan.
43021007	Kan Hisos fagalwasiyon fag katogbong nafwayong han Pidro, Tonya wa kagfon intam. Is Pidro nadog di nga kitay ka nahampang gis baba bintalan kawa kagfon intam, nasolong it rotay, ginya nafogong sat boknga habilogan, maskin naloslos wa haraw kaarakitay mangibolon, ginya nalokso has basad danom.
43021008	Dapat ay ka tiba manga katogbong indasog yadi, masahayan yapdi sas basad baloto, goyod wa ka sarap napno oyang, kawa idwa ayayo gis bahalan danom sinya, manga odi limak safolok dofa it kaayayowan.
43021009	Ta nondokson wan is fakadagsaan baloto, ta nalag sinya ha manga baga afoy a, manga sinogba oyang basad afoy hanggan tinapay.
43021010	Is Hisos iglwang has taw, Diyan hastay hayo iktan oyang tiba.
43021011	Ginya madis Simon Pidro hawas basad baloto natogbong istaw nagoyod has bahalan linaw, baba bintalan, ka sarap napno wa manga oyang, myasa wa dahol. 153 gamtanan ka oyang. Nyawa kitay kayonya wan, ka sarap idwan ragyang.
43021012	Is Hisos iglwang has taw, Fag hastay, tam manyabas wan. Dapat ay, in Hisos manga katogbong fagayo kadala gintaw hanya no faktaw, maskin ta natwa wa kitay hanya wa kagfon intam.
43021013	Is Hisos hawas bilog afoy, nabol ka tinapay, nadisag hat manga katogbong, hanggan ka oyang, kitonya yadi.
43021014	To kat fatolo ginan is Hisos nogfalag it sadili hat manga katogbong hanya nonboyag ya gis kahatayan.
43021015	Nontabo wagyabas, is Hisos gintaw in Simon Pidro kiti, Simon, in Hwan anak, haw awkin galwasi angko bohondi kito kam manga ofod no galwasi angko? Is Pidro nasagot, Ala ngay, angko Fon, haw fadi wad twa kitay ho galwasi hyamo. Ginyas Hisos iglwang, Bahogan angko manga anak topa.
43021016	Sadi ya ginan is Hisos gintaw hanya, Simon, in Hwan anak, haw awkin galwasi angko? Is Pidro igsagot, Ala, angko Fon, haw fadi wad twa kitay aho galwasi hyamo. Is Hisos iglwang, Anowan angko manga topa.
43021017	It fatolo wa ginan is Hisos nogfatanggap in Pidro kiti, Simon, haw in Hwan anak, haw aw galwasi angko? In Pidro fangayofan inrongkot wan maskin tolo wa ginan is Hisos naintaw hanya, Haw aw galwasi angko? Yakangas Pidro nalwang ha hanya, angko Fon, haw twa wa fagayo, haw twa kitay aho galwasi hyamo. Is Hisos nafwayong ya hanya, Bahogan angko manga topa.
43021018	Orongan wan, bohonwa bohag angko fwayong ha hyamo kitay haw no bago yapdi, haw igsalawid yanga hyamo fotol hanggan iglahaw nyawa hadawam fakasayaon, dapat aban, haw no magorang wan, ha aba igfalogday im gamat has taw a, ta gomafos di hyamo aban, ginya tomaban hyamo bohonwa ha hyamo fakasayaon fag hadasogan.
43021019	Is Hisos noglwang kitonya, igfatohoyan no kinday fag kahatayan ka mamalag in Diyos kafiyan aban is Pidro no matay. No nafwayong wa kitonya, nalwang han Pidro, Tahinan wangko.
43021020	Ginyas Pidro natakfili hat ginanan a, nalag ka goyan hanya kan Hisos fagalwasiyon fag katogbong ka masorayan san Hisos akbang ta no nangwan, ka mandi ka naintaw, Hyami Fon, fakta ka omoyon hyamo kalaban?
43021021	Is Pidro no nalag hanya, naintaw in Hisos, Angko Fon, kinda tonya fag taw aban?
43021022	Is Hisos nalwang ha hanya, Ho no kasaya wa kitay hanya fag domogay hanggan aho nombangkad ya domwag, kana ara hyamo fagmawaton? Haw fag tahin wa ngap angko.
43021023	Manga taw nafadahit has mangag tahin in Hisos kitay, is Hisos iglwang tonya fag katogbong idwa matay. Dapat is Hisos idwa nalwang kitay hanyadwa matay, nalwang odi kitay, nongko fakasayaon kitay tonya fag taw fag boyagan fagaba, hanggan no ginahin aho nombangkad ya, kana araw hyamo fagmawaton?
43021024	To fag katogbong kagtoltol to fag manga bagay hanggan nasorat. Tam twa yadi kitay kat fwayong it mata wa lagan, sonson wa fakaoronganan.
43021025	Dapat aywan yapdin Hisos manga naibolon kadwan sorat istay. No nangos tonya fagayo imsorat digsadig sadi, lomabi distay is baba daga it fwalidan manga famasaan it kaaywanan.
44001001	Hogsorat ya ha hyamo Tiyofilo kati. Sangko sorat gona, ho nafwayong fagayo in Hisos manga naibolon hanggan it manga nafwayong gis bago mamwayong has taw,
44001002	hanggan wanabwat ham tongod. Is Hisos bagon abwat ham tongod, natogon hat manga nafili Fandiya-Barita gis Maliyaw fag Falad.
44001003	Is Hisos, nonsagaya wagdog mahori, fagaba wagfalag it sadili habilogan hat manga Fandiya-Barita. Kawa kitonya is Hisos nafaorongan wa kitay hanyan boyag ya ngay. Nafalag has taw ofat ik safolok sirang, natoltol yadi han Diyos sakop baliwa.
44001004	Is Hisos no gofodan yapdi has taw, hanya natogon has taw kitay, Ham fag idyag lahaw gis banwa Hirosalim. Ham fanayan yapdi sinya angko Ama natogon it bato disagon ha hayo, kangko yadi faglwangon.
44001005	Kawa sas danom is Hwan nogfatogna manga taw, dapat ay, ngalay wa aban, sas Maliyaw fag Falad ham nomtogna.
44001006	Ta no gofodan yapdin Hisos, ta gintaw hanya kitay, Hyami Fon, ha aw fafwali ya nangos ha hyami kati in Israil sakop banwanan?
44001007	Kiti is Hisos nogsagot, Angko ama ka bahala no ginahin fag masohod ka kitonya fag bagay, nyawa ham idwa twa no ginahin.
44001008	Dapat ham tomanggap karigonan ka Maliyaw fag Falad nomdokson ha hayo. Ginya madi, ham bago digfaorongan angko sas banwa Hirosalim, sas sakop Hodiya sadi wak dahonya, sas sakop Samariya, hanggan wa sadik dahonya baba daga.
44001009	Is Hisos nontabo wagfwayong kitonya, hanya dagos wan-abwat has tongod, it manga ofod no mabantayan yapdi hanya. Ginyas Hisos infarom wa has basad linyabo.
44001010	In Hisos manga ofod no mabantayan yapdi has tongod, is Hisos no kaayayo, ha dowak ama, balokasan abohay nalindog sasta akbang.
44001011	Tonya nalwang kitay, Ham manga taga Galiliya, kana mayon ham no mabantayan yapdi has tongod? To fag is Hisos, kan-abwat has tongod, imbangkad ya aban hastay is baba daga, kito mandi ka hayo lagan kati non-abwat ham tongod.
44001012	Ginya madi ka manga Fandiya-Barita infwali ya has Hirosalim gis Moyod Oliboan, ngandayo manga sadik liho it kaayayowan gis Hirosalim.
44001013	To ka mandi da Pidro, da Hwan, da Santyago, da Andris, da Filipi, da Tomas, da Bartolomi, da Matiyo, hanggan in Santyago sangay kan Alfiyo anak, in Simon yadi sangay kagbaliwa it kapariho Hodyo, hanggan kan Santyago anak fag Hodas. Ta no nadasog hat fangigyanan sas banwa, fagayo nadagos wa nasakbaw has tongod fag salogan.
44001014	To fag manga ama, hanggan yadi manga ina, hanggan in Hisos manga fadwasay hanggan wat ina, is Mariya, fagaba gofodan igdarangin sinya.
44001015	Nonsagaya manga fihin ik sirang, ka manga fadwasay nanifonan, manga sadik daan ha dowak safolo fagayo fagayo. Ginyas Pidro nalindog sasta fag bokngan, nafwayong kiti,
44001016	Manga fadwasay, fag im-anod wan kanfwalid sas Kasoratan, ka Maliyaw fag Falad fwayong lan Dabid, kawa han Hodas ka nafangolo ka manga nagamat in Hisos.
44001017	Is Hodas danwa hyami ofod hyabi, igtogbong yadi gibolon.
44001018	In Hodas natanggap kwarta git naibolon dwat nasali daga. Is Hodas no nasongon, sinya wa kandagdag hanya nontobong. It tiyan inbosni wan, inbangkad yadi wat bitoha.
44001019	Fagayo natwa wan sa sadi wak dahonya Hirosalim. Yakanga ta noglwang, tonya fag daga, Akildama, it kahologan, Daga Folot.
44001020	Is Pidro igfwayong ya, Maskin insorat sas Kasoratan manga Ambahan, Fag idwa ha goli taw sat baba daga, Fag idwa hagbanwanan sinya nyawa fakta fag taw. Insorat yadi, Fag iba taw man ka fadagos it ibolonon.
44001021	Kati nangos, tam fag fomili ya intam ofod sadi, kaarakitay faorongan yadit mata lagan kawas Hisos inboyag ya.
44001022	Ka nangos omofod intam, fag ka mandi ka danwa koyog hyami, is Hisos no gofodan hantam hyabi. Fag ka sadik taw ka nalag in Hisos is Hwan nogfatogna hanya, hanggan balin Hisos non-abwat has tongod.
44001023	Ta nafili dowak ama, da Matiyas da Hosi, kasta fan-ngayanan is Barsabas, it bansagan is Hosto.
44001024	Ginya madi ta nandarangin kiti, Hyami Fon, haw twa no kinday sasta basad fangayofan fagayo. Fatohoyanan nangos ha hyami no faktaw gis dowa ka hyamo nafili,
44001025	kaarakitay hanyam bali Fandiya-Barita ka fadagos in Hodas ibolon kat nadayo no hawat hadasogan.
44001026	Ginya madi ta nafaaraktoman ka dowak ngayan. In Matiyas ngayan kasta nabol. Ginya madi tonya wa kanbali ista ofod indogang has safolo ha sadik Fandiya-Barita.
44002001	Nondasog ka sirang Pintikostis, ta matifonan fagayo sa sadik balay.
44002002	Ta nadog wa madali sadik hasnog gis tongod kito was hinagoman nogfawas. Ka hasnog napno wa sinya fag balay ista fagtifonan.
44002003	Ta nalag sinya bilang wa manga dila afoy nayokfo has taw ha sadi ha sadi.
44002004	Ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawas fagayo sasta manga fangayofan sadi wak dahonya. Ginya madi ta kampang bokod bokod fag manga sanglitan, no kinday ka Maliyaw fag Falad igfadonong.
44002005	Ha manga Hodyo masimbaon han Diyos, gis fagayo fag manga layonan daga iba, igdogayan wa sas Hirosalim gis nanya fag manga masohod.
44002006	Ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw, no nadog tonya fag hasnog, ta nagobok wa a, nanifonan wa sinya. Tandolaw wa dahol maskin tagdog in Hisos manga katogbong kampang sat manga fangampangan fagayo.
44002007	Kawa ta kataka wagdog, maskin tadwa kamin gisip, taglwang, Bonwa awkin manga taga Galiliya tonya fagayo ka kampang?
44002008	Kana mayon ta no kampang yadi wantam manga sadili fangampangan?
44002009	Tam manga taga Partiya, manga taga Midya, manga taga Ilam, mangag banwanan sas Misopotamya, manga gis Hodiya, gis Kapadosya, gis Ponto hanggan gis Asya,
44002010	gis Firigya, gis Panfilya, gis Ihipto hanggan gis manga sakop Libya ka akbang has sakop Sirini, hanggan ka manga famaklay gis Roma, nyawa manga Hodyo orongan, nyawa mangan bali manga Hodyo,
44002011	manga taga Kirita, hanggan manga taga Arabya. Nyawa kayonya, tam igdog intam wa manga fangampangan ta nogtoltol hantam kawa han Diyos manga marigon fag ibolon.
44002012	Tadwa kamin gisip it donggon, hanggan dayo wa falfason garintawan ha sadi ha sadi kiti, Kana kat kahologan tonya?
44002013	Dapat ay, ka tibag fasidyowan odi, iglwang, Tyamo fag manga taw ngandayo kalango odi.
44002014	Dapat is Pidro, hanggan it manga ofod safolo ha sadi, nalindog. Is Pidro kampang marigon, iglwang, Ham ka mandi gis sakop Hodiya, hanggan ka mangag sabang yadi sas Hirosalim kati, ham fag talinga fiya fiya angko bato fwayongon ha hayo.
44002015	Mi fagayo bonwa kalango, kito ka hayo fatoga. No kito yapdi fag manga masohod, myanit yapdi kaabwat, bonya fanlangoon.
44002016	Yatokitay, to ngap igfaanod wa kati kan Howil, in Diyos fangampang fwayong hyabi, noglwang kitay,
44002017	Is Diyos danwa nalwang hyabi kitay, sas ginanan fag manga sirang, kangko ibolonon kito, Ho fahafod angko Falad has fagayo fag manga taw. Ginya hayo manga anak imbali yadi abangko manga fangampang has manga taw. Yakanga aban, is Diyos ha falagon ha hayo manga anahan manga bagay madolaw. Ka manga magorang ama sa hayo ha akwa yadi aba tagimfanon.
44002018	Gis nanya fag manga sirang, ho fahafod yadi angko Falad Hangko manga sogowan, nyawa ama nyawa ina. Ginya tambali yadi angko manga fangampang.
44002019	Aho mamalag manga falagon madolaw sas banwa sam tongod, Hanggan manga madolaw sas baba daga, Folot, afoy hanggan songaw anos dahol dahol.
44002020	Imharom ka myanit a, Ka magdanon imbali wa dararag kitos folot, Bagom dasog kagfon intam it Sirang, Ka mahalga hanggan masilaw yadi fag Sirang.
44002021	Yabay, nyawa faktaw nogsyag in Diyos, imbawi wan.
44002022	Ham manga taga Israil, kati ham fag matalingan. Is Hisos, ka taga Nasarit, kan Diyos nasogo hantam. Kan Diyos manga fatimawa hanggan manga falagon madolaw kat nafaibolon in Hisos, kagfaorongan kitay hanya giwan Diyos. Tam fadi wad natwa no kinday kan Hisos manga naibolon maskin inlag wan santam fagbokngan.
44002023	Dapat in Diyos wa kafangayofanan domisag hantam to fag is Hisos, hanggan is Diyos natwa wan gis hyabi hyabi kitay, tonya wat bato ibolonon. Ginya madi, to fag taw ham nafapako hanggan wa nafahatay gis manga gamat taw dwat.
44002024	Dapat ay, is Diyos nafaboyag ya domwag hanya, nafalfas hanya gis karigonan kahatayan, maskin ka kahatayan idwa nasyagan natarabing hanya sas Daga Salad.
44002025	Kito kan Dabid fwayong kawa han Hisos, Ho nalag in Diyos fagaba sangko akbang Hanya sawangko balis sihon, yakanga hodwa kadala.
44002026	Kawa kitonya, angko fangayofan kasolong, angko bibig gambahan igbaya Nyawa ho matay aban, ho ha fagsyagon yapdi,
44002027	Maskin hadwag fabayaan angko falad sas Daga Salad. Hadwag faangay kitay kam Maliyaw fag imboyok.
44002028	Haw nafwayong angko ka manga dalan has haboyagan. Maskin haw wan kangko ofod, ho kasolong wa dahol dahol.
44002029	Manga fadwasay, ho twa wagfatohoyan hayo kitay intam hafofowan ama, is Dabid natay wa a, inlobgob yadi wan. Istay wat lobgoban hanggan kati.
44002030	Kawas Dabid in Diyos fangampang danwa natwa in Diyos bato disagon hanya kitay, git hasokfonan aban, hambali gorangon sadi, kito yadi hanya.
44002031	In Dabid lagan, hanggan it fakatwawon kawan Diyos-natogon-Famawi imboyag ya domwag noglwang, Hanyadwan obon sas Daga Salad. Idwan angay kitay it habilogan fag imboyok.
44002032	To fag is Hisos is Diyos nafaboyag ya domwag. Migfaorongan hyami mata lagan kawas Hisos inboyag ya.
44002033	Hanyan abwat san Diyos balis sihon, hanggan natanggap git Ama it Ama natogon bato disagon, ka Maliyaw fag Falad. To kan Hisos nafahafod ha hyami, kito ka hayo lagan, hayo donggon kati.
44002034	Is Dabid idwa gis tongod, dapat hanya kagfwayong kitay, Is Diyos nafwayong hasagfon angko, Haw fag matokawan sangko balis sihon,
44002035	No kandogay day ahodya nafasakop fiya fiya ha hyamo im manga kalaban fagayo.
44002036	Yakanga ka fiya, tam manga taga Israil, sadik kayonya, tam fag danwa twa kitay, to fag is Hisos, ka hayo nafapako sas nafatimbangan hayo, is Diyos nafabali hanya kagfon intam hanggan it natogon-Famawi hanggan Gorangon.
44002037	Yakanga ka manga matalingan nangayfanan wan sat basad fangayofan ta no nadog kitonya. Ginya ta gintaw in Pidro hanggan ka manga Fandiya-Barita tiba, Yabay yabay, manga fadwasay, kana araw ka hyami halimbawan?
44002038	Is Pidro igsagot, Ham fagayo fag soyo wan han Diyos, ham fag fatogna wa hayo, ham nogfasakop san Kiristo Hisos ngayan, kaarakitay hanya faliyam hayo manga ogali dwat. Ginya madi, is Diyos fahafod it Maliyaw fag Falad ha hayo.
44002039	Maskin in Diyos natogon bato disagon hawa hayo nomdisag, hanggan ha hayo manga anak, hanggan has fagayo fag manga taw, nyawa ka manga sawas ayayo, hawas fagayo kan Diyos kagfon intam it fagtawagon.
44002040	Aywan yapdin Pidro manga natoltol has taw kaarakitay faorongan hanggan nafaaronganon yadi has taw kitay, Kaarakitay ham imbawi wan, ham fag idwag tolad kito ka kati fag manga taw ka ha ogali dwat.
44002041	Yakanga fagayo kantiwala in Pidro manga fwayong intogna wan. Tanaywan manga tolok libo taw gis nanya lamang fag sirang.
44002042	Tagfadagos yadig talinga ka manga Fandiya-Barita adal, nangaraktoman it manga botang, igsayowan iglifongan tinapay, hanggan igdarangin fagaba.
44002043	Kawa ka manga Fandiya-Barita gibolon aywan fag manga falagon madolaw, yakanga ka manga taw fagayo kataka ya, kadala ya.
44002044	Ka mangan tiwala fagayo gofodan di. It manga botang nafaaraktoman di fagayo.
44002045	Ta nafasalit manga kaakwaan, ginya madi kat sali nangorayan has taw kaarakitay idwa komorang ista fanganon. Ta nangafod, nafahosto ha sadi ha sadi.
44002046	Sirang sirang tagtifonan sas Fanimbaan-Dahol, fagaba masolong, hanggan igsayowan ta no kwan hanon sasta manga balay.
44002047	Ka mangan tiwala igfasayagdog in Diyos, hanggan fagayo fag manga taw kasaya waglag kasta manga ogali. Sirang sirang kagfon intam igfadogang has Tifonan sinya ka manga taw kanbawi.
44003001	Sadi ginan da Pidro da Hwan hawas Fanimbaan-Dahol dayo myanit kalibaba, maskin gis nanya manga taw igdarangin fagaba sinya.
44003002	Fagaba manga taw igboklid sadik ama kanfihong it bitis gi yapdit kasagayan. Sirang sirang tagfwalid hanya sas bilog sakbawan alad, kat ngayan, Maangay fag Sakbawan, kaarakitay hanya managad togbong gis manga taw kagsakbaw has basad Fanimbaan-Dahol.
44003003	Ka ama fihong, no nalag inda Pidro da Hwan, dayo kasakbaw has basad alad Fanimbaan-Dahol, hanyag sagad wan.
44003004	Yakanga ka dowa, da Pidro, nangolinganan hanya. Is Pidro iglwang kitay, Ha fag bantay hyami.
44003005	Hanya nabantay ngay, gayfan ta ngandayo ha bato nga disagon hanya.
44003006	Dapat is Pidro iglwang hanya, Hodwa ha pilak, hodwa yadi ha ginto, dapat aho ha akwa disagon iba ha hyamo, kakitay, san Kiristo Hisos ngayan, ka taga Nasarit, haw fag lomindog wa a, fag lomahaw wan.
44003007	Is Pidro nagamit ka ama fihong sat balis sihon fag gamat a, nafalindog wan. It bitis dagos wanrigon hanggan it manga halisan.
44003008	Hanya nalokso nalindog, ginya yabay igfabago waglahaw, igfatahin waglokso nogsakbaw has basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol. Nahin wanda Pidro a, masolong wagfasayagdog han Diyos.
44003009	Fagayo fag manga taw ka sas Fanimbaan-Dahol gis nanya iglag ka ama noglahaw igfasayagdog in Diyos.
44003010	Tandolaw wa dahol dahol maskin ta kilala kitay, to fag ama ka matokawan fagaba sas bilog Sakbawan Fiya Kabantay, sas alad Fanimbaan-Dahol, dapat ay, kati iglahaw, ogali mandi.
44003011	Ka ama no matawidan yapdi inda Pidro da Hwan san Salomon bilog Famahowayan, manga taw nanhadalandanan wan nagobok no kana mayon ka sinya, maskin tandolaw wa dahol.
44003012	Is Pidro no nalag ka manga taw gobok, igfwayong kiti, Manga taga Israil, kana ham no kadolaw to fag bagay? Kana mayon ham nogdoro hyami kitonya? Ham gayfan hami aw ka nafalahaw to fag ama hyami odi kadonongan, ngatay hyami odi kafiyan?
44003013	Yatokitay, intam hafofowan, it Diyos, inda Abraham da Isaak da Hakob Diyos, ka nadisag dahol man has fagayo fag kangayanan han Hisos it sogowan. Dapat ham nafagamat hanya has manga ha kangayanan. Ham nadayo hanya san Pilato atobangan, nyawas Pilato danwa ha fangayofan fomalfas hanya.
44003014	Ham nadayo ka Maliyaw hanggan ka Maslong, ham nasagad fag ka sadik taw famahatay taw ka malfas.
44003015	Ham nafahatay di ngap kagdisag haboyagan, dapat ay, is Diyos nafaboyag ya hanya. Migfaorongan hyami wa sadili mata lagan.
44003016	In Hisos lamang ngayan karigonan ka nafafiya to fag ama, kawa hanyag syag in Hisos. Kawa hanyag syag lamang in Hisos, hanyan fiya wa orongan kito ka hayo lagan fagayo kati.
44003017	Manga fadwasay, ho twa kitay ham idwa natwagdog no kanat kahologan hayo naibolon han Hisos, nyawa ham, nyawa hayo manga gorangon, idwa yadi natwa.
44003018	Dapat kawa ham nafahatay in Hisos, in-anod wan kan Diyos nafadog gis hyabi hyabi, git manga fangampang kawa kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi kitay, it ibolon idyam tabo hanya nodya domog mahori.
44003019	Yakanga ham fag soyo wa kati. Fag kafwali ya han Diyos kaarakitay hanyadwag botang sat basad fangayofan hayo manga naogali dwat,
44003020	fahoway yadi hayo manga fangayofan fagaba. Ginya madi aban, hanya somogo yadi kat nafatohoyan Famawi hanggan Gorangon kaarakitay ha hayo, kawas Hisos.
44003021	Kati is Hisos fag sam tongod yapdi nodyan dasog gis nanya fag manga masohod, kitay ka manga bagay fagayo imbago wan kito kan Diyos nalwang lat manga maliyaw fag fangampang gi yapdis hyabi hyabi.
44003022	Is Mwisis danwa nalwang kitay, Is Diyos, intam Fon ka fomili yadi aban sadi gi hayo, fabali hanyat fangampang kito yadingko. Ham fag talingat manga bato fwayongon fagayo ha hayo.
44003023	Is Diyos domayo git sakop hanggan domwat nyawa faktaw kadwag talinga tonya fag fangampang aban.
44003024	Fagayo fag manga fangampang hyabi, gin Samwil ginan, hanggan fagayo ka nanarosonan nahalili hanya, nafwayong yadi kawa has manga bagay kan-anod kati fag kasohodan.
44003025	In Diyos manga natogon gona, it manga bato disagon lat manga fangampang danwa ha hayo, hanggan ham in-aktom yadi han Diyos taranggapan gi hayo hafofowan ginan, no nafwayong han Abraham, Gi hyamo hasokfonan aban, fagayo fagayo fag manga layonan taw sadik baba daga bomaya wan.
44003026	Yakanga ha hayo bago bago is Diyos no nafatohoyan it Sogowan, no nasogo hanya kaarakitay ham bomaya wan, hanya nogtogbong hayo domayo hayo manga ogali dwat.
44004001	Da Pidro da Hwan nogtoltol yapdi has manga taw, manga fagalanhan-Diyos hanggan wasta tahinan sondalo ka mangag bantay sas Fanimbaan-Dahol hanggan wa manga Sadosiyo indasog wa sinya.
44004002	Ta kaisog wa dahol dahol has dowak Fandiya-Barita maskin tagfwayong kitay is Hisos inboyag ya, kagfaorongan kitay ha akwa ya haboyagan sas dayo kahatayan.
44004003	Ta nagamat inda Pidro, ginya, kawa kayabi wan gis nanya, ta nafaporiso yapdi hanggan wansirang.
44004004	Nyawa kitonya kaaywanon ka nanalinga inda Pidro toltol intiwala han Hisos, ngandayo gamtanan manga 5,000 gis fagonan ka manga ama kantiwala.
44004005	Nonsirang wan, ka manga gorangon, ka manga fagtahinan sas banwa, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo nanifonan sas Hirosalim.
44004006	Hanggan wa da Anas sinya, ka gorangon fag fagalan-han-Diyos, da Kaifas, da Hwan, da Alihandro, hanggan ka gorangon fag fagalan, it manga kaiban fagayo sinya yadi wan.
44004007	Ta nafalindog ka manga Fandiya-Barita sasta fagbokngan, ginya ta naintaw yadi handa Pidro kitay, Gindak kadonongan ham nabol tonya? Faktat ngayan ka hayo nasokfon ham no naibolon kitonya?
44004008	Ginya madis Pidro, kawa ka Falad Maliyaw sa hanya sadi wak dahonya, nasagot, Ham ka manga gorangon hanggan manga fagtahinan sas banwa,
44004009	no kadi has ama fihong, no kinday hami no natogbong hanya hanggan wanfiya, no tonya di ka hayo fagintawon hyami,
44004010	ham fagayo istay, hanggan fagayo fagayo taga Israil, ham fag twa kitay, in Kiristo Hisos, taga Nasarit, it ngayan karigonan, ka hayo nafapako sas nafatimbangan hayo, dapat ay, is Diyos nafaboyag ya hanya, hanya ka nafasyagan to fag taw nalindog sa hayo faglagan, orongan wanfiya.
44004011	To fag is Hisos, Ka hayo fagdayoon fag bato, ham ka kalig balay, Hanyan bali ka bato kag-ganit has tiba sadik dahonya balay.
44004012	Is Kiristo Hisos lamang kagbawi manga taw, maskin, sadik baba daga, is Diyos idwa ha nadisag has taw iba ngayan kagbawi intam.
44004013	Ka tifonan gorangon Hodyo intaka wagdog inda Pidro da Hwan maskin ta nahampang maslong has taw, labi wa ta no nadog kitay hanya basta odi taw, idwa ha nagadalan. Ta natwa wagdog kitay, maskin mangharaw inbali kitonyak madonong, kawa ta naofod in Hisos hyabi.
44004014	Ginya madi, ta no nalag ka taw kanfiya malindogan sanda Pidro da Hwan akbang, ta kyabog it bato lwangon gis nanya.
44004015	Yakanga ta nafadokson yapdi inda Pidro gis fanoltolan manga gorangon Hodyo. Ginya madi ta nangampangan yapdi.
44004016	Ta nangarintawan, Kinda araw intam halimbawan hanya fag manga taw, maskin fagayo fag manga taw sas Hirosalim nadog kawasta naibolon madolaw, yakanga tam idwa syagan igfabohag ista fwayong.
44004017	Dapat, kaarakitay to idwam barita domwag has iba taw, tam fatagak to fag manga ama kitay, ta fag idwag barita domwag to fag ngayan, nyawa haday.
44004018	Ginya madi ta nafasakbaw ya inda Pidro. Taglibit wa hampang, Ham hawag fwayong, hawag faadal domwag no kawa han Hisos ngayan.
44004019	Dapat da Pidro da Hwan nasagot, Ham wak gisip no sida ka fiya san Diyos faglagan, ngatay hami fag ha hayo no katanog, ngatay fag han Diyos.
44004020	Idyadi wa fiya mi nodwa fadog ka hyami lagan hanggan ka hyami donggon.
44004021	Ginya ta no nabando ya domwag, marigon man ka haraw, ta nafalfas wanda Pidro. Tadwa ha lagan halimbawan fadosa tonya fag dowak ama, maskin ka fakaaywanan igfasayagdog in Diyos kawasta lagan,
44004022	maskin kasta nafafiya fag ama iglabi wa ofat ik safolok fangaraw it kagorangan.
44004023	Ta no nafalfas wan inda Pidro da Hwan, da Pidro hawat manga fakilalaon, namwayong ka manga fagtahinan fagalan, hanggan manga fagtahinan sas banwa fwayong kitay, ta fag idwag barita domwag.
44004024	Ta no nadog kitonya, ta gofodan sinya fagayo, igdarangin han Diyos. Taglwang, Hyami Fon, haw ka nahalig banwa, hanggan daga, hanggan dagat, hanggan fagayo fag manga bagay ka sinya.
44004025	Haw danwa nafwayong gi yapdi hyami hafofowan ginan, gin Dabid, hyamo fangibolon, ka Maliyaw fag Falad no nafadonong hanya, noglwang kitay, Kana mayon ka manga Hintil no kaisog wa dahol dahol? Ka manga taw no gwas it bato ibolonon idwa ha kahologan?
44004026	Ka manga gorangon sas baba daga igfatalaga wa kitay ta lomaban wan Kasta manga fagtahinan matifonan wan Kaarakitay lomaban han Diyos hanggan hat natogon-Famawi-hanggan-Gorangon.
44004027	Maskin orongan wan da Hirodis da Pontiyo Pilato, hanggan ka manga Hintil, hanggan ka manga taga Israil sadi wak dahonya, ta nanifonan istay fag banwa, ta nalaban im Sogowan Maliyaw, is Hisos, ka hyamo nafatohoyan.
44004028	Ta nafatonglos wa fagayo fag manga bagay ka hyamo nafwayong kitay fag im-anod wan.
44004029	Ginya madi, hyami Fon, kati tagfadalag dog hyami. Ha nangos togbongan wa hyami, hyamo manga sogowan, kaarakitay mi bomarita ya marigon has taw hyamo hampang.
44004030	Ha falogdayan yadim gamat kaarakitay mamafiya ka manga ha sagit. Haw fag faangay nangos mi omibolon ka manga falagon madolaw san Hisos ngayan, ka hyamo Maliyaw fag Sogowan.
44004031	Ta nontabo wagdarangin, kasta nagtifonan fag balay inhawig. Maskin ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawas taw fagayo sadi wak dahonya, inrigon yasta fangayofan idwa ha madalag barita in Diyos hampang.
44004032	Fagayo fagayo kantiwala, insadi it fangayofan hanggan wat isip. Nyawa faktaw, idwag sadili it manga botang, dapat nafaaraktoman di fagayo.
44004033	Ka manga Fandiya-Barita ha kadonongan marigon ta nogfaorongan kitay, is Hisos intam Fon inboyag ya domwag. In Diyos malooy fag kahowayan inlag sas fagayo.
44004034	Idwa ha taw korang it fanganon gis nanya, maskin ka maakwa nafasali ngatay it daga, ngatay it balay,
44004035	ginya ta nadisag it sali has manga Fandiya-Barita. Ginya madi ka manga Fandiya-Barita nangorayan ha sadi ha sadi kaarakitay idwa komorang ista fanganon.
44004036	Kitonya yadi kan Hosi naibolon. Is Hosi taga Sipri, gin Libi hasokfonan. Ka manga Fandiya-Barita nafangayan hanya is Birnabi, it kahologan, Is Matogbongon.
44004037	Is Hosi nafasalit iyab, ginya nadisag it sali has manga Fandiya-Barita.
44005001	Dapat ay, sadik talsawa, da Ananiyas, da Safira, nafasali yadi wat daga ka sadi.
44005002	Is Ananiyas nabohin kat sali hanggan is Safira nafaangay wan. Ginya madis Ananiyas nadisag kat sawad has manga Fandiya-Barita.
44005003	Dapat is Pidro nafwayong han Ananiyas, Kana mayon haw nogtalinga in Satanas, kaarakitay ha bomohag has Falad Maliyaw? Kana ha nogbohin yapdi ka sali daga?
44005004	Ha nodyapdi harag fasali, bohonwa awkin hyamo yapdi ka daga? Haw no nafasali wan, ka hyamo kawa kwarta, idwa aw? Kana mayon haw no gibolon yapdi kitonya? Idwa has taw, dapat han Diyos haw nogbohag.
44005005	Is Ananiyas no nadog tonya fag hampang natay wa dagos, nakfo odi. Fagayo indala wa dahol iglag.
44005006	Ka manga anahan nalindog, nasafot ka natay, nadiya has sokayan a, nalobgob.
44005007	Manga tolok oras araw, it kadogayan, it babay inbangkad yadi, idwa ha fangayofan kitay it indogan natay wan.
44005008	Is Safira nondasog, is Pidro naintaw hanya, nalwang, Fwayongan angko, ngatay hayo natanggap it sali hayo daga dahonya wa aw? Ka ina nasagot, Dahonya ngay.
44005009	Dapat is Pidro nafwayong, Kana mayon hayo nagkasadiyan somolay kagfon intam it Falad? Fanlag ngay, ka manga taw ka nalobgob im indogan sawas sokayan, hanggan wa araw haw kasta lobgobon.
44005010	Is Safira dagos wa nakfo san Pidro akbang, natay yadi wan. Ginya madi ka manga anahan no nasakbaw ya, nalag kitay is Safira mahatayan. Ta nadiya yadi wan, nalobgob hanya sat indogan akbang.
44005011	In Diyos Tifonan sadi wak kayonya indala wa dahol dahol, hanggan fagayo ka nadog to fag manga bagay indala yadi wan.
44005012	Ka manga Fandiya-Barita gibolon aywan fag manga falagon madolaw sasta faglagan. Fagayo kantiwala fagaba wagtifonan san Salomon Famahowayan.
44005013	Dapat ka mangadyan tiwala kadala gaktom has mangan tiwala nyawa tagfaanod kitay fiya ista ogali.
44005014	Dapat ka manga ama hanggan manga ina kagsyag hasagfon intam kaaywan wa kaaywan wan.
44005015	Manga taw nadiya ka manga ha sagit has bilog dalan, nafwalid baba sagmak, kaarakitay is Pidro nogdalan sinya, ngadit anino fag omanino ka ha sagit.
44005016	Aywan kandasog gis fakadogan banwa Hirosalim. Ta nadiya ka manga ha sagit hanggan ka manga labang nafahoriyan. Infiya wa fagayo fagayo.
44005017	Dapat ka gorangon fag fagalan, hanggan it manga ofod sadik layonan manga Sadosiyo, kaingli wa dahol ka manga Fandiya-Barita.
44005018	Yakanga ta nagamat was taw, nafaporiso basad banwa.
44005019	Dapat basad yabi, in Diyos anghil sadi, naboklas ka fanahop porisowan, nataban ka manga Fandiya-Barita has sokayan, nalwang,
44005020	Sogi, ham fag hawas Fanimbaan-Dahol, ham fag toltol has taw kawa has Bago fag Haboyagan.
44005021	Ginya madi yabay, tantanog wan. Dayo yapdi kayawa, ka manga Fandiya-Barita hawas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, natoltol has taw. Dapat ka gorangon fag fagalan hanggan it manga ofod nondasog araw, has akbang porisowan, ta nafatawag ka tifonan manga fagtahinan Hodyo fagayo sasta fanoltolan. Ginya madi ta nasogo kitay, famantay ka mangan poriso fafon, tabanan hastay.
44005022	Dapat ka manga namantay idwa ha lagan taw sinya. Yakanga ta nwali wan. nafwayong, Idwa akwa sinya.
44005023	No kitay di, kat fanahop maganitan mandi, ha bantay ya ngadi, dapat ay idwa ha taw sas basad.
44005024	Kasta tahinan ka manga sondalo kagbantay sas Fanimbaan-Dahol, hanggan ka manga fagtahinan fagalan nangarisipon wan ta no nadog kitonya kitay, hada wa mayon ka manga Fandiya-Barita.
44005025	Ginya madi handasog sadik taw igfwayong, Yatokitay maporisowan tonya, sawas basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, igtoltol ya nga wa ngap has taw.
44005026	Ginya ka tahinan sondalo nafaofod it sakop tiba has Fanimbaan-Dahol. Nataban ka manga Fandiya-Barita, igfahowayon odi, maskin kadala ngandayo ka fakaaywanan bomintok hanya, hanya no mangisog has taw.
44005027	Ta no nataban ka manga Fandiya-Barita, ta nafaatobangan hanya has fanoltolan manga Hodyo. Ka gorangon fagalan naintaw wa fiya fiya,
44005028	igfwayong, Gwadi marigon hyami bando ha hayo kitay fag idwag toltol tonya fag taw it ngayan, dapat ham nafahaskat di ngap sadi wak dahonya Hirosalim, hanggan ham igbangdan yadi wa hyami it kahatayan.
44005029	Dapat da Pidro, hanggan ka iba Fandiya-Barita nasagot, taglwang, Ka fiya hami imtanog yap han Diyos bago has manga taw.
44005030	Intam manga hafofowan Diyos ka nafaboyag ya in Hisos ka hayo nafahatay, ham no nafasakbit ya ngadi hanya sas nafatimbangan hayo.
44005031	Is Diyos nataban in Hisos ham tongod, han Diyos balis sihon, nafabali hanya intam Fagtahinan hanggan Famawi kaarakitay in Israil hasokfonan somoyo wan, hanggan is Diyos faliyam wan it manga naogali dwat.
44005032	To fagayo fagayo hyami wa sadili mata lagan, hami hanggan ka Falad Maliyaw kan Diyos nadisag has manga katanog hanya.
44005033	Dapat ka fanifonan Hodyo inhori wa dahol dahol igdog. Ta kasaya wagfahatay ka manga Fandiya-Barita.
44005034	Dapat sadik ama Farisiyo, is Gamaliyal, kagfaadal in Mwisis togon, nalindog sasta fagbokngan fanifonan. Ta fagayo magalang fiya fiya hanya. Hanya nafwayong kitay, Fadoksonan yap ngalay to fag manga taw.
44005035	Ginya nafwayong has taw, Manga ama taga Israil, isipan yap fiya fiya hayo bato ibolonon has nwa fag manga taw.
44005036	Hyabi, idya dogay, is Tiyodas, inbangkad igfadaholon it sadili, nataban manga ofat ik daan ama. Dapat ta no nafahatay in Tiyodas, it manga ofod nalagyo lamang, idwa ha kahologan.
44005037	Ginya madi, is Tiyodas no natay wan, is Hodas man, taga Galiliya, inbangkad dayog falista manga taw, hanya nataban aywan ogbot fag manga taw. Dapat is Hodas natay, hanggan it manga ofod nalagyo yadi.
44005038	Yakanga, hogfwayong hayo kati, ham hawag mawat tonya fag manga taw, fabayaanan lamang sinya. It fakasayaon hanggan ibolonon no gi odis kapariho taw, imliyam yadi kito kas taw.
44005039	Dapat to no gin Diyos, ham idwa syagan domaog, dapat kamlag aban ngandayo ham wa kaglaban in Diyos. Ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo nafaangay di.
44005040	Ta no nafasakbaw ya ka manga Fandiya-Barita, ta nabakbak is taw, ginya tagbando kitay, Ham fag idwag fwayong domwag in Hisos ngayan has taw. Ginya madi ta nafalahaw ya.
44005041	Ka manga Fandiya-Barita kasolong wan noglahaw gis fanoltolan manga Hodyo maskin is Diyos nafaangay kitay ta fag gagwanta wan, nyawa manga taw igyod hanya, kawa ta galwasi in Hisos.
44005042	Sirang sirang sas Fanimbaan-Dahol, hanggan ha balay ha balay, tadwag logak igtoltol kawas Hisos kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi-hanggan-Gorangon.
44006001	Gis nanya fag masohod in Hisos manga katogbong no kaaywan, ka manga Hodyo ka kampang fangampangan Girigo igsogat has manga Hodyo ka kampang it sadili sanglitan. Taglwang, Kana ham nogfabayaan ka manga ina ka balo sa hyami? Kati ham fawa koray ha hyami manga ina balo kat bato tanggapon sirang sirang.
44006002	Yakanga ka Safolo-ha-Dowa nafatawag ka fakaaywanan fag manga katogbong, igfwayong has taw, Idwa fiya hami nogtohas igbarita in Diyos hampang kaarakitay igbahala has hanon.
44006003	Yakanga filiyan fitok ama gi hayo ka ha akwa ka Falad Maliyaw sat fangayofan sadi wak dahonya, fiyat ogali, madonong yadi. Ginya tam mamatohoyan tonya fag manga taw kagfahafod hanon has fagayo.
44006004	Dapat hami idwa fahoyangon igdarangin hanggan igbarita in Diyos hampang.
44006005	Fagayo nafaangay wan. Ta nafili in Istiban, ka marigon no katiwala in Diyos hanggan igfasakop has Falad Maliyaw. Ta nafili yadinda Filipi, da Forokoro, da Nikanor, da Timon, da Parminas, hanggan is Nikolas, ka taga Antiyokya, sadik Hintil ka nafasakop has fakatiwalaon Hodyo.
44006006	Ta nataban ka fitok ama has manga Fandiya-Barita. Ka manga Fandiya-Barita nandarangin hanggan nafwalid it manga gamat sasta baba alfoyo.
44006007	In Diyos hampang kaskat wan. In Hisos manga katogbong sas Hirosalim kabagat wa kaaywan, hanggan aywan fag manga fagalan-han-Diyos intiwala yadi.
44006008	In Diyos malooy fag kahowayan hanggan kadonongan sawan Istiban fangayofan sadi wak dahonya. Yakanga hanya nasyagan gibolon manga madolaw fag manga bagay hanggan manga fatimawa.
44006009	Dapat tiba taw gi sadik fanimbaan Hodyo, tagngayan Ista Nafalfas, nalaban in Istiban. Manga Hodyo gis Sirini, gis Alihandriya kagsimba sinya fag fanimbaan. Tonya hanggan manga Hodyo gis Silisya hanggan gis Asya ka nalaban in Istiban.
44006010	Tadwa syagan nadaog maskin in Istiban kadonongan gis Falad Maliyaw.
44006011	Yakanga ta natangdan odi mafyaloman manga ama bohagon kaglwang kitay, Mi nadog wan hanya no kampang igsalan han Mwisis hanggan han Diyos.
44006012	Maskin kitonya, tagfaisogon ka manga fagtahinan sas banwa, hanggan ka mangag faadal Batasan Hodyo kaarakitay omisog yadi in Istiban. Ginya madi ta nagamat in Istiban, nataban hanya has fanifonan Hodyo.
44006013	Taglwang, To fag ama idwag tohas igsalan kampang, iglwang ka Fanimbaan-Dahol idwa fiya, iglaban yadi ka Batasan Hodyo.
44006014	Mi nadog it hampang kitay, tonya fag is Hisos, taga Nasarit, fahakfo ka Fanimbaan-Dahol, hanggan faoman yadi in Mwisis manga faobonan ogali hantam.
44006015	Fagayo fag manga taw ka matokawan sas fanoltolan manga fagtahinan Hodyo igdoro wa fiya fiya in Istiban. Taglag it walong bilang yadi wa walong anghil.
44007001	Ginya ka gorangon fag fagalan gintaw in Istiban, Ista sombong hyamo orongan wa aw?
44007002	Is Istiban nasagot, Manga fadwasay, hanggan manga magorang, ham fag matalingan. Is Abraham intam pinagkaama no sayapdis sakop Misopotamiya, nodya nalin has banwa Haran, ka marigon hanggan kafiyaon fag Diyos nasabang hanya.
44007003	Nafwayong hanya kitay, Haw fag galin gim banwanan, obonan im manga kaiban. Haw fag hawangko fagfwayongon banwanan ha hyamo.
44007004	Ginya madis Abraham nalin wa ngay gis manga banwanan Kaldiyo, nabanwanan has Haran. Ginya madit ama no natay sas Haran, is Diyos nafaalin ya domwag in Abraham gis Haran, nafangolo hanya hastay fag banwanan, kantam banwanan kati.
44007005	Dapat ay, is Abraham no bago yapdi dasog, is Diyos idyag disag daga hanya, ngadi dahos basad dalohap, nyawas Diyos nafwayong hanya kitay, is Abraham hanggan it manga hasokfonan ka omafo tonya fag banwanan aban. No kitay di, is Abraham idya ha anak gis nanya.
44007006	Is Diyos nafwayong han Abraham kitay, Im hasokfonan domogayan sas iba banwanan aban. Tambali ista manga sogowan sinya, hanggan ka manga taga sinya mamahoriyan im manga hasokfonan ofat ik daan fangaraw.
44007007	Dapat is Diyos iglwang, Aho mamadosa yadi ka mangag fahoriyan im manga hasokfonan, ginya madi ta falahaw yas taw. Istay yadi fag banwanan im manga hasokfonan somimba ya hangko aban.
44007008	Is Diyos ha taranggapan han Abraham, hanggan natogon ka ogali igfatoli bilang tandaan kitay tan-aktom sas taranggapan. Yakangan Abraham anak, is Isaak nonsagaya, is Abraham natoli hanya sas fawalo fag sirang. Kitonya yadis Isaak natoli in Hakob hanggan is Hakob natoli it manga anak ama, safolo ha dowa, kanbali intam manga pinagkaama sas safolo ha dowak layonan in Israil manga hasokfonan.
44007009	Tonyantam hafofowan, intam fagngayanon tiba, in-ingli in Hosi hyabi. Ta nafasali ya ngadi hanya has taga Ihipto. Ka taga Ihipto nafabali in Hosi it sogowan. Dapat is Diyos sawa hanya,
44007010	nabawi hanya git lagan mahori fagayo. Is Diyos nafabali kitay is Faraon, ka gorangon sas sakop Ihipto, fag igbaya in Hosi kadonongan. Yakanga nafabali in Hosi ista tahinan sas Ihipto hanggan san Faraon sadili balay.
44007011	Gis nanya fag manga masohod, ka manga taw sas sakop Ihipto, hanggan sas sakop Kanaan sadi wak dahonya, gwayan wan, kawa kalonos wa dahol dahol. Intam manga pinagkaama idwa yadi ha faglagon it bato hanon.
44007012	Dapat ay, is Hakob no nadog kitay ha hanon sas Ihipto, nasogot manga anak hanya.
44007013	Ginya madi, sasta fadowa fag swali, is Hosi bago di nafadog hat manga fadwasay hanya no faktaw, hanggan is Faraon bago di nadog yadi is Hosi no ginda fag layonan taw.
44007014	Is Hosi nafatawag it ama hanggan it manga kaiban fagayo, gamtanan fitok safolo ha limak taw.
44007015	Ginya madis Hakob nadasog yadi has sakop Ihipto. Sinya wak natay hanggan wat manga anak, intam manga pinagkaama.
44007016	Ta natibo mandi ista habilogan, tiba tiba nyawasta botol odi, nadiya mandi nafaalin man has Sikim han Abraham nasali daga, it bato lobgobanan, it nasali gin Hamor manga anak.
44007017	Ginya madi aban, is Diyos no kaakbang wa kadisag it nagtogonan daga han Abraham hasokfonan, intam iba sas Ihipto inbali ayo ayo.
44007018	Ginya, no dogay, hanbali ya sadik gorangon sas Ihipto kadwa nahilala in Hosi.
44007019	Tonya yadi fag gorangon kagbohag ya ngadi intam manga hafofowan hyabi, hanggan igfahoriyan. Nafasognod has taw kitay, okasan ista manga anak dararag kaarakitay matay.
44007020	Gis nanya fag masohod is Mwisis nonsagaya, taglag kafiyaon fag anak, yakangat magorang naano hanya tolok magdanon sas basad balay.
44007021	Ginya ta no nafaalin in Mwisis has sokayan, matagowan yapdi, in Faraon dayaga nalag, nasafat, naano bilang wat sadili anak.
44007022	Ta nafadonong in Mwisis fagayo fag kadonongan taga Ihipto. Is Mwisis inbali marigon igtoltol hanggan gibolon.
44007023	Ginya madis Mwisis no ofat ik safolok fangaraw it kagorangan, kasaya manabang hat kaiban manga taga Israil.
44007024	Is Mwisis no nalag kitay ka sadik taga Ihipto gisog ka sadik taga Israil, is Mwisis naapin ka taga Israil hanggan nafahatay ka taga Ihipto.
44007025	In Mwisis fangayofan it manga kaiban nangos tomwa wagdog kitay, is Diyos nafili in Mwisis kaarakitay omapin is taw. Dapat tadwa twagdog.
44007026	Nonbago marom, is Mwisis no nasabang ya, nalag ya ngay ka mandi kapariho taga Israil gawayan, gayfan lomilang is taw, nalwang, Ham myasa wa taga Israil, kana mayon ham no gawayan?
44007027	Dapat kagdaog it ofod, natolod ogbot in Mwisis, iglwang, Faktaw ka nafabali hyamo hyami fangabaya?
44007028	Ngatay haw kasaya ya ngay mamahatay angko, kito kam naibolon fafon ha sadik taga Ihipto?
44007029	Is Mwisis no nadog ista hampang, hanya nalagyo dan. Nabanwanan sas sakop Madian. No madogayan sinya, it anak ama dowa.
44007030	Ginya madi, nonsagaya ofat ik safolok fangaraw sinya, is Mwisis no ayayo gista manga banwanan, akbang has moyod Sinay, is Diyos nafalag hanya sadik anghil sas fon hayo libaba, gigang.
44007031	Is Mwisis indolaw wat lagan. Ginya, no gakbang kaarakitay bomantay fiya fiya, is Mwisis nadog kagfon intam it hasnog iglwang kitay,
44007032	Aho im manga hafofowan Diyos, inda Abraham, da Isaak, da Hakob Diyos. Is Mwisis karokog wa kadala, kadala wagbantay.
44007033	Ginyas Diyos nafwayong hanya, Bol yap im lapak maskin im faglidan daga intohoyan han Diyos.
44007034	Ho fadi wadag lag kitay ka taga Ihipto igdaog angko sakop. Hogdog wa kitay ta gwayanan wan. Hogdokson wan kaarakitay bomawi is taw. Kati yabay ho somogo hyamo has Ihipto.
44007035	To fag is Mwisis kasta fakaplaon igdog, ta noglwang Fakta ka nafabali hyamo hyami fangabaya? Is Mwisis kan Diyos nasogo kaarakitay imbali ista fagtahinan hanggan famawi, hanya no nalag in Diyos anghil sas fon hayo libaba.
44007036	Is Mwisis ka nataban ka manga taga Israil gis Ihipto, hanya no gibolon manga fatimawa hanggan falagon madolaw, ta no sas sakop Ihipto yapdi, ta no sas Dagat Dararag, hanggan ta no basad fakahyabogan ofat ik safolok fangaraw.
44007037	To wa fag Mwisis ka nalwang han Israil manga hasokfonan, Is Diyos fatohoyan gi hayo aban sadik fangampang kito mandingko.
44007038	To wa fag Mwisis ka sinya in Israil manga hasokfonan nontifonan basad fakahyabogan. Hanya ka kampang has anghil hyabi, ka anghil no kampang ha hanya hanggan hantam manga hafofowan sas Moyod Sinay. Hanya ka natanggap gin Diyos ka hampang kagfaboyag is taw kaarakitay igdisag hantam.
44007039	Dapat ay, intam manga hafofowan dayo katanog in Mwisis, ta napla odig dog, fagaba gayfan has Ihipto.
44007040	Taglwang han Aaron, Falowan hyami manga faglohodan malagan ka fomangolo hyami, kawas Mwisis ka nataban hyami gis Ihipto, midwa twa no kinday sinya.
44007041	Gis nanya, ta nahalig tolad anak baka faglohodan. Nasogba yadi manga hayopan has bilog tolad, hanggan nafanolodan wa sinya.
44007042	Yakangas Diyos nagoyoyan has taw, nafabayaan wa ta noglohod has manga fanggasan sas banwa sam tongod, kito kansorat san Diyos fangampang sorat, Ham mangan Israil hasokfonan, ham no nadogay ofat ik safolok fangaraw basad fakahyabogan, Hawangko anod awkin ham igsogba manga hayopan, hanggan igdisag manga disagon?
44007043	Bonwa mawat, in Molok balay-rotay ka hayo nadiya hanggan in Rimfan fanggasan ka hayo faglohodan. Ka hayo nadiya kawa hayo sadili gamat nahalig manga tolad faglohodan, Yakanga ho omokas odi hayo has dayo Babilonya.
44007044	Intam hafofowan nogdogayan yapdi basad fakahyabogan, ka Balay-Rotay kagfatohoyan in Diyos taranggapan has taw, sinya yadi wan. Inhalig fiya fiya kiton Diyos togon han Mwisis no nafalag hanyat fagtoladon.
44007045	Ginya madis Mwisis no natay, it manga anak man ka nabahala ka Balay-Rotay, hanggan is Hosi no sasta fagonan is Diyos no nafaalin tibak layonan taw gin Diyos disagon fag banwanan, is Hosi no nataban in Israil hasokfonan hanya, tagdiya yapdi ka Balay-Rotay. Sinya yapdi ka Balay-Rotay hyabi hanggan nadasog han Dabid kasta Gorangon.
44007046	Is Dabid in Diyos wa fagbayaon, hanggan hanyag sagad kitay is Diyos faangayan kitay hanya mangalig balay ka maangay han Hakob Diyos.
44007047	Dapat is Salomon odi, kan Dabid anak, ka nahalig tonya fag balay.
44007048	Dapat ay, is Diyos ka Abwat man has Fagayo, idwag banwanan sasta manga gamat nahalig balay, kito kan Diyos fangampang fwayong,
44007049	Ka banwa sam tongod angko tokawan fanokawan gorangon, Hanggan ka daga angko yadi lidan. Kana fag balay hayo torokon domwag hangko, Siday nangos hayo falo angko famahowayan?
44007050	Bonwa awkin aho ka nahalig to fag manga bagay fagayo?
44007051	Is Istiban igtoltol yapdi has taw, iglwang, Hayo manga fangayofan maganit wa dahol. Idwan bago hayo manga ogali. Ham kito yadi ka hayo manga hafofowan gis hyabi. Ham fagaba wagsongat ka Falad Maliyaw.
44007052	Hayo manga hafofowan nafahoriyan in Diyos manga fangampang fagayo. Ta nafahatay yadi kagfwayong kitay, is Maslong imbangkad aban, hanggan ham naoyon it manga kalaban hanggan wa nafahatay in Maslong.
44007053	Ham fadi wad nadog in Diyos manga togon git manga anghil, dapat ham idwan tanog.
44007054	Ka fanifonan Hodyo sadi wak kayonya, no nadog in Istiban toltol, nangarigitan it manga ngifon kawa ta kaisog hanya.
44007055	Dapat is Istiban, kawa ka Falad Maliyaw sawa hanya sadi wak dahonya, hanya nabantay has tongod, nalag in Diyos kayawaan, nalag yadin Hisos malindogan san Diyos balis sihon.
44007056	Is Istiban iglwang, Yabay yabay, hoglag in Diyos banwanan maboklasan, hanggan Kanbali Taw, malindogan san Diyos balis sihon.
44007057	Dapat ka manga taw nataklob it manga talinga, dayog dog in Istiban fwayong, naringgit wan. Ginya ta natarabangan natoklos in Istiban.
44007058	Ta nagoyod hanya has sokayan banwa, nabintok hanggan wa nafahatay hanya. Ka manga nadog in Istiban hampang haraw, naloslos it manga balokas, nafamataw sas anahan akbang, kawas Sawlo.
44007059	Ta nogbintok yapdin Istiban, is Istiban nandarangin, nalwang, Hisos, angko Fon, ha tanggapan wangko falad kati.
44007060	Ginyas Istiban nanlingkohodan natawag marigon, Angko Fon, haw nangos fag idwag botang ista naibolon dwat hangko.
44008001	Is Sawlo igfaangay yadi was taw ta nogfahatay in Istiban. Gis nanya yadi fag sirang manga taw igfadagos igfahoriyan wa dahol dahol in Diyos Tifonan sas banwa Hirosalim. Ka mangan tiwala nanhalagyowanan wan gis banwa Hirosalim, hawas manga sakop Hodiya hanggan Samariya. Dapat ka manga Fandiya-Barita idwa nalagyo.
44008002	Ka manga taw ka katanog in Diyos nalobgob in Istiban, nangodgorawan yadi.
44008003	Dapat ay, is Sawlo talaga wagdwat in Diyos Tifonan. Nagombalay, igsakbaw, goyod yadi ginya ka mangan tiwala, nyawa ama, nyawa ina, ginyag faporiso.
44008004	Ka mangan tiwala nonsarowayan, ta nabarita di ngap in Diyos hampang nyawa hada kandasog.
44008005	Is Filipi hawas sadik banwa sakop Samariya, nabarita has taw in Diyos-natogon-Famawi-hanggan-Gorangon.
44008006	Ka fakaaywanan no nadog it hampang, hanggan nalag it manga falagon madolaw, insadi ista fangayofan tomalinga fiya fiya.
44008007	Aywan fag manga labang nalin gis taw, igharokyawan no galin wan. Aywan yadi fag manga gafilay hanggan fihong infiya wan.
44008008	Yakanga sinya fag banwa tagbaya wa dahol.
44008009	Dapat ha sadik ama sinya, is Simon, dogay wagfataka has manga taga Samariya, iglipat maskin. Hanyag fabali kitay hanya kasta fagdogan.
44008010	Nyawa ka ha manga kangayanan abwat, hanggan kadwa ha manga kangayanan, fagayo igtalinga hanya. Fagayo iglwang, To fag ama kasta faglwangon in Diyos karigonan, is Marigon.
44008011	Dogay wa gis hyabi is Simon idwag logak igfatakas taw, kawag lipat. Yakanga fagayo igtalinga wa hanya.
44008012	Dapat is Filipi no nabarita kawa han Diyos sakop, hanggan kawa han Kiristo Hisos ngayan, ta katiwala yadi wan, nyawa ama, nyawa ina, hanggan intogna yadi.
44008013	Hanggan was Simon intiwala, hanggan nontogna wan, gofod in Filipi, nyawa haday. Is Simon kataka waglag in Filipi manga fagfalagon madolaw hanggan fatimawa.
44008014	Ka manga Fandiya-Barita sas Hirosalim no nadog kitay manga taga Samariya intiwala han Diyos hampang, ta nasogo inda Pidro da Hwan has sakop Samariya.
44008015	Ta no nadasog, ta nandarangin yapdi kawa has mangan tiwala sas Samariya, kaarakitay ka Falad Maliyaw fag sas taw yadi,
44008016	maskin idya ha akwa, nyawa faktaw, kawa san Hisos kagfon intam it ngayan lamang ta nontogna.
44008017	Ginya madi da Pidro da Hwan nafwalid ista manga gamat hasta baba alfoyo kaarakitay ta tomanggap ka Falad Maliyaw.
44008018	Is Simon no nalag kitay ka Falad Maliyaw indisag has taw ka manga Fandiya-Barita nogfwalid ista manga gamat hasta baba alfoyo, is Simon iglwang,
44008019	Ho manlobos yadi wan. Ho somali wa hayo kaarakitay aho nangos fag kitonya yadi hayo, igdisag ka Falad Maliyaw has taw aho nogfwalid angko gamat hasta baba alfoyo.
44008020	Is Pidro nasagot, Im kwarta imtahin yadi hyamo imdwat. Maskin haw gayfan in Diyos disag ngandayo fagsaliyon.
44008021	Hadwa ha tanggapon tonya fag bagay. Idwa maangay sa hyamo, kawas Diyos twa kitay hyamo fangayofan dwat yapdi.
44008022	Haw fag soyo yap, fag darangin hasagfon intam, kaarakitay nomtwa di, hanya faliyam nangos im fagayfanon dwat.
44008023	Kawa hoglag haw kaingli wa dahol, bilang magafosan sas ogali dwat.
44008024	Is Simon iglwang, Ham fag sakop angko igdarangin hasagfon intam kaarakitay kam nafwayong angko manga dwat idwa omakbang hangko.
44008025	Ginya da Pidro infwali ya has banwa Hirosalim nonsagaya wagbarita hanggan igfaorongan kagfon intam it hampang has fakaaywanan fag manga banwanan sas Samariya.
44008026	Ginya madin Diyos anghil nasogo in Filipi, nalwang, Haw fag hanya wa dagos has Ihipto baliwa, has dalan has Gasa. Tonyag dalan sas fakahyabogan.
44008027	Yakangas Filipi hanya wan. No sawas dalan is Filipi nalag sadik ama bating, taga Itiyopya, kagbahala han Kandasi manga botang fagayo, kawas Kandasi ka gorangon ina gis nanya sas sakop Itiyopya. Ka ama bago di goli gis Hirosalim, kawa nanimba ginya.
44008028	Ka ama masahayan basad kalisa, igbasa in Isayas, in Diyos fangampang nasorat.
44008029	Ka Falad Maliyaw nafwayong han Filipi, Ha hoyogan wan tonya fag kalisa.
44008030	Is Filipi nadalandan wa ogbot, naakbang has ama ka masahayan, igdog ka ama igbasa in Isayas, in Diyos fangampang nasorat. Ginya madis Filipi gintaw hanya, Haw aw twa ngagdog kam fagbasaon?
44008031	Ka ama nasagot, Kinda araw aho no tomwa wagdog nodwa hagfwayong angko? Ginyag lwang han Filipi, Haw fag sahay yadi wan, fag is nwa, sangko akbang.
44008032	To kat fagbasaon gis nanya, No kinday ka topa idwa gawang ta nogtaban has famahatayan, Hanggan no kinday ka anak topa idwa gawang ta noglokfog hanya, Kitonya yadi hanyadwa gawang.
44008033	Ta nogfahoriyan hanya, tadwag fadalan hasagtalinga hampangan, ta nafahayan odi hanya, Idwa akwa sokfon Maskin it haboyagan sas baba daga inbol di.
44008034	Ginya madi ka ama taga Itiyopya naintaw in Filipi kitay no faktaw kan Diyos fangampang faglwangon sat nabasa, ngatay it sadili ngatay iba taw ya kat faglwangon.
44008035	Ginyat fagbasaon, is Filipi natoltol ka Fiya fag Barita kawa han Hisos.
44008036	Ta noglahaw yapdi tandasog sas ha danom. Ka amag lwang, Idwa aw fiya haw no mamatogna angko?
44008037	Is Filipi nasagot, iglwang, Fiya di haw nomtiwala sadi wak dahonya fangayofan. Ka amag sagot, Ahon tiwala wan kitay is Kiristo Hisos in Diyos wa Anak.
44008038	Ka ama nafatorosan wat kalisa a, ta dowa nadokson wan, hawas basad danom. Is Filipi nafatogna ka ama sinya.
44008039	Ta no nalahaw gis basad danom, kagfon intam it Falad dagos wa nataban in Filipi. Ginya ka ama idwa nalag domwag in Filipi. Nafadagos wat lahawan, masolong wan.
44008040	Dapat is Filipi indasog sas banwa Asoto. Ginya madi natoltol ka Fiya fag Barita kat nagdalanan banwa fagayo hanggan wandasog sas banwa Sisariya.
44009001	Dapat ay is Sawlo igfadagos wagfahoriyan hanggan wagfahatay kagfon intam it manga katogbong. Yakangay hanya naakbang has gorangon fag fagalan,
44009002	nanagad manga sorat famalag has manga fanimbaan Hodyo sas banwa Damasko, kaarakitay faangayan hanya no gomamat nyawa faktat lagan sinya, nyawa ama, nyawa ina, kagfasakop has Ogali Bago. Ginya madi tomaban tonya, magafosan, has Hirosalim.
44009003	Da Sawlo no kaakbang wa has banwa Damasko, sadi odi ginan nayawa masilaw gim tongod san Sawlo ligongan.
44009004	Yakangas Sawlo inlohob odi. Ginya madi nadog sadik hasnog kampang ha hanya, iglwang, Sawlo, Sawlo, kana mayon haw nogfahoriyan angko?
