44009005	Is Sawlo naintaw, Faktaw haw, angko Fon? Ha nasagot hanya, Aho kawas Hisos kam fagfahoriyon.
44009006	Haw fag lindog, fag hawas basad banwa. Haw no hanya, ha bago domog kam bato ibolonon.
44009007	In Sawlo manga ofod idwa gawang gawang. Ta nadog ongay ka hasnog dapat tadwa ha lagan taw.
44009008	Is Sawlo inlindog, mafogan di ongay it mata, dapat idwag lag. Yakanga ta nagamit odi hanya has basad banwa Damasko.
44009009	Tolo wak sirang is Sawlo idwag lag, idwa ha nahwan, idwa nainom.
44009010	Yabay, gis nanya, in Hisos katogbong sadi sinya yadis Damasko, kawas Ananiyas. Kagfon intam no nafalag madolaw hanya, nangayan hanya, nalwang, Ananiyas. Is Ananiyas nasagot, Angko Fon, kana tonya?
44009011	Kagfon intam nafwayong, Haw fag kalindog, haw fag hawas karsada kat ngayan, Maslong, haw intawan sinya in Hodas balay, ligawan in Sawlo, taga Tarso sinya. Katis Sawlo igdarangin wan.
44009012	Ha nafalag hanya madolaw. Nalag haw igsakbaw hat oliyanan, ginyag fwalid im gamat ha hanya kaarakitay it mata lomag ya.
44009013	Dapat is Ananiyas iglwang, Angko Fon, gwadi aywan fag manga taw kagfwayong angko kitay tonya fag taw dwat it ibolon fagayo has manga taw kantohoyan ha hyamo sas Hirosalim.
44009014	Ginya madi hanya, hono, inbangkad yadi hastay is Damasko, madiyan it kasoratan gis manga fagtahinan fagalan, kaarakitay gomafos fagayo istay kagsyag ha hyamo.
44009015	Dapat ay, kagfon intam nafwayong han Ananiyas, Ha ngap fag hanya wan. Maskin hanya kangko nafili kaarakitay igfahilala angko ngayan has manga Hintil, has manga gorangon, hanggan han Israil manga hasokfonan.
44009016	Ho fadog hanya fagayo kat bato agwantaon aban maskin galwasi angko.
44009017	Ginya madi yabay, is Ananiyas hanya wa ngay. Nasakbaw basad balay, igfwalid it gamat san Sawlo, iglwang, Fadwasay Sawlo, kagfon intam, is Hisos, ka nafalag ha hyamo sas boknga dalan, haw noglahaw hastay, kagsogo angko hastay kaarakitay im mata lomag ya, hanggan ka Maliyaw fag Falad fag sawa hyamo sadi wak dahonya.
44009018	Dagos handagdag manga bilang siksik gin Sawlo mata. Ginya hanya nalag ya. Dagos wa nalahaw, nafatogna yadi wan.
44009019	Ginya madi yabay, hanya no nangwan ya hanon, inrigon wan. Is Sawlo nadogay yapdi ogbot sas Damasko, gofodan in Hisos manga katogbong sinya.
44009020	Dagos wagfadog sas manga fanimbaan Hodyo kawa han Hisos, igfaorongan kitay hanyan Diyos wa Anak.
44009021	Fagayo intaka wagdog, taglwang, Bohonwa awkin to ka ama ka dan igfahoriyan has mangag syag han Hisos ngayan sas Hirosalim? Bonwa awkin tonya yadi kanbangkad hastay kaarakitay gomamat tonya fag manga taw, tomaban yadi magafosan has manga fagtahinan fagalan?
44009022	Dapat kawas Sawlo kabagat wa kafiyaon nogfaadal, ka manga Hodyo ka mabanwanan istay sas Damasko, idwa twag sagot, maskin hanya goronganan wagfatohoyan kitay, is Hisos kan Diyos nga natogon-Famawi.
44009023	No dogay ogbot, ka manga Hodyo nangoyonan kitay fahatayan in Sawlo.
44009024	Dapat is Sawlo nadog wan. Yabi sirang ta golog in Sawlo sas manga sakbawan alad banwa kaarakitay fahatay hanya.
44009025	Dapat basad yabi it manga katogbong natonton in Sawlo basad baban dahol, has dayo alad bato.
44009026	Ginya madis Sawlo nondasog sas Hirosalim, gwayan wa kasaya omaktom has manga katogbong sinya. Dapat ta kadala yapdi, tadwa katiwala kitay kati is Sawlo sadi yadik katogbong.
44009027	Dapat is Barnabi nataban in Sawlo has manga Fandiya-Barita. Is Barnabi nafatwagdog has taw no kinday no sas boknga dalan, is Sawlo nalag kagfon intam, hanggan kagfon intam nahampang hanya. Nalwang yadi kitay is Sawlo no sas Damasko idwa kadala igfaoronganan kawa han Hisos.
44009028	Ginya yabay is Sawlo gofodan has taw sas Hirosalim, idwa yadi kadalag toltol sinya sat ngayan kagfon intam.
44009029	Hanyag fatoltolan hanggan igfabodbohagan has manga Hodyo ka kampang fangampangan Girigo. Dapat ta kasaya wagfahatay in Sawlo.
44009030	Ka manga fadwasay natwa di ngay, ta nataban in Sawlo has lwad, has banwa Sisariya, ginya ta nafaoli mandi hanya has banwa Tarso.
44009031	Ginya madi yabay, sa sadi wak dahonya sakop Hodiya, sakop Galiliya, hanggan sakop Samariya, idwa hagfahoriyan in Diyos Tifonan. Kawa ta katanog kagfon intam it manga togon, ka mangan tiwala inrigon ya, inaywan ya, hanggan igfadagos yapdi kaayo kawa ka Maliyaw fag Falad igtogbong yadi.
44009032	Is Pidro noglahaw igsabang has manga fadwasay sas ligongan, indasog has lwad, igsabang has mangan tiwala sas banwa Lida.
44009033	Sinyas Pidro nalag sadik ama, is Iniyas, idwa syagan kimot, walok fangaraw maigyanan odi.
44009034	Is Pidro iglwang hanya, Iniyas, is Kiristo Hisos kagfafiya hyamo. Ha fag lindog wan, fafiyanan yap im sagmak. Hanyan lindog wa dagos.
44009035	Fagayo ka sas banwa Lida hanggan sas banwa Saron nalag is Iniyas nonfiya, yakanga tantiwala hasagfon intam.
44009036	Sas banwa Hopi man ha sadik ina in Hisos katogbong, is Tabita, fagaba wa gibolon fiya, igtogbong has manga myabog. In Tabita ngayan sas fangampangan Girigo, is Dorkas.
44009037	Gis nanya fag manga masohod, is Dorkas insagit, natay wan. Ta no nafyad it habilogan, ta nafwalid sas tongod fag salogan.
44009038	Ka banwa Lida akbang di has banwa Hopi, yakanga manga katogbong no nadog kitay is Pidro sadis Lida mangharaw, ta nasogo dowak ama fanabang hanya, iglwang, Sabangan nangos hyami, fag ngalay wan.
44009039	Is Pidro naofod wa ka dowak ama. Nondasog sinya, ta nafasakbaw wa dagos in Pidro has tongod fag salogan. Ka manga ina balo fagayo goraw yapdi, gobok in Pidro. Ta nafalag in Pidro manga homot, manga balokas in Dorkas nahalig, hanya no boyagan yapdi.
44009040	Dapat is Pidro nafadokson yap fagayo. Ginya nanlingkohodan, nandarangin. Ginya madi nasayango has natay, iglwang, Tabita, ha fakabangon wan. Ginya in Dorkas mata infoga ya. No nalag in Pidro, intokaw wan.
44009041	Is Pidro natawid it gamat, natogbong igfalindog. Ginya madis Pidro nafatawag ka mangan tiwala hanggan ka manga ina balo. Nafalag is taw kitay is Dorkas boyagan ya.
44009042	Indog wan ha sadik dahonya sas banwa Hopi. Yakanga aywan kantiwala hasagfon intam.
44009043	Is Pidro nandogayan yapdi sas Hopi sat sangay Simon balay kagfafiyan anit baka fakaligon.
44010001	Sas banwa Sisariya ha sadik ama, is Kornilyo, sadik fagtahinan sondalo taga Roma. It sakop habanan sondalo sadik daan gis sakop Italya.
44010002	Is Kornilyo igsimba han Diyos hanggan katanog yadit manga togon. It manga ofod sas balay kitonya yadi. Is Kornilyo fagabag togbong has manga Hodyo myabog. Fagaba yadig darangin han Diyos.
44010003	Sadi ginan, dayo myanit kalibaba, is Kornilyo ha lagan madolaw, nalag fiya fiya in Diyos anghil sadi igsakbaw hat basad balay, igngayan hanya, iglwang, Kornilyo.
44010004	Is Kornilyo nadoro wa fiya fiya ka anghil kawa kadala wa dahol dahol, ginyag sagot, Kana tonya? Ka anghil iglwang, Is Diyos igdog im manga darangin hanggan iglag hyamo togbong has manga myabog, yakanga hanyag tohod hyamo.
44010005	Yabay, sogowan manga taw has banwa Hopi kati, kaarakitay tomaban hastay sadik ama, is Simon, kawasta faglwangon is Pidro.
44010006	Hanya maoliyanan sas bahalan dagat, sat sangay Simon balay kagfafiyan manga anit baka fakaligon.
44010007	Ka anghil nonlahaw, is Kornilyo natawag dowak sogowan hanggan sadik sondalo, ka katanog yadin Diyos manga togon, ka maofodan fagaba hanya.
44010008	Is Kornilyo no nafwayong hat manga sogowan it lagan fagayo, nasogo was taw has banwa Hopi.
44010009	No bago marom, in Kornilyo sogowan no kaakbang has Hopi, no kaboknga wa sirang, is Pidro nafanyak has baba balay kaarakitay mandarangin sinya.
44010010	Is Pidro kalonos wa dahol dahol gis nanya, dapat ta nogfatalaga yapdi fanganon, is Diyos nafalag madolaw han Pidro.
44010011	Hanya nalag kitay, ka banwa maboklasan, hanggan bilang homot dahol katonton gis tongod, matagbongan gis ofat ik fongfongan.
44010012	Fagayo fag manga hayopan sinya wan basad homot, ka mangag lahaw hanggan ka manga gilafang sas baba daga, hanggan ka manga manok kaglayog sas tongod.
44010013	Is Pidro ha donggon hasnog kaglwang kitay, Pidro, ha fag lindog wan, ha fag fahatay a, fakwan wan.
44010014	Is Pidro igsagot, Angko Fon, no ngayan di aho, hodwa mananog tonya. Nyawa ginahin hodya ha nahwan no kadintam fagbaybayon.
44010015	Ginyas Pidro nadog ya domwag ka hasnog iglwang kitay, Haw fag idwag ngayan fagbaybayon kan Diyos manga nafabali maangay.
44010016	Tolo ginan naolit kitonya. Ginya madi ka bilang homot in-abwat has tongod.
44010017	Is Pidro no garisipon yapdi no kanat kahologan it lagan, in Kornilyo manga sogowan, no natwa wan in Simon balay, naakbang has sakbawan a,
44010018	igtawag kitay, ngatay is Simon Pidro sinya no goli.
44010019	Is Pidro no garisipon garisipon yapdit manga lagan, in Diyos Falad nafwayong hanya kitay, Yabay, tolok ama igsayak hyamo.
44010020	Ha fag dokson wan, fag idwa kafang gofod is taw, maskin aho ka nasogo tonya hastay.
44010021	Yakangas Pidro nadokson wan, iglwang has taw, Aho ka hayo fagligawon. Kana hayo bolon?
44010022	Tagsagot kitay, Sadik fagtahinan sondalo Roma, is Kornilyo, ka nasogo hyami hastay. Is Kornilyo fiya fag taw, katanog yadin Diyos. Sadi wak layonan manga Hodyo fagayo iggalang hanya. Sadik anghil maliyaw kagfwayong han Kornilyo, Fasonsonan manga taw han Pidro kaarakitay ham domog it fwayong.
44010023	Is Pidro nafasakbaw ka manga ama, nafatoyog sinya gis nanya fag yabi. No marom marom, da Pidro natahin yadi was taw, hanggan manga fadwasay tiba gis banwa Hopi naofod yadi hanya.
44010024	No domwag sirang, ta nadasog wan has banwa Sisariya. Da Kornilyo hanggan it manga kaiban, hanggan it manga fakilalaon fiya fiya, kat nasabang, sinya wak matifonan, mafanayan is taw.
44010025	Da Pidro no kadasog, is Kornilyo natagbo was taw, nanlingkohodan yapdi han Pidro, iglohod hanya.
44010026	Dapat is Pidro igfalindog hanya, iglwang, Ha fag lindog. Aho taw di kito yadi hyamo.
44010027	Tagfadagos wagtoltolan hanggan wa ha basad balay. Is Pidro iglag taw kaaywanon matifonan sinya.
44010028	Is Pidrog fwayong, Ham fadi wadagdog ka manga ogali Hodyo igbando, fag idwa gofod ngadig sabang has manga bonwa Hodyo. Dapat is Diyos nafatohoyan angko kitay, aho fag idwag lwang nyawa faktaw fagbaybayon.
44010029	Yakanga ham no nafasabang angko, hodwa kafang hastay ha hayo. Kati ho kasaya domog no kana ka hayo fagsabangon angko.
44010030	Ginya madis Kornilyo igsagot, Manga ofat ik yabi itfagonan, dayo myanit kalibaba, kito ka kati, ahog darangin istay sangko balay. Yabay, sadi wa ginan sadik ama, it solong masilaw wan, nalindog sangko atobangan,
44010031	iglwang, Kornilyo, is Diyos igdog im manga darangin, igbaya yadig lag hyamo manga natogbong.
44010032	Ha fasabangan in Simon Pidro sas banwa Hopi, hanya maoliyanan sat sangay Simon balay, sas gobang dagat, ka Simon kagfafiyan anit baka fakaligon.
44010033	Yakanga ho nasogo wa dagos ha hyamo. Salamat, ha ngap inbangkad wa ngay. Kati mi fagayo istay wan matifonan san Diyos faglagan kaarakitay tomalinga hyamo, haw nogtoltol ha hyami kagfon intam it fwayongon.
44010034	Ginyas Pidro igfwayong kitay, Ho bago di natwa fiya fiya kitay is Diyos idwa ha fagfiliyon taw, mangharaw.
44010035	Ka manga katanog hanya hanggan gogali yadi fiya, maangay han Diyos nyawa ginda fag layonan taw.
44010036	Ham nadog in Diyos natogon hampang has manga taga Israil nogfadog ka Fiya fag Barita no kinday tam noglag kahowayan nomsadi san Kiristo Hisos, hanya kagfon fagayo fagayo.
44010037	Ham natwa wan no kana kan-anod sas sakop Hodiya sadi wak dahonya, gis Galiliya tonya no nafabago, giwan Hwan igfaadal hasagfatogna baliwa.
44010038	Ham twa wan no kinday is Diyos nafatohoyan kitay is Hisos taga Nasarit ngay it natogon Famawi, maskin nadisag hanyat Falad Maliyaw, hanggan it kadonongan. Maskin is Diyos sawa hanya, it manga naibolon kafiyaon. Hanya, nyawa hadak nalahaw, nafafiya fagayo kan Fandaya nafahoriyan.
44010039	Hyami wa mata lagan it manga naibolon fagayo sas fakadaholan banwanan Hodyo hanggan sas banwa Hirosalim. Ta nafapako di ngap hanya, nafasakbit sas nafatimbangan hayo.
44010040	Dapat ay, sas fatolo fag sirang, is Diyos nafaboyag ya hanya, ginya nafalag hanya has taw,
44010041	idya has fakaaywanan, hayapdi hyami kan Diyos manga nafili gis hyabi, kaarakitay hami faorongan hyami mata lagan. Ha hyami is Hisos nogsayowan kwan, manga ginom, hanya nonboyag ya domwag.
44010042	Is Diyos natogon ha hyami kitay mi fag tomoltol hanggan fag faorongan kawas Hisos kan Diyos nafatalaga ka fangabaya has manga taw, nyawa ka manga boyagan yapdi, nyawa ka natay hyabi.
44010043	Tonya wa kan Diyos manga fangampang faglwangon fagayo kitay, nyawa faktaw kamtiwala hanya, imliyam it manga naogali dwat, ta nogsyag in Hisos ngayan.
44010044	Is Pidro idya katabo kampang, ka Maliyaw fag Falad dagos wa nadokson has fagayo kagtalinga hanya.
44010045	Kan Pidro manga taban Hodyo ka danwan tiwala, indolaw wan ta no nalag ka Falad Maliyaw inlobos yadi has manga Hintil.
44010046	Tagdog yadi ka manga Hintil kampang manga sanglitan madolaw, hanggan igfasayagdog han Diyos. Yakangas Pidro iglwang,
44010047	Kito yadintam ka Maliyaw fag Falad inlobos yadi has taw. Fakta fag taw nangos, ham gayfan, ka bomando kaarakitay to fag manga taw idwam togna?
44010048	Ginyas Pidro nalwang, Fatognaan wan to fag manga taw san Kiristo Hisos ngayan. Ginya madi taglwang kitay is Pidro nangos fag domogay yapdi sinya no kayodak yabi.
44011001	Yakanga ka manga Fandiya-Barita hanggan ka manga fadwasay sas sakop Hodiya nadog kitay ha manga Hintil katiwala yadi wa han Diyos hampang.
44011002	Ginya da Pidro no nalahaw has bohid, has Hirosalim, ka manga fadwasay ka mahogod yapdi has ogali Hodyo, nangato in Pidro.
44011003	Taglwang ha hanya, Kana haw no mailihodan yadi has nwa fag manga Hintil kadwan toli? Hagsayo yadi was taw ta no kwan.
44011004	Dapat is Pidro natoltol has taw gis fabagowanan kat lagan fagayo.
44011005	Is Pidro igfwayong kitay, Itfagonan, aho no sas banwa Hopi, aho ha lagan madolaw gin Diyos. Aho nogdarangin, kangko lagan bilang wa kitos sadik homot dahol, matagbongan, intonton gis tongod hangko akbang.
44011006	Ho nabantay wa fiya fiya. Hoglag sinya ha akwa wan fagayo fagayo fag manga hayopan kaglahaw, hanggan ka gilafang sas baba daga, idwa ha yod, hanggan ka manga manok kaglayog sam tongod.
44011007	Ginya madi ho nadog sadik hasnog iglwang kitay, Kalibang Pidro, fag fahatay wa a, fakwan wan.
44011008	Dapat hoglwang, Angko Fon, nyawa kindawan hodwa kasaya. Ngadi sadi ginan hodwa ha nahwan kantam manga fagbaybayon.
44011009	Ginya ho nadog ya domwag ka hasnog gim tongod iglwang kitay, Fag idwag lwang fagbaybayon kan Diyos nafabali maangay.
44011010	Ka bilang wa homot tolo ginan intonton. Yakangan fwali ya ham tongod.
44011011	Gis nanya fag kasohodan fiya fiya, tolok ama kasta nasogo hangko gis banwa Sisariya indasog sangko fagoliyanan fag balay.
44011012	Ka Maliyaw fag Falad nalwang hangko, Haw fag idwag fadogayon, tahinan wastaw. To fag onom ik fadwasay natahin yadi wangko. Ginya madi mi nasakbaw han Kornilyo basad balay.
44011013	Is Kornilyo nafwayong yadi ha hyami kitay, itfagonan hanya nalag in Diyos anghil sadi malindogan sat basad balay, igfwayong hanya, Haw sogowan manga taw has banwa Hopi, fasabangan in Simon Pidro.
44011014	Hanya fomwayong ha hyamo no kinday haw, hanggan sadi wak kayonya sam balay, nombawi.
44011015	Ginya madi, araw, hogfabago wa ongay igtoltol. Ka Maliyaw fag Falad dagos wa nadokson has manga taw, kito yadi nogdokson hyabi hantam.
44011016	Ho natohod yadi kantam Fon fwayong kitay, Sas danom is Hwan nogfatogna manga taw, dapat ay, sas Maliyaw fag Falad ham nomtogna aban.
44011017	Is Diyos nogdisag yadi has taw kito yadi kat nadisag hantam hyabi, tam nontiwala hantam Fon is Kiristo Hisos, faktaw aho, ham gayfan, kaarakitay bomando in Diyos ibolon?
44011018	Yabay, ta nadog di ngay kitonya, ta dagos wantohas gidolog in Pidro. Yabay, tagfasaya yadi wagdog han Diyos. Taglwang, No kitonya mangharaw, is Diyos igdisag has manga Hintil kitay, ta fag somoyo yadi kaarakitay imbawi wan.
44011019	Giwasta nafahatay in Istiban, ha mangag fahoriyan ka mangam tiwala, yakanga ta nanarowayan wan. Tiban dasog has sakop Finisya, tiba has foyo dagat Sipri, tiba has banwa Antiyokya sas sakop Siriya. Ta nabarita in Diyos hampang nyawa siday kandasog, dapat has manga Hodyo lamang.
44011020	Ginya madi ha mangam tiwala, manga taga banwa Sirini sas foyo dagat Sipri, indasog has Antiyokya. Ta nogfaadal, ha yadis manga Girigo ka Fiya fag Barita kawa han Hisos intam Fon.
44011021	Intam Fon karigonan sawas taw. Yakanga kaaywanon wan kantiwala, igsyag hantam Fon.
44011022	Ginya madin Diyos Tifonan sas Hirosalim, no nadog kitonya, nasogo in Birnabi has banwa Antiyokya.
44011023	Is Birnabi nondasog sinya, nabaya waglag kitay in Diyos kafiyan sawas taw. Kawas Birnabi fiya fag taw, hanggan ka Falad Maliyaw sawa hanya sadi wak dahonya, marigon yadi nogsyag hantam Fon, yakanga natogon has taw kitay, ta fag fadagos orongan hantam Fon, ta fag idwag fagomon. Ka manga taw kantiwala sinya in-aywan wan.
44011025	Ginya madi yabay, is Birnabi hawas banwa Tarso, igsayak in Sawlo.
44011026	No nalag in Sawlo, nafaofod hanya has banwa Antiyokya. Bog-os wa sik fangaraw ta no gofodan han Diyos Tifonan sinya, igfaadal has fakaaywanan. Sinya sas banwa Antiyokya ka manga taw no nafabago nangayan in Diyos manga katogbong, In Kiristo fag manga taw.
44011027	Gis nanya fag masohod ha akwa yadin Diyos manga fangampang indasog gis Hirosalim has banwa Antiyokya.
44011028	Insadi is Agabo. Kawa ka Falad Maliyaw karigonan sa hanya, hanya danwa nafatagak has taw kitay sadi wak baba daga aban imlonos. Tonya fag lonos in-anod ngay in Kalawdiyo fag kasohodan gorangon sas sakop Roma sadi wak dahonya.
44011029	In Hisos manga katogbong nagkasadiyan ta fadiya togbong has manga fadwasay ka mabanwanan sas Hodiya no daho day kasta fagsyaganon.
44011030	Kitonya wa nga kan-anod. Da Birnabi da Sawlo nadiya wasta manga togbong has manga fagtahinan Tifonan sas banwa Hirosalim.
44012001	Gis nanya fag manga masohod, is Hirodis, ka gorangon sas sakop Hodiya, nafagamat is taw tiba san Diyos Tifonan kaarakitay fahoriyan wan.
44012002	Hanya nafalifong in Santyago liyog, in Hwan fadwasay fag Santyago.
44012003	Ginya madi, is Hirodis no natwa kitay manga Hodyo igbayat naibolon, nadagos nasogo manga sondalo kaarakitay gomamat man in Pidro. Gis nanya fag masohod, ka manga Hodyo igtohod ka Fanohodan Tinapay Mayangfis.
44012004	Ta no nagamat in Pidro ta nafaporiso hanya. Ofat ik layonan sondalo igtarobosan igbantay hanya, myasa ofat sa sadik layonan. In Hirodis fangayofan fabangkad in Pidro has fakaaywanan taw kaarakitay mangampangan nonsagaya wa ka Fanohodan Nagsagayan.
44012005	Yakanga ha manga sondalo igbantay yapdin Pidro basad porisowan, dapat ay, in Diyos Tifonan dagos wagdarangin mahogod han Diyos kawa hanya.
44012006	Ginya madi, kati wa fag basad yabi kitay, nomsirang araw is Hirodis nangos fabangkad in Pidro has hampangan, is Pidro matoyogan, it gamat matarabingan tarikada has sondalo baliw baliw. Ha akwa yadi manga sondalo matanodan dayo sakbawan porisowan.
44012007	Sadi odi ginan in Diyos anghil inlag sinya, nayawa fiya fiya basad lingoban ogbot ogbot. Ka anghil natingfi in Pidro tagyangan nafafolaw hanya, ginyag lwang, Kalibang, ha fag kabangon wan. Ka manga tarikada inlohas wan gin Pidro gamat.
44012008	Ginya ka anghil iglwang, Fag fafiyowan im rotay, solongan im lapak. Ginyas Pidro intanog wan. Ka anghil nafwayong ya domwag, Fag solong wam rotay aba, ginya ha fag tahin wangko.
44012009	Is Pidro nadokson wan gis porisowan, naoyan ka anghil, dapat idya twa ngatay orongan ha anghil igfangolo hanya, gayfan hanya ngandig tagimfan.
44012010	Ta nontolas manga dowak layonan sondalo kagbantay sinya, tandasog has fanahop baol sas sakbawan aladan has sokayan. Ka fanahop inboklas wa kitonya, yakanga ta nadokson wan. Ta no nadalan ha sadik karsada, ka anghil inliyam wa dagos.
44012011	Ginya madis Pidro natwa wa kitay bonwa tagimfan. Yakangag lwang, Ya mangharaw, orongan wan angko nadalanan. Is Diyos nasogot anghil kaarakitay bomawi angko gin Hirodis hanggan gis manga mahori ka manga Hodyo bato ibolonon hangko.
44012012	Is Pidro no naayfan fiya fiya, hawan Mariya balay, kan Hwan ina, ka Hwan kasta fagngayanon yadi is Markos. Kaaywanon fag manga fadwasay sinya matifonan igdarangin.
44012013	Is Pidro no nataraktak sas fanahop sakbawan, sadik sogowan dayaga, is Roda, nabantay no faktaw kagtaraktak.
44012014	Is Roda nahilala wa kitay, is Pidro mangharaw ka kampang sinya. Kawas Rodag baya wa dahol, idya naboklas ka sakbawan, nadalandan yapdi has basad balay, iglwang kitay, Is Pidro is nwa wan, dayo balay.
44012015	Taglwang has dayaga, Ha ngandi kapaong. Dapat ka dayaga garonganon igfwayong, Sinya wan. Yakanga taglwang, Ngandayo in Pidro odi falad tonya.
44012016	Dapat is Pidro mahogod wagtaraktak yapdi sas dayo balay. Ta no naboklas wa ka sakbawan, taglag is Pidro wa ngay, yakanga tandolaw wan.
44012017	Dapat is Pidro igfaaman kitay, Ham ha gawang gawang. Ginya madis Pidro natoltol is taw no kinday is Diyos nafalfas hanya gis porisowan, nalwang, Fwayongan han Santyago hanggan hantam manga fadwasay tiba. Ginyas Pidro nalahaw wan, hawas iba banwanan.
44012018	Nonsirang, ka manga sondalo di kahodhoriyan wan. Ta garintawan kitay no hadawas Pidro?
44012019	Is Hirodis nafasayak it manga sondalo in Pidro, dapat tadwa ha lagan. Yakanga ta naintaw fiya fiya ka manga bantay. Ginyas Hirodis nafasognod kitay fahatayan wan ka manga bantay poriso. Ginya madis Hirodis nalahaw wan, hawas lwad has banwa Sisariya, nandogayan sinya.
44012020	Gi yapdis fagonan, is Hirodis dogay wa kaisog has manga taga banwa Tiro, manga taga banwa Sidon. Yakanga tansadi wat fangayofan kitay ta omakbang han Hirodis kaarakitay imfafiyowan ya. Ta nahampang han Balasto kagbahala in Hirodis balay kitay, Ofodan nangos hyami han Hirodis kaarakitay mimfafiyowan ya, maskin ka manga taga Tiro hanggan taga Sidon nogbol it manga fanganon, gin Hirodis baba daga.
44012021	Nondasog ista togonan fag sirang, is Hirodis nasolong it rotay, kalag wa kitay ha kangayanan, ginya natokaw sat tokawan fanokawan gorangon a, natoltol has taw fiya wa donggon.
44012022	Manga taw igharokyawan wan, taglwang, Bilang wa sadik diyos ka kampang ti, bilang nangos bonwa taw.
44012023	Gis nanya yadi in Diyos anghil dagos wa nafaiktan in Hirodis, maskin hanyag fahap in Diyos kangayanan. Hanya naolodan a, hanggan wa natay.
44012024	Dapat ay, in Diyos hampang inlangba sasta manga basad fangayofan, hanggan wa naskat sadi wak dahonya banwanan.
44012025	Nontabot ibolon sas Hirosalim, da Birnabi da Sawlo nwali wan has banwa Antiyokya. Ta nafaofod yadin Hwan, kasta fagngayanon is Markos.
44013001	Gis nanya fag manga masohod ha akwa in Diyos manga fangampang hanggan mangag faadal san Diyos Tifonan sas banwa Antiyokya sas sakop Siriya. Ka mangan aktom sinya da Birnabi, da Simyon kasta fagngayanon is Nigro, da Losyo taga banwa Sirini, da Sawlo, da Manain. Da Manain da Hirodis, ka gorangon sas Hodiya, no anahan yapdi, fagaba gofodan hyabi.
44013002	Ka Tifonan nogfasayagdog in Diyos, hanggan idwa kwan hanon kaarakitay mandarangin, ka Falad Maliyaw nafwayong has taw, Fabokodan inda Birnabi da Sawlo hangko, kaarakitay ta fatonglos ka ibolonon kangko nafatohoyan ha hanya.
44013003	Ginya madi, tadya nangwan hanon a, nandarangin mahogod, ginya nafwalid it manga gamat has dowak ama baba alfoyo, ginya ta nafalahaw inda Birnabi da Sawlo kaarakitay mamarita has manga taw.
44013004	Yakanga ka Falad Maliyaw igsogo inda Birnabi da Sawlo kaarakitay mamarita. Tandasog has lwad has banwa Salosya sas gobang dagat. Ginya ta nasahay baba dagat hawas foyo dagat Sipri.
44013005	Nondasog has banwa Salamina sinya, ta natoltol in Diyos hampang sas manga fanimbaan Hodyo. Is Hwan Markos ista ofod, inda Barnabi katogbong.
44013006	Ta nadagos wa nalahaw gi sadik gobang dagat has banwa Papos sas bali fongfongan daga. Ta nalag sinya sadik ama Hodyo, is Bar Hisos, ka lipatan lipatan. Hanya sadik Hodyo kagfaniring kitay hanya in Diyos fangampang.
44013007	Is Bar Hisos in Sirgiyo Pawlo ka gobirnador fakilalaon. Is Sirgiyo Pawlo sadik taw fiya it isip. Hanya nafatawag inda Birnabi da Sawlo maskin kasayagdog in Diyos hampang.
44013008	Dapat ka lipatan lipatan, is Ilimas it ngayan sas fangampangan Girigo, igbando di ka Gobirnador kaarakitay idwam tiwala.
44013009	Dapat is Sawlo, kasta nangayan yadis Pablo, kawa ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawa hanya sadi wak dahonya, igsinayan wat mata han Ilimas, ginyag lwang,
44013010	Haw in Fandaya odi anak. Haw iglaban ka fiya fagayo. Sonson wa dwat, madaya ya ngadim manga ibolon. Kana mayon haw no fagabag fabarikwang ka fakaoronganan kawa han Diyos?
44013011	Lag ngay, kati araw, fadosa wa hyamo. Is Diyos fabota wa hyamo mata, dogay hadwa lomag ka yawa myanit. Is Ilimas dagos wa nadog bilang wa ha sadik linyabo masding nataklob it mata. Iglahaw gayohapan odig ligaw no faktaw ka gomamithanya.
44013012	Ka Gobirnador no nalag kitay is Ilimas inbota wan, hanyan tiwala wa han Diyos, hanggan indolaw wagdog ta nogfaadal kagfon intam it barita.
44013013	Ginya madi da Pablo nasahay has baba dagat, in-ginan gis banwa Papos. Tandasog has banwa Pirgi, sakop Fanfilya. Dapat is Hwan Markos naobon is taw, nwali has Hirosalim.
44013014	Da Pablo da Birnabi nafadagos it lahawan hanggan wandasog has banwa Antiyokya, sakop Pisidya. Ka Sirang Kafahowayan nondasog, da Pablo nasakbaw has basad fanimbaan Hodyo, intokaw wan.
44013015	Ka manga Hodyo no namasa gin Mwisis manga togon hanggan gin Diyos manga fangampang sorat, ka mangag bahala sas tifonan Hodyo sas fanimbaan, iglwang handa Pablo, Manga fadwasay, ham no ha bato fwayongon has manga taw, fag fwayong wan.
44013016	Ginyas Pablo nalindog, nafaaman is taw kitay ta fag idya gawang. Ginya nalwang, Ham in Israil manga hasokfonan, hanggan ka manga Hintil istay kagsimba yadi han Diyos, ham fag matalingan fiya fiya.
44013017	Is Diyos, kantam tifonan Israil fagsimbaon, ka danwa nafili intam manga hafofowan. Ta no sayapdis sakop Ihipto is Diyos nafabali intam manga hafofowan sadik layonan taw kaaywanon. Ginya madi, maskin marigon wa dahol dahol is Diyos, hanya nafalahaw is taw gis Ihipto.
44013018	Nyawadwa fiya bangan ista ogali, is Diyos naagwanta naano yapdis taw ofat ik safolok fangaraw ta no basad fakahyabogan.
44013019	Ginya madi, is Diyos nontabo wagfadwat ka fitok layonan taw sas Kanaan, hanya nadisag man hantam manga hafofowan ista banwanan. Gi wasta nalin has Ihipto,
44013020	hanggan ta no nwali ya has sakop Kanaan hanggan nadaog it manga kalaban, gamtanan 450 fangaraw it kadogayan. Ginya madis Diyos nadisag ka manga fangabaya has taw balin Diyos fangampang is Samwil.
44013021	Ginya madi intam manga hafofowan no nasagad gorangon gin Samwil, is Diyos nafaangay kitay fag is Sawlo, in Kis anak, in Binhamin hasokfonan, kambali ista gorangon ofat ik safolok fangaraw.
44013022	Is Diyos no nabol in Sawlo kangayanan, nafabali man in Dabid ista gorangon. Kiti in Diyos faorongan kawa han Dabid. Is Diyos iglwang, Hogbaya waglag in Dabid, in Hisi anak ogali. Talaga wamtanog angko manga kafangayofanan fagayo.
44013023	Ginya madi, gi yadin Dabid hasokfonan, is Diyos nadisag han Israil hasokfonan kat natogon-Famawi, kawas Hisos.
44013024	Is Hisos nodyag toltol has taw, is Hwan namarita sadik dahonya banwanan Israil kitay, ta fag somoyo wan, fag dayo ista manga ogali dwat, ginya fag fatogna wan.
44013025	Is Hwan no kaakbang wa katabo igbarita, naintaw has taw, Faktaw aho, ham gayfan? Bonwa aho kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi, dapat ha kadasog wan ka omoyan sangko ginanan. Ho kaya ngadig lohas it famaganit lapak.
44013026	Angko manga fadwasay, kan Abraham yadi hasokfonan, hanggan manga Hintil kagsimba han Diyos, hawantam kandiya to fag barita no kinday tam nombawi.
44013027	Ka manga taga Hirosalim, hanggan ista manga fagtahinan, idwa natwa nadog kitay hanya wa ka Famawi. Tadwa natwa wagdog kan Diyos manga fangampang nafwayong gona, kasta fagbasaon fagayo fag Sirang Kafahowayan. Dapat taw mandi ka nafatonglos it nabasa no nafatohoyan kitay fahatayan in Hisos.
44013028	Nyawa kasta fagsombongon idya fiya fahatayon, ta nasagad wa ngap gin Pilato kitay fahatayan wan in Hisos.
44013029	Ta no nafatonglos wa fagayo fag manga bagay kansorat sas Kasoratan kawa han Hisos, ta nabol wat habilogan gis nafatimbangan hayo a, nafwalid basad lohib.
44013030	Dapat ay, is Diyos nafaboyag ya domwag hanya.
44013031	Ginya madi, aywan fag manga sirang is Hisos nafalag yapdit sadili hat manga ofod ka naofod hanya itfagonan hanya noglahaw gis sakop Galiliya, hawas banwa Hirosalim. Tonya fag manga taw kagfaorongan kati has manga taga Israil.
44013032	Kati mistay wan kaarakitay fomwayong ha hayo ka Fiya fag Barita in Diyos natogon hantam manga hafofowan,
44013033	kan Diyos nafatonglos hantam no nafaboyag ya in Hisos, kito kansorat sas fadowa fag ambahan, Haw angko wa anak, Aho im Ama.
44013034	Kawas Diyos nafaboyag ya domwag hanya kaarakitay idwam dasog kaboyok, is Diyos iglwang kitay, Ho domisag ha hyamo ka maliyaw fag manga kafiyan Kangko nafatohoyan han Dabid.
44013035	Nafwayong yadi sas iba fag ambahan, Hadwag faangay kitay is Maliyaw imboyok.
44013036	Kawas Dabid nontabo wa gibolon in Diyos fakasayaon hyabi, kat manga kasohodan no boyagan yapdi, hanya natay wan, inlobgob sat manga magorang akbang, it habilogan inboyok wan.
44013037	Dapat kan Diyos nafaboyag ya idwan boyok.
44013038	Manga fadwasay, ham fag twagdog kitay, kati nabarita wa ha hayo kitay, giwan Hisos naagwanta, intam manga naogali dwat imliyam wan,
44013039	hanggan gi wa hanya fagayo kagsyag hanya, intam manga naogali dwat imliyam wan, nyawa hyabi tam idwa syagan igfaliyam no katanog in Mwisis togon.
44013040	Yakanga ham fag matagahan kaarakitay idwa hamlag sa hayo kito kan Diyos manga fangampang nafwayong kitay,
44013041	Ham ka mangag yod, lag ngay, Ham imdolaw wa aban, ham hawas fadosaan. Aho omibolon sadik madolaw fag bagay ham nostay yapdi, Nyawa kindawan ham idwa katiwala, nyawa tagtoltol wa hayo.
44013042	Da Pablo da Birnabi, no kadokson wa gis fanimbaan Hodyo, ka manga taw nafwayong kitay, Ham aban fanoltol ya to fag manga bagay sas domwag fag Sirang Kafahowayan.
44013043	Ta nontabo wagtoltolan, aywan fag manga Hodyo orongan, hanggan manga Hintil kanbali manga Hodyo, natahin wanda Pablo da Birnabi. Da Pablo natoltol has taw nafwayong, Fag fadagos gogali ka maangay han Diyos malooy fag kahowayan.
44013044	No domwag wa Sirang Kafahowayan, fagayo fag manga taw sinya fag banwa nanifonan kaarakitay domog in Diyos hampang.
44013045	Dapat ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo kaingli waglag inda Pablo nogtoltol, maskin kaaywanon fag manga taw katiwala wan. Yakanga ta nafabohag wan, hanggan nafadwat igdog in Pablo.
44013046	Dapat da Pablo da Birnabi nafwayong marigon, Ka fiya hami fag fomwayong yap in Diyos hampang ha hayo manga Hodyo. Dapat kawa ham nadayo in Diyos hampang, ham kagfatohoyan kitay ham idwa maangay has haboyagan idwa ha katabowanan. Gis kati ginan mi aba hawas manga Hintil no bomarita.
44013047	Kito kagfon intam nogfasognod ha hyami kitay, Ho nafatohoyan hyamo bilang salong has manga Hintil Kaarakitay bomarita ka Famawi hanggan has kafongfonganan daga.
44013048	Ka manga Hintil kabaya wagdog inda Pablo nafwayong, igfasayagdog kagfon intam it hampang. In Diyos manga nafatohoyan has haboyagan idwa ha katabowanan, intiwala wan.
44013049	Ginya madi kagfon intam it hampang naskat wa sinya, sadi wak dahonya banwanan.
44013050	Dapat ay, ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo nafasognod has manga ina masimbaon han Diyos, kasta manga fakilalaon sas banwa, hanggan ista manga fagtahinan fag manga ama kitay, ta fag fahoriyan inda Pablo da Birnabi. Ta nasogo wa ginya fag banwanan.
44013051	Ginya madi ka dowak ama nafadagdag ka fogis daga gista manga bitis, bilang igfalag kitay ka taga sinyag dayo in Hisos, ginya hawas banwa Ikonyo.
44013052	Dapat ay, in Hisos manga katogbong sas banwa Antiyokya, sakop Pisidya, kasolong wa dahol dahol, hanggan ka Maliyaw fag Falad sawas taw sadi wak dahonya.
44014001	Kitonya yadi kasta naibolon sas banwa Ikonyo. Da Pablo da Birnabi nasakbaw has basad fanimbaan Hodyo, kafiyaon kadog ta nogbarita. Yakanga aywan fag manga Hodyo hanggan Girigo kantiwala.
44014002	Dapat ka manga Hodyo ka dayo katiwala, nafasognod ka manga Hintil, nafadwat igdog yadi kaarakitay ta domayo ka mangam tiwala.
44014003	Da Pablo da Birnabi nadogay ogbot sinya, igtoltol marigon has taw kawa hantam Fon baliwa. Intam Fon nafaanod yadi kitay orongan kasta nafwayong kawa hat kahowayan. Nafasyagan yadinda Pablo da Birnabi gibolon manga falagon madolaw.
44014004	Dapat ka manga taw inbali dowak layonan sinya fag banwa. Ka sadik layonan balis manga Hodyo, ka sadi balinda Pablo.
44014005	Ginya madi ka manga Hintil, manga Hodyo tiba, hanggan ista manga fagtahinan insadi kitay, ta mamahoriyan ka manga Fandiya-Barita hanggan wa bomintok.
44014006	Dapat ka manga Fandiya-Barita nadog di ngay, ta nalibya wa dagos has banwa Listra hanggan has banwa Darbi, sas sakop Likaonya, hanggan sas manga ligongan.
44014007	Ta nafaadal yadi sinya ka Fiya fag Barita.
44014008	Gis nanya fag masohod, sadik ama sas banwa Listra idwa syagan iglahaw, kawa gis ogbot ginan danwa fihong.
44014009	Hanyag talinga is Pablo nogtoltol. Is Pablo igdoro has ama fihong, nasarom kawa hanya kasyag kitay hanyam fiya.
44014010	Yakangas Pablo nahampang marigon, nalwang, Ha fag lindog maslong. Ka ama nalokso, ginyag lahaw ngay.
44014011	Ka fakaaywanan no nalag in Pablo naibolon, ta nanarawagan sas fangampangan Likaonya, iglwang, Manga diyos inbangkad hantam ha habilogan taw.
44014012	Ta nafangayan in Birnabi is Siyos fag diyos, hanggan ta nafangayan yadin Pablo, is Hirmis fag diyos, maskin hanya wa kagtoltol.
44014013	In Siyos fag diyos fanimbaan balis dasogan banwa. Kasta fagalan han Siyos, no nadog kitay hanbangkad, nagoyod manga todo baka, ha ono borahan, has dasogan banwa, ista fagsogbaon fangafiyan handa Pablo nangos.
44014014	Dapat da Birnabi da Pablo natwa di ngay ista bato ibolonon, ta naragyang it sadili manga balokas, nadalandan hasta fagbokngan, natawag marigon, iglwang
44014015	Ham manga ama, fag idwa gibolon kityamo. Hami taw yadi kito hayo. Hamig faadal lamang ha hayo ka Fiya fag Barita kaarakitay ham domayo wan ka kitonya fag manga bagay, kadwa ha kahologan. Ham fag kafwali ya ka has Diyos boyagan, ka nahalig banwa, hanggan daga, hanggan dagat, hanggan fagayo ka maoliyanan sinya.
44014016	No hyabi di is Diyos igfabayaan fagayo fag manga layonan taw, nyawa gibolon no kana kat sadili fakasayaon.
44014017	Dapat nyawa kitonya, hanya danwag disag hosto kagfahilala hantam in Diyos, hanggan igfaorongan kitay hanya mahoway hantam, kawa hanya mandi kagfahwayan gim tongod, kagfabohad aywan sas fanganiyon, kagdisag manga fanganon kaarakitay igfahapsog intam, hanggan kagfasolong igdog intam manga fangayofan.
44014018	Nyawa kitay da Birnabi da Pablo kampang kindawan kitonya, ta ganong wadwa nasyagan nabando manga taw kaarakitay idwag sogba fangafiyan ha hanya.
44014019	Dapat ha manga Hodyo naoyan yadi inda Pablo gis banwa Antiyokya sas sakop Pisidya, hanggan gis banwa Ikonyo. Ta nafasognod ka manga taw hanggan nabintok in Pablo. Ginya madi yabay, ta nagoyod hanya has dayo banwa, maskin ta gayfan hanya natay wan.
44014020	Dapat ay, in Hisos manga katogbong no nasafongan in Pablo, is Pablo dagos wanlindog ya, infwali ya, hayas basad banwa. No bago marom is Pablo naofod in Birnabi hawas banwa Darbi yabay.
44014021	Ginya madi da Pablo da Birnabi no natoltol ka Fiya fag Barita sas banwa Darbi, hanggan nafabali aywan fag manga taw in Hisos manga katogbong, tanfwali ya has banwa Listra, has banwa Ikonyo hanggan has banwa Antiyokya, sas sakop Pisidya,
44014022	igfarigon sinya in Hisos manga katogbong fangayofan. Igtogon yadi kitay, ta fag fadagos wa katiwala orongan, iglwang yadi kitay, Tam domog yapdi aywan fag mahori bago di masog han Diyos banwanan.
44014023	Ta nafili manga fagtahinan kagbahala han Diyos manga Tifonan fagayo. Ginya yabay, nontabo wagdarangin, idwa nangwan hanon, ta nafaano ka manga Tifonan hantam Fon kasta fagsyagon.
44014024	Ginya ta nadalan has sakop Pisidya, yakanga ta nadasog has sakop Panfilya.
44014025	Ta no natoltol in Diyos hampang sas banwa Pirgi, ta nalahaw has lwad, has banwa Atalya.
44014026	Ginya fag banwa ta nasahay baba dagat, infwali ya has banwa Antiyokya, sas sakop Siriya. Gistay fag Antiyokya hyabi da Pablo da Birnabi no nafabago it ibolon igbarita giwasta nafaano ginan inda Pablo hantam Fon kafiyan. Kati in-anod wan kat manga ibolon kitay intonglos wan.
44014027	Da Pablo nondasog wan, ta nafatifon ka mangan tiwala sinya fag banwa. Ta natoltol kan Diyos naibolon fagayo ginda Pablo, hanggan no kinday is Diyos nafaangay kitay manga Hintil fiya yadi nomtiwala.
44014028	Da Pablo nadogay nangofodan in Hisos manga katogbong sinya.
44015001	Dapat ay, ha manga fihin ik taw nadasog has banwa Antiyokya, sas sakop Siriya, gis sakop Hodiya. Tagfaadal has manga fadwasay kitay, ham nodwag fatoli hayo, kito kan Mwisis togon, ham idwam bawi.
44015002	Da Pablo da Birnabi nalaban has taw, inbali wa gagran kawa noglabanan kitonya. Yakanga ista nagkasadiyan, ta somogo inda Pablo da Birnabi hanggan manga fadwasay tiba gis Antiyokya has Hirosalim, kaarakitay mangampangan has manga Fandiya-Barita sinya, hanggan has manga fagtahinan kawa tonya wa fag bagay.
44015003	Ka Tifonan nasogo tonya fag manga taw, yakanga ta no nadalan has sakop Finisya hanggan sakop Samariya, ta nafadahit no kinday ka manga Hintil intiwala yadi wan. Ka manga fadwasay sinya nabaya wa dahol igdog.
44015004	Ginya da Pablo nondasog has Hirosalim, ka manga Fandiya-Barita, hanggan ka manga fagtahinan, hanggan sadi wak dahonya Tifonan nabaya wa dahol dahol igdog. Da Pablo natoltol fagayo, nyawa kana, kan Diyos naibolon ta nogbarita.
44015005	Dapat tiba Farisiyo kantiwala nafwayong yadi, Ka manga Hintil kamtiwala fag imtoli wan. Ham fag fwayong kitay ta fag imtanog wan in Mwisis togon.
44015006	Ka manga Fandiya-Barita hanggan manga fagtahinan nanoltolan yapdi, ta nangayfan yapdi to fag mahori.
44015007	Ginya madi ta noglabanan dogay las hampang, is Pidro nalindog, nalwang kitay, Manga fadwasay, tam twa wa kitay, itfagonan, is Diyos nafili angko, kaarakitay gingko bibig ka manga Hintil fag domog ka Fiya fag Barita hanggan imtiwala yadi wan.
44015008	Is Diyos kaglag santam manga basad fangayofan nafaorongan kitay, hanyag tanggap yadi ka manga Hintil, hanya no nadisag it Maliyaw fag Falad has taw, kito yadi no nadisag hantam, is manga Hodyo.
44015009	Pariho is Diyos nogbantay has manga taw hanggan hantam. Is Diyos nafalinay yadista manga fangayofan maskin tagsyag yadi han Hisos in Diyos-natogon-Famawi.
44015010	Ya kana mayon tam nogsolay in Diyos, ham gayfan? In Mwisis togon tiba hantam, nyawa tam, nyawantam manga magorang, tam idwa nasyagan nafaanod. Kana mayon tam nogfahoriyan tonya has manga Hintil kamtiwala?
44015011	No kinday tam nonbawi tam nontiwala, kawa gin Hisos intam Fon malooy fag kahowayan, ta kitonya yadi nombawi.
44015012	Fagayo tantohas wagtoltolan, basta odi matalingan inda Birnabi da Pablo nogtoltol in Diyos naibolon madolaw has manga Hintil ta nogbarita.
44015013	Da Pablo nontabo wagtoltol, is Santyago man ka kampang kitay, Manga fadwasay, ham fag matalingan man angko.
44015014	Kati yadi haraw, is Simon Pidro no natoltol no kinday is Diyos no nafatawag ka manga Hintil bago bago, kaarakitay tibak Hintil imbali yadit sakop,
44015015	tonyag faanod in Diyos manga fangampang fagfwayongon hyabi, noglwang kitay,
44015016	Ginya madi ho kafwali ya, Farigon ya in Dabid oliyanan kandwat, Ho fatobo ya, falindog ya tonya
44015017	Kaarakitay tiba taw lomigaw intam Fon, Kawa fagayo fag layonan taw angko yadi sakop
44015018	Kitonyan Diyos fwayong kagfatohoyan tonya fag manga bagay, gi yapdis hyabi.
44015019	Yakanga, angko fangayofan nangos, tam fag idwag fahoriyan ka manga Hintil ka kaakbang han Diyos.
44015020	Dapat, tam fag somorat yap man has taw ka fiya, kitay, ta nangos fag idwa kwan nyawa kana fag bagay kasta nadisag has labang taw, fag idwag fabayowan, fag idwa kwan ka hayopan ka natay kantagbong, fag idwa yadi kwan folot.
44015021	Maskin gi yapdis hyabi ta fagaba wagbasa in Mwisis manga togon sas manga fanimbaan Hodyo sas Sirang Kafahowayan. It manga hampang indog yadi has fagayo fag manga banwa.
44015022	Yakanga ka manga Fandiya-Barita hanggan ka manga fagtahinan, hanggan ka Tifonan sadik dahonya, ista nagkasadiyan, fiya nogfili ka tibak taw kaarakitay tomahin inda Pablo da Birnabi has Antiyokya sas sakop Siriya. Ta nasogo inda Hodas, kasta faglwangon is Barsabas, hanggan da Silas. To fag manga ama ka manga fadwasay fagtahinan sas Hirosalim.
44015023	Ka manga Fandiya-Barita nafadiya sorat has Antiyokya, kaglwang kitay, Hami ka manga Fandiya-Barita hanggan ka manga fagtahinan, mi gwas hayo, hyami manga fadwasay Hintil sas banwa Antiyokya, sas sakop Siriya, hanggan sas sakop Silisya.
44015024	Mi nadog kitay ha akwa gi hyami Tifonan igfaagran hayo, dapat tonya bonwa hyami nasogo. Kasta manga nafwayong hayo, nafaadowan odi hayo.
44015025	Yakanga hyami nagkasadiyan mi somogo ya ka tiba taw ha hayo. Ta omofod intam fagbayaon da Birnabi da Pablo,
44015026	kadwa nahwangit it haboyagan maskin ta galwasi in Kiristo Hisos, kagfon intam.
44015027	Yakanga migsogo nga ha hayo inda Hodas da Silas kaarakitay fatwagdog hayo ka hyami bato lwangon gistay fag sorat.
44015028	Maskin hyami nagkasadiyan ka Maliyaw fag Falad nafatwagdog hyami kitay, mi fag idwag fahoriyan hayo no bonwa to fag manga bagay ka hyami fakasayaon orongan,
44015029	kitay, ham fag idwa kwan nyawa kana fag manga bagay kandisag has labang taw, fag idwa kwan folot hayopan, fag idwa yadi kwan manga hayopan kantagbong. Fag idwa yadig fabayowan. Kafiyaon ham no bomaybay tonya fag manga bagay. Balinya lamang hyami sorat kati.
44015030	Ginya madi ta nafalahaw wan inda Birnabi. Yakanga yabay, ta nondasog has banwa Antiyokya, sas sakop Siriya, ta nafatifon ka mangan tiwala. Ta nadisag has taw tonya fag sorat.
44015031	Ta no nabasa ka sorat, ka manga taga sinya inrigon yat fangayofan maskin tansaya wagdog.
44015032	Da Hodas da Silas in Diyos manga fangampang yadi. Aywan it nafwayong has mangam tiwala nafarigon ista manga fangayofan hanggan nafabali yadi maganit ta no katiwala.
44015033	Gis nanya fag manga masohod ta nadogay yapdi ogbot sinya. Ginya madi ka manga taga Antiyokya nafaoli ya inda Hodas hasagsogo is taw. Ka manga fadwasay nadarangin kitay, fag fiya it manga lahawan nangos.
44015034	Dapat is Silas naayfan kitay fiya hanya nomgoyan yapdi nangos sinya.
44015035	Da Pablo da Birnabi nadogay yapdi sinya sas banwa Antiyokya. Aywan yadista manga ofod igfaadal hanggan igtoltol in Diyos hampang sinya.
44015036	Ginya madi, aban ogbot, is Pablo iglwang han Birnabi kitay, Tam nangos fag kafwali ya, tam manabang intam manga fadwasay has fagayo fag manga banwa kantam nafaadal intam Fon hampang hyabi. Tam mamantay ya no kinday ka manga taw sinya kati.
44015037	Is Birnabi kasaya kitay mamaofod ya nangos in Hwan, kasta fagngayanon is Hwan Markos.
44015038	Dapat is Pablo dayo wagtaban maskin is Hwan hyabi idwa nafadagos naofod hanggan wa nafatabo ista lahawan, dapat naobon was taw, infwali wa dagos gis sakop Panfilya.
44015039	Da Pablo da Birnabi kahodhoriyan wa gis nanya fag masohod, yakanga ta nanarowayan wan. Is Birnabi nataban in Markos, nasahay has baba dagat hawas foyo dagat Sipri.
44015040	Dapat is Pablo nataban man in Silas. Ka manga fadwasay nontabo wagdarangin kitay intam Fon nangos fag ganos taw, da Pablo nalahaw wan.
44015041	Da Pablo hawas sakop Siriya, hanggan sakop Silisya, nafarigon sinya in Diyos manga tifonan.
44016001	Da Pablo hawas banwa Darbi hanggan banwa Listra. Ya mangharaw sinya ha akwa yadin Hisos katogbong sadi, kawas Timotiyo. In Timotiyo ina intiwala yadi wan, sadik Hodyo, dapat it ama sadik Girigo.
44016002	Fagayo ka mangan tiwala sas Listra hanggan sas Ikonyo nafaorongan kitay in Timotiyo ogali fiya.
44016003	Is Pablo kasayag taban in Timotiyo, yakanga ta natoli hanya maskin fagayo fag manga Hodyo sinya fag manga banwa natwa wa kitay it ama Girigo.
44016004	Nyawa siday fag banwa kanda Pablo nagsabangan, ta nafwayong has mangan tiwala ka manga Fandiya-Barita, hanggan manga fagtahinan san Diyos Tifonan sas Hirosalim it nagkasadiyan manga togon. Ta nafwayong yadi kitay fag katanog tonya fag manga togon.
44016005	Yakanga yabay, ka manga Tifonan fagayo inbali marigon ta no katiwala. Sirang sirang ha kadogang san Diyos manga Tifonan manga taw.
44016006	Da Pablo nadalan has fagbokngan manga sakop Firigya hanggan sakop Galasya maskin ka Maliyaw fag Falad idyag faangay kitay ta fag bomarita has sakop Asya.
44016007	Ta nondasog has bahalan sakop Misya, ta gayfan ta hawas sakop Bitinya, dapat in Hisos Falad idya nafaangay.
44016008	Yakanga ta natolas di sas sakop Misya, yakanga hawas lwad has banwa Toroas.
44016009	Gis nanya fag yabi, is Pablo ha lagan gin Diyos sadik bagay madolaw. Hanya ha lagan sadik ama taga sakop Masidonya malindogan, igsagad kitay, Ham nangos fag hawastay has difay, has Masidonya, togbongan hyami.
44016010	Yakanga nonsagaya kan Pablo lagan, mi nangalimbotangan wa dagos, maskin mi natwa kitay, is Diyos igfatawag hyami kaarakitay tomoltol ka Fiya fag Barita has sakop Masidonya.
44016011	Gis banwa Toroas hyami sahayan nadagos has baba dagat has foyo dagat Samotrasya. No marom marom wan, mi nasahay ya baba dagat, hawas banwa Niyapolis.
44016012	Ginya fag banwa mi nalahaw baba daga has banwa Filipos. Ka banwa Filipos sadik banwa dahol sas sakop Masidonya, ka mangag bahala sinya gis sakop Roma. Mi nadogay ogbot sinya.
44016013	No Sirang wa Kafahowayan, mi nalahaw has dayo banwa, ha sadik foyo sas gobang safa. Mi gayfan ngandayo sinya ka manga Hodyo nogtifonan igdarangin. Mintokaw sinya a, migtoltol has manga ina ka matifonan sinya.
44016014	Ka sadik ina ka sinya, kawas Lidya, taga banwa Tiyatira, iglako manga rotay masding, madamol. Is Lidyag simba han Diyos. Kagfon intam nafatwagdog sat basad fangayofan, yakangas Lidya intiwala in Pablo toltol.
44016015	Is Lidya hanggan wat manga ofod sas balay, nontogna wan, is Lidyag lwang ha hyami kitay, Ham noglag kitay, aho orongan wantiwala hasagfon intam, ham fag sawa hyamik migya. Naaronganon nogtaban hyami hat balay. Maskin ngay midwa nadayo.
44016016	Sadi ginan mi no haya ngawas fandaranginan, sadik dayaga, ista nasali sogowan, natagbo hyami. Ha labang kagbahala hanya, kagfasyagan hanyag pinto ista madalanan aban. Ka mangag fon tonya fag dayaga iglag dahol fag fakinabang ginya fag dayaga, kawa nogpinto is taw, tagtangdan hasagfon ka dayaga.
44016017	Ka dayaga goyan yadi goyan yadi hyami da Pablo, igtawag kiti, To fag manga taw in Diyos, ka Abwat man has Fagayo Fagayo, it manga sogowan. Tagfadog ha hayo no kinday ham nombawi.
44016018	Is Pablo kahori wagdog maskin sirang sirang fagaba wa kitonya. Is Pablo nasayango has dayaga, ginya nalwang has labang, Hogsogo hyamo san Kiristo Hisos ngayan, haw fag galin wan gis nyamo fag dayaga. Yabay, ka labang dagos wa nalin.
44016019	Dapat ay, ka mangag fon tonya fag dayaga no nalag di ngay tadwa ha fagfakinabangon ginya fag dayaga, ta natoklos, nagamat inda Pablo da Silas, nagoyod has falhang manga balay has fagbokngan banwa, nataban has manga fagtahinan sas banwa.
44016020	Ta no nataban inda Pablo has manga gorangon taga Roma, kagtalinga hampangan, taglwang, To fag manga ama manga Hodyo kagfaagran manga taw istay fag banwa.
44016021	It fagfaadalon iglaban hantam manga ogali taga Roma. Idwa fiya tam nogtanggap, idwa fiya tam no katanog ista manga adal hantam.
44016022	Ka manga taw fagayo nangoyonan gisog inda Pablo. Ka mangag talinga hampangan nalanit inda Pablo manga balokas, ginya ta nafabakbak manga sondalo has taw.
44016023	Ka manga sondalo nontabo wagbakbak inda Pablo, ta nafaporiso wa hanya, nafabantay fiya fiya has bantay.
44016024	Yakanga, kagbantay nataban is taw has fakabokngan balay porisowan. Ta nabinggas yadi inda Pablo manga bitis.
44016025	Dapat araw, no kaboknga wa yabi, da Pablo da Silas igdarangin, garambahanan yadi han Diyos. Ka tiba poriso sinya matalingan odi.
44016026	Ginya madi sadi odi ginan, nalinog marigon, kanga kitay ka fagrigonan torok porisowan inbolang wan. Fagayo fag manga sakbawan porisowan dagos wanboklas, ista manga gafos kadina fagayo inlohas wan.
44016027	Ka bantay nonfolaw, nalag di nga kitay ka manga sakbawan porisowan inboklas wan, hanya madali wanbangon. Nagonos wa dagos it talibong. Hanya ganong wa fahatay it sadili maskin hanya gayfan ka manga poriso nalfas wan.
44016028	Dapat ay, is Pablo natawag marigon, Haw fag idwag tobok hyamo, mi fagayo istay di.
44016029	Kagbantay nanagad salong a, nadalandan has basad porisowan, karokog waglingkohodan handa Pablo da Silas akbang.
44016030	Ginya nataban inda Pablo has sokayan, iglwang kitay, Manga ama, kana kin ka fiya angko ibolonon kaarakitay ahom bawi?
44016031	Taglwang, Haw fag katiwala han Hisos kagfon intam, ginya madi haw imbawi wan, haw hanggan im talanahan.
44016032	Da Pablo natoltol kagfon intam it hampang has bantay hanggan has fagayo fag manga taw ka sat balay.
44016033	Gis nanya yadi fag basad yabi, ka bantay nafyad inda Pablo manga baran. Ka bantay hanggan it manga ofod fagayo sas balay nafatogna wa dagos.
44016034	Ginya madi ka bantay porisowan nataban inda Pablo hat sadili balay, nandisag hanon. Ka bantay hanggan it talanahan igbaya wa dahol maskin ta katiwala han Diyos.
44016035	Nonbago wa marom, ka manga gorangon sas banwa nasogo manga sondalo, iglwang kitay, Falfasan wa tyamo fag dowak ama.
44016036	Kagbantay nafadahit kitonya handa Pablo, iglwang, Ka manga gorangon sas banwa iglwang kitay, Falfasan wa hayo. Yabay ham fag lahaw wa a, fag mahoway wa hayo manga fangayofan.
44016037	Dapat ay, is Pablog lwang has manga sondalo, Gwadi ta nafabakbak hyami sasta faglagan, nyawa tadwa nafadalan las hampangan, nyawa mi ha kasoratan kitay hami bilang wa yadi taga Roma, hanggan tagporiso wa hyami. Ginya madi mafyaloman odi ta nogfalahaw hyami kati. Idwam himo. Fag ka mandi manga gorangon ka kabangkad hastay, ka fomalfas hyami.
44016038	Ka manga sondalo nafadahit has mangag talinga hampangan kan Pablo nafwayong. Yakanga tandala wan ta no nadog di nga kitay, da Pablo da Silas bilang wa yadi manga taga Roma.
44016039	Yakanga ka manga gorangon banwa hanya wan, nasoyo handa Pablo. Ta nataban inda Pablo has sokayan, ginya madi nalwang yadi kitay, Ham nangos fag lahaw wa gistay fag banwa, no fiya di.
44016040	Ginya madi da Pablo da Silas indokson di ngay gis porisowan, ta nadagos wa han Lidya balay. Ta no natahod manga fadwasay sinya, ta natogon has taw kitay ta fag karigon no katiwala. Ginya madi ka dowak ama nalahaw ya.
44017001	Ginya madi ta no nadalan sas banwa Amfipolis hanggan banwa Apolonya, tandasog has banwa Tisalonika. Sinya fag banwa ka manga Hodyo ha fanimbaan.
44017002	Tolok Sirang Kafahowayan, kawat ogali kitonya, is Pablo nasakbaw sinya, hanggan natoltol has taw.
44017003	Igfaorongan kitay ka Kasoratan danwag lwang kawan Diyos-natogon-Famawi it ibolon idyam tabo hanya nodwa omagwanta basad mahori hanggan imboyag ya, iglwang yadi, To fag is Hisos kangko fagfwayongon ha hayo, tonya wa nga kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi.
44017004	Manga fihin ik Hodyo katiwala in Pablo fwayong, gofod yadi inda Pablo da Silas, hanggan wa manga Girigo kaaywanon ka danwag simba han Diyos, hanggan manga ina ayo, kasta manga fakilalaon, gofod yabay inda Pablo.
44017005	Dapat ka manga fagtahinan Hodyo kaingli inda Pablo. Ta nafatifon ka manga ama malamangan odi basad manga karsada, nafaagran fagayo fag manga taw sas falhang manga balay, boknga banwa. Ginya idwag fasakbawon, nasakbaw wa dagos in Hason balay, igsayak inda Pablo da Silas kaarakitay falag has fakaaywanan.
44017006	Ta nodwa nalag inda Pablo sinya, ta nagoyod in Hason, hanggan ka tibak fadwasay has atobangan mangag talinga hampangan sas banwa. Ginya ta naringgit kitay, Ka manga taw kagfaagran nyawa haday kandasog, indasog yadistay.
44017007	Is Hason nafasakbaw tonya fag manga taw hat basad balay. Ta fagayo iglaban ka gorangon taga Roma manga togon, maskin taglwang ha sadi yak gorangon, hono, it ngayan is Hisos.
44017008	Ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw sas banwa hanggan ka mangag talinga hampangan galibitan it fangayofan no nadog kitonya.
44017009	Ginya madi ka manga gorangon no nafabayad ginda Hason it fangafang wan Pablo, ta nafalfas yadi inda Hason.
44017010	Yakanga no yabi wan, ka manga fadwasay nasogo inda Pablo da Silas has banwa Biriya. Ta nondasog sinya, ta nasakbaw has basad fanimbaan Hodyo.
44017011	Ka manga Hodyo istay sas Biriya fiya hampangon, bondi kito ka manga taga Tisalonika. Ta kasaya wagdog is Pablo nogtoltol. Sirang sirang tagligaw ka Kasoratan kat afo, ngatay orongan in Pablo manga fwayong.
44017012	Kawa kitonya, aywan fag manga Hodyo kantiwala sinya, hanggan aywan yadi fag manga Girigo, manga ama hanggan manga ina, kasta manga fakilalaon fiya fiya sas banwa Biriya.
44017013	Dapat ay, ka manga Hodyo sas banwa Tisalonika no nadog kitay da Pablo igtoltol in Diyos hampang sas Biriya yadi, ta naoyan hanya, nafasognod ka fakaaywanan fag manga taga Biriya, nafaagran is taw.
44017014	Ginya madi yabay, ka manga fadwasay intiwala nasogo wa dagos in Pablo has gobang dagat. Dapat da Silas da Timotiyo in-goyan yapdi sas Biriya.
44017015	Ka manga nafangolo in Pablo naofod wa hanya balis banwa Atinas. Ta nonfwali ya has banwa Biriya, ta nafadahit in Pablo togon handa Silas da Timotiyo kitay, ta fag idwa dogay no goyan hanya.
44017016	No mafanayan yapdi inda Silas da Timotiyo sas banwa Atinas, is Pablo inbalaw waglag kaaywanon fag manga tolad faglohodon sas basad banwa.
44017017	Yakangas Pablo igtoltol has manga Hodyo sasta basad fanimbaan, hanggan has manga Hintil kagsimba yadi han Diyos sinya. Ginya madis Pablo natoltol yadis taw sirang sirang nyawa faktaw kat lagan sas faktaban manga balay.
44017018	Ha akwa sinya manga Ipikoriyo hanggan manga Istoyko, mamga taw matoltolon, iglaban in Pablo. Tibag yod hanya, taglwang, Kana ngap araw to fag taw kat fwayongon hantam, igfabali hanya madonong? Ka tibag lwang, No kadog di to fag taw bokod fagfakatiwalaon it fagfaadalon. Taglwang kitonya maskin is Pablo nabarita kawa han Hisos, hanggan no kinday tam nomboyag ya aban.
44017019	Ta nataban in Pablo has fanoltolan, ta nogngayan Ariyopago, ginya taglwang, Mi kasaya tomwa no kana tonya fag adal bago im fagfwayongon ha hyami.
44017020	Mi bago nadog kati kam fagfwayongon ha hyami madolaw, yakanga mi kasaya tomwa no kanat kahologan.
44017021	Maskin ta gintaw kitonya, ka manga taga banwa Atinas hanggan ka mangan aktom sinya gis iba banwanan, idwa ha fakamolon, gobok odi has manga taw, igtalinga igtalinga odi, igtoltolan nyawa kanat donggon fag manga bagay madolaw.
44017022	Yakangas Pablo nalindog sasta atobangan, sas fanoltolan Ariyopago, nalwang kitay, Ham manga taga Atinas, hoglag hayo manga fangayofan mahogod has iba iba fag manga fakatiwalaon.
44017023	Maskin aho no gayayag basad banwa, aho nogbantay hayo manga tolad faglohodon, ho ha lagan sadik danglayan ha sorat kitay, To intohoyan ha sadik faglohodon midya kilala. Ka hayo faglohodon nyawa ham idya kilala, tonya wan kangko fagfwayongon ha hayo.
44017024	Is Diyos wa ka nahalig sadik dahonya intam daga, hanggan fagayo fag manga bagay sinya, hanggan hanya wa kagfon ka banwa hanggan ka daga, yakanga hanyadwa maoliyanan sasta manga nahalig fanimbaan.
44017025	Bonwa kitay ka manga taw ha fagtogbongon han Diyos, maskin hanya idwa ha korang, nyawa kana. Yatokitay, is Diyos man kagdisag haboyagan, ipsaw, hanggan fagayo fag manga bagay has taw.
44017026	Gi di sadik taw is Diyos no nahalig fagayo fag manga layonan taw kaarakitay bomanwanan istay is baba daga. Is Diyos kagfatohoyan no ginahin ka manga layonan taw nomrigon hanggan no siday fiya fiya ista sakop banwanan.
44017027	Is Diyos naibolon kitonya kaarakitay manga taw somayak hanya, ngandayo ta lomag hanya, ta no galingawan. Ka orongan wan is Diyos idwa ayayo gintam fagayo,
44017028	maskin Intam haboyagan giwa hanya, hanya yadi kagfahimot intam, hanggan igdisag fangayofan. Kito yadi ka hayo mangag fasangay tiba noglwang, Tam wa nga kat manga anak.
44017029	Kawa tam in Diyos wa manga anak, tam fag idwa gayfan is Diyos bilang odi tolad ginto, ngatay pilak, ngatay bato, tonya fagayo ista odi naayfan kitay fag kitonya, ista odi gamat nahalig.
44017030	Dogay wa fag manga fangaraw is Diyos idwag bati kitay manga taw idwa kilala hanya, dapat kati hanyag fwayong has fagayo fag manga taw, nyawa hadat banwanan, ta fag somoyo wan, fag domayo it manga ogali dwat,
44017031	maskin is Diyos iglwang kitay, gis nanya fag sirang aban hanya mamatohoyan has taw, sadik baba daga, it fadosaan, sas fakafiyan wa fiya fiya, kawan Diyos nafili fag ama ka mamatohoyan tonya. Is Diyos nafatwagdog has fagayo kitay, tonya wan kat nafili fag ama no nafaboyag ya hanya gis kahatayan.
44017032	Ta no nadog kitay is Pablo gwas kawa ha haboyagan sas dayo kahatayan, tibag yod odi, dapat tibag lwang, Aban, fag sadi ya ginan haw no fomwayong hyami kawa hanya baliwa.
44017033	Ginya yabay is Pablo nalahaw gis fanoltolan.
44017034	Ha akwa yadi tibak ama natahin hanya, intiwala wan. Insadi is Diyonisyo, ka sadi gis tifonan kagbahala sas fanoltolan Ariyopago, hanggan sadik ina is Damaris, ha akwa yadi tiba.
44018001	Ginya madis Pablo nalahaw wa gis banwa Atinas, hawas banwa Korinto.
44018002	Nondasog wa sinya, hanya nalag in Akila, sadik Hodyo taga Ponto, ka ngalay yapdin dasog gis sakop Italya, hanggan wat babay, is Pirisila, kawas Kalawdyo nasogo ka manga Hodyo kitay fag galin gis banwa Roma.
44018003	Is Pablo hawanda Akila, ginya nadogayan sasta balay maskin ta kalig balay rotay kito yadin Pablo, yakangas Pablo naibolon yadi sinya.
44018004	Fagaba sas Sirang Kafahowayan, is Pablo igfatoltolan sas fanimbaan Hodyo, igfaaronganon has manga Hodyo hanggan manga Girigo kitay ta fag katiwala wa nangos in Hisos.
44018005	Da Silas da Timotiyo nondasog has banwa Korinto gis sakop Masidonya, is Pablo igbarita lamang hanggan igfaorongan has manga Hodyo kitay kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi hanggan Gorangon is Hisos wan.
44018006	Dapat ka manga Hodyo tiba nogsongat, igyod ya ngadin Pablo. Is Pablo igfagfag ka fogis git boknga rotay, igfatagak is taw kitay, Ham bahala wa gisip no ham wa kadwan tiwala, ham has fadosaan wan. Hodwa ha sagoton. Gis kati ho hawas manga Hintil ho no bomarita.
44018007	Ginya madis Pablo nalin wan, hawan Tisyo Hosto balay, ka sadik Hintil kagsimba in Diyos. In Tisyo balay sas dayo fanimbaan Hodyo.
44018008	Is Kirispo, kagbahala sas fanimbaan Hodyo gis nanya, intiwala hasagfon intam, hanggan wat manga ofod sas balay. Aywan fag manga taga Korinto tiba no nadog in Pablo toltol intiwala wan, hanggan intogna wan.
44018009	Ginya madi sadi ginan basad yabi, is Diyos ha nafalag madolaw han Pablo, igfwayong hanya, Ha fag idwa kadala. Fag fadagos haw nogfaadal istay, fag idwag tohas igbarita,
44018010	maskin aho sawa hyamo. Hadwam kinday maskin aywan kambali angko fag manga taw istay fag banwa.
44018011	Is Pablo nadogay yapdi sadik fangaraw hagboknga sas Korinto, igfaadal has taw in Diyos hampang.
44018012	Dapat ay, aban, nos Galyon wa kanbali gobirnador sas sakop Akaya, ka manga Hodyo nagkasadiyan ta gomamat in Pablo, tomaban has fangabaya.
44018013	Tagfasogbo in Pablo kitay, Is Pablo igfayayom manga taw igsimba han Diyos sa sadik halgan kadwa maangay has manga Batasan Hodyo.
44018014	In Pablo fangayofan homampang yap han Galyon, dapat is Galyon iglwang has taw, Ham fag toltol yap gis nyamo. No hayo sombong orongan wa kasalanan dahol, ngatay iglaban has ogali Roma, ho tomalinga wan.
44018015	Dapat hayo donggon nosta odi manga hampang, manga ngayan, ka odi hayo manga ogali Hodyo, ho bonwa hayo fangabaya no kitonya di. Ham fag bahala man di.
44018016	Is Galyon nasogo nga inda Pablo gis balay fangabaya.
44018017	Ginya ka manga Hodyo nagamat in Sostinis kagbahala sas fanimbaan Hodyo. Ta nabakbak hanya sas sokayan balay fangabaya, dapat is Galyon idwag bati ista naibolon.
44018018	Ginya madis Pablo nadogay yapdi ogbot sas banwa Korinto. Ginya no nanogon yapdi has manga fadwasay, inlahaw wan. Nondasog sas Kinkiriya sas gobang dagat, is Pablo namalokfog it bok, kawat togonan han Diyos intabo wan. Ginya nasahay has baba dagat, kaginan has sakop Siriya. Da Pirisila da Akila, talsawa, nahoyog wan Pablo.
44018019	Nondasog wa sas banwa Ifiso, is Pablo nafamataw inda Pirisila da Akila sinya. Ginyas Pablo hawas fanimbaan Hodyo, nafatoltolan has manga taw.
44018020	Taglwang han Pablo, Haw nangos fag domogay yapdistay, dapat is Pablo idwag faangay is taw,
44018021	natogon odi, iglwang, Aho aba kabangkad ya non Diyos wa kafangayofanan. Ginya nalahaw ya gis Ifiso, nasahay ya ngawan has baba dagat.
44018022	Nondagsa sas banwa Sisariya, is Pablo nalahaw ya has banwa Hirosalim, namadog has Tifonan kantiwala sinya, ginya bago di nadagos has banwa Antiyokya sas sakop Siriya.
44018023	Ginya madis Pablo nadogay yapdi ogbot sinya, ginya nalahaw ya ngay. Nasabang ha banwanan ha banwanan sas sakop Galasya hanggan Firigya, igfarigon intam Fon manga katogbong fagayo sinya.
44018024	Yabay, ha akwa sadik ama Hodyo, is Apolos, nadasog has banwa Ifiso, it kasagayan hyabi, sas banwa Alihandiriya. Is Apolos nogtoltol fiya wa kadog, hanggan aywan yadit fakatwawon gin Diyos sorat.
44018025	Hanya indonong ka Ogali Bago gintam Fon, mahogod hanggan maslong yadi nogfaadal kawa han Hisos, dapat kito yadin Hwan yapdi nogfaadal hasagfatogna baliwa.
44018026	Is Apolos idwag fahoyangon igtoltol sas fanimbaan Hodyo. Da Pirisila da Akila talsawa, no nadog in Apolos toltol, ta nataban wa hanya hat balay, nafwayong wa fiya fiya ka manga bagay ka bonyan Apolos fakatwawon sas Ogali Bago gin Diyos.
44018027	Ginya madis Apolos no kasaya domifay has sakop Akaya, ka manga fadwasay nafaangay wan. Ta nafadiya yadi sorat has manga fadwasay sinya, ta nasorat kitay, Ham fag igbaya in Apolos hanya nomdasog ha hayo. Nondasog sinya, dahol in Apolos togbong has mangam tiwala kawa in Diyos malooy fag kahowayan sawa hanya.
44018028	Ka manga Hodyo idwa ha halimbawan lomaban in Apolos kawa fakaoronganan wan hanggan marigon nogtoltol gis Kasoratan kitay kan Diyos-natogon-Famawi is Hisos wan.
44019001	Is Apolos no sayapdis banwa Korinto, is Pablo dan wa nalahaw has moyod fag dalan hanggan wandasog sas banwa Ifiso. Is Pablo nalag mangan tiwala sinya.
44019002	Is Pablo naintaw has taw, Ham awkin natanggap ka Maliyaw fag Falad ham nontiwala? Taglwang, Idyapdi, midyapdi ha donggon kitay ha akwa Maliyaw fag Falad.
44019003	Is Pablo naintaw, No kitonya, kinday ham nontogna? Tagsagot, Kitos Hwan nogfatogna manga taw hyabi.
44019004	Is Pablo iglwang, Is Hwan nogfatogna manga taw kawa igfatohoyan kitay manga taw igsoyo wan. Is Hwan iglwang has manga taga Israil hyabi, Fag is Hisos ka goyan sangko ginanan ka hayo fakatiwalaon.
44019005	Ta no nadog, tantogna yadi san Hisos intam Fon ngayan.
44019006	Ginyas Pablo nogfwalid it gamat hasta baba alfoyo, ka Maliyaw fag Falad nadokson has taw, ta nahampang manga sanglitan madolaw, hanggan nafadog has taw in Diyos fagfwayongon.
44019007	Ngandayo manga safolo ha dowak ama ka natanggap ka Maliyaw fag Falad kitonya.
44019008	Tolok magdanon is Pablo fagaba has fanimbaan Hodyo, igfaaronganon ka sinya fag manga taw, idwa ha mabalaw nogfwayong ka han Diyos sakop baliwa.
44019009	Dapat ha akwa yapdig farigon it sadili fangayofan, igdayo has katiwala, igfadwat yapdig dog has fakaaywanan ka Ogali Bago. Yakangas Pablo nalin wa gis fanimbaan nogfaadal, nataban yadi ka mangan tiwala, hawan Tirano famaadalan, igfaadal sinya sirang sirang.
44019010	Dowak fangaraw is Pablo nogfaadal sinya, yakanga fagayo fag manga taw, nyawa Hodyo, nyawa Girigo, ka mabanwanan sas sakop Asya, nadog kagfon intam it hampang.
44019011	Gis nanya fag manga masohod, is Diyos nafasyagan in Pablo gibolon ka bonwa faglagon fag manga madolaw.
44019012	Yakanga nyawa taong ogbot ogbot, nyawa sangbaw in Pablo sangkap, ta no nadiya has manga ha sagit, tanfiya wan. Ka manga labang nalin yadi wan gis manga ha sagit.
44019013	Ha akwa sinya manga Hodyo malahawan malahawan igfaalin yadi manga labang. Tagsolay yadi golit in Hisos, kagfon intam it ngayan, nogfaalin manga labang. Ta nalwang kitay, San Hisos ngayan, kan Pablo fagfaadalon, hogsogo hayo, Ham fag galin wan gis taw.
44019014	In Iskiba manga anak ama fito ka tiba ka gibolon kitonya. Is Iskiba Hodyo, sadik fagtahinan fagalan-han-Diyos.
44019015	Dapat ay, ka labang nasagot has taw, iglwang kitay, Ho kilala in Hisos hanggan in Pablo, dapat fakta fag manga taw ham?
44019016	Ginya madi ka ama ka ha labang yapdi naogwan is taw, nadaog ya, nafalobas ya. Yakanga baranon ya malobasan ya ta no nalagyo ginya fag balay.
44019017	Ka mabanwanan sas banwa Ifiso, nyawa Hodyo, nyawa Girigo, ta nadog wa fagayo, tandala wa dahol dahol. Dapat is Hisos, kagfon intam it ngayan labi wanbantog.
44019018	Aywan kantiwala igsoyo, igbaya wan, taglwang, Mi gibolon yadi kitonya.
44019019	Gis nanya ka mangan tiwala ka ha manga botang yapdi nabangkad manga botang famasaan, nasonog sasta faglagan. Ta no nafahalga kasta nasonog fag manga botang, it halga 50,000 kwarta pilak gamtanan.
44019020	Yakanga ka manga taw kantiwala intam Fon hampang kaayo hanggan karigon.
44019021	Ginya madis Pablo naayfan kitay hanya fag domalan nangos has sakop Masidonya hanggan sakop Akaya bago di has banwa Hirosalim aban. Is Pablog lwang, Aho no giwas Hirosalim aban, ho fag domasog wan has banwa Roma.
44019022	Ginya madis Pablo nafagona ka dowak katogbong da Timotiyo da Irasto has sakop Masidonya. Dapat is Pablo in-goyan yapdi ngalay sas sakop Asya.
44019023	Gis nanya yadi fag manga masohod, ka manga taw sinyas Ifiso, gagran wan maskin ta kadwat igdog ka Ogali Bago gin Hisos.
44019024	Ha sadik fandayan pilak sinya, is Dimitriyo, ka kalig manga balay garogbot garogbot, in Diyana manga oliyanan. Is Diyana sadik tolad ina ista fagsimbaon. Dahol inda Dimitriyo fagfakinabangon giwat manga nahalig.
44019025	Is Dimitriyo nafatifon it manga sogowan hanggan ka tiba taw ka kitonya yadit fangaboyagon, nalwang kitay, Manga taw ham, ham fadi wadtwa kitay tam ha fakinabang dahol gintam manga fakaligon.
44019026	Ham fadi wadag lag, ham fadi wadag dog to fag is Pablo, it fagfaadalon. Hanyag lwang kitay no ka odi nahalig taw faglohodon, bonwa orongan diyos. Yakanga aywan it nafatiwala hanggan nafatanog, bondi istay is banwa Ifiso, hanggan sadi wak dahonya sakop Asya.
44019027	Mahori aban kamlag ginya fag adal, bondi kitay ta yomod intam manga fakaligon kantam fangaboyagon, intam faglohodon ina yadi, is Diyana, it oliyanan imbali idwa mahalga, hanggan nyawas Diyana, ka manga taga Asya, hanggan sadi wak baba daga faglohodon kati, aban idwa ha gomalang hanya domwag.
44019028	Ka manga taw nadog di ngay kitonya, tanhorit manga fangayofan, ta nanarawagan kitay, Kafiyaon, kafiyaon is Diyana, kantam manga taga Ifiso faglohodon.
44019029	Yakanga sadi wak dahonya banwa nangagran. Manga taw nagoyod inda Gayo da Aristarko, manga taga Masidonya, kan Pablo manga ofod sas lahawan, nagoyod hasta fanifonan fag balay basad banwa.
44019030	No kitay di, nos Pablo di, kasayag falag hanya has fakaaywanan, dapat ka manga fadwasay idwag faangay.
44019031	Ka tiba fag manga gorangon sas Asya, kan Pablo fakilalaon, nasogo yadi manga sogowan, nabando marigon kitay, is Pablo fag idwa has balay fanifonan.
44019032	Ka fakaaywanan fag manga taw mawang wa dahol gis nanya. Ka tibat faglwangon sadik bagay, ka tiba bokod wan it faglwangon maskin ka fakaaywanan idwa twa no kana mayon ta nogtifonan igtifonan sinya.
44019033	Ka tiba gayfan ka sinya is Alihandro ka fagfonan fagagraon maskin ka Hodyo nasyag hanya. Yakangas Alihandro nafaaman is taw kitay ta fag idwa gawang gawang kaarakitay hanya homampang fiya fiya has taw.
44019034	Dapat ta no nahilala kitay, Hodyo di mangharaw is Alihandro, ta nasohodan natawag dowak oras, taglwang, Kafiyaon kafiyaon is Diyana, kantam manga taga Ifiso faglohodon.
44019035	No dogay wa araw, ka fagtahinan banwa nabando is taw, idwa nafaawang domwag, nalwang kitay, Ham manga taga Ifiso, faktaw kadwa twa kitay ka banwa Ifiso ka gano in Diyana manga oliyanan, ham gayfan? Tam ka gano yadi ka bato mahalga kandagdag gis banwa gim tongod.
44019036	Idwa ha fabohag to fag manga bagay gin Diyana, yakanga ham fag kahoway wan hayo manga fangayofan, ham fag idwa gadaliyan.
44019037	Bonwa kitay ka hayo nataban fag manga taw ignahaw gin Diyana balay. Bonwa yadi kitay tagyod intam faglohodon ina, is Diyana.
44019038	Labi was Dimitriyo hanggan it manga ofod fandayan, no ha fagsombongon ngadi haday fag taw, ka manga fangabaya tomalinga wan, hanggan ha manga gorangon. Ham fag hanya wan nogfwayong, ngadi faktaw sa hayo.
44019039	Dapat ham no ha faglwangon ya tiba, fiya di nomtabo sa sadik hampangan ka maangay hantam ogaliyon.
44019040	Ngandayo ka mangag bahala sas Roma bomangdan intam kitay, tam kagfaagran kati maskin idwa ha nagfonan hayo fagagraon, idwa yadi ha kahologan ngadi ogbot ogbot.
44019041	No nalwang di nga kitonya, ka fagtahinan banwa nafaoli wa ka manga taw.
44020001	Ka manga taw nontabo wa gagran, is Pablo nafatawag ya in Hisos manga katogbong, nafarigon ya ista manga fangayofan. Ginya madi natogon is taw, nalahaw has sakop Masidonya.
44020002	Nasabang ha banwa ha banwa, nafaadal ya domwag in Hisos manga katogbong. Nafadagos wat lahawan hanggan wandasog has sakop Girisya.
44020003	Is Pablo nadogay yapdi sinya tolok magdanon. Ginya hanya nangos somahay has baba dagat, kafwali ya has sakop Siriya. Dapat no nadog kitay ha manga Hodyo goyonan wa fahatay hanya boknga dalan, it fangayofan hanya fag kafwali ya, domalan sas sakop Masidonya no goli.
44020004	Is Sopatir in Piro anak gis banwa Biriya naofod in Pablo hanggan da Aristarko da Sigondo gis banwa Tisalonika, is Gayo gis banwa Darbi, da Timotiyo, da Tikiko da Torofimo gis sakop Asya.
44020005	Ta nagona in Pablo, nafanaya hyami sas banwa Toroas.
44020006	Nonsagaya wa ka Fanohodan Tinapay Mayangfis, hami nasahay las dagat gis banwa Filipos. Sas falima fag sirang mindagsa sas banwa Toroas. Mi nadogay yapdi sinya fitok sirang.
44020007	Ka sirang gona basad simba, hami no matifonan kaarakitay manayowan kwan, igfaarogbotan tinapay, is Pablo natoltol has taw hanggan wa boknga yabi maskin no bago marom lomahaw wan.
44020008	Aywan fag salong sas tongod fag salogan sa hyami nagtifonan.
44020009	Is Iyotiko, sadik anahan, matokawan sas baba gaha. Ginya madi, kawas Pablo igtoltol yapdi ayo ayo, is Iyotiko intongka wan, intoyog wa fiya fiya. Yakanga indagdag gis fatolo fag salogan has daga gis baba gaha. Mahatayan wan ta nogfoyot hanya.
44020010	Dapat is Pablo nadokson wan, nafohot hanya. Iglwang has taw, Ham fag idwa galibitan, hanya boyagan di.
44020011	Is Pablo insakbaw ya, igfaarogbotan tinapay, igsayowan has taw, kwan wan. Ginya nafadagos yapdit toltol has taw hanggan wa kayawa, ginya madi bago di nalahaw.
44020012	Ista manga fangayofan inhoway wa orongan ta no nafaoli ya ka anahan hat sadili balay boyagan di.
44020013	Ginya madi, mi nasahay baba dagat, hawas banwa Ason. In Pablo togon kitay mi fag sinya wa kagtagbo hanya maskin it fangayofan hanya lomahaw sas nakamayan sas bahalan dagat.
44020014	Mi no nangablangan ya sas Ason, is Pablo nasahay, ginya mi nangoyogan has banwa Mitilini.
44020015	Mi nalahaw ginya sas baba dagat. No bago marom mindasog sas masohod foyo dagat Kiyo. No domwag sirang mindagsa sas foyo dagat Samos. Nondasog sadi yak sirang, mindagsa sas banwa Milito.
44020016	Is Pablo iglwang kitay, Tam fag somagaya yapdi sas banwa Ifiso kaarakitay tam idwam libang sas sakop Asya maskin is Pablo gatangon it lahawan. It fakasayaon, no somyagan di, fag sawas Hirosalim sas sirang Pintikostis.
44020017	Yakangas Pablo nafatawag has Milito ka manga fagtahinan gis Tifonan sas banwa Ifiso.
44020018	Ta nondasog, is Pablo iglwang, Ham fadi wadtwa no kana kangko ogali aho nogdogayan sa hayo gingko bago dasog sas sakop Asya.
44020019	Ahodwag faabwaton angko fangayofan no gibolon intam Fon ibolon. Nyawa ho goraw wa gagwanta aywan fag mahori kagsolay angko, kawa manga Hodyo goyonan wa kaisog angko.
44020020	Aho nogtoltol hanggan igfaadal hayo, nyawa sawasta fagdogan fagayo, nyawa ha hayo manga balay, hodwa kaya igfadog ha hayo nyawa kana fag bagay kagtogbong hayo.
44020021	Hogfwayong nyawa has manga Hodyo, nyawa has manga Girigo, kitay tam fag domayo intam manga ogali dwat, fag kafwali han Diyos, fag syag hantam Fon is Hisos.
44020022	Kati, kawa ka Maliyaw fag Falad kagtaban angko, ho hawas Hirosalim. Hodwa twa no kana ka madalanan sangko sinya.
44020023	Nonman, nyawa haday fag banwa aho nogsabang, ka Maliyaw fag Falad igfatohoyan kitay ahom poriso aban sas Hirosalim, hanggan ta fahoriyan yadingko sinya.
44020024	Dapat no kadi angko haboyagan idwa ha kinday sangko. Fag imtonglos di ngay angko lahawan. Fag imtabo in Hisos intam Fon disag hangko faibolonon, kawag fadog ka Fiya fag Barita, in Diyos malooy fag kahowayan.
44020025	Aho nogfaadal ha hayo kawa han Diyos sakop baliwa, tam gofodan yapdi. Dapat gis kati ginan ho twa wa kitay ham idwa lomag domwag angko.
44020026	Yakanga hoglwang kati bonwa aho ka hayo sogaton nyawa faktaw sa hayo no hawas kadwatan,
44020027	maskin ho natoltol wa fiya fiya ha hayo in Diyos kafangayofanan hantam, sadik dahonya.
44020028	Dapat ham fag matagahan hayo sadili hanggan hayo manga sakop ka Maliyaw fag Falad nafaano hayo. Ham fag gano fiya fiya in Diyos Tifonan, maskin it sadili Anak it kahatayan ka nabawi tonya.
44020029	Ho twa wa kitay angko ginanan aban, ha akwa manga taw, bilang manga ido maisog gi sayo basad talon, idwa fadaogon domwat ka Tifonan.
44020030	Gi yadi hayo aban hamlag manga taw kampang bohagon kaarakitay in Hisos manga katogbong imdiya wa hanya maskin kasayag fatalang manga taw, nomtwa di.
44020031	Yakanga ham fag matagahan, fag tohod kitay tolok fangaraw ho galowan wa kaawa hayo aho nogfaadal hayo, yabi sirang.
44020032	kati hogfaano hayo han Diyos, hanggan hat hampang kagfatohoyan it malooy fag kahowayan. Hanya ka fasyagan hayo, hanya ka twag disag ha hayo fagayo fag kafiyan kat nafatalaga has fagayo kat nafabokod hat sadili.
44020033	Nyawa ginahin hodwa ha fagayfanon hayo pilak, hayo ginto, hayo manga rotay, nyawa gafo.
44020034	Ham twa wa kitay kangko fangaboyagon, hanggan angko manga ofod fangaboyagon, gi wangko sadili nakayayan.
44020035	Nyawa ginahin hogfalag kitay ka kito kangko nakayayan ka fiya, kaarakitay tam ha togbongon has manga magomo it habilogan. Tam fag tohod in Hisos kagfon intam it fwayong kitay, Kagdisag bomaya man kagtanggap.
44020036	Nontabo wa kampang kitonya, is Pablo nalingkohodan, ginya ta nandarangin igsohodan.
44020037	Fagayo ta nangoraw wan, nafohot, naayok in Pablo.
44020038	Kasta fakarongkoton dahol kawa tagdog kitay is Pablo iglwang, Ham aba idwa lomag domwag angko. Ginya ta nafangolo in Pablo has sahayan sas baba dagat.
44021001	Nontabo wagtogon is taw, mi dagos wa nalahaw baba dagat hawas foyo dagat Kos. Nonbago marom, mindasog sas foyo dagat Rodas. Ginya madi mi hawas banwa Patara.
44021002	Sas Patara mi natahod sadi yak sahayan kagdifay has sakop Finisya, yakanga mi nasahay sinya, ginyan ginan wan.
44021003	Mi nadalan sas masohod foyo dagat Sipri, kabantay balis wala baliwa. Ginya madi migdagos wan hanggan wandasog has sakop Siriya. Mindagsa sas banwa Tiro maskin ta nafadokson it manga diya sinya.
44021004	Mi nasayak in Hisos manga katogbong sinya. Mi no nalag, mi nadogay sinya fitok sirang. Ka Maliyaw fag Falad nafaayfan in Hisos manga katogbong, tagbando in Pablo kitay, Fag idwa has Hirosalim.
44021005	Nonsagaya sadik simba, mi nalahaw ya ginya, nafadagos wa hyami lahawan. Fagayo, hanggan wat manga babay, manga anak, nafangolo hyami hanggan wa nadasog sas dayo banwa Tiro. Nondasog sas gobang dagat, mi fagayo nanlingkohodan a, nandarangin, hanggan nanarogonan ha sadi ha sadi.
44021006	Ginya mi nasahay ya ngawan hanggan ka manga taw ka nafangolo hyami nwali wan.
44021007	Gis banwa Tiro mi nalahaw ya has baba dagat hanggan wandasog has banwa Tolimaida. Mi sadi wak sirangan nanabang manga fadwasay sinya.
44021008	Ginya madi nonsirang mi nalahaw ya ngawan baba dagat hanggan mindagsa wan sas banwa Sisariya. Mi nigya san Filipi balay. Is Filipi sadi kagbarita, sadi yadi kasta nafili hyabi sas fito sas Hirosalim.
44021009	It manga anak dayaga ofat sonson wan Diyos manga fangampang.
44021010	Nonsagaya fihin ik sirang, ha akwan dasog gis Hodiya in Diyos fangampang sadi ya, it ngayan is Agabo.
44021011	Hanya nanabang hyami, nabol in Pablo fagyahos, nagafos it sadili bitis, manga gamat, ginyag lwang, Ka Maliyaw fag Falad nafwayong kitay, Kitonya yadi ka manga Hodyo sas Hirosalim gomafos kagfon to fag fagyahos, ginya ta fagamat hanya has manga Hintil.
44021012	Mi no nadog kitonya, migfwayong wagfwayong, hanggan ka taga sinya iglwang yadi han Pablo kitay, Gwadi haw fag idwa has Hirosalim.
44021013	Is Pablog lwang. Kana ham no goraw hanggan igfagomo angko fangayofan? Maskin ho galwasi in Hisos kagfon intam, ho talaga wa fagafos angko, nyawa hanggan wa matay sas Hirosalim, no tonya wat fasadan.
44021014	Mi nodwa nasyagan nabando, mi fawa ha naawang domwag hanya baliwa, miglwang, No kindawan kagfon intam it fasadan, fag kitonya wan.
44021015	Nonsagaya fihin ik sirang, mi galimbotangan wan, mi hawas Hirosalim.
44021016	In Hisos manga katogbong tiba gis banwa Sisariya nahin hyami, nafangolo hyami han Manason balay maskin mi sinya wak migya. Is Manason taga Sipri, dogay wantiwala han Hisos.
44021017	Mi nondasog sas Hirosalim, intam manga fadwasay nabaya waglag hyami.
44021018	No bago marom mi nanabang in Santyago. Sinya yadi ka manga fagtahinan fagayo san Diyos Tifonan.
44021019	Nonsagaya kampang ogbot magalang has taw, igbaya, is Pablo nafwayong igsadig sadi ka manga bagay in Diyos naibolon has manga Hintil kawas Pablo nogbarita.
44021020	Ta no nadog kitonya, tagfasayagdog in Diyos. Dapat ta nalwang han Pablo, Fadwasay Pablo, haw fadi wadtwa no kayodawak libo fag manga Hodyo kawa mangag syag in Hisos, mahogod yapdi no katanog in Mwisis togon.
44021021	Ha akwa nafadahit has manga Hodyo istay kitay, haw igfwayong has manga Hodyo kan-aktom sas manga banwanan Hintil kitay, Ta fag domayo in Mwisis manga togon. Haw, hono, iglwang fag idwag fatoli ista manga anak, fag idwa yadi katanog ka ogali Hodyo.
44021022	Kinda araw intam halimbawan? Matohoyanan ta domog kitay haw indasog wastay kati.
44021023	Fag kito nangos kam ibolonon. Istay ha ofat ik ama Hodyo ha taranggapan has Fanimbaan-Dahol.
44021024	Ha tabanan wa nangos ka ofat ik ama, haw fag fadagos ka ogali igfalinay kagfatonglos intam Batasan Hodyo. Fag haw wa kagsakop ista gastos. Ginya madi ta falinay it manga alfoyo. No kitonya fagayo tomwa kitay ista fadahit ya mangharaw idwa orongan. Haw katanog yapdi ka Batasan Hodyo.
44021025	No kadi has manga Hintil kantiwala, mi nafadiya sorat no kinday ka hyami fangayofan. Ta fag idwa kwan kasta manga nadisag has manga tolad faglohodon. Fag idwa kwan folot hayopan, hanggan ka manga hayopan kantagbong. Ta fag idwa yadig fabayowan.
44021026	Yakanga nonbago marom, is Pablo naofod ka manga ama, nafadagos ka ogali igfalinay, hanggan nasakbaw has basad Fanimbaan-Dahol. Nafadog has taw no ginahin imtabo ta nogfatonglos ka ogali nogfalinay kito, hanggan no ginahin hanya no domisag ka manga bato disagon kagsakop ka manga ama ofat.
44021027	No kaakbang wa kasagaya tonya fag fitok sirang, is Pablo nasakbaw has basad Fanimbaan-Dahol. Tiba Hodyo sinya, manga taga Asya, ka nalag in Pablo it fagonan, nafasognod has fakaaywanan, naogwan in Pablo,
44021028	natawag ya ngadi kitay, Manga kapariho Hodyo, kalibang, togbongan hyami. To fag taw, nyawa haday kandasog, nogfaadal has taw, iglaban has tifonan Israil, iglaban ka Batasan Hodyo, iglaban has Fanimbaan-Dahol. Bondi tonya, hanya nataban yadi manga Girigo has basad Fanimbaan-Dahol, igsagaya wa ogali istay sas basad balay kantohoyan han Diyos.
44021029	Taglwang kitonya maskin ta nalag is Pablo no gayayag basad banwa, ha ofod is Torofimo, sadik Hintil, taga Ifiso. Ista odi asolop kitay ngandayo tonyan Pablo ofod has basad aladan Fanimbaan-Dahol.
